1b1(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar pa ti put+pa
1b2(dkon brtsegs): sa pag pa na nA ma mar+tha yA na~M sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'bregs
1b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yab dang sras mjal ba ni se ba ba/ theg pa chen po
1b4(dkon brtsegs): mdo/
1b5(dkon brtsegs): / mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / bang chu
1b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dang /
1b7(dkon brtsegs): 'big snapa can po dang / rangs
1b8(dkon brtsegs): sa thams cad la bag 'tshal lo//
1b9(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad la phag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa/
1b10(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA pa ti pu
1b11(dkon brtsegs): sa pag ma na nA ma mahA yA na~M swA tra/ bid skad du/ 'a/
1b12(dkon brtsegs): pa yab dang sr-is mjal ba zhi se ba pa/ theg pa chen po'i
2a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
2a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang songs
2a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa/
2b1(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol bla grolnga ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ du
2b2(dkon brtsegs): bai rul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi ba zhi pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgab pa rnas
2b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa
2b4(dkon brtsegs): blang la byin pa theng la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs byin pa dbugs byin
4a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan
4a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa
4a3(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srung sA phun sum
4a4(dkon brtsegs): cho gas pa dran pa'i sgo sku phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa don
4a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyetse ba'i bden pa gsal ba nye rtse ba'i 'den pa bsal
4b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa btsal ba spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa mthar
4b2(dkon brtsegs): pin+da pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'ikhor dang ldan pa/ bdag
4b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'kho re dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu/
4b4(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su rmed pag
4b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu gsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu gsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa
4b6(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo ba le mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grog
5a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu
5a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba sher ba shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang
5a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ yal ga dang / la ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lcug ma dang / shun lpags kyi skyon dang
5a4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/ dag pa snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/
5a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang
5a6(dkon brtsegs): chu klung 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo gal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong
5b1(dkon brtsegs): stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa
5b2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes
5b3(dkon brtsegs): rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khu
5b4(dkon brtsegs): bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i
5b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stan
5b6(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs cig ste/ de'i tshe nem gyi tho rangs kyi res la/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/
6a1(dkon brtsegs): blag pa med pa na bzhugs so// ra bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams pa dadang ldan
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dud la gzigs nas/ dge slong
6a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'gal
6a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko di n+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
6a5(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i stangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gas ba de sogs su thal mo snang ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
6a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon por dad par bgyi'o// de skad
6b1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun shes kau nI la 'di skad ces bka' sbas to// kau di r+ya khyod ni zlum tham du
6b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug cig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin pa
6b3(dkon brtsegs): lteng rgyas 'ad srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa nA ri'i bu dang
6b4(dkon brtsegs): mo gal gyi bu chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po
6b5(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen po
6b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mau gal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug cig/ de nas tshe
6b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bus chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan
7a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa chogs kyi gyen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pa des du
7a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyapa gnag ste/ de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa 'chad ci
7a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu
7a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'cher ka la 'di skad
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang me mngon par dad par bya ba
7a6(dkon brtsegs): nuso zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'chang ka de lta yin gyis/ khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad
7a7(dkon brtsegs): pa skyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
7b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo gas kyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bshin tu // 'a ste/ rgyal pa rnams ni lhag par da'o// rdob phyir nas
7b2(dkon brtsegs): tAl rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ shing khur bcu'am/
7b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ sum cu 'am/ be ni bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing / skam la lo mang du son
7b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig yod/ de la mi la la zhig gis/ me btang na me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyuraro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis
7b5(dkon brtsegs): gtong na/ me'i phung po de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo gal
7b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'o ba yin// tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen po 'dis ste/
7b7(dkon brtsegs): dper na glang po che mche bo can kha gang nges pa'i so brag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu de bzhin du/ rgyal po rgyal rigs
7b8(dkon brtsegs): spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char/
8a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lha mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis/ rgyal po zas gtsang
8a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing band pa yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mogs kyi bu chen po/ bcom ldan
8a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa 'tshor ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
8a4(dkon brtsegs): slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do// zhes dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ 'char
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ka rtul po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char kA rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang na ngas dad par bye'i/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o//
8a6(dkon brtsegs): 'char/ nga'i nyan thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang
8a7(dkon brtsegs): snun pa 'angar ka la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsas pa/ 'char ka bzang po las nyan par zos// khyod ni rigs dang byed partog rab yid gyis//
8a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs rnams dga' ba bskyed pa yi// rgyal po'i dab pa byung ngu dang bar bros// rgyal po ba de dad par byas ni// rigs kyi sta ngag dang ni mi rnams so//
8b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos// da lta na ni shAH'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtag pas/
8b2(dkon brtsegs): dkrugs shing nyams// ri yi nges nas dbab 'grel mi bzhin du// brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su
8b3(dkon brtsegs): dran byed pas// yid la gnod 'gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/ rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs ga nas pa bzhin/
8b4(dkon brtsegs): lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phros shing // lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal po bde nyams snyi
8b5(dkon brtsegs): d+herA smre sngags 'dod// nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang // mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang // longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing // sa bdag
8b6(dkon brtsegs): ni snying rjer smre sngags 'dod// mdangs 'phrog 'byed pa'i mi ni stobs can gyis// ji ltar mi zhig yongs su non gyu ra na// bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes
8b7(dkon brtsegs): ltase yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no// ti se gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag bltar bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin du rgyal chen
8b8(dkon brtsegs): bos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos bsdu bar bya ba mi mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gi ma shi bas myos gyur pa'i// mos ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te/
9a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos pa yi// rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim tha shi zas myos pa mi/
9a2(dkon brtsegs): bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'dod// de lta bas nA 'char ka
9a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskyal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa blang bar gyis/
9a4(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka khyod ma gtogs pa srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag na skal mthun spyod med pas// rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dang bya bar// gang gis nus pa'i dge slong
9a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med// 'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus na sa yi bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// sa skyong byed pa rnam
9a6(dkon brtsegs): par grags pa byung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni//
9a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par rgyal po des kyang bskyangs// grong dang grong khyer dag kyang bdab nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang
9a8(dkon brtsegs): shed les skyes// sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgyad stong dag gis gang ba ste// sdong dum cher ma du shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong
9b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrung
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad// de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod// rgyal po de lo'i bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mdza nga
9b3(dkon brtsegs): b+ha ska/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan// ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
9b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog/ 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'// rgyal po dben pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lha yi pho brang
9b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i khyu mchog 'dir// na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni// ji ltar
9b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras/ bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir// mamos pa la bu yis myung du spros// sbrid pa'i 'gro ba
9b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mkhas bgyis te// bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba bskyed// bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs bgyis te// yu la la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par
9b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis// dka' thub gnas na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dge bu
10a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig khyod la stabs/ de ska bas na 'dod pa'i dga'as spyad// dadang rgyal sri thams cad khyod dang mdzu// rnamams su
10a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang btsA ba ste// gnal med lang gi rnan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di ga rnams kyang mchog gzugs snan zhing // mA ma n+d+has sbyirnas pa'i byen pa
10a3(dkon brtsegs): ros mo'i sgra yi tshul dang grul mkhas// bsnyen bkur bsnyems shing yod ta yid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni pad+ma'i sim 'dra ba ste// brim pa'i'i mdog brjod du mdzes
10a4(dkon brtsegs): nga 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug/ brla ni glang po che yi sna dang 'dra// phrag so sha rgyas
10a5(dkon brtsegs): b+hU at+ma legs dang ldan// lag pa rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/ sor mo byin gyis pra bai re legs dang ldan// kye ni zangs mdog 'dral srab cing dag
10a6(dkon brtsegs): rlig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// so na thig bzang so rnams rang rong med// mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba 'phyang der 'dug cing lta ba
10a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug/ sta zur yongs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing // mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin// dregs bcas glang chen 'a
10a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'gros dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la ste// rtse ba 'dod cing dang la ba ba dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje ltos la brtse ba byos// bu gcig
10b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang dngul bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin snang gis// nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsnyen par gyis/
10b2(dkon brtsegs): snying po ldan des smras pa yi// pa dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras// yab cig khyod ni meng par gsung b.lags// gang dag tshig gis grags
10b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad meng // yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan la bab la rgyal po gson// ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod pa dang /
10b4(dkon brtsegs): so mi dga'o zhing ma mos de 'dra son// sa yi bdag po'i bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas skye bo dag gis
10b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bsam// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smra// long ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis// long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid/
10b6(dkon brtsegs): zad la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol ba ci lta bur na bcings pa yi// tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug par
10b7(dkon brtsegs): gyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar ni// nyam ngar gnaso la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing /
10b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba// long ba rus khyer brtson par gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam bgyi// mi yi bdag po khyod ni/
11a1(dkon brtsegs): long ba bzhin// bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa
11a2(dkon brtsegs): sra la rnam par smod// 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/
11a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yi dung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// smye sde gas 'don pa'i pa dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi pags rnying rjes pa ci 'dra dang // ngar snabs rdzus pa'i thal ba bzhinide spangs te/
11a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong po snun pa chags med pa// sdig pa rnam par bral te rab tu byung // gnon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba
11a6(dkon brtsegs): byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po pi skyed
11a7(dkon brtsegs): ma/ grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa las// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du smra bas na// mi yi sa
11a8(dkon brtsegs): ge de ni 'dod khas gnas// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni 'thob bya'i phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gnon nu rab tu byung bas na//
11b1(dkon brtsegs): bu de bu lam dad gyur pa dang // zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas// la ra ka khyo ni dus kyi snum ze
11b2(dkon brtsegs): blos snying po gzhan sgyum mAm// nga nyid de yi nI na der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/
11b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// mi yi bdag po zas gcung 'di nyid de// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar 'gyur// 'char ka khyod ni des
11b4(dkon brtsegs): snyom sems// rjes su rab byung zla byin gzhan snyam mam// khyod nyid de'i tshe de yi dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba drad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'chan
11b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de
11b6(dkon brtsegs): das tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bas khas blangaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zhig de 'das nas sA dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sha
11b7(dkon brtsegs): srabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na/ shAkya stong
11b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig dgos pa zhig go ched du 'dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon nas/ ser skya'i gnas 'di nyidan
12a1(dkon brtsegs): shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni
12a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyag gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rna ma par rgyal ba/
12a3(dkon brtsegs): chos da rjong ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di ci dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /
12a4(dkon brtsegs): glang po ring po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun
12a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ des gling chen
12a6(dkon brtsegs): ban pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'del ba med la/ mnyam ste/ mi mnyam pa med cing / chos dang mthun par legs
12a7(dkon brtsegs): par bab nas bskam pa rdzogs par bskyangs par gyur pa zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang
12a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan cing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / ji sang du byas pa dang / mdzong par mi byas pa dang / dbang du ga gi dbang drug
12b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to narma/
12b2(dkon brtsegs): des de snyam du bsams nas/ shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la bsti ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhigu nga'i bu de
12b3(dkon brtsegs): ba bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na/ de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas
12b4(dkon brtsegs): sem par gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song
12b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka laM yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legaso// tshe dang ldan pa 'char/
12b6(dkon brtsegs): yun yang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bskrun ma mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba
12b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tama?/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal /
12b8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dge' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces sa// dga' ba'i bzhin de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das /
13a1(dkon brtsegs): bskrun mi mnga'// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugaso// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/
13a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis po brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bani/
13a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba dra song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la
13a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legaso// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang ring zhig nas byon to//
13a5(dkon brtsegs): tshedang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'amo/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba
13a6(dkon brtsegs): ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang
13a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sangs 'di skad ces smraso// shin tu legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskrun mi mnga'o//
13a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhun so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de lagamang ba ci yang med do// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// pa'i mi sgoms/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis po brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu
13b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par sang gnas dben pa de 'khod par mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'aN ka gas pa der song ste/ tshe dang snun pa 'ar kul yang dag par mdzu ba
13b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka nur spyod/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka pyod pa li zhes// tshe dang ldan pa 'drar ka yun yang ring zhig nas phyin to// tshe dang ldan pa'i
13b4(dkon brtsegs): ldad 'das sa bsnyun gyi meng ba 'am/ sbubs dang ldan napa/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi ming 'a bas/ de la 'am ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/
13b5(dkon brtsegs): smin 'das bad pa ri byod tAm/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bas dza stoms kyis 'o ma brtul ta pa/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyu dang ldang pa lar ka swA bA \u0f7f'i
13b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces smraso// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das laM bsnun myi ma 'o// stobs dang ldan no// nga /
13b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhug so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam ba ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i
13b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par bye'o//
17a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa/ chos kyis 'byung ba ni sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/
17a2(dkon brtsegs): ni ba'i dgon par zhi ba ston mdzad pas// smyon pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos skyes pa/ sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i che// yan lag
17a3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te// rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pa'i khrus byas na// nags kyi mtha' thub pa su yis bkru// 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab
17a4(dkon brtsegs): stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa des bkrus gnan yang ba mdzad// sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal lo skye bo phal chen sgros// rgyal
17a5(dkon brtsegs): bes smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyad// rgyal po'i rkyen pos gos mchog bzang po gye no// can dang nim pos shing 'ad ba legs par bris/
17a6(dkon brtsegs): nags chen de'i gseb thub pa su yis brgyan// 'an+dar kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brnyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin pasam
17a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan brgyan// mngon shes rig pa rnam par brgyan pa'i sku// rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri
17a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshon thegs pa'i// dpa' bo yul du po mos lus bsrungs te/ khwa bre gdugs kyis rtag tu dka' bas dga'// gcig pu rigs na bdug na su yis bsrungs/ @
17b1(dkon brtsegs): kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mangs
17b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyas// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras// chos legs spyod cing du ba med brjod pa thob// khyod
17b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang zan ze bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di
17b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smraso// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon/ tshogs kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongasu sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi
17b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na dge sbyong gi rgyal po lham me lhan ne spang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yang gyi chos bco lnga la zla ba sa ste yongasu rgyas po'i tshe/
17b6(dkon brtsegs): skar ma'i tshigs kyis kun nus pas ra~M bA ni lham me spyan de skang dri ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang ma bzhugs na/ snum ste snyan no spang ngeg/
17b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyi ma ni ston g+h+r-i dus na shin tu lham me sman ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang / dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na shin tu sgyum
17b8(dkon brtsegs): ma~M snyan ne glang rje'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i ring na 'jug pa ni lham me lhan ni lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong
20a1(dkon brtsegs): de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te/
20a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byor gyur te//
20a3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gong gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs
20a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de// bdag cag srid pa'i rgyud las sgrol mdzad na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// de yi dus dbab blta bar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das
20a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i dus mkhyer te// 'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la// blte ba'i
20a6(dkon brtsegs): don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po de ni rang gi sems kyis su// de snyam du ni rje su bsam par byas// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjesu
20a7(dkon brtsegs): bsdams nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod ci zhig dgos/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma
20a8(dkon brtsegs): la tshig su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam bya ste// khyod nyid dad par bya phyi ra bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems
20b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed na// skyes pa bud med dag mtho ris 'dong // stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med lngar// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byon
20b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya lce blo thugs dang skyed cig dang // khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jog rten 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs
20b3(dkon brtsegs): bo d+hi cher mi rmi/ chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par// stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad// srid pa bla nI las brga lnga gyur nas/
20b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mang po chu ba chu lces sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'dod gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la no dad pa skyed// sring po'i zug rngubani pa kun bca
20b5(dkon brtsegs): sman po'i gtso ba smr-i dgu'i zug rngub byin// gso bar byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'arjer pa lnga mchog 'an dad pa skyed// bdud kyi smo tsam dpag
20b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa pa mdzad de// nag poni rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu ni ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis// 'dred pa mi mchags ni rid pa snying
20b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba stsam ni chos kyang bas dang // 'di me ni ba mal bsha gsas nas// mau ba sa ni m+b+hi dbang gis sa 'debs kyis// 'dredan pa mi ma chog
20b8(dkon brtsegs): dang pa spyod// phas kyi rnam lam tshogs rnams zil ma da te// sri pa dpag yas ma 'dzi mo rab bsko nas// sems sad bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzang kyis/
21a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mi mchog la ni drad pa skyed// rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/ mur pa rab rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi// mig
21a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa skyed// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la// rga 'chi med mchog mi
21a3(dkon brtsegs): la ston mdzad cing // 'chi med gnas su sems can dor mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// me chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig
21a4(dkon brtsegs): rten 'di// mes pajig su la sprin chen char pa bzhin// ba ni gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad bskyed// dri gsum
21a5(dkon brtsegs): drim spangs shing skyon bsal to// dri ma gsum las skye bo grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi ma tshig la ni dang bsnod
21a6(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu kun la phra bai ni mdzugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs// thugs rje thogs brtse sems can 'grol mdzad kyis// 'dren
21a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog lnga ni dad pa skyed// bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul// thugs rje mnga' ba ma ni ni mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs ni mdzad
21a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho las ni lha'i bus ji lta bar// stobs bcu
21b1(dkon brtsegs): rje che ma' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// tshad med yon tan tshegs kyis mdzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis
21b2(dkon brtsegs): spo yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis// 'dren po mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye bo dang bar
21b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod mdzad cing // mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin rjen rang bzhin yongs dag pa// mkhas pa'i
21b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ngo po dga' ba yongasu skyed// rgyal ba de bzhini skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed// 'jig rten gtsel dad pa thob 'gyur na
21b5(dkon brtsegs): mi dang lha dag sdug po sAl khur yang 'dor// sbrid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'gro// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig
21b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ni// na mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding ji bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skad// de nas
21b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la se legs par bshad pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis
21b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon du mthong / sngon bdag rmel nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bya'o// zhes de ma bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dang
22a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par gyur to// de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong khyod ni nga'i chos
22a2(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa'i bu yin nam/ khyod bdag gi gzan zil bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song nag/ nga yang bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir phye ba nin 'ong ngo //
22a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas/ gzan zos te bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo // de'i tshe ba
22a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/ deng skye bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro//
22a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//
22a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'chang ka legs so legaso// de rong rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas
22a7(dkon brtsegs): da kyis pa sode na pas mang du bskyed de// de'i ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams sa bka' stsas pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal blo zas gcad ma
22a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dad par byas pa'i ba sod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de sa gal te gzugs shig yod na ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
22b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nam kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshes gan/
22b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do// mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod
22b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa/ lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am
22b4(dkon brtsegs): brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi nas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogasu brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bco
22b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor
22b7(dkon brtsegs): cing bdud du bar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te shar phyogs su
22b8(dkon brtsegs): brten nas/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po
23a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhid du bcom ldan
23a2(dkon brtsegs): bdas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs
23a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
23a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskor cing mdun du bad ra nas snga ma bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nub
23a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs lags brte na steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug
23a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ lha 'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas
23a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam bzhin steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin du lha 'ings
23a8(dkon brtsegs): rab 'thab bral dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i dbang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
23b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i dbang po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / gar su gtsang ma'i snam
23b2(dkon brtsegs): nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar sngangs che
23b3(dkon brtsegs): yang g.yog 'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha ma
23b4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po theg bzong ris kyang / lha ma yan khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i sreg pa bsgrub
23b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris sgyu ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bco
23b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing
23b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyu to/ bya'i rgyal po 'ad ba bzang brgya de khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas/ mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur ma
23b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zos phyag 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur te/ gzhon mu stegs can kun tu
24a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lpags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ na mkha' yongs su
24a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba sa pa yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnanA nas ni// na mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes
24a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'jom// rtog ge can tshegs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag
24a4(dkon brtsegs): po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas su/
24a5(dkon brtsegs): sipa de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// ma~M yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes rgyu
24a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing // nyan thos pang+gA'i tshal mchog la yang 'byed// swA yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// swA
24a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// bde sogs khyim thub sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs
24a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mdun bdang stong gsum na// rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rna ma par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po la
24b1(dkon brtsegs): bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsur byas pa// 'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na
24b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngar 'gror gtong ba zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad
24b3(dkon brtsegs): ning stobs yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha yi rgyal po yongasu dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor// sna tshogs
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang // lha mi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar
24b5(dkon brtsegs): byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs zis
24b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po zil gyis ldanan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yi so lha gnas na// gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de nin nyon mongs rnams las rnam
24b7(dkon brtsegs): grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// me dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/
24b8(dkon brtsegs): po dbang sgyur byed pa ni// lha'i gnas 'dug cing lnga tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ga'i brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur/
25a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngan chad spyad pas lha mi zil mngon te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
25a2(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyang // rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshungs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te/
25a3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu snyan pa yan dag brgyad ldan dag/ yongasu rjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs
25a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung ba// 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa sgo dang mi rnams dang /
25a5(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po dag ni dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston pa mdzad// bya lam na mkha' dpag
25a6(dkon brtsegs): par tshus kyang srid/ rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid// ri rab srung brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtho rtogs mi nus so//
25a7(dkon brtsegs): / rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bam po gnyis pa/
25a8(dkon brtsegs): denas tshe dang ldan pa 'cha song nas ring po ma lon par rgyam tho thos gtsang mas kyi rnams la bsgo ba/ thogs pa dag 'dis ste dperan/ rim par
25b1(dkon brtsegs): sngas ma ni gang 'di dpang reng 'altar zag// dbyar re shar na ni 'char bar shes pa'o// thugs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'gyur ka yAng / bcom sngan
25b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sna ltas yin te/ dge sbyong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grogase bo pa
25b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bus na bzhon pa'i mchog rnams bstod de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ di ring kho nar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu lhan sdug pa de lta zhing 'dod de
25b4(dkon brtsegs): lha logs zhes gsolha nas/ shAkya rnams rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstan do// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas
25b5(dkon brtsegs): se skya'i gnas dang / n+ya g+ho d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing / bye ma gtsang ma brdal du bcug
25b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ nyams gang ba dang / me tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabasu gar mkhan dang / gA
25b7(dkon brtsegs): mi khan dang / gyad dang / bum pa thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / gla'i cha sprad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to/
25b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang / chas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyi nga bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
26a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas byung nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shAkyal la'i banon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu
26a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di lar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du sngo la/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing / rgyan rnams kyang sngo la/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa
26a3(dkon brtsegs): khor rgyan sde po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lham rgyan sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma gcad
26a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ras sdongan po gyon cing / rgyang sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyun sngon po can lcag thags dang khrid pa du me dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon pa
26a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgreng ba shi stag ste/ shing rtswar re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shAkya la la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'dri lta bu ste/ 'di ltar
26a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ster ba nas/ thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkra ba dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo
26a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du bzhin no// shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mtshan can gser gyi
26a8(dkon brtsegs): drabs g.yogs pa sha stag bshams pa ste/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas
26b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od ra gyur to// glang po che brgyad khri de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyun gyis brgyad pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pa rin po che sna bdud gyi rgyu
26b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa brjid khri bshams par gyur te 'dong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgya ring po nas 'ong
26b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs na/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang gis sumu cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mosna tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis
26b4(dkon brtsegs): shAkya seHskya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams sor skya'i gnas nas byung ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
26b5(dkon brtsegs): lha skyed mos rnyil du 'dong pa dang rjes su mthun no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya'o grong khyer dam pa nas// rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyA
26b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog de// kho dang bcas te ji ltar 'ong gyur pa// de ltar bstan gyis khyad cag de nyon cig/ shing rta brgya stong mchog dang ldan pa dag/ legs par brgya
26b7(dkon brtsegs): cing mdzes par smras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rkyen yang sngo ba dang // rta yang
26b8(dkon brtsegs): nang sde 'i la dang bcas/ mtshan pa lnga po dag kyang rdzob ste// de bani dgis kyi dam pa das kyang bri// sug kyang sde zhing thag sang ngeg kyangs/
27a1(dkon brtsegs): bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par
27a2(dkon brtsegs): byas/ shing rta ser zhing rgyan yang ser ba dang // rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bces// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste// de bzhin gos kyi
27a3(dkon brtsegs): dram pa dag kyang ser// lug kyang ser zhing thag srad dag kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can
27a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dmar zhing rgyan yang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas/
27a5(dkon brtsegs): car ma lnga paM dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam dag kyang dmar// lcag kyang dmar zhing thag srad dag kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
27a6(dkon brtsegs): mas dang bcas/ mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyan yang dkar ba dang //
27a7(dkon brtsegs): rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcug kyang dkar zhing thag
27a8(dkon brtsegs): sri rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par
27b1(dkon brtsegs): byas shing rta bkra zhing rgyun yang bkra ba dang // d+hA yang bkra zhing bkru ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba skye// de bani gas
27b2(dkon brtsegs): ngom pa dag kyang bkra// lhag kyang bkra zhing thag srang dag kyang bkra/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba ni gos can te/
27b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khri ching bar bshams pa ni// gser gyi rgyal mtshan
27b4(dkon brtsegs): gis rnam par brgyan// / glang po rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su/
27b5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun
27b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes// rgyal po'i tshe 'os rgyal po 'tshom stabs can// glang po de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi//
27b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan gar
27b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhan rnams dang gyad rnams dang // bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga'i zhing rgyal ba
28a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi bzhin 'brang // / rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal ba
28a2(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rta babs pa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du
28a3(dkon brtsegs): bdang te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas/ mig gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi
28a4(dkon brtsegs): bar snang gi na mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i
28a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zham ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de lta
28a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nam ring du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams ba
28a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung
28a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog mar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la smad nas/
28b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thul mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das lnga phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'banas skyes
28b2(dkon brtsegs): mog mi bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog mar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabar te/ pus mo g.yas pa ni
28b3(dkon brtsegs): ngasrud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe d+hal
28b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thub bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ru
28b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma
28b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / lha'i me tog nAn+di ra ba dang / mAn+da ra ba chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
28b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rol mo sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// mi las 'das pa'i klu'i nga ro yang steng gi bar snang las byung
28b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// l-I'i me tog ut+pal dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye mo'i char yang bab par gyur to//
29a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa yang mthong / lha'i rin po che sna
29a3(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi rgyu mas grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsum
29a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar gyur pa ngo mtshar mi che ste
29a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o// zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang phyug lce dbang byed pa de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas
29a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
29a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te// tshig 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud te/ phyogs bzhir gzigs
29b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ ngani 'jig rten na gnaza/ nga ni 'jig rten nA dag ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / rlung dang /
29b2(dkon brtsegs): mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan pa
29b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas/ dzAm+bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe// nyi ma yo yang dz+nyAm+bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma btang ste
29b4(dkon brtsegs): sna'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// nga yang bcom ldan
29b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di dang lani gsum du phyog 'tshal lo// zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smra so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bsnams nas
29b6(dkon brtsegs): sa chen ba mgom pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen zhing nga'i
29b7(dkon brtsegs): tsud cha// dzAm+ba'i grim mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing // lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// da
29b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag
31a1(dkon brtsegs): ci smos// mtshan ni don grub legs shes sngon brjod pa// pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud
31a2(dkon brtsegs): cornyis pas na// don grub legs par bdag gis da gdod 'tshal// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri
31a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i yid zhan gyi rwas bcos pu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bsham so// thams ca da dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi
31a4(dkon brtsegs): ras bac+doMs pus g.yogs par me ting ngo // steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi riras bcos pu'i bla bre bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chag sa de nas
31a5(dkon brtsegs): babs te/ gadrar khri bshams pa la bzhugs so// rgyal zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
31a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dag go/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar
31a7(dkon brtsegs): snangs 'khod par gyur to// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser sna zhes bya grong khyer dbu pa yi// n+ya gro d+ha ya~M ra ba nyams dag
31a8(dkon brtsegs): bair rgyal po zas gtsang de dag gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yini// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dab
31b1(dkon brtsegs): klu tshogs rnams de bzhin dbul bupa dang // d+hi ba rgyal rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am gyi
31b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa
31b3(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal pa dang dge rgyas pa dag dang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus//
31b4(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang // gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'byung ba rnams kyang 'dus
31b5(dkon brtsegs): seng sa rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por
31b6(dkon brtsegs): 8/ sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongasu tshim par byas// da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni
31b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi// rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis//
31b8(dkon brtsegs): nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol ba// gling ba ni dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin cher sna bdun dag
32a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing
32a2(dkon brtsegs): sa ya skyong ba ste// gling bzhi dbang ba'i rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi yi bdeg dang mi yi mchod par 'ong // lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab/
32a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis// rgyal po bdag gis tshig la
32a4(dkon brtsegs): gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis// bdag la bslu bar mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod// bdag
32a5(dkon brtsegs): la cung bdun ma yang thugs mini// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rus sAl gcig cig 'phangs// d+ha mtshwa'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dang
32a6(dkon brtsegs): rus+saH/ de ri ljon pa'i ring du m+b+hi // de la khrod pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus sbrul gang nas 'dir 'ongs te// nga yi the tshom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir/
32a7(dkon brtsegs): myur gyu// smras shes de skad smras// khron pa'i nang gi rus sbrul de nyi la// rgya mtsho'i rus sbrul blo rkyen des smras pa// da ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te/
32a8(dkon brtsegs): khron pa der ni dri ring bor bar gyur// rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song // da ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// da ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na/
32b1(dkon brtsegs): ruskal khrod kyi khrod par gnas cha'o// de la khrodan pa'i nang gi rus sbrul gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam ram// 'on te khror pa 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris
32b2(dkon brtsegs): ngal myur du smos shes smras// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo rgya chen po des// khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig smras pa// khror pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pa ste/
32b3(dkon brtsegs): blo rgya tshur zhing shes pa ra ba tu nan// nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring dus nas de ru skye skye yang // rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma nus no// dbus su
32b4(dkon brtsegs): gros mor ga ma nus shes smras/ de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chung ngo // gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/
32b5(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis byud sa la bslab medzad par ba zed// bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chud pas mi gtsang mtshon nas 'da' med pa// sung gsum 'jig
32b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di nga ba bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgrums pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'dus
32b7(dkon brtsegs): skyos / spyod band nas// dpyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems rgyur rnams ma thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal po zas gceng sems
32b8(dkon brtsegs): ni // lugs kyis lasu phrul pa mdzad pa nga/ mjig rte gsul thomaH'i das mi lus par// de 'i ma de ni 'dus
33a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rgyal po 'dus par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sgyu ma yin
33a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po thag bzang ris/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po
33a3(dkon brtsegs): thug pa bang ri l+h+wa mA yin khrag khrig phrag drug ts+tsha dang / l+h+wam yin gyi bu mo khrug khrig drug drug cu dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mdzod pa zlog par byas te/
33a4(dkon brtsegs): des rgya mtsho chen po'i ring na rin po che ni thang yod pa dang / rin thang med po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo// rin po
33a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon
33a6(dkon brtsegs): par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can/ rkang
33a7(dkon brtsegs): lag gi rgyan daser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab ldan/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha
33a8(dkon brtsegs): stag go// cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ru dag kyang mngon par sbrel to// shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyan mtshan can/ gsor gyi rgyan
33b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya pan spyan no// ying bzhin rgyu nod bu d+hA b+he de dag kyang skyed gA byar spyang smras shing / de dag gi phyi bzhid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ng+ga dzA dag 'dodun
33b2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu ma / gang rta de dag slod na na snod pa sha stag go// yang bzhid gyi nang bu'i bla ze dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rin gyi che sna bdud hUM phreng ba'i lnga sde ma
33b3(dkon brtsegs): da ngos/ 'ad bzhin gyi nor bu'i zla bri de dag kyang / rin po che sna bdun kyai sa zug yeng ka'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shidr-id+ha'i rgyun dang /
33b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyag zla rje'i rgyud de de/ rlung gis bskyod/ swA swA stong ming dbyings mnyangan ba bag skye ga'i'abyung bar 'gyur/ sa skye bar ma rabam du/
33b5(dkon brtsegs): ma ming du phreng ba dang / na 'di bar 'byung bar ba'i dzu 'i de sna nga
33b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma ma
34a1(dkon brtsegs): mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la sa ni glu len/ la la gur byed/ s+ya swa ni tsan+dan dang / ut+pa la'i bye mas 'thor/ la las ni
34a2(dkon brtsegs): a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo mo'i phye mas 'thor/ la las ni lA ma yin gyi sgra rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor// li las ni gser dngul gyi bye mas 'thor/ la las
34a3(dkon brtsegs): nits+tshin+da ra ba dang / mAn+da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu she ka chen po dang / bai ru sha kra dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog
34a4(dkon brtsegs): da'i chen po dang / sne sA dang / sgyu sngar chen po dang / swA sngar khra bo dang / smra sngar wa chen gyi mye tog mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon
34a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'grogyur ro// la las nI gAster m+b+hi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / bai DUr+ya'i me tog dang / smug gi me tog dang / mu tig
34a6(dkon brtsegs): dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i skyong po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// sa las ni rin po che sna bdun d+hong / dbrog gis skye pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'a
34a7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'gyur ro// la las ni na bza' dang / rgyan 'bum// la las ni sku rigs dang / nabs kyi rgyun dang / phyag gi rkyen dang / snod gdub da
34a8(dkon brtsegs): gdu bu dang / gdu bu tham pa dang / dbu rgan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyam sang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do nal dang / nor bu'i ngo shal dang / se
34b1(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po'i gdubs dag
34b2(dkon brtsegs): dodang bya do dang / mgul rgyun sna tshogs 'thor b+har gyur to// la was nI tsang cong gshibs pa/ s+ya ltas ni mgo rgyun+ta/ la lAs ni rna cha gdub kror/ sum
34b3(dkon brtsegs): gaster g+hi byung ba rid+hi po ches smras pa/ la las ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis smras pa/ lA las ni drag/ la las ni gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba
34b4(dkon brtsegs): mu tig gi phreng ba thogaso// khral las ni glaser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai DUr+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi gdugs dang / sdug gi gdun
34b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshad sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi ba dang kha rjon/
34b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / cho sna tshogs can mang po thogs so// la las ni spos chu'i chur 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la las ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcud pa
34b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi'i mchog khyod la phyag 'tsham lo// mi'i 'phrul khyod la phyog 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis ge tse la phyag 'tshas su/
34b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod pa do zla yang ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tsholo// ye shes mtshes phyag 'tsham so// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i ril phyud
34b9(dkon brtsegs): batshal mo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal mo//
35a1(dkon brtsegs): le lo mi mngalang song mi mnga'/
35a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid// nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rin po che'i pho brang
35a3(dkon brtsegs): lha na sdug pa/ mdzes pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag bcu yang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang gi grong rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs
35a4(dkon brtsegs): khri phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// bzhugs de dag re re zhing yang ba gem bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug
35a5(dkon brtsegs): cu mngon par sprul to// ba gam gyi de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba lta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug
35a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sprul N+Di to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba lta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par
35a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni dngul/ gral bu dang sgo 'apir ni bai DUr+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni sdug/ kai nu nr-i mu tig dmar po//
35a8(dkon brtsegs): sa gan ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin cam sha stag go// bai DUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung blam ni shil/ gral bu dang spro 'bar ni gser/ ma pa dang kho khyer ni dngu
35a9(dkon brtsegs): ba ni sdug ka Tu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gni ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung byam ni bai DUr+ya/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni
35b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan rnams na thag rin po che sna bdun na sun// rin po che'i pho zang gi rnas de dag par snang gi na mkha' la sding nang / bcom ldan 'das la san gasgyum dang dubyed/
35b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po rjes srung gi bu ni bar snang gi na mkha' la 'gro zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sgra rnams snong
35b3(dkon brtsegs): mos tshul yangs 'dus la rtog du skye bar 'jug go// de bzhin du pho brang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi na mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum so
35b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ rin po che'i po zang gi rna la de dag dang / ba ga de dgra dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / srang gi'i rmi/
35b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag kha da de dag las g+ha'i tsan+dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i char 'bab par gyur to// me tog mAr+tha
35b6(dkon brtsegs): ra ba dang / mthi ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha kau tshe dang / par+yA sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog da
35b7(dkon brtsegs): chen pa / stes dang / sgra snar chen po dang / sgra sAr char yang yang na 'bad par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUr+yA dang /
35b8(dkon brtsegs): nang sdug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dbang po dang / rin po chen thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos duH
35b9(dkon brtsegs): skye sngar
37a1(dkon brtsegs): char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i b+ha bre de dag gi mthus lha'i bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char dbab pa
37a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de dang de dag las mngon par 'bab par gyur to// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri/ 'phang du yang dpag
37a3(dkon brtsegs): tshad drug khri/ ma yin gyi mchod pas de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
37a4(dkon brtsegs): ba byis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'greng bdud tsam du me tog mAn+da ra ba su rmas par ga
37a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// spos ches kyang rdzab tu gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzob kyi dri des khyab par
37a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
37a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'ang chung las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa de dag ni smos kyang ci dgoso// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris rin pa
37a8(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi shing rta lo zhon te/ lan gsum bskor bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan+dan gyi bye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis man
37b1(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa/ byang chub dam pa don du gaN+DeR+Sha skad du// skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi skul ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po// khyongs bdan ni
37b2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs su zhi bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis sgrub sa song na// log ltung ga tu lhung bar mi 'gyur ba// de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/
37b3(dkon brtsegs): dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i don skad du// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhi nga // mya ngan las rgal yongs dag gyur pa la// 'dren pa
37b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar ma chi// rgyu dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi// lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/
37b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la skyabs song+ge phyis kyang mi skye ba// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu nye bar mchi// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zing ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la len gsum
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bskotshe/ rta'i rgyun de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyun de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyun de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang de dag
37b7(dkon brtsegs): da pra dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la/ mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/
37b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ste dper na/ rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgya de la mkhas pas sgra byung ba bzhin no// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das
38a1(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan+dan dang / ut+pas dang / a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i byam
38a2(dkon brtsegs): ri dngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog mAtsAr ba dang / mAn+da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ke dang / many+dzi sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa rusha ko chen
38a3(dkon brtsegs): ma na dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skra snang dang / skye snar chen po dang / skya snar khra bo da / sku snang bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sprul
38a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyur mngon par bab bo// steng go bair snang las/ gser dang / dngu lo dang / bai DUr+ya dang / she la dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang
38a5(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char ying mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char de bebs pas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
38a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod yug tu mag chad drug cu chun spros nus rtsub tu gyur to// smyos chu'i rdzab kyi ji des kyang snying gsum gyi stong chen por 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgya
38a7(dkon brtsegs): ra gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri des tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
38a8(dkon brtsegs): ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zang ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i che/ bar snang las lham
38a9(dkon brtsegs): rang lha ma yin gyi
38b1(dkon brtsegs): na gyi g+ha rdzas kyi sil snyan g+ni sna dag byung ngo // sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byug par gyur te// na
38b2(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems ma gang dag gis sgra zos par gyur pa de dag thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung rlub sa phyir ba man
38b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar lha m+b+ha yin gyi dbang po thag zlang rnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas na pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i rgya stong de dag du
38b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan da das la mchod pa bye byu dang // lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zeng ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ l-i la ni glu sen/ la la ni snyil sku byed/ la la ni dang
38b5(dkon brtsegs): byedalA la n+ti lus kyi rlul+la bsgyur/ la la ni tsan+dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ga ru dang / tra ma la'i lo mi'i phye ma 'thor/ a'i lha'i me tog mUn+dar+ya ba dang
38b6(dkon brtsegs): mon ba chen po dang / dang / ma s+t+rai shi klu chen po dang / ba ru shu ka dang bai run kan+ten po dang / mdog dkar dang / mngag dkar ni b+h+yo
38b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ser dang / sna snar chen dang / sna snar za bo dang / skye sngar bA ts+tshin dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngus dang / de r+ya dang /
38b8(dkon brtsegs): la so ma dang / spu ga dang / rdang stong ba dang / mu tig dpa ze tha~Mng / rin po che thams med kyi me tog rnams 'thar cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon pa
39a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang / spos kyi sa lnga na
39a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thor ro// la las ni na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu rnam
39a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / nor bu'i do shul dang / sa mo do dang / rgya
39a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mgris rgyu sna tshogs dang / rnacha dang / rna cha gdu bkor dang / btseng tsong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyun dang / phreng ba'i lnga ldi dge 'thor zhing / me tog gi b+ha zed
39a5(dkon brtsegs): smos kyi b+h+rUM b+hi dang / nor bu'i bla bre dag kyang thog so// la las ni spos chu'i char 'beb so// la las ni phyi ma'i chur 'bebs so// la las ni mu tig dmar po'i'o char 'dzas
39a6(dkon brtsegs): saumA m+b+ha bi/ ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang / l-i las ni gser gyis sgom pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la
39a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon pA 'khor ro// tshogs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gang brten gang la gnas bzlas nas// gang zag man+dog sa mchod 'gyur ba// de 'dra ba yo grogs po dang
39a8(dkon brtsegs): b+h+yor rgyun du phrang por zhig/ snu ma yin gyi dbyung po drag zung ris kyis ji skar byas pa de bzhin du/ sgyu ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom sa nu las
39a9(dkon brtsegs): pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal lagon te/ bcom ldan 'das sa ya gsum sko ba byed cing / tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bcom
39b1(dkon brtsegs): sa lha mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtsod paden khyod sna phyag 'argyas pa// mi 'dzugs 'dugs bras khyod la byug ma na/ chosas sus
39b2(dkon brtsegs): myurU pa bo// 'gro ba 'dzin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal// kun snor 'ching po gcod sa phyag bcas mo// 'khor chud myi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal so// mAHru phyir thang
39b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ma phyag 'tshal mo/ 'gro ba bying ba stsol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga'i zhing // 'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te// pad+ma
39b4(dkon brtsegs): yis mi gos 'dra bas ma/ blo zab paste mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bsten// rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad de ni/
39b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang du'ab smon pa yong mo mnga'// mi gnas na mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du/ snga ma
39b6(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta sa non te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor
39b7(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / gser phye dag gis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang /
39b8(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar gzung nas phyin ci lo gzhugs pa'i// 'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen/
40a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dri na byed pa tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag bya ba med// chos kun stong ning byed pa kun las dben/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med cing g.yo med ni zhes bstan// su zhig bder gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren
40a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhini yab ltar spyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba yis ni
40a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa de kun pa lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro bsngal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ lha mo yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji
40a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das
40a6(dkon brtsegs): la ldan gsum bskor ba byed cing / dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'khor brgyal
40a7(dkon brtsegs): chu las pa rol rnam rgal po// rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro la mdzad cing // bde gshegs pa rol kyang bde 'jigs pa med 'joms pa// spyan 'dzes 'de ba
40a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabasal btug/ blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen// byin ci log lta thibs por rabazhin blo ldan to// 'khrul
40b1(dkon brtsegs): bAswa brgya rtswa byu ma shes rgyu rnams pa// mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas drugs par ma da// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams sems ca sgrum
40b2(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu'i dra ning mig ga le'i mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa d+mam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed// sring pa gsu po dag na ma chags spya nga stong/
40b3(dkon brtsegs): rnas mi log 'bran pa'i dor gyung rang bzhin bral ba dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga'
40b4(dkon brtsegs): lta burami da dang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa sdod// lha ma yin gyis dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgrags
