40b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang bcom ldan 'angs la mchod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhod te/ bcom ldan 'das lo lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me tog skyes
40b6(dkon brtsegs): khru'i rnams kyis gtong te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di
40b7(dkon brtsegs): zil nanan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos brjes chu bzhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyis gzugs kyi /
40b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan// dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid pu nga gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi lngan
41a1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer zil brlag bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig
41a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsam kun zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas zla 'od zil rlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra can gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/
41a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
41a4(dkon brtsegs): ba s+yA swA khwa mos mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pas 'dren pa blo gros ni po/
41a5(dkon brtsegs): nim po gye sapas 'gyu NAs+ya// 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// rang bas rdul rnams ni bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// glags
41a6(dkon brtsegs): gyisbyi na ma bzhin no// thugs btang nags med shing sreg ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs dra sreg/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tu med par dag
41a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin nyon mengs thams cad 'joms mdzad de// bdud rtsis lus zhugs drug bzhin no// mun pa mun na gsol mdzad de// mun krung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/
41a8(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po pade mchog gis rina' byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyid pa
41b1(dkon brtsegs): yul la mngon pa dga' bas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rda la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor brgyad/
41b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul ka' mi bzang sems ni
41b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'ang la// g.yul la dbang pos g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin// shin tu char bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyes khyod la phyag 'tsha'i/
41b4(dkon brtsegs): dag darang ngekal zhing dgra yang bcom// gang tu mi bsnyengs mi bskyed bde ba brnyes// khyod ni nyin mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu
41b5(dkon brtsegs): dusa'i sa ma// mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te/ khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam// thub po khyod kyis seMs can rje zas
41b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi dang / kun tu khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'// shes rang nam grol srid pa'i srid pa skems// shes rapo nam dag khyod kyis blugs kyang dag/ chos rnams su
41b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug ci chags mi mnga'// thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang po ga la las mngon par dga' bas 'i lur byas pa de/
41b8(dkon brtsegs): na du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po lag mi bzangs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mtsha pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing lazhon te/ bco ldan ngas/
42a1(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang dul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan
42a2(dkon brtsegs): la mang de gar bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni 'ardang bdags nig tu zad /
42a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gis dbenapa
42a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces dgyi ba yang // bshad pa ci yang ma
42a5(dkon brtsegs): khadag gis kyang ni ma bshad cing // sul bshad pa ma mchis te// khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams
42a6(dkon brtsegs): gas pa // rnam par skyed dkru ba ni// lA ma yin gyi dbang po mag 'das kyis jiltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnams
42a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan pas kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// rin po chesna bdun gyi gang rnal zhen nas/ bcom ldan 'das lal na gsum bskor ba byed
42a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi dgal yang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par de snod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la 'ang
42b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de pyir khyod ni dgra 'thung skam mchis// khyod kyi
42b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzungs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mdod/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan de phun sum tshogs// dang bya dadun
42b3(dkon brtsegs): su rtogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyed de// skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thug
42b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cada' byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis// des na mi bsnyengs 'jog rten gsum bdul nas
42b5(dkon brtsegs): 2 gaste bu spyi bsngags te// nog gi tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po'ajig rten gsum// rnam par gnon gyis de ltar
42b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi su mo yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgyas nas/ rin po che 'dud gyi shing la nor te/ bcom ldan 'das
42b7(dkon brtsegs): bldan pa ma na da cing / rnyen pa'i rnam pa bkod na/ tod nas tshigs su bcad bdag gi so mam ldan 'das la 'don par bzu pa/ gru pa chen
42b8(dkon brtsegs): dadapa'i med kyis khyod kyinas sus// kun kyis rgyam pa 'dun na zhugs papa yang // do rgyam 'i'i sangs rgyas 'dus man/ bcom na
43a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// skye bo bsam pa ci bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sa
43a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang dor rdzi ba nin
43a3(dkon brtsegs): du yang 'tshal// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres ma 'dres mtshan// gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni// gcig la 'jog gi gnan ni dgas
43a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad// 'dred pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris rnam par
43a5(dkon brtsegs): sdang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang zung gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal
43a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan padas la lan gas su ga ba byed cing / na pa tha sta pa ga/ seMn nas/ mas su sna pa ga nas ma ldan 'ad
43a7(dkon brtsegs): sa par bsod pa/ rgyags dang la rdzog pa thos bzung bkang // yang ga rab tu nga bas kyi dbyung ba gshegs / dz+has mngod par dga' ba da
43a8(dkon brtsegs): bag mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di ngas ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmil ma dga' ba thams cad
43b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma lags 'dra// dri lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// ston ka'i sprin dang mtshus
43b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rtswa yi zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo dga' ba// mkhas pa'i spyi bo dag
43b3(dkon brtsegs): 'din rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal po khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dab pa de dag mi ngal yong mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam
43b4(dkon brtsegs): bar m-in chags nas/ yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag zang ris sa sogs pa sam yid kyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug su
43b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gsu mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bri byas nas/ byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyi mtsham ning mgul yi rang sa/ rab tu dga' nas dgul ba dang yid bang
43b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes rgyas mo stsags bcom ldan 'das cings phyag 'chas ni / ma ldan 'das kyi spyad sder 'khang par gyur / de nas bcom ldan 'das
43b7(dkon brtsegs): sgo ma yon gyi dbang ba'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ snu ma yid de dag gi sdug pa'i bsam pa yang thug su chung nas/ de'i che 'jug pa mdzad do// ja
43b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos cid de/ gang gi 'dus pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ mam ldan 'das kyin mi gyi ska mas cang ber kho sa du tshims la ngag su
43b9(dkon brtsegs): 'dis te/ h+lA zer ba dang / dang ba dang / ra gA dang / se brgyad dang / shes dang / ru na
43b10(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang sad pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rnas par bkang ste/ phyir mig nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsor du rnams
43b11(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rtathus ston las langs te/ blo gos phrag pa gcig shug par nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang
43b12(dkon brtsegs): sus+ya bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshig su bcad de nus pa
43b13(dkon brtsegs): rgyu nag sa pa/ pa marjid// snang 'dra pa gyur// sgras zhim zhes
43b14(dkon brtsegs): nga gsungs// lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten pad+ma ban khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha mni rnams la lung bstan bka' stsa
43b15(dkon brtsegs): / de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// di ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems// 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bzhin
43b16(dkon brtsegs): bgags pas gang gi bas ma mkhyen nas// mi yi seng gis 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yong su dag pa'i yid kyis su// mo lo ma ga la dad pa gang gis
43b17(dkon brtsegs): ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs
43b18(dkon brtsegs): shing chu yi zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo dga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag
43b19(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal po khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dab pa de dag mi ngal yong mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'a
43b20(dkon brtsegs): bar tshogs nas// yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag zang ris la sogs pa snya ma yid gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug chu bo nga/
43b21(dkon brtsegs): dag gsuM mdzod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas/ byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim ning mgu la yi rang ste/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bdeg
43b22(dkon brtsegs): skyes te/ la mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
43b23(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi sdug pa'i bsam pa yang thug su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dir
43b24(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi 'dzum pa mdzad pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nas kyi sgonas thong bar kha dog sna tshogs kha dag dus
44a1(dkon brtsegs): sa'adi lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dbang po dang / dar po dang / le brgyan dang / shes dang / dung gi
44a2(dkon brtsegs): dag byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bya
44a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rtathul ston las langs te/ blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i skang
44a4(dkon brtsegs): spyas+ya bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshig su bcad de nus pa
44a5(dkon brtsegs): mdon par bzhed rgyu zhig mi mchis par// mi yi seng gi 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen the ci'i slad 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum
44a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten pad+ma band khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha mni rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal
44a7(dkon brtsegs): / de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// di ring su yis dgas med rgya chen sems// 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bani
44a8(dkon brtsegs): gagags pas gang gi bas ma mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yongasu dag pa'i yid kyis su// mo yi mchog la dad pa gang gis
44b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bder gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di lta
44b2(dkon brtsegs): byeder glashegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di di ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las
44b3(dkon brtsegs): rje rlom 'tshal ba'i som nyig cad du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tshom myur du legs par gcad du gsol// de nas tshe lnga dang ldan pa
44b4(dkon brtsegs): nu bya nus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig
44b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa des byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/
44b6(dkon brtsegs): mos kyis mchod pa 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dang
44b7(dkon brtsegs): pA'i yid byas te// de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo chen de dge lha min ris bor te// mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag phyi dus rgyal ba
44b8(dkon brtsegs): mi'i seng ge/ gaM gA klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed// bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshan mthun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bder gshegs
45a1(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig drug cu rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing // lha dang ba
45a2(dkon brtsegs): deT+Ti 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cur
45a3(dkon brtsegs): / rgyal ba rnams kyi stong gsum skyong bar 'gyur// de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur// brtan pa
45a4(dkon brtsegs): ma thams cad spyod// bla na med po'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag tshe'i tshad du gyur pa ni// bskul pa khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba yang // rnam par 'dren
45a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur// chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thob pa de dag myi ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu ni gyur nas/
45a6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig drug cur tshang bar ni// rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshigs// gaM gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo
45a7(dkon brtsegs): dgra las rgol ba'i rgyal bar mtshan mi thun 'gyur// zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang mthun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi// skyes pa
45a8(dkon brtsegs): bud med yongasu smin mdzad de// bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dams par 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin// rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa/
45b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rtenA par phyir drang srong rten thos gas dus// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yi rangs gyur cing skabs kyang skyes par 'gyur/
45b2(dkon brtsegs): myu 'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // bam po gsum pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos su ma yin
45b3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spong pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
45b4(dkon brtsegs): dgadzad nas/ 'di spyi bu'i rnam por smin pa grub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par banag pa sa pa skal pa grangs med pa yang
45b5(dkon brtsegs): na 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang / der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
45b6(dkon brtsegs): ro na pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad
45b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rje su
45b8(dkon brtsegs): chen par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par ban
45b9(dkon brtsegs): dngar gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig
46a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/ lA m+ba yin
46a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa ga~M gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang len lon par mi nus
46a3(dkon brtsegs): sAm che dang rngupa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las longs te/ ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
46a4(dkon brtsegs): mngochub gzhol ba yi// thugs skyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// tshwa tsam mi spyod mi'i seng ge/ de lha'i yo
46a5(dkon brtsegs): yis mchod gyur pa// tsan+dan phur mau ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// gaM gA'i bye ma ches
46a6(dkon brtsegs): mA dz+dzar tu bkang ba yi// spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os// yon tan chen po mnga' ba la// gaM gA'i bye snyed ma ches mang ba'i// me tog tshogs
46a7(dkon brtsegs): ni b+h+yo mag/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod ngos// rgyal ba snro mA rab blang ba// mar 'i snying por rab nAm// 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu steng kyi/ mar me rnams
46a8(dkon brtsegs): mchong ba dzas// mthu mnga' bdes su// 'ad ti pa ma phying chu chag/ sanam khyim dang mang / na ma mama'i bar chos// mi
46b1(dkon brtsegs): pas thugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// ston+da dan ma
46b2(dkon brtsegs): da' ba khyod// rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge
46b3(dkon brtsegs): / khyaskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gau gA'i bye mchis mang ba'i// ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po smra ba'i rtags/
46b4(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// rtag gzung dpe la gsan du gsol// gal thegaM gA'i bye skyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'an
46b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi/ rnams can thams cad rgya sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo bo yang // ga~M gA'i bye ma snyed
46b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ mgo bo de dag ra re zhing // de dag kha dang ldan gyur la// kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la// gAM gA'i klung gi byi skyed kyi/
46b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dge slobs mi bas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni byin
46b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag leg so legs so// nga'i nyan thos ni drang por gyur pa// ye shes
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur pa// chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshangs par gyur pa/ sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon da
47a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la 'jug go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gi slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
47a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
47a4(dkon brtsegs): na tan gyi rtogs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang
47a5(dkon brtsegs): nagyi khamos gaM kA'i klung gi bye ma snyed shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
47a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad bzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir rten
47a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji skad cig yod
47a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas/ sems can gyi
47b1(dkon brtsegs): mas ji snyed kyi bsod bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re lus 'byung ngo // sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams jis
47b2(dkon brtsegs): zud pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dong du bskyed pas
47b3(dkon brtsegs): na thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan ldon par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la// byang chub sems
47b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpad+ma chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhon
47b5(dkon brtsegs): / sa spyod pa ngas pa mas kyi nga du
47b6(dkon brtsegs): sa byed pa dge slong ga nga byung rjes bskus byung ba ni me bu bamang du med pa
47b7(dkon brtsegs): ya du/
47b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa'i tshe/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
47b9(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ra
48a1(dkon brtsegs): mamamed par gyur ba me pa ma ma par gyur pa/
48a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang zab tog des sems bskyed pa re res zhing gi
48a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi phan par dgongs par 'gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs dbang tha ma tog gi sangs
48a4(dkon brtsegs): gang te yang 'jig rten gyi khams gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi ning gcig tu 'gyur te/ yongasu dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongasu
48a5(dkon brtsegs): sa pa ji 'i chad sa zhin gshegs pa dbang theb glu dro'i sangs rgyas kyi ning der/ log par sems pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to// lus dang ngag da
48a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzub babo / ra yongasu ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yod med par gyur to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to
48a7(dkon brtsegs): yici'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing gtams te rjes su bstan cing bslabs pa'i phyir ro//
48a8(dkon brtsegs): / no gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang ze'o tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing den 'khod pa'i sems cad rnams kyang bde ba lnga dang lda
48a9(dkon brtsegs): / 'as sa mdza ma
48b1(dkon brtsegs): na med pa
48b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur to// sa la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i ba dang ldan par gyur to// la lA ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur /
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dedage bde ba de la yang mi spyod la/ bde ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bzo 'tshal
48b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med do // de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongasu spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la
48b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya la de la yang mngon par chags pa med do// de bzhin du sems ca na de dag kyang bde ba de la yod mngon par mazhen pa med do// de ba ni
48b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med do//
48b7(dkon brtsegs): yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongasu spyod de/ de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de
48b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge las yod zlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas/ de dag las
48b9(dkon brtsegs): gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'o byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med de/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal
49a1(dkon brtsegs): / gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams
49a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par du ma byas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i
49a3(dkon brtsegs): gong da de sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa de mo 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems
49a4(dkon brtsegs): sa pa pa'i che dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas/ nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// rlung nyam su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo // char nyamasu mi/
49a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yabab po// de bzhi na gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spong ba'i tshe/ sems can de dag le lus dang / ngag dang
49a6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rje su 'brang ba bstan cing bshod pas/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de thos/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongasu bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rnam par
49a8(dkon brtsegs): smin pas/ de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bdes yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma/
49b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal tshor ba med cing / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma
49b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa de sa gtams pa de dag ni/ chos la rim gro bya ba rten thos kyi brlags
49b3(dkon brtsegs): sesar gyur to// de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid kyi sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de nga
49b4(dkon brtsegs): Ting DA ga bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal
49b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba ma spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir ya ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byang//
49b6(dkon brtsegs): 'i spong ba yod pas/ de dag la skyo ba med do// de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de// sems cad de dag mi
49b7(dkon brtsegs): ra ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag tha chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad
49b8(dkon brtsegs): r-i sdug bsngal yang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dag la sdug pa dang
50a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de ma sdug bsngal gyi tshe rang rgyud med pa'i
50a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i sdug bsngal med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang
50a3(dkon brtsegs): tu'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag sdug bsngal ba'i sdug
50a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dang mi 'byung ngo // gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni
50a5(dkon brtsegs): sa pa de'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zhugs te/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i
50a6(dkon brtsegs): can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi ning der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongasu smin par byas pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de
50a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang
50a8(dkon brtsegs): sngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bzung ba dang / nye bar brtsams pa dang / bar bsgrubs pa'i
50a9(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bas/ sems can de snyed cig gi deni bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba sal ba
50b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom lda
50b2(dkon brtsegs): gas// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ci snyam du sems/ sems nan pa dang / sems dpa' ba nas/ nye bar bsgrubs pa'i brang gyi sems
50b3(dkon brtsegs): na de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sbyar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgya/
50b4(dkon brtsegs): nochos su dag par bya ba dang / sems can de skyed yongasu smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// bka' stsal pa
50b5(dkon brtsegs): / de la ci snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas nye bar bsgribs pra'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang
50b6(dkon brtsegs): nas nye bar bsgrubs pa thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'i grus zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar gyis bar dang / dran pa zhan pa nas te
50b7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'i dran pa'i babar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i ting nge'adzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i shes
50b8(dkon brtsegs): sgri bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de la phanas par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrubs pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am
51a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ning yongasu dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsom
51a2(dkon brtsegs): tu ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so len so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems nan pa
51a3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang /
51a4(dkon brtsegs): sa pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongasu bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang
51a5(dkon brtsegs): ra brtsams pa dang / nye bar bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi de bya ba 'am/ de dag le phan par bsams pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/
51a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba 'am/ de ltar tha gru che ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so// dan/ slong nga
51a7(dkon brtsegs): ni snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin skam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong /
51a8(dkon brtsegs): mi zer bar 'kho // de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng 'das par/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu
51b1(dkon brtsegs): r+ya pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid braphags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da sngar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/
51b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
51b3(dkon brtsegs): brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
51b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
51b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i rus le bab par shes na
51b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo
51b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba
51b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
52a1(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga 'di na gnas par gyur te// des kya bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs de
52a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas / 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
52a3(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag de ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba de gang zhig yin snyam/ zhes bka'
52a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i de bani gshegs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du
52a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mngal
52a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dge bar bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa
52a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i ste/ lA la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smran/ rgyal ba gtso bo/ rgyal ba dob pa/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni
52a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyid legs par yang dag par brjod do// de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ngo'i tsho tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras
52b1(dkon brtsegs): dab po rnams ni thabs mkhas te// sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // lus can yongasu smin mdzad phyir// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'brun
52b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyade cu rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur gyung // da dung tshig pa'i 'du shes stsal// byang chub mo chog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ blo dzin du
52b3(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gtsog gi/ sangs rgyas ning rnams dgra mdzad pas// dza ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba khyod ni kukyis btsal// da dung dang
52b4(dkon brtsegs): gso bskyed par// de dang der ni yongs bstan te// da dung du yang 'dren po khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs
52b5(dkon brtsegs): sa kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags myi mnga'// khyod kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad med// brgya byin tshangs
52b6(dkon brtsegs): byang dang // la lar bdud kyi tshe byad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med cha byad spyod pa
52b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma chu yis mi chags bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi/
52b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di'i rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'di dag rnams// gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lar bltam pa yongasu bstan// la
53a1(dkon brtsegs): / lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la sa na ni 'khor lo bskor// la lar spang ba spyod pa mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du/
53a2(dkon brtsegs): gyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul/
53a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa lhur// sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis
53a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags byis tshul gyis// sems can rnam par gdul slad du// 'dren pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// smyos pa ma lags smon pa'i tshul// na ba ma lags
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad// de ltar bsam ya sa mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi
53a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' cher khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/
53a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang brnyang khri drug stong gis/ snga ma yin gyi dbang po dag gis mchod pa
53a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to//
53b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khadra pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug spyong mngon par sprul to// wa'i rin po che sna bdu
53b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang / mu tig dam po dang / rdo snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa da ni
53b3(dkon brtsegs): dpo che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris/ bgro ba lta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngus pa
53b4(dkon brtsegs): h+yaM dang / shel lo// gser gyi lan kar rnams kyi ka be dang / gdang bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba nems rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kran rnams kyi ka
53b5(dkon brtsegs): gdung bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai DUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / ga dang bu rnams ni bai DUr+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi
53b6(dkon brtsegs): na kan rnams kyi ka bA dang / gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul la byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba lta na sdug pa rim pa
53b7(dkon brtsegs): na gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / spu ga dang
53b8(dkon brtsegs): mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkru ba/ blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / ngu
54a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi dra ba dang / bai N+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra ba dang / mu tig dpar ze'i dru ba dang / sdug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying ba'i dra bas rna
54a2(dkon brtsegs): bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser na sa rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po rje bdun las byas
54a3(dkon brtsegs): sha stag/ rgyal mtshan bkru ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang
54a4(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bai sgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon rtse po rnams ni tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po cam
54a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar bas can sha stag mngon par sprul to// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs can bkra ba/ lha na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par
54a6(dkon brtsegs): // bla bre bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par gyur te/ bla bre de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla bre dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla bre dang / de
54a7(dkon brtsegs): b+he dang / shel gyi bla zi dang / mu tig dper po'i bla bre dang / sdig gi bla ze dang / rdo'i snying po'i bA bre ste/ rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pan sun/
54a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri dru
54b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni chung chu za dag pa/
54b2(dkon brtsegs): sdong po de dag dang / b+hU bye brgyad ji drug stong de dag bcom ldan 'das la busmra pa dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang sA sIng zhing / bcom ldan 'das sa
54b3(dkon brtsegs): da ma bskor ba byas so// 'dis ste dper na glang po che'i rgyas pas sru ngog bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sde rnams mag sa khyer zhing na mkha' la mang
54b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes brdol du nog go/ de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dad de dag dang / prAb+h+re de shu
54b5(dkon brtsegs): bar snang gi na mkha' lnga lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur te// de nas 'dab babang brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis/ ma
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das yi mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan
54b7(dkon brtsegs): gsu bcad po dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rga dang 'chilas rnam bral khyod la phyag 'tshal mo// sems can gzhal yos kha lto sbyar la phyag 'tshas so//
54b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so// bdag cag rnams kyang bud med bu yi lus lus ldan zhing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yun
54b9(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyan pa dang // dpe byad bzang pos brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dred po khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag
55a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rnam par 'dren 'khyod lta sa/ skye bo rab 'brel sangs rgyas hru
55a2(dkon brtsegs): gang bod kyi gzi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te// spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag smrar gyu
55a3(dkon brtsegs): ci / 'gro ba rnams spyong mya ngan bzla bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan cing // shes rab ldan pa mchog tu 'gyur bar shog
55a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhasgo lta bu// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs cu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing // 'jig ren mkhas pa
55a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang // rmi 'dra sgra 'dra gnas pa med pa dang // brag chan mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing //
55a6(dkon brtsegs): tIr rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po'i 'dab bzang de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad//
55a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis pa bzhad par mi
55a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs// 'dab bzang rnams kyi rgyal bya mchod
55a9(dkon brtsegs): bgyis te// bla bre na mkha' rgyas par gang bar bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar bskyed// rkang gnyis dam pa de dag lung bstan gsol/
55b1(dkon brtsegs): chub rnams thas mar ba snar cing // dga' ba'i sem sna du ma gu rngan sems kyis 'byung// mkha' snang 'am bya phyir 'gyur ba par 'ag+sa/ da
55b2(dkon brtsegs): dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing // the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jig med 'gyur/
55b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi// 'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongasu sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal bas// rgyas pa
55b4(dkon brtsegs): de bstan de dag mthong dga' ba// slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rje su rang
55b5(dkon brtsegs): khaM mdzod// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'dir 'dus 'gyur gyis// rang 'byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho
55b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul la tshigasu bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thams cad zil nor stobs bcu brtson 'grus ldan// rgyal ba dbang po thul ba de bzhin gshegs/
55b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis// 'dab bzang 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig
55b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa// de yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon// the tshom bsal la rab tu dga' ba skyed// bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing /
56a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med gyur pa btsal ba'i phyir// 'dab chags dbang pa
56a2(dkon brtsegs): la mchod legs byas// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// sred med bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang // sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams//
56a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun sum zhing dang
56a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dag gang la dga' bas mchod byas pas// dud lagro'o gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha
56a5(dkon brtsegs): dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong // 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gaM gA'i bye snyed du// de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing // rnam
56a6(dkon brtsegs): drin mtha' yas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung ma chi
56a7(dkon brtsegs): mI ldan med// rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskams rang 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgyad du bro ni bgrangs par// 'jig rte
56a8(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam gzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur
56b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de smran// 'das pa rgyas sbyangs pa brgyad myu 'gyur// de ma sgrub pa rdu sa dang zlas rnams kyi// shin tu sems dus bye ba brtan cu zung // ched
56b2(dkon brtsegs): da 'gro ba'i gsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur// mi dag de skar 'di rnams pa rgyal tsho// bdab bzang lus su gyur nas grangs ze de
56b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sngon che 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug chung ba ste// dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul bu
56b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyas gyi// dga' bas dka' thub drug dang ldan par 'gyur// chu'i khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab kri// marje
56b5(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyas pa'i
56b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang // nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// / nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
56b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / na mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan
56b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yang thos nas/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan pa
57a1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyis gdugs/ bai DUr+ya'i dra ba lnga ldi bkye ba/ mu tig dang
57a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yu ba can/ bai DUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun pos sbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to//
57a3(dkon brtsegs): rtasngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bai DUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs pa/ bye ba phrag drug curtsa
57a4(dkon brtsegs): drug mngon par sprul to// nor bu skar 'od kyi bla bre khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ des 'khor dag thams cad g.yog gcig kyang stong par snang la mngon par sprul
57a5(dkon brtsegs): de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba/ mig tu mdzes pa lta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bres pa mngon par sprul to// bI bre de dag gi kha
57a6(dkon brtsegs): yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dre ba mngon par sprul te bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung nang dgra mngon par smras to// klu'i bu mo sil snyan
57a7(dkon brtsegs): gas pa bye ba drag dgu bcu drug mngon par sprul to// de nas kyi klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po dge la zhon nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi'i gdugs stong gi bar snang la byas
57a8(dkon brtsegs): namakha' la 'dod ning ril mo sem snyad bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug pa de dag yin cing / bcom ldan 'das la yin gsum gar ba byed sa/ swa'i tsin+dan gyi
57b1(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha'i a gA r+ya dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang
57b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ut+pal dang / tsam+ba ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna
57b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so// de nas de dag gis
57b4(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gis
57b5(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla bre dang
57b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo si
57b7(dkon brtsegs): snyan yan lag brgya dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan pa/ de lta bur yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur te// sgra des kyang stong
57b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gyur te/ sems can gang gi rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blo med pa yang dag pa
58a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam
58a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi char bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i nged byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go/ spos chu'i char bab pas kyang / ser skyas
58a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i 'khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spros chus rdzab tu gyur to// spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
58a4(dkon brtsegs): khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis smos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sas phyin
58a5(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / dbye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag po/
58a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi na mkha' la 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi
58a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs
58a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe tshig su bcad po 'di dag kyang smraso// klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu'i yid kyis su// byang chub zhi ba com
58b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas// rgyan gyis legs brgyan dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bde bar gshegs la mchod cing
58b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dog sngo zhing rgyan yang spro ba'i rdza
58b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan// de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la lta yis mchod pa byed// klu pi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag
58b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal/ mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis// mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa gyis// sil smrar
58b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig ni byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis/
58b6(dkon brtsegs): der sbrul mkha' la bla bre chen po gcig tu gyur// phyogs bcur dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog
58b7(dkon brtsegs): gi ga zi brjid phyogasu 'bar zhing gsal// klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du rgyal la mchod pa byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas
58b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zhi pa tshol byed cing // 'jig rten don byed bder gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni
59a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdug bsngal 'grol ba ltar// chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig pa
59a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing de bu ba lte bur nyam chung la// char rgyun tshul phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig rtsing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs ban
59a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad rtags nas ni// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi ring bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par gyi// sgyu ma bkod pa lta bu ma mchis rdzun pa byis
59a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rungs par bgyid pa// byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar
59a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'gribs gyur na ji ltar gda' ba yang
59a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags na skye
59a7(dkon brtsegs): kho mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag du ni 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas// des na 'dren pa rgyas pa khyod la skye
59a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyis sras rnams chos kyis yongasu tshim nas zab la zab pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir
59b1(dkon brtsegs): 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag smyon pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang ren+da dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su man/
59b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgying sdig bral 'jig ren don rnams bgyid par shon
59b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bas pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das
59b4(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpral sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa
59b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yong ma mthong // mi yi dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgya ni yang dag gsung // de thos lha mA lha mi na tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba
59b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dri za rnams kyang bskyod pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'a gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgya rnams thams cad man
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yod ma mchis// de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsung // de thos
59b8(dkon brtsegs): nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dogs pa bcad par gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rnams
60a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyu
60a2(dkon brtsegs): bder gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don ma thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'dir rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'gyur// sdug
60a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi ga nga'i tshal ba// de dag yi ni thub pa ston pas ngogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyi
60a4(dkon brtsegs): gang smad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol tho chom zhum// rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas
60a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di ba ka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yi rangs mchog tu dga' ba/
60a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyes pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal drug no/
60a7(dkon brtsegs): de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dgar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
60a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rtathul legaso rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu yi bu mos
60b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzod che 'jig rten pan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de yi 'bras bu spyan gyis yid gnyis za ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don du ngas ni 'jum/
60b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon// klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yod kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong pa rnams bshig blo ldan da/
60b3(dkon brtsegs): med legs par gnas// 'di na byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med// chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs pan
60b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas bzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag pa med mthong legs// mchod
60b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par phye zhing legs par smra bkod pa 'di dag smra ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong // nga la gzhal yas mchod de
60b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa dang ni 'gro ba stong shes pas// klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gan su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar che
60b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs nas// ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha gnas su ni lha yi dga' ba spyad// lhar
60b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba der gshegs sras rnams de na tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gas
61a1(dkon brtsegs): lha yi gnasu lU yi grong khyer lha rang brtul 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod// pad+ma chus
61a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo chen gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdzos
61a3(dkon brtsegs): no ba bzhin du yong mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dge' ba spyad nas ni// tshe tshad yongasu zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul rag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/
61a4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs ma srad grags ldan der yang lha yi tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros pa che tshad rab tu gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul
61a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// mkhas pa che bzang blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas// 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/
61a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan rnams gzhon 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing dga' spyod par 'gyur// bder gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan
61a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs// bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smang
61a8(dkon brtsegs): grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub
61b1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur// de dag bsgral par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs pa bang // thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas ren
61b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas grub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chu
61b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni dbang po zhi// kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyuraro// bde
61b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten de ni byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs
61b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin byang chub sha stago byang chub don gyi phyir// rang byang dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pas nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i rtse bsam pa rengs par mthar thug shes nas ni// bde bar gshe rigs kyi bstan pa mchog la/
61b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du gshegs gyur de ltar chos kyang ston// de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub
61b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig ming po byang chub bkod// rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur/
62a1(dkon brtsegs): tha'on pa de dag bskas pa skar ma 'das rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dba'adab b.rang dgA dang sna rin bcas pa dang // dri
62a2(dkon brtsegs): bu maM 'am ci tshogs gnod sbyid 'gror bcas dga' ning mgu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs rjes kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad ro
62a3(dkon brtsegs): rangs thal sbyar bde bar gzhogs mgos phyag 'tshal/ klu'i bu mo lung bsta na pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
62a4(dkon brtsegs): denas sung dum dag rgyas da nga / l+r-ing basmad pa yang rjes/ ngas su rdzogs par rig nas/
62a5(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal pa dag nga dang / skye dga' yi sa gsapa pa bye ba drug gu pa rlom cir thob par gyur te/ 'di skad de bzhin gshegs pa de sems na rnams
62a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das del ni mkhye ro pa'am/ mi gzugs pa'am/ mgusan pa 'gro/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing / @
62a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi rjes ni legs par bye sungs pa/ yang dag mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ kye bar gtong ba/ 'di ma thongs don yang pa/ ma
62a8(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams rang gis rig par bya bani cir rmang du byung ba ste/ de nim gshegs pa ro ni rdzu 'phrus che nang mthuche ba mngal ba'o// 'di snya bung med du gyur pa/
62b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi brtan pa mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongasu shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dge 'dun yang
62b2(dkon brtsegs): par bzhugs pa/ drang por bzhugs pa/ rig par bzhugs pa/ mthun par bzhugs pa dang / 'dri ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
62b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// snyam ste/ ngo mtshar tho ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan
62b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos/ kun ras g.yog par byas te/ thams cad dang sngar ba
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis
62b6(dkon brtsegs): smos kyi dri de tsher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa'i
62b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun
62b8(dkon brtsegs): chad du mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas// n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal par bkang ngo // klu
63a1(dkon brtsegs): me tog 'dun khang brgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa/ yang mngon par sprul to// kA ri drA
63a2(dkon brtsegs): sil spyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs lnga ldi bye ba'i phrag dgu bcu bres/
63a3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai DUr+ya'i drababs mi rigs par brgyan to// 'dun khang de'i gni yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches g.yogs par byas
63a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jom pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdol ba armo nigi ltar 'jam pa
63a5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog bai DUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lin+di ki sbyar ro ga na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
63a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba sta bu'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nor bu rin pa sa la las ni me 'byung la/ la la las ni chu 'byung ba
63a7(dkon brtsegs): sha stag+sa ste/ de la'ang la la sa saM ni chu kha doge sngon po 'ab+h+ring / la la las ni chu kha dog po byung / sal las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung /
63a8(dkon brtsegs): las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung ngo // la la las ni tshu la dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo // nor bu la la yis ni bde bar bsil rlung 'byung / nor bu mi la las ni dem
63b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam bzhin du 'byung / la la las ni snum pa'i bya ba byed/ la lA las ni me mang gi bya ba byed/ 'khor de dag thams cad
63b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che'i nang du snang 'gyuraro// ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar
63b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi sa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/ nyan thos kyi dge
63b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyurato// 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'o ga nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam
63b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang
63b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs
63b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'thor bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rta de rnams sngon du skri ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom
63b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la yin gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po cheg ces troka sar rig du bde bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'dis la gtor/ mngon par ga
63b9(dkon brtsegs): rtsims ma'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs /
64a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi ga ni de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thor ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das
64a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin
64a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das me lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas
64a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ thal mi sbyar te cang mi zer bar/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing mog mi 'dzum par lta le/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yan
64a5(dkon brtsegs): ton 'dod pa'i phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi
64a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan d+he su dran par byas nas/ sra sa nas zla gos phrag pa gcig tu gapar te/ pus maM g.yas pa'i spang sil btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa
64a7(dkon brtsegs): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa
64a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtum zhugs legs spyad pa// dka' thub bgyis pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te// bden
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par 'byung // lo drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma rnyed kyang // bder gshegs
64b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi thugs ni num ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad// ji ltar 'dren pa lA mi'i bla ma khyod// 'gros phan bzhed dka' thub spung mdzad
64b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btAr gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid ma dga'// thub pas dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang // byang chub sems
64b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur nas// de mthong bas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal pos bzod smra bdi/
64b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs deng phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug rod skyabs su
64b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma btang ste// gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gzhal gyur pa// rgyal ba'i thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bder gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal ro// bdag
64b7(dkon brtsegs): cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci na na// bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par ltung ba'o bde gshegs kyi// ldog bsngalal spyod pa dran nas mi/
64b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang // bde gshegs spyod pa mi che thor gyur dang // sgrub pa'i chen des mi ga nong pa// 'jog rten bachen pa
65a1(dkon brtsegs): / spyod bde bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas blo mnga' bder gshegs spyod pa la// thub pa gru tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bka' ba ni sro m+bu sra
65a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bder gshegs byang chub lung bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thob 'tshal zhing // klu'i tshogs 'di dag thub pas sgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba
65a3(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs stong bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs// ga pa'i bsam pa smon lam btab pa de dag kyang drugasu chud nas/
65a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe 'dzum po mdzad do// 'din chos nyid de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzug pa de'i tshe/ kha dag sna tshogs kha reg du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi
65a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas/ phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gdug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta sbrul gyis
65a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa rnams// rgyu med rgyas pa 'dzum po mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bder gshegs
65a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsam// rdzogs kyi slob dpod sgra za mo'ide dag ni// 'dzum rgyun batshal khyod kyi nal dus// yid ni num gyur
65a8(dkon brtsegs): tshim 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tshom rnam pa bas la dug thososo// 'jig rten khams pa ston pa shAkya thug/ de ring su zhig gling su dgage'i// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/
65b1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni dga' bar gyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'arjend pa su nig gis// bder gshegs ches nyid yab la bsnyed bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs pa yong byung
65b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyis/ shAkya seng ge bka' srol the tshom khums// sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal dus// tshogs kyi srab dpon the tshom bsam du gces/
65b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dga' 'gyur te// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshing
65b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyis na// gzhan du mi sems nani tan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad slar bka' stsal pa/ thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis
65b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis// rta thul sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de nyan par gyis// klu yi bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnanam
65b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas// skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yo su tshal// snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsnyen// 'gro
65b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rgya chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa// rnam thar sgog sum yongasu bsgos
65b8(dkon brtsegs): nas su// shin tu srid can bde bar 'gro 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/ gang che rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thob nas/ mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thog/ 'gro che
66a1(dkon brtsegs): // rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/ 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur/ rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dag
66a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob// de na bdud med mu stegs chos
66a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed// bder gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la ma
66a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/ mtshungs med thub pa bde ba myur du yang // yongasu 'chi med pa thob par 'gyur// thos na
66a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun stong gzugs kyi mchog ldan/ 'gro ba thams cad bder gshegs de dag gi dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur// phyags dang bya dang gnod
66a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin mi de dag rang byung dgongs min cung byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan/ bde gshegs rnams ni 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can nA nga yang ni/ bstan pa de
66a7(dkon brtsegs): la mi dga' 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de dag gsungs dga' ba yi/ 'gro ba ba'i mid yang dag thob par 'gyur// detshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/ na ba dang nin dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan sti snga
66a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod las yongasu grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la/ yongasu nus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/ gzhan yang byang chub thob nas thob nas thub rnams kyis// ye she
66b1(dkon brtsegs): lag 'gyur rnyenang zlas pa pa rnams lung chud du pa yi/ rnam pa'i gsung rgyas rnams yid das / des yang ni rab tu'i grugs/ das rnam ma kyis rgyas pa'i smra za
66b2(dkon brtsegs): yang bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyud dge/ de nas grulnga bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis sgyu ma yin rnams dang / mamakha' stong rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang klurnams kyi mang
66b3(dkon brtsegs): mtheb sung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rings te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ster de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi mang chu
66b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bco ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po rgya che zhing yongasu rgyas pa yin pas// mtho ba dpa' bar mi 'argyan
66b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing / yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas// mtho ba mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhin
66b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snya ma// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la
66b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla bre bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste gser gyi skud pa'i bla bre dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla bre dang / bai DUr+ya'i bla bre dang / shel gyi bla bre dang / mu tig dmar
66b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bri bre dang / spug bla bre dang / rdo'i snying po'i blo bren sug/ rin po che'i bla bre dag li yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ro'i lnga ldi mngon par sprul te/ gsor gyi srung pa'i bla bre nis la ni dadus gyi me tog phreng 'i rdzaldi kri su gyi
67a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni gser gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ bai chu'i bla bre rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla bre rnams la ri ba du
67a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig darar po'i bla bre rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla bre rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying
67a3(dkon brtsegs): dru bla rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye bas sdug mngon par sprul to// shing rnga bkra' ba bal na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas
67a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying po drar du'o// shing rnga de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyis gdugs bu rim brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bau Sh+ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi yu bcad bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon
67a5(dkon brtsegs): par sprul po// gdugs de dag la yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga ldi mngon par sprul te 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang / bai duH'i me tog lngalnga
67a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / shel gyi me dog gi lnga ldi dang / mu tig dbang po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / klu'i me tog gi lnga ldig sag go// mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de
67a7(dkon brtsegs): da me tog gi 'phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byas so// tshul bum gyi mos las na dag kyang mngon par sprul lo// zhing da de dag rje de ning 'ang blar de dag ris rjes su 'drang bar gyur to// des
67a8(dkon brtsegs): grul bupa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi gong de dag la gnon te/ rin po ches bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla dang / mdog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mchod pa byed
67b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la seng gi bar ldang las la da gsum banar te// banar nas bang de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs lam gro phyag 'am la nas phyogs gdum 'dzang
67b2(dkon brtsegs): sem sa 'das 'tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bzod pa/ thams cad du yang me ba sengs pang 'a ba sa/ khra pa chen gyi mtho ma ma ste/ tshul ba srung pa
67b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhis su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha sad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags pa mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin pani bsgrubs pas
67b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab ldan la dregs pa yod mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin song ste rmi lam dga' dang // chu bla nam mkha'i smyig rgyu lta bur ni// bde bar gshegs/
67b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ci ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam so// de bzhin bde bar gshegs
67b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di ni brag ca ci bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bla bre sil stan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// blag cha ci bzhin de dag de
67b7(dkon brtsegs): lngar gda'// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog du myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro la bdag cag gris// rdzogs bgyis d+hal
67b8(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi// nang dang mashing yongs su gces gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur du thob ma gi med pa'i gnas// ga thos
68a1(dkon brtsegs): grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi// ba kya rtag byang chub la mchog sangs rgyas nas// sems can blo sobs sa la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med
68a2(dkon brtsegs): rab stod pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas
68a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa daphrul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sdod pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas lo mtshan mi mnga'// ngo marar 'gyur
68a4(dkon brtsegs): med rtsal bas 'dzin mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par bka' srol nyan par 'tshal// rnal ba'i nal nas 'jum pa mdzad mthong nus// 'gro ba de dag the tshom som nyi mchal// the tshom
