68a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum// mi'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag 'gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yangab mthong // de sus sangs
68a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis// mi'i dam pa bdag ni mnyan par 'tshal// de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid cig bcom/
68a7(dkon brtsegs): nas dang dag mtha'al sri ga mo gnas// rnam gzugs mtha' mnga' bdag di mthun par 'tshal// de ring su yis 'khor bcus bdud rnams bcom// thub bson pa dang sus sa
68a8(dkon brtsegs): mar bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig gtid byed 'gyur// ma mchis te dang bdag de mnyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de'i dodan de mnyan sang nga// 'gro la ku kying thal mo gyur tsho gas
68b1(dkon brtsegs): snying rdzebs mngal mchod pa byas/
68b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa thotshomamal pa'i byecho ma stsal// rang gnyis dam pas lung bskrad mdzang du gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dngadu ldan pa dathul latshigs su bcang des bka' stsam pa
68b3(dkon brtsegs): bral khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas pa gyur// de drid bstar byas nathul mthul nyan par gyis// grul du
68b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs kyis ngal mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// ni ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang banag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring mchod
68b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i chosra la blo gros rnam par btang // lom sor skya bro rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// rab tu la ba stor rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas de
68b6(dkon brtsegs): dag las de byas pa na// grul bum skye gnas ni 'phos skye gnas bzang / brgya byin lnga'i drung du 'dong bar 'gyur// thugs rje byams don mdzad skyo bzung du'ang 'dod// des ni yang dang yang
68b7(dkon brtsegs): bsnun te// phyir zhing chos la bre tshom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa grang+gA'i bye snyed du// nang nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing // bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed// go cha chen po rab tu
68b8(dkon brtsegs): bgos yid kyis// de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar byed// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te// ngo mtshar med rjes bya ba'i rtsal
68b9(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyub// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar ste// de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dgan// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed/ rgyal 'dzi
69a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshar med pa zhing skyong zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med 'i ba chol// de dag rol ba la yang mi gnas ste// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'ju rgya
69a2(dkon brtsegs): pas lung bstan cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bskul te// grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thogs nas// 'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar gyur/
69a3(dkon brtsegs): zul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u se dgu pa'o// // de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu drug gis// lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang /
69a4(dkon brtsegs): klu rnams dang / zul du ma rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim ning mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' ning dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas/ ngomar thod par
69a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang yang dag par stsal// bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bsdad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang snyan la/ ches gang la
69a6(dkon brtsegs): yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par snyan pa 'di ni ngomanar chad ngos pa nas/ de dag gis chos de la bu khong du drud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas
69a7(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mdzod pa'i phyir brtsor par gyur te/ glang 'i rgya la bas
69a8(dkon brtsegs): gabu bye 'phrag sum bcu drug mdon par sprul to// glang poches srung gi bung dga'i ri ning mgro byed phrag sum cu drug drug/ mgo ba'i nings kyi ba phrag sum bcu drug drugs ril la'i
69b1(dkon brtsegs): nga chud ma ring na yang badrang du 'du 'i la mas bye badrug kyang dang // 'dum tshan da na dum sa sa sa
69b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdud bdun ning pad+ma'i mtha' mtha' 'khod pas/ bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag gi mgo re la yang rin po ches bdu
69b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bdugs nas/ rin pa chas bdun gyi dra ba dog gis gzungs byas pa dang / ring po che sna bdud gyi lnga ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag gsum cun drug drug mngor par skul lo//
69b4(dkon brtsegs): che'i mgo thams cad la yang lnga'i spos kyi bla bre sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bres pa'i sa ga mngon par stsal to// de nas ji bdeg blang ba ches srung gi bu bye bra gsum kyi drug pa nga/
69b5(dkon brtsegs): la bzhon te/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing / nam mkha' las rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug bskor ba byas nas lha'i bu can dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gdor/
69b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ku ru'i phye ma dang / lA'i ta ma la'i lo ma'i dang / ut+pa la'i bye ma dang / lha'i gser phyi dang / lha'i metog man+dA ba dang / man+ta ba ched po
69b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu drug ka dang / ma byug gachen po dang / bdun kachen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab
69b8(dkon brtsegs): ga'i to// gser dang / dngul dang / pre Sh+ya dang / sil dang / stug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i sring ba'i mitog la rnams dang / skul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
70a1(dkon brtsegs): gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon pa rab tu gtor to// spos kyi bla dri dag las spos kyi ngang byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa snga tshogs kyi rar yang steng gi par
70a2(dkon brtsegs): snang las mngon par snang las mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tu chang drug cu nun rang spos rus rdzab tu gyur te/
70a3(dkon brtsegs): sa chu'i rdza ba de'i dros song gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gyur na/ sems can gang dag gis smos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo si la sma de dag gis
70a4(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mdod pa'i phyir/ glang po
70a5(dkon brtsegs): sasrung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gi mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang mdun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni rdul
70a6(dkon brtsegs): la la na tsan dan dang / oM ka ru dang / tam la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lde ma yin gyi la rdzas kyi bye ba dang / spos sna tshogs kyis phye ma 'thob la la ni me tog man+dAr ba dang / @n+d+ha
70a7(dkon brtsegs): bachen po nas sgyu swar khra bo dang / snga sngar pakra chen gyi bar kyi mdog dang / sprul pa'i metog rnams 'byor/ la lA di gsen gyi me to ga nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig gsor
70a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po sdom pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mthong / le la nin bza' dag mthong// lal ni nabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rin po ches sbas
70b1(dkon brtsegs): sa sa// yang na gse byin bdag sa ya ma / ma rnams ca kyi rgyalam na dang / pa'i bdas pa ga gas/
70b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs na n+ti/ la la ni sa'i sas nu'i ra 'bebs te/ l+h+wa ma yin gyi bu mas tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bzod pa'i ba sam du'i so// de
70b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag glang po che rgyal po srung gi bu de dag la bzhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las/ glang po ches srung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'dasal ma
70b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ nabs la mgro bos phyagra 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad bdag gis mngon par bsod
70b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan pad gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mngan
70b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog mnga'/ mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di snyed du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bras ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogasal 'gro ba rab du
70b7(dkon brtsegs): bkod bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin nyid// brjod pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyed gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis/ 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba
70b8(dkon brtsegs): byong // bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ongs mang dang // gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang // chos rnams 'di dang rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams
71a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsan/ chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos bya ba yongs su bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/ bcom ldan 'das
71a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bsar// shing rnga'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bdag dang gnan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang // shing rta'i bgyi bdag kyang brjid par 'gyur// de bzhin
71a3(dkon brtsegs): kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su skul mi bgyid// chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis// chos rnams chos nye bar mi rten te// chos rnams gang yang ma
71a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes 'chi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang der ma mchis te// 'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ci bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yong
71a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gsungs// ming gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu
71a6(dkon brtsegs): ngomatshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs shing gyur de// nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros ston pa rnams// chos kyis chos tshul la gzung ba gyis te// ni pA'i go bang 'chi med thob par bgyi
71a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje ldan pa par bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams rgya'i mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ci ltar
71a8(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal sgribs pa'i 'gro sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyas kyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgyalan yongs su grol/
71b1(dkon brtsegs): / su la mas ca // mas ma ma pa las rgyam ma
71b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs tsha dag pag gis// 'gro ma ma kham smig dang bral pa 'i// tshogs yongs rgya ba nyid kyis lag gyu cing // ngas nyid las kyi bras dubyu gapas sol
71b3(dkon brtsegs): chom ldan 'das kyis dri ba bye ba phrag sum nu madrug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam zugs su chud nas// 'dum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rda tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'jigs su
71b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang de gsol pa// bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyur mchis par mi 'dzum na// bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyuni myur du gsungs// nes nur gdod nga
71b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi the rom gsol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'jum mthong nas// skye bo de dag bre tsor rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzum pa'i dzid ni de dag mnyan par 'tshal// thung chen 'gro ba'i tha tshom pasam
71b6(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa'i bsan la su ni gzugs// the tshom bral ning so mnyi bsal bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam khyen nas// mi'i mchog gis 'dzum pa dzan
71b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur// gang gi blo gros drad rtogs blo mkhyen nas/ bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du lachu
71b8(dkon brtsegs): bu mdzad 'gro ba 'di dag blo zhan yongs su btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dga'// sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis te// dga' ba'i yid kyis sdod pa'i dang
72a1(dkon brtsegs): tu lta/ nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub cher 'jig rten mig/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba thugs
72a2(dkon brtsegs): rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa thul la tshigs su bcad de srar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pangs mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris
72a3(dkon brtsegs): mthun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de'i don ni lung stan pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen dor ni de ring 'phel// 'dzum mdzad rgyu rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad
72a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ de ni ma log par yangangs bstan gyis// bstan pa la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyod// dri za'i don rnams chos kyi rjes stegs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas
72a5(dkon brtsegs): sa nyid 'byung bar gyur pa med pa ste/ chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rdog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjes
72a6(dkon brtsegs): su brjod bya ba// des ni nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsung // de dag gi tshig de rtogs gyur nas// maud glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub na med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i
72a7(dkon brtsegs): lngal po rnams kyis mchod de// nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di ga mos// 'di dgang la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ri bor dga' ba'i yid gyur
72a8(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul pa// brgya byin lha yul bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur// ning
72b1(dkon brtsegs): rnas mi rjems su nga // de ga 'a nim khas rgyas kyang d+ham// de dag bde gshegs byung ba po byung // de dag ning yang dag par 'angs dga'agyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'i rje
72b2(dkon brtsegs): sems canan// srog tshug mang po dag la byang chub sngam/ 'gro ba 'di garang bzhin song rig nas/ bde gshegs 'gro ba dgra la son par 'gyur/ rgyal ba thams cad pakhyen ci
72b3(dkon brtsegs): gas pa// rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub sten// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong jig nas// bde glashegs 'gro bdag la son par 'gyur// rgyal ba rdzam
72b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste// sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang po'o// bsal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur//
72b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su sngon// rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar de na dri zas mchod lung bskur// rnga thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung
72b6(dkon brtsegs): sad pa ni bcad par mdzad// dri za lung bstan pa yid du byung 'gyur ba// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// dar ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas// kya thub la thams
72b7(dkon brtsegs): cad skyabs su dong // dri za lung bstan po'i le'u sde bcu pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung
72b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rang ste// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de// chos
73a1(dkon brtsegs): rnying la 'jug pa yang thos pas// stod pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom
73a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom
73a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das lnga mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mngon par shes stobs ni kun tu mtha' yas te/
73a4(dkon brtsegs): d+har ro chu 'dzin pas ma 'tshal ba dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten pan mdzad pa// mi'i seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod// ri rabasrang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/
73a5(dkon brtsegs): 'i brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs// chang bzung dpag par nus pa yod ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bas
73a6(dkon brtsegs): sa su chud// skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams
73a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyed pa dang // de dag sems rgyud ci 'dra 'byung ba dang // de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang
73a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin ni sdang skyong // mi'i gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag
73b1(dkon brtsegs): lam rgyud kho khyims pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes rgyun tu rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// bde gshegs
73b2(dkon brtsegs): sa 'a gro kun rab tu gzigs// chung zla'i lam rgyud gang du khyams gyur cing // byams pa'i stobasralas rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs
73b3(dkon brtsegs): seng ges lha ba ci 'dra dang // gong gis sdug bsngal rnam par 'thob 'gyur b.ro// gang la rten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba// de ga rnams kyang 'dren pas rang du rje
73b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyal ba'i bsan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgoni gang gis// ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shig/ ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'amyur khyod kyis mkhyen// khyis
73b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// rab tu 'byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi// bstan pa rab phra che lngar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs
73b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la bstas bgyis pas// dmyal ba chen por tshe srid gnas pa dang // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rag
73b7(dkon brtsegs): tu gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dang skyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bsan 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// chan ma thams cad
73b8(dkon brtsegs): ra 'jig bgyis shing // 'gro rgyad kun sngon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di chum 'dra bar rab brtags nas// phung po thag cha 'dri bar rtogs 'gyur te// byang chub sems ma
74a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni rab tu gzigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa// de yis bla med sangs rgyas grub
74a2(dkon brtsegs): par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang 'byung thob 'gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod spyir bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/
74a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzub pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// mi'i seng ge 'jum pa 'dzad pa// dri'i zla nga 'du nga
74a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad ni// 'dzum pa de'i rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol// stor pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di dag gli #
74a5(dkon brtsegs): rlom bsal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bo'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa skyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gis sems ni
74a6(dkon brtsegs): mi skul gnas par gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bsad du gsol// de ring 'khor rnams the tsho mtsho 'tshal ning // kun kyang rgyal ba'i nal du lta zhing sdong // 'di nas tha
74a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos blo rlom bsal du gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gi tshe 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus dbang po 'dir bstan lags
74a8(dkon brtsegs): gang nig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis gyur// de ri legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la pa ma nid pa// the tsom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis lags
74b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gsol// de thos la dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// drug 'azhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa d+ha bral la rigs su
74b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad de srar bka' stsal pa// rnathul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag gis dron rjer byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyur dris pas na// sngon po'i dgongs parjo
74b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis legs par mthong // de dag lung bsan ma lus par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid kyi ni gzigs gyur nas// 'grol bar po'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// ngang pa'i yid
74b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rngathul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas// gnod skyed tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis mo sa dbus sangs rgyas bsreng
74b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang bdang // chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma thams cad rnam par re zhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun tu spong pa rnamasas
74b6(dkon brtsegs): nga// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang bdang // rnal 'byor stobs kyi phung po rnams bshig cing // kun rdzob tsam du rig nas ma chags te// srid pa kun tu tshul padra ba'i
74b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang bkang // de dag srid pa kun tu chags 'gyur ba// stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste
74b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i btul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// ni ba
75a1(dkon brtsegs): bla med byang chub thob pa'i phyir// phung po'i rang bzhin dben ning stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang stong de yang rang bzhir stong pa
75a2(dkon brtsegs): ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min// ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang po nir stong par rig gyur nas// shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na/
75a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang bzhin stong phrar shes par bya// mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste// de ltar
75a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod na gzhan mir spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur// rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i glanas
75a5(dkon brtsegs): shes byang chub yid ldar gyur// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar nga la mchod pa rab byas nas// gnod sbyin rgyu nas shi 'phos blo can rnams// mtho ras
75a6(dkon brtsegs): dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad cig cig la yang // blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal
75a7(dkon brtsegs): ba gdams dag stod// de dag 'jig rter phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul par 'dra shes nas// 'jig rten
75a8(dkon brtsegs): chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar brtan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas// byang chub bla med de dag 'thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur// sems
75b1(dkon brtsegs): can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grol// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya// ni ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dga'i
75b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa song ni chang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur po ni// rgyal sras mang po sar ma'i tshogs snyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'phri
75b3(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de dag zos nas ltar bcas bajig rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson pa brdan
75b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te// kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// / gnod sbyin lung bsan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / bam polnga pa/
75b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po la sogs pa mi 'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis// lA ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang // gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar drag kyang mthong / lung bstan pa yang
75b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ khyod kyi 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la/ srog dang skye ba po dang / shing las skye dang / shed bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag
75b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gi yang gang yang med la/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs
75b8(dkon brtsegs): las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs// sangs rgyas kyang mi
76a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do// ci nig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan
76a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro nas lung bstan par mdzad// ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs
76a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin pa dang / ning bkod pa de dang / ning yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ning nas ring du 'dong ba dang / der de bzhin gan
76a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs
76a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas su bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di skad cig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba dang de dag
76a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos bsal ba 'di skad cig du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad// ci zhig las dgongs te
76a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams nye bar len pa medapa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// nos bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzangs ma sa/ dranas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i
76a8(dkon brtsegs): chom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis nu bzhus pa// rgyal ba'i gsu
76b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rmugs gas kyi mangs ba ga gas skyes// zang da nga srung bdan pa/ de gshegs bdag gis da // gdu na pa
76b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis la zang ba dang // rang bzhin med gsung ci ladu// mchod pa 'dri ni gang zag mchog/ skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub sems bskyed pa ni jil bu// skyes buramachog gus pa
76b3(dkon brtsegs): sum pa'o// ldeng po ga de dag ma 'phrul// mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'a bo gsung // de mi yang dag sung bsrun pas// gleng ba dag gi sdom du
76b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'jal myur ste zhes// gsungs pa de ni ci la bu// ldem por gsungs pa de dag kyang // shAkya seng ge de ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa mA lags la// dge bzhis
76b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung ci lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu mchog bdag mtshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// rkang gnyis mchog gsung ci lta gu/
76b6(dkon brtsegs): ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra bsngal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong sde stong pa yang // rtogs shes mgon gsung ci lta bu// the tshom rnam pa 'di dag
76b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes// shes rab dpe' med bdag ma 'tshal// ni ba yod ces bka' stsal la// chos kun ni gsung ci lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag/ bdag la rnam par bas du
76b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkhar 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// chos ni rab tu spang bgyis na// mi khas dmyal srungs ci la bu// brngan pa mtho sa 'jig
77a1(dkon brtsegs): rten dang / 'gro ba gan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// ras las can gsung ci lta bu// bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang /
77a2(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mi nor bdag ma 'tshal// mgon po nga la bdag dogs ra// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom stsol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la// byang chub yang dag bsgrubs
77a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'adra gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi chu la// de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni zang bstar chad med bla ma
77a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// mnor sbyin yadra bsan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab rib bral ba yi// sgran mnga' sdigs
77a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di// sel nus mA nAchi sA nga lta bas// bdag ni rnyil ba mchog la dang /
77a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'ab ci'i rgyal po ljod pas the tsom dris pas 'di dag gsan nas// de lan gang bye pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldod pa la tshigs su brdud
77a7(dkon brtsegs): ra dka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid dang lungs pa// bdag gis ma 'cha' ces smras pa// gas te ga' nig mi song sa// rgyal bas de lung bsan mi gsung /
77a8(dkon brtsegs): zhen 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur ma// 'gyur ba med cing ther thugs// de la 'phel med 'grib pa med // le lo shin du 'ongs dag la// jig rang bzhin med
77b1(dkon brtsegs): gas nga du / rdzu mas ma mas par byas// ma kyid kyi sa medam// ma pa'i bang sa/ slu
77b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs bris pa// mI pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med spyi bo mkhas pas rdzogs// byis pa rnams ni 'dil 'khrul// rdo chungs
77b3(dkon brtsegs): ni rnyed par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de nim 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/ gnad du ma sems nyan par gyis// khyim
77b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brang dga' ba rnams// 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// ldog pa'i sems dang 'dushes car// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag song cang
77b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i// sems med chos ni ngas bshang na/ khyis pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang / byang chub par
77b6(dkon brtsegs): yon thos 'gyur nas// zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chen de ri thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba// de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa// 'tsho 'pho ba yang
77b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzir de dag la// de la ther zug med// dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam
77b8(dkon brtsegs): par som/ sgyum 'dral lngar skye// ji la bu zhes dogs gyur pa// mthar byin ma gyur slob pa dang // rgya bo rnams la mtho'i ris bshang // gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/
78a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag shes brten ces gang smras pa// gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bsdun// g.yo
78a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma 'tshal ces smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag yod khas len cing // bya ba
78a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bdag gis byas 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang sbas pa/ khyis pa log
78a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'i blo can rnams// rang bzhin spong bar mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin spong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtogs pa'i bskyed// yang dag ma yin
78a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pas bcings// ni ba yod chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong nas smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyi// kun tu rtog las sred pa skyed// sgom pas ci ltar mig rgyul
78a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rtog pas som pa bskyed// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la log par brtags// chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smyig rgyu la ni chu med do// de bzhin yongasu
78a7(dkon brtsegs): ga pas dkrugs// sud po min la sdud par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sug med smyig rgyu chu bzhin te// smyig rgyal ni chu med
78a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na// byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtogs pas bcings par gyur// chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang /
78b1(dkon brtsegs): sa smras pa/ nga pasas gyur pa/ mim khas rnams rmim par gyur/ 'ang ba byung sa sa// 'dus da chu / dag
78b2(dkon brtsegs): kha gu da 'gyu shes sdug pa ste// de ga pangadag tu ngan can te// nam mkha' la ni 'du ba nas// songs canam thong byed // mi mkhas sems su
78b3(dkon brtsegs): myong mthing ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang // skye bo'i 'gro rgyad gzhan dag dang // lus kyadra ngas ni bskur ba dang // byed pa po ni rab tu daklag/ yang dag du ni 'gro ba dag
78b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang bar gyis// rdzi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par nan// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bas// byid pe phyogs bcu rnams na med// nga ma
78b5(dkon brtsegs): nga gis brtul po'i sa// me 'byung 'gyur ba ci bzhin no// bdag cag tsame 'di bskyed bya zhes// rlung dang shing la sems pa med// 'on kyang mi ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi byed po
78b6(dkon brtsegs): zhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang dag nyan par byos// mi'i tshe chad lo bcu ste/
78b7(dkon brtsegs): de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi// lo la phung por srungs pa med// bsgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad med ces gang smras pa// las zad ces ni ngas smras pa// spong pa'i tshul du zang
78b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med// tha skad tshul du zad par san// yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa// phyin ci log de mtha'// log pa'i bla can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid pa
79a1(dkon brtsegs): cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyis// nges par ldod pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa la/
79a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub blo ldaran rnams la bsad// chos rnams cad ma byas pa// a'i so'i gzugs su bsar// de ltar spyod pa byed pa rnams la// mtshad nying mtha' las ngas bstan te// 'a
79a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a'i sgo'i gzugs su bskrud// chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa// a y-is chos la 'jug par bstan// A'i bsgo'i gzungs bas pa
79a4(dkon brtsegs): de drang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur ba med par yang // a ni rlos kur sgo mar bsan// a'i
79a5(dkon brtsegs): sgor gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pas 'di ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zang smras// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyi// mi zang sgo'i gzungs su
79a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kur bsam gyis mi khyab ces
79a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ci bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a'i sgo'i gzungs bsar pa// 'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos kun lus med byang chub rjes// blo ldan rnams ldangs bstad pa/
79a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di rang gzungs kyi sgo yid te// ma lader nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams 'ong bani med pa sa// med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// ma la dzin
79b1(dkon brtsegs): nus 'dug par bya// rdzas rnams gdags pa med pa sa// med pas de dag gangagasu med// 'di yang gzungs gi sa yin te// mas nanas lag pa na// sa ma
79b2(dkon brtsegs): med paso// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yid de// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bsdud// gzungs kyi sa mang la nyon// chos kun yid la du
79b3(dkon brtsegs): me// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bsdar// med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'dra
79b4(dkon brtsegs): yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las rten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a las brda
79b5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos
79b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// oM las rten nas shes par bya// grong dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong med
79b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro// chos kun mnyam mdu de bas na// mtshan nyid gcog cing mtshan go'i med// nam mkha' dang nI
79b8(dkon brtsegs): bA ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag med chad pa med// mnyam gzhag med cing gisu med// gdung med bsil med cha ba'ang med// lta ba'i lam min med phyir ro/
80a1(dkon brtsegs): drang po ma yin yon po min// mun pa ma yin snang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzugs su shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po yang med pa
80a2(dkon brtsegs): ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang mi byed nye ni med// skyel ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro med ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal
80a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing mi nyal med// sred pa med par shes par gyis// migacan ma yin long ba min// lta ba ma yin mun sgribs min// sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min//
80a4(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa ma yin ni ba'akhor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min brdzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shesar gyis// 'jig rten 'dul ba'i don phyir gyis// 'di la the tshom gang yang
80a5(dkon brtsegs): med// gang gtsang bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du byung ba med// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nus pa lung bstan pa dang / gzungs nges par bstan
80a6(dkon brtsegs): pus yongs su marnam par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang / raM la pad+ma la rten pa dang / rI la rjen pa dang
80a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdud gyi rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par bya/ gdugs kyis lnga ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla bre dang lnga lngas
80a8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sel snya bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas// ri spos kyi ngang ldang la skyes pa dang / zang las skyes pa
80b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / chulas skyes pa'i mi ga thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la bachod pa byas nas/ demi 'a tsho'i tshigs dang lha cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa byed drug brgyang po dang sa du
80b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes dang tshul sa skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tor mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu ngo gi
80b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te/ rkang pas dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsor ba byas te// bcom 'das kyis nabs la mgo 'os phyag 'tshal nas/
80b4(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing // rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
80b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa daphrul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la chags su bcad de gso
80b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bde gshegs 'di bral spyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// khrims mchod pa yang dag tu// mdzum mdzad rgyu bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum
80b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas/ 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// zla ba ches la me bzhin du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta// bang gshegs pa mdzes pa deng su nig/ gnyis med chos lags mchog
80b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tshom stsol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das// ci ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par
81a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ sba mchog bdag gis the tshom bum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tshom mchis som
81a2(dkon brtsegs): nyi chad// ci ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur// de ltar gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs che mdzad pa dang // the tshom gcod spang ljon pa dang // mi ci rnams kyi
81a3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa khrul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen rnams dang du// sangs rgyas yon
81a4(dkon brtsegs): tan rten 'gyur ba// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// de khyod
81a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i yid kyis dA las nyor// 'jig rten pan+da dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par bya// the tshom gcad pa nga las nyon// ljon pa
81a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga sogs mi 'am ci// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas 'chi 'phos mtho ras 'dod // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der// lha ma
81a7(dkon brtsegs): nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems kyi dbang bsgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi'i seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas ning rnam/
81a8(dkon brtsegs): khrig du// sbrul bkye rang na lha gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu yang // de dag lha ming 'khor 'khor nas// rang
81b1(dkon brtsegs): shing rnams snga tshogs su// byang chub rnam par 'chang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa lnga// mi'i seng ge 'jig rnyed mgor// chags med re shes thong dpags
81b2(dkon brtsegs): spobs bcu gzi brjod datha' yas 'gyur// de dag nyid du sems can gang // yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skyed// nyad kyis theg pas gang byung ba// kud kyang snying pa thar pa/
81b3(dkon brtsegs): mi'i seng ge'i zhing der ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams//
81b4(dkon brtsegs): cag dag med sangs zhing // yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya cher yun ring btab// de dag 'dir
81b5(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos nas// bsam+ba pas rang bzhin rnam par sbyong // nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun kyang
81b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su drag/ de dag nang du rnam kun tu// mi khor gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams yongs su spangs de dag ri// sems can rnams kyang yongs su 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten
81b7(dkon brtsegs): mgon po yis// mi 'am ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnam// kun kyang yid ni rangs par gyur// / mi'am ci'i lung bstan pa'i le'u sa bcu
81b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ngo // / de nas lnga 'bring ldan glang po can brgyad khris/ lA ma yin rnams nas mi'ab ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/
82a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzi ma zhing mgul yi 'angs te// rab tu dga' bring dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
82a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson par 'gyur te// de dag gis ser bya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dkyil kho yug dung pag dang drug bcu rgyun chang ma chog mnarabs dus ma chung tsam du gang bar byas
82a3(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// ni ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun
82a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjecan// 'jig rten bdag po mI'i sag/ sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes
82a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ldan pa// thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zlanya pa'i ni// mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi nal tu
82a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga dpage tu med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpag yas ye shes phung po ljod// gzi rjid dpag yas phung po can// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshul// stobs bcu mengang shing dpal
82a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa// bde pa nim bsad dri gsum sel// brgyal ba'i bcwo brgyad chos dang ldan// the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis menga' zhing // dpe 'byung bzung ba
82a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mche ma tshungs med thugs// bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khams songs kyis bar byed pa// ting 'dzin sapas rnams mi brgyad pa/
82b1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes spobs kyi mtshan can+dan// bdud stobs bco thung rgyal ba lags// ye shes songs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser sna mi mang 'acan thos brtul// ninga'i thugs kyis myong
82b2(dkon brtsegs): / lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu song gi bde gshegs khyod// gti mu gzhi bgyid chos bskyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stongs bcur// chos dmas 'di
82b3(dkon brtsegs): ni thob par shog/ rdzi lar thub pa khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro kyi// das
82b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don skad du// sing brtse nye bar gzung nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i tshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyud las bskal bar bgyi// bdag cag ltar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren pa
82b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dren 'gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyis bsam pa
82b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rje thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po// rgyu ma
82b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis par 'dzum pa mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyid byung
82b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas// 'khor kun the tshom 'tshal 'gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni mnyan par 'tshal// don can 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/ dge
83a1(dkon brtsegs): spyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the tshom cad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis// gang gis deng mchod bla med bgyis// su zhig de ring
83a2(dkon brtsegs): gting thob 'gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum// de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis// deng sus lnga gnas thams cad kyang // rab
83a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' yid ldan par bgyis// rgyal bgrub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i the tsho myur tu khum// de thos pade gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab du yi dgang 'gyur// de nas bam
83a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis chags su bcad dacha ldan pa rnga thul slar bka' stsal pa// 'phreng lngar glang po can lnga yi// lung bsdad rta thul khyod dris pas// ngas 'gro ba mang po yi// dod chen shin du dang
83a5(dkon brtsegs): byas 'gyur// stobs bcu rtsal ba madris// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// da ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phreng ldan glang po la tshogs kyis// ra la sems
83a6(dkon brtsegs): dang nga chod pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pa ma byas rgyal bar 'gyur// dri 'di nas 'chi 'phos nas// 'thun par mi'i nang skyes// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la
83a7(dkon brtsegs): me tog mchog gi sa mchod par 'gyur// kun tu bde grashegs sems// skyed par 'gyur rnying phel byed 'gyur// rang byung mi'i seng ge la// tshigs su bca pas bskyod par 'gyur/
83a8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas// me tog gis mdzad tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bsod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams pa
83b1(dkon brtsegs): cing mthu bo che'i su bzod nas// rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la// rnam par 'dren par 'jig rter byung // grags pa ma snad dgras rgyu ba// brgyad khri bo rnams de ngag kur// bcwa
83b2(dkon brtsegs): migacig ma bde gzugs 'gyur// mau tog rgyal brtan ldan ces bya// den dmyal dang dud 'gro dang // ngas song gzhir rje'i 'jig rten med// ning den ni la min med/
83b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu bcod// 'phreng ldan glang po can lnga yi// longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mchang dpag tu med// dri tshe mi dge snga mi phrag
83b4(dkon brtsegs): myi dge byed pa smos ci dgos// de na rnams 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ gang gA'i bye ma rang mang ste
83b5(dkon brtsegs): grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang // grags pa mra smad de dag gi/ ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring srel la'ang /
83b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sku mnga' 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring srel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srogs chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub ngu ni sems
83b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed 'gyur// 'phreng ljin glang ba can rnams kyis// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang // ngo tsha sems ni rab tu dga' 'phreng ldar grwa
83b8(dkon brtsegs): rkyen lung bstan pa'i le'us bcu gsum // de nas rgyal chen ba'i'i ris kyi lha dgu khris// lA ma yin rnams nas 'phreng la glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi
84a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mthong / lung bsrud pa yang thos nas tshi ma ming mgul yi ngas te/ rab tu dga' ning dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes nas/ sa sar+b+bas kyi chos rnams
84a2(dkon brtsegs): thod par bya ba'i phyir/ mos pa drag po bskyed de/ 'di lta sde dper na// khang pa'i grul non pa'i mi nig chu'i dbus su phyin du gru chug tu 'ong zhis nu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya
84a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed pa de bzhin du// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri bo de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams
84a4(dkon brtsegs): tho par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po
84a5(dkon brtsegs): bani dang lhan cig tu/ rin po che'i bla bra bkru ba/ bltan stug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang phel cher mu tig dmar po dang / sar mo dog dang / bai myu dang / gas
84a6(dkon brtsegs): / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gas gra go// lha'i rol mo sa la sbyid dragu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bla brang gu khri bo de dag thos nas/ rol po
84a7(dkon brtsegs): simasan dgu khri po de dag byed cing seng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor brjing / me tog man+dA dang / man+dAr ba chen po dang / many+dzu
84a8(dkon brtsegs): dang maN+Dag ka chen po dang / bdug ka dang / ba dug ka rkyen po dang / sprul pa'i metog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtong/ mngon par ga'o// mngon par rabadu ga'i te/
84b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug gis la tshad par byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das sa lan sum 'aslar ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad bangag gis mngon par bdang ba// rgal ba'i spyod na mang sa
84b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ni dgu zi thas pa dag/ 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan ngan// thal mo ba du sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis num ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchi
84b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mtsho gra la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams ma ku pa// mi shes par rnam par spangs// sred pa'i phung po
84b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ngargyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bskal// khyod ri zug rngu phyung ba ste// rnal gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ning khyen bzhir spong ba ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi tharnams //
84b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi nyon mongs thams cad spangs// bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcad// sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ri// slong
84b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom ldan 'das khyod la smon pa yang // rnam pa kun tu mi mnga'o// khyod kyis sred pa drung nas phyung // ma rig pa ri thugs kyang byung // rngam pa bzhi po'i phyir ci
84b7(dkon brtsegs): log/ rnam par kun tu yongs su spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de// rigs rngon pas ci bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzi
84b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'jigs ba tshogs ltar ltungs// stong pa nyid ni ma 'chal bas// ma rig pa'i mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i brtson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag
85a1(dkon brtsegs): ci bzhin du// 'grod chung bsod par gzigs// gang gi rnam dag mig byung ba'i// ye shes sdang ba rab tu bstam// phung po song par rnam par shig/ ming dang gdun
85a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par shig/ chos gang dang ming gang gis// chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos dengos des
85a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis sdong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul ra// de la sems can gang gas ma mchis// srog dang gang zag
85a4(dkon brtsegs): su mchis lngar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yid sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam pas bsdad du mdzad// ji ltar ri mo mkhan na//
85a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing // mnyan dang ni ma mnyam dang // lci dang yang ba bstan gyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis
85a6(dkon brtsegs): de banin chos dbyings mnyam la gas na// byis pa rnams ri de la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyi srab pa la// legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du
85a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstad ba// shes rab chen po khyod kyi ri// ye shes spyod par ba dus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa
85a8(dkon brtsegs): de lta'i bdag cag myur du ri// bla pang byang chubazhi thob ste// de ltar 'dren pa khyod pazhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bsor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams
85b1(dkon brtsegs): nga 'gyur ba'i sengs can la// ji la 'dzid pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag gis chos kyang ngas myur bstan// de ras bcom ldanams kyis sa
85b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thugs su rung nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol// rgyu ma ra chis par rdzogs sangs rbAs
85b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu// dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bshang ba mthong nas ni
85b4(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis chen po 'tshal 'gyur na// kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis// nem nur gang gis gcad par gyur// su zhig de ring ros stsogs gyur
85b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyed bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem rur 'tshal gyur na// rnam par 'dred pa lung
85b6(dkon brtsegs): bsan gsol// ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur ra// 'gro the tshom 'tshal 'gyur ba// 'dren pa'i de ltar lung gsol// ni ras rnam pa
85b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams// myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstar du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
85b8(dkon brtsegs): thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// thul khyod kyi
86a1(dkon brtsegs): dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byor mnyan pa
86a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis// dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis// mdzod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// di ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas
86a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ri nges pa rnyed // nga'i bstad la rab tu gnas// sngor yang sangs rgyas bye ba'i phrag/ brgyad cu dag la 'di ga mchod// ma 'ongs
86a4(dkon brtsegs): tus na spangs rgyas ni/ bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba gcig mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma 'gyur ba// de nyid byang chu
86a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chang mi rgya// de bas ni tu phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer tshang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur ba ni// blo'i mchog dang ldan pa dag
86a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur// gleng med gzigs pa de dag nr-i// mi rnams de'i dus kyi// lo grangs bye ba brgyad chungam// srog gi dbang po gnas par gyur// gis 'ang mthan
86a7(dkon brtsegs): sa de dag gi// nyin thos 'did chags bral ba rnams// lus kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa dag/ byed chad red 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams lathugs brtse ba'i// 'jig
86a8(dkon brtsegs): yon po dpa la ldan rnams/ myang na 'das pa'i ring sel yang // gis rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mi pa mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dzin pa dbral ldan pa/
86a9(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'jig rjer smo ma de ga nyinapas thos 'dus
86b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i mdzod na rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas ning rnams legs brgyar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon pargya ba rnams kyis// mtshad de dag thams cad pa// srog gas
86b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa slob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dag dang chos gas
86b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu chang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis// bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas// 'jig
86b4(dkon brtsegs): rter thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // shAkya yongs su sbyin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bani'i ris rnams la// 'jig rten sgron ma lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu
86b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems can mgu yid rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o// /
86b6(dkon brtsegs): dam po drug pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba khrag brgyad cus// lha ma yan dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag pa/
86b7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i du mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang // mi 'am ci dag dang / 'phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal mtshan bani'i
86b8(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim ning mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' ning dga' ba dang yang
87a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// yid 'byung ba chen po skyes te// 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
87a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba bstan sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyi'ang bzhin cad/ mu rig dmar po'i 'phreng ba dang // baing+tha'i 'phreng ba'i brgyan pa/
87a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi/ 'phreng bsu btsun pa/ sa gnas rim baN+Da dra dang / bag ma dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / mar khung gi
87a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla bre rin po dang / dril bu g.yer kA'i bra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo
87a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa lha'i rol mo si la san sgra rab tu byung ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing rnga lnga rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan
87a6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / tshul mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad du yang mngon par sprul to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad
87a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ldan pa'i 'khor yug tu dpag chang drug tu tshun chad me trog man+ta rba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis d+has pAr gang bar byas so// glang po ches srung gi bu bye ba drug brgyad
87a8(dkon brtsegs): suyang mngon par sprul te/ glang po mas srung gi bu da gare re ning mgo bye ba phrag brgyang chu glang po ches rlung gi bu'i mgo dag re ning yang sodrug drug/ sa~M de pa'i shing nga
87b1(dkon brtsegs): rjid du bdud bdus rdzing bu de dga'i ronang yang dad+ma song phrag bdu bdud/ 'dra zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgya wi// 'ang ba pa de dga'i rining yang ma'i bum bdus
87b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu be de dag re ning yang 'khor bdud bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyud pag sngag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdur du byas te/ dbus su
87b3(dkon brtsegs): ches srung gi bu dag bcung nas/ byi ba zhin shong nga de war bsams pa de dag bgyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas so// ring po che khang po dong gi las nga
87b4(dkon brtsegs): dar dang / a ga ru dang / ut+pal dang / ta ma la'i lo ma 'phye ma dang / gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog mAn+dA ra ba dang / man+ta ra ba chen po dang
87b5(dkon brtsegs): many+dzug ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / dA ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog kar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab
87b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / sdug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sde bdud gyi me dog gi char yang mngon par bang
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo de dag las lA la ni glu ler/ lA la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed// la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing / lA ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po che
87b8(dkon brtsegs): sa srungs gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad la non te/ bcom ldan 'das
88a1(dkon brtsegs): / lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to// lha'i rol mo sel sa bye ba phrag brgyad rgya yang bar sang las
88a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gnar bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul te// lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu lon/ la la ni ga
88a3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ lA la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di sa
88a4(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lnga'i bu mo 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so sam nas/ de dag 'das
88a5(dkon brtsegs): dunges 'di dag thams cad ni ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yid nosnyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad stsal pa dang
88a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes nas/ chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tshom med cing ner rur med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
88a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag kyang stsal pa dang 'dra bar mthong /
88a8(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa deng 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bdani pa de dag kyang tshul pa da
88b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o// zhes bya bar shes nas/ the tsho med cing dem nur rnyed par gyur te/ de'i ma com ldan 'das la tshigs
88b2(dkon brtsegs): btsad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang // sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang // lha rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa
88b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dred pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di dag thams cad sprul pa
88b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'o zhes/ de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan 'ad sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rtsal bas lung bstan bdag cakI 'chal
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas// 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/ khyis pa'i sa thob the snyad gang btags pa// de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/
88b6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi spo ba dang // bcom ldan tan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul pa ji bzhir rje/
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bcom ldan 'das bstan la the tshom mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra ltar len cing // se rul bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang rga/ d+he
88b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la dpar phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyong spyod pa bag yod pa/
89a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs sras kyang // khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di 'dra// bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas
89a2(dkon brtsegs): can/ re shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ sprul pa 'di dgra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dred pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med zhig
89a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs med cing // sdug bsngala'i byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa de dag ci bzhin no// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang ba nin
89a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags de pa mchis// gang che go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom thams cad spangs// sbrul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rna
89a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/ bde gshegs skyong yul 'di la spyod pa rnams// the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
89a6(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyang cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chung nas 'dzum pa mdza // de nas tshe dang ldan pa khrul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis
89a7(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de// gsol pa gzhal yas grangs mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid cam// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'jun mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'dren ni la
89a8(dkon brtsegs): mang/ rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshigs srungs tho tshom khung// rang byung bde gshegs nal das 'dzum pa 'di// byung bar rig nas 'jig rten gyi chom 'tshal/ 'gro ba'i tshe cha mdzu
89b1(dkon brtsegs): mu mthong ba 'am// ma rtogs pa'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa 'am// skyes pa'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ las sam las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgya
89b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la 'dod pa skyed do// 'di lar de bzhin gag gos pa kun rdzob dedo dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes dbya ba yang kur rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zang ngo //
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis song pa nyid du rab tu gzigs// rab tu mkhyen legs par mngon du mdzad pas// de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rte
89b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob du med pa ste// shes rab bya ba ma yin pa// rnam par bya ba ma yin pa// yongs su shes
89b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba ma yin pa// ma bstan pa rab tu ma bas ldan pa// ma thos par ma byas pa// ma shes par rnam par ma shes pa// ma bstan pa ma mthong ba// ma gtags pa 'dzin du ma bcug
89b6(dkon brtsegs): maHrtogs par ma byas pa// thob par ma byas pa ma thob pa/ nye bar ma bsten pa// ma bor ba ma bzhag pa// ma spangs pa bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa
89b7(dkon brtsegs): ma smad pa ma bstod pa// thob pa ma yin pa ma thob pa ma yin pa// bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa// gzugs ma yin
89b8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med
91a1(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa med pa// ma brtags pa rnam par mjugs pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spos pa smos pa dang bral ba
91a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
91a3(dkon brtsegs): dang lus dang / yid bde kyi mtshan mi dmyigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos kyi mtshan mi dmyigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rnab
91a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmyigs/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa dang / rna ba dang / swa dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
91a5(dkon brtsegs): 'i mtshan ma mi dmyigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung mtshan ma mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'a
91a6(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi brar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mchud ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshanam
91a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan mi dmigs pa/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par gas pa'i khams kyi mtshanam mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang /
91a8(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan mo mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma gyis kyi mtshad pa mi dmigs pa'i/ 'din chos gang dang gang so
91b1(dkon brtsegs): zhin klung gis padad pa'i nas de dang de brjod pa'i nga ba zhid de dang ngas mi brjod pa ste// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ring lda thams dga' ba yin ma dbyim pas pa'i smyi ma
91b2(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ldan pa/ mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las rnams par gyur te/
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/ de dag gis 'dri ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas
91b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi nos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan
91b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
91b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'khod nas 'bru bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bsod pa rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/ 2
91b7(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mi rnyed rnams kyang de bzhin de// dbang po'i grong ni mtshanams dben pa dang // kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i dben pa 'di ga sa
91b8(dkon brtsegs): sa pacan lasam pas na rang gis gzigs// de bun rdzob bded dang dod dam so// bded pa gdum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis bde ba gshesas
92a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// lce min ris dang lnga rnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don skad du// 'jig rten pan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to//
92a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dgas dang // lha min ris dang lha'i rnams// mi'i seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad
92a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs dma'ang bzhin mtho bo'i rigs rnams dang // phyug po khyim dang dbul ba'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin yog gi tshogs// dung meng tshogs dang skyes pa chos
92a4(dkon brtsegs): mning dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas// 'jig rten par
92a5(dkon brtsegs): la dri bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba ra// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang mtho ba sman dang mi snyan dang // bstod dang smod dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo//
92a6(dkon brtsegs): thothob pa rnye dad la chags pa skyed// mthob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gnan ma bstun tshul 'dis shes par bya// nang rnams bcud kyis de rgyun gnod par 'gyur
92a7(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzong dri la dron dam smra ba// deng gnor pa'i blo ldan gas par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rung bzhi bdug tu sna pa dang // mi rba ga chos laja/
92a8(dkon brtsegs): ces spa kyad cing // de ltar dga' sa mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dgi bad gshegs gsung na thos gyur nas// 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rdzogs spong bar bgyid // de dag
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gsungs ni spangs gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // de dag tshul mid bde ba tshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgya dag bris pas myong bar 'gyur
92b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten par pa'i bsdad pa su nig gis// ma ldog blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi ba gras pa rnying ltar rab spangs te// srid pa kun las 'das nas ni bar 'gyur// chos 'di
92b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rung bzhid dra bar pa ste// sdong pa mtshan med pa don dam nas gang gis thos nas dga' ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// ci ltar bde bar gshegs pas
92b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla med pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag blo car rnams
92b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba skyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bla ra med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral gyi
92b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyi lnga bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam po thugs su chud nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
92b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad de// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor 'di
92b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bson de ni thob gyur na// 'khor 'di shin tu dga' ning mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid
93a1(dkon brtsegs): cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad srad du// stan
93a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu' dag thos gyur na// skye dgu kun la rab tu spang bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos
93a3(dkon brtsegs): nas// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi'i dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir// the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol// 'khor rnams thams cad
93a4(dkon brtsegs): thos par dga' zhing sdod// lharnams lung bstan pa na bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim 'gror gus par rna glags te// khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib
93a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten pan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/
93a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten par phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad po// rdo thul khyod kyis dris pa dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sa
93a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan tshogs la blonan cing // 'dod chags blo dang ne sdang blo ldan zhing // tshe rabs brgyar ni rjod pa'i blo can dang // gti mug bro can dga' bar sted mi 'gyur// byang
93a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sdor dris pa// gang rnams sring rjerje dang ldan pa dag/ de kun yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro badzin
93b1(dkon brtsegs): zin mthong 'gyur te// mi'i seng ge snying rje cher bskyed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas// ut+pal 'phreng ba'i na mgo la khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dgar
93b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// sngoran gyi rgyal la bsnyed bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me toge 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lnga rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun pa
93b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten dkor byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi'i seng ge gang+gA'i// bye snyed kun la
93b4(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad bsngon bkur byas// byang chub blan med pa spor byed cing // dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur na// sdug bsngal gyur
93b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam la snying rje bskyed// de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par 'gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren 'gyur ba// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug
93b6(dkon brtsegs): bla'o chad par 'gyur// mi'i nyon mongs spyod par rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chang // rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa
93b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'chang // de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// cis stong zhes bya mtshan ma'i rnam par stong rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma redas
93b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i chos rnams de lar shes gyur nas// kun kyang bcom ldan 'dasangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag gang la mchod pa rgya cher byas// bdag gi chos bzhi
94a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yi ma rnams nas 'thab thal
94a2(dkon brtsegs): ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag/ nyi shu
94a3(dkon brtsegs): na yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro// sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha'i bsam pa rnams
94a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni yongs su nus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yi// lung bsar lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dgal// 'thab dral ba lung bsan da'i le'us/ brgya
94a5(dkon brtsegs): / de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgya cus lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom
94a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstadan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam// bon te tshor ba'am/ 'od te shes sam/ 'od de 'du byed dam/ 'on
94a7(dkon brtsegs): mang sa panis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dran mong po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bas mam nas/ de dag dis ma du sems te/ gzugs de tsam la ba
94a8(dkon brtsegs): me da yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chu pa pas po/ tshor bdang / 'dugs / 'a byed nga/ rnam pa shes pa dri tso ldan das kyis d+hA me pa yang dag
94a9(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa'i byang chub tu lungs bdun go// ji ci'i phyir nam gzugs kyang bskyes pam bya chu se 'i grangs skyes pan rjes maskyes pas mi skyes pa ba rdzogs dal
94b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang 'gag pa ma
94b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa yang byang chub kyang ma skyes par/ de la ji ltar ma skyes papa skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'amang tu bar
94b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spos po med pa/ byang chub kyang smos pa med pa/ rnam par rnas
94b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang smos pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang
94b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa
94b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ming gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na/ ci ltar 'gag pa med
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pas/ 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar
94b8(dkon brtsegs): bya/ de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na/ 'di nas la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni glang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang /
94b9(dkon brtsegs): du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis song / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' jo ba zhi
95a1(dkon brtsegs): stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la/ gzugs zhes
95a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni/ tha snyad tsam mying tsam/ brda'
95a3(dkon brtsegs): tsam/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam gdags pa tsam ste/ de mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi tshwa'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan lnga dang ldan zhing rje rtse ba las/ de nyal ba las bas na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing de ltar mdzad pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur bar bzhin du/
95a5(dkon brtsegs): byung nu thos mas dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrang par mi 'gyur de/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro
