95a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir na na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam par gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen te// chos de dag ni de ltar
95a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin na/ de la chos gang nig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos tha
95a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang dmigs su med de// sa sa'i phyibo yang dmigs su med/ sa ma'i phyi 'i chos kyang dmigs su me/ can thos kyang dmigs su med na thos kyi makyang darigs su ming bar/
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rgyas kyang dmigs su meng/ rang sangs rgyas bya chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyang dmigs su med/ sa
95b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzus kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngas las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag
95b3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom mamache sa yid gnyis ma mchis so// zhes gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la tshom med cing / nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom
95b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
95b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs
95b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas// mtshungs med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang
95b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor 'du shes ma yin te// sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags mi'i seng ge phung po dben la gyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa
95b8(dkon brtsegs): gas byang chub sems kyang nam yang byung ma mchis// phung po dben pa'i yod ngan myong 'gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la de rur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon par
95'a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis shing // byang chub sems dpa' la yang de mi sdod do// dga' dang num par 'gyur ba// bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod pa bgyid// bde gsheg
95'a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'dir spyod// gzugs kyi
95'a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma rnams par gcig bgyis shing / mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yang mi spodan// dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid// phung po
95'a4(dkon brtsegs): di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cig/ lung bstar bde gshegs ning kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub byang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'amyal del rmongs ma mchis// skye ba
95'a5(dkon brtsegs): chos dang sangs rgyas yon ta rnams// de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ mi'i seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal bu// de dag ni khyod sras ni dri'i yab// gang ni gaphung po'i gshes
95'a6(dkon brtsegs): dam khris shing // khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rtul bde bzhin lung bskur pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chu
95'a7(dkon brtsegs): la zhing stong bgyid pa// 'jig rjed mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na// de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed ming dka'// phung po rgya mched
95'a8(dkon brtsegs): dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal brtsal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gis 'jal ba de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung po sems med de ba'i rtse mche dang
95'b1(dkon brtsegs): khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang // lung bsan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par// rang gis 'tshal ba de dgargyal ba'i sgras/ 'ang byung chen ba ngas nyid spong pa //
95'b2(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched dag dang rgyal bas dang / byang chub dang ni lung bsad rgyal sras rnams// ngo ba nyid kyis stong par gang skyong pa// phung po sdes 'dra bzhin khams rnams dang // srem che
95'b3(dkon brtsegs): yang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'chal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas pa ma lags te/
95'b4(dkon brtsegs): palags ma mchis yongs lags// 'dus byas ma lpags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong ning
95'b5(dkon brtsegs): smod pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la// de ltar bgyis nA gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags// rnab par 'dren la bsod pa'i
95'b6(dkon brtsegs): byiming napas gang // ji sed 'jig rten pan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro bar rang byung ba// rgyal ba mtsha mchog ldan pa grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
95'b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol
95'b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'dren pargyu med stobs ni gang zhig gis// spobs chen brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol// nges na 'jig rten 'di dag dag
96a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// shAkya thub pa'i nal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal 'gyur te// nyan par 'tshal ning gan du mi sems par// kun sdang 'jig rten
96a2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nad pa nang skyob// srad pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thob 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du
96a3(dkon brtsegs): lha// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs nal du lnga zhing sdod// de la
96a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dgar 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gnog 'gyur ba// ye shes stobs kyi chom bcad du gsol// mi'i khyu mchog
96a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan dus la ba ba// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gsal du gsol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni ma mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa na thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten smon mdzad la// 'dzum pa'i don dris da ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhasal dris pas na/
96a7(dkon brtsegs): de ring 'gro ba'i don chen bya// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lnga'i bsam pa mkhyen
96a8(dkon brtsegs): nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid rnyed par gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgogasum
96b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rdzogs// snod kyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas// bas pa cig gis nung legs par nus// de nyid du ni stong ba nyid legs par bsgoms// sar chang byas pa de ni 'dir yang bsrang
96b2(dkon brtsegs): rang ba na gshegs dang deng brang ming // skyes du mchog dang rdzogs pa rdzob myur nas// song pa nyid kyis 'dren pa brjod byas pas// de ring 'gro 'i do shing du byas// 'am
96b3(dkon brtsegs): da bye med de bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de ba'izhi 'ang bstan dang // yang dga'i bgro bangs spyod pa dang // byang ba bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun kyi sa tid 'a da//
96b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// lce rnams gang yang de la the tshom med// byang chub sems kyis rtag par de lar sbyang // de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji rtsa bzhid// 'a tshogs 'di dag rtogs parje
96b5(dkon brtsegs): blo can te// mkhas pa 'dri dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal bar rang byung 'gyur// gnas pa med pa la ni nges gyur na// g.yo ba med pa de li nem nur med// 'gro ba kun pa
96b6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa yod min pa// de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yod med do// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub dang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang
96b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med// de la 'dra lha rnams the tshom rnam par dag blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la ra be gnas te// de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi
96b8(dkon brtsegs): dka'// rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshar du 'gyur ba ni// bzung
97a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la rnam nges rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas la dga' ldan lha rnams kyis// bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro ba bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni ltar bcas 'jig rten
97a2(dkon brtsegs): yang / yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par gyur// / dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas de'i tsher ba 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bdun cus lnga ma yin rnams nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim ning mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga'i zhing dga'
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bdaga' ni ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas/ de banasan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgrongs
97a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis
97a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' dag mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang mi zad pa'i mtha' dang /
97a7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'
97a8(dkon brtsegs): yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i srad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma
97b1(dkon brtsegs): mas pa'i drung dum dang pa'i mtha 'a das bkyir// logacig pa'i srang du mi gnyis pa'i mnga' zhes pagyi'o// mamachis pa'i srang du tha' mamachis shes bgyi'o// bco ldan 'das ya
97b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha'am lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'dzin
97b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o// thu na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub po
97b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang bya
97b5(dkon brtsegs): nub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mnyams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// de ci'i slad du ner
97b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan
97b7(dkon brtsegs): las 'das par 'chal ba dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i phyi srad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar bzhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'tshal bar
97b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i tha' la 'khor bar bzhugs pa gang yang mchis na/ deni sder gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sacas rnams kyis
98a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i dbang po rab 'phrul la
98a2(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa 'phrul dga' ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun po de dag rang gis lung bstan pa gsun nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan
98a3(dkon brtsegs): pa thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la chags su bcad de gsol// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bson te// rang byung skyes bungs pa
98a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag kyang // rgyu ma mchis par 'jum pa mi mdzad pas// khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pas// mthong nas ltar bcas 'jig rten the chom 'tshal// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags
98a5(dkon brtsegs): rang byung gsungs// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum rgya de thos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur// byang chub mtsho/
98a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub slad du// de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang // byang chub yid bzhir bde bar mi 'grub ste// the rlom som nyi bas
98a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skul ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor gyi 'khor 'dri dag/ sdig pa yongs
98a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur// dbas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tshom 'a/
98b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lung bsan cing // 'gro ba 'dri ga thams cad dga' bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dong ldan pa thul
98b2(dkon brtsegs): pan phyir 'jum pa mdzad// rngathul khyod kyis nu ba de zhus pa// lung bsan de ni khyod la ma lus par// sngan pas byas kun kyang nyan//
98b3(dkon brtsegs): da mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'ang ro chen po bsgrags// ga ba du rdzal dngo sa sa rung bas
98b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te// de lar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni sobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nas srong gyur pa'i che// mi rnams zla ba myung du 'char bar shes/
98b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras po tshul tho ba dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur mnga' bar shes// skar cho gas dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i rdzas
98b6(dkon brtsegs): pochu 'thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar// ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/
98b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/
98b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/ ji lar gdam du 'ong ba 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du byo tshom med// de bzhid rgyal sas mkhas pa de dag kyang / 'jig rnyed pa'as
99a1(dkon brtsegs): par myur du 'gyur zhes 'jug/ gang thob nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkha
99a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba phrag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smras byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag
99a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las ni zlog mi nus// des lhar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gi bdag nyid yon tan brjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la
99a4(dkon brtsegs): yi rang mdzad// da ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing // de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sbal// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang
99a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gis rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya
99a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshul la 'jug par rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyed bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang 'byung 'gyur//
99a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bskal pa steng du dka/ 'bru ba skyong// gakhrag lpags la mi la byas pa bas// gong gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khrud 'phagras dka/ 'thu ba de 'i'i min// las
99a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang byung gang rnams 'byung ba dang // mi 'ongs sems can par bzhed gang 'byung dang // dar dus 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab
99b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul la tshogs thub pa'i tshul zhes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyed bkur rab byas nas/ dul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rjer ma 'as
99b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de ni rgyal bar dbyung gnas pa yi rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyong yul ro// chu lathob rnams kyis spong ba sten myur du thob// de la dbul sangs rgyas rnam
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams brtse ba// tshul shes pa dag sdon pa'i lam la spyod// dri ltas tshul la dang ba'i yid byas ste
99b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsams par bya ba'i sdug bsngal skyong la min// rtag tu dpe gshes bster byas na// bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'kho
99b5(dkon brtsegs): kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yod rangs ste// rjes su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas// mthar byin blo gros lin bzhugs par gyur// / 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
99b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po bdun pa// de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dbang bsgyur la sogs pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rigs kyis lnga khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lA ma yin rnams nas
99b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga'i lnga'i bar ngag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bsad pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom
99b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis yang dag mtha' zhes gang sbas pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na/ de'i
100a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag par dmigs na ni// mtha' yang de ltar dmig
100a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de ltar bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan
100a3(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gnyis su mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ zhes mi sbyong ma mos na/ de 'di snyam+b+ha du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du
100a4(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyang / de ni lam log par bzhugs par 'dal bar brdzi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smod pa 'di ni lam log par nu rmen
100a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmi
100a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ mo 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma la ga
100a7(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/
100a8(dkon brtsegs): byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po mi lags dngos po ma mchis pa lags// mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi bam lags
100b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par gyi bam lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi bde yang chos gang gis gnyen po yang ma lag
100b2(dkon brtsegs): la/ chos grang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba lags te/ glang gis chos gzhan gyi gnye
100b3(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la/ gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gnad de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang ma bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spangs par bgyi ba ma lags//
100b5(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
100b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi ma skyes pa'i mtshan mnas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa nga yang ma/
100b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das na
100b8(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma /
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi mngon ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das
101a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis gzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du rma
101a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba yang ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba yang ma legs/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba
101a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par bcu
101a5(dkon brtsegs): brtsi'o// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rigs kyi lha de dag gis ji la shes pa'i chos de lta bur lung bstad ras/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
101a6(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa// bcom ldan 'ad srid pa mthar phyin legs par gsungs/ 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes ra// skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jig pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol grong
101a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bzhugs// phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mas stong sde gang yang ma mchis so/
101a8(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang // yongs shes bya dang srang bsgoms mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang du yang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung //
101b1(dkon brtsegs): chu ba gang rang mdza ma mi migs te// byang chu phyogs kyi ches rnams de bzhin do// sangs rgyas gang yang mtsha mar mi dmigs te// lung ba sems pa'am rnams dgas
101b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngo nyin pa// de dag byang chub 'chang rgya sems bskyed kyang / mtshan mar spyod cing skyong yul leg pa ste// khro gros ngarapa byang chu las
101b3(dkon brtsegs): mi skyod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spang ste// sdong pa dang mi spong de bzhin min
101b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa ni ba thob// pas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min// gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bzod
101b5(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang // de bzhin rang rgyal stong par gyur pa
101b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i yul de la spyod yul med// go 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang // nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang // gang rnams song pas song zhes stong sgra dang // sa
101b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yod spros 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la// spo ba dang rnal bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med par byang chub rtogs//
101b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pan// bang gcag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tsha
102a1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag
102a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ skye bo phul po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul gyis
102a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bsam pa mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la// thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsu
102a4(dkon brtsegs): la// rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsungs// 'jig rten don srid 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu
102a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa bka' stsal the tshom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rigs nas// mthu chen khyod kyi 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal// go'u dam rgyal bas 'dren pa de dag
102a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rter sman spyad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan du gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis sbyar spong // 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan
102a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol// 'jig rjer sman srad ba de gshegs bsdad la the tshom ma mchis te// phyir ning dang pa bskyed rim 'gro cher bgyid de//
102a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal sems na grol 'gyur bar// rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par khum// bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bde gnas shing // gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/
102b1(dkon brtsegs): dedas ni the chom ma mchis mchil// de bas skye bo'i brichom bcad du gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldad pa bul la tshigs su bcang de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye rigs
102b2(dkon brtsegs): dngang brten byas nas// tshigs su bcad de ngas su gang sA rnying // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs nus pa// khyod kyi chag ni dus dang ldan pa yi// rtathul ji ba de'i don dris pas/ skye bo'i ma
102b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i don byas 'gyur// khyod kyis de dris skye bo'i tshogs chen dag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag nus par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rnathul 'jam pa
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa bstan pa'i lam 'di nas// don du gnyer ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smyig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin ma
102b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes srang phyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan mi mngon dga' 'jigs 'gyur
102b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dod// mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur// med pa'i rdog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar mchis pa yi
102b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma stong pa rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// ni bdag ni grags ldan dam pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan chen mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba
102b8(dkon brtsegs): du sdug bsngal ma chud myong // de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas// mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang // sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan pa/
103a1(dkon brtsegs): cing song mthong na// byang chub gnal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyong ba spong // mtshan ma las na
103a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor gzhan med de// kun sbyor ba de nyid med yin// gang rnams byang chub thob par rtogs pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas bar chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na// 9
103a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med// rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid bya
103a4(dkon brtsegs): chub du ni mkhas mi spras// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bstsal// dper na tsam pa ka'i 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub ma
103a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs pa legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam shes na// 'gro ba
103a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa kun mkhyen gyur// gnan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas tshangs ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag drugacus lA ma yin rnams/
103a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim ning mgul yi'ang te/ rab tu dga' ning dga' ba dang / yid drad ba skyes
103a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes zhing / de bzhin
103b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bsan pa 'di la ni srang bathob ste/ chos za mo la bzod pa tho bar gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba shes
103b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin/
103b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yin//
103b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ marmongs pa yang ma yin// shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/
103b5(dkon brtsegs): po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma
103b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song ba yang ma yin/ 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi song ba yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang mA yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma
103b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yino// zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i yid kyis/ de dag ming la yang mi gnas/ tha sa/
103b8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba yor/
104a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can
104a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can pa
104a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'a
104a4(dkon brtsegs): shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma
104a5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos can gyi 'du shes can mang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos can gyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin
104a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'dugs can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa
104a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan lus 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yid/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ des
104a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i rlocan/ nam mkha' bzhin dung gcing gos pa med par gyur nas/ de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir/ de'i che de dag ni bas bcom lnga
104b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par sod pa/ ni la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ni bskyad cing ni ba'i pha rol byon// ni ba bskyed par mdzad cing 'gro la ni bsod pa rjes su sor/ ni nga'i
104b2(dkon brtsegs): yul dgyes shing byang chub ni la dri dral 'khrugs ma mchis/ khyod kyis 'chi med ni ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyed// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i ni ba'i lam mchog na pa yang dag ste/
104b3(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs slong rnams ni mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bstad pa'i byang chub gzhal yas ni bde la 'grod// de seng sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsdad
104b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grong khyer ni bar deng zhes gsungs// 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bsten// gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba'i 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas thob// bslab
104b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni zhing yid nizhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mthu chen ni bshes par gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba ni bgyid gang dag gis// 'chi med
104b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// nyon mongs ni zhing mtshan ma kun spangs ni brtag tu ston pa
104b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las ni 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun
104b8(dkon brtsegs): khas ma mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag ngogs ma mchis// gang gapung ngor te byang chub ni 'tshol de la ni bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya
105a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan la dga' ma lags dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa ni tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma spod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas
105a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas ni dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba zhi pa dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam par kun tu mtshan mi rnyed// de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes
105a3(dkon brtsegs): byed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyod bral ni ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyor mongs ni ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob// rnam
105a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams cad
105a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang byung sdig med shog/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang
105a6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la stod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi dbang khyod
105a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chang pa song 'dra ning // sdor gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen// rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi
105a8(dkon brtsegs): nig rmi lam bkras gyur pa// kha zas ra bcu zos kyang ma 'drangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// som pa'i
105b1(dkon brtsegs): nigatam pa'i rmil bar// chubasi la zlog med 'thungs sur kyang // ngoms med tsha ba nipar mi 'gyur te// de bani khyud kyis chos rnamasathams cad gzigs// 'dis skyed
105b2(dkon brtsegs): med rnor med sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yod mi mnga'// mi nig yid du
105b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig sngan// dga' bar 'gyur yang chag la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med// de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'// pi langs skad brgyad daja tsA
105b4(dkon brtsegs): te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod min te// de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag
105b5(dkon brtsegs): pa// gos kyi drung bzhag sna tshogs mtshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang
105b6(dkon brtsegs): rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi yis dung gi sna thos te// sgra 'di
105b7(dkon brtsegs): galas byung zhes brtags byas kyang // rang bzhin sdong pa'i dngos te mi dmigs// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi nig gsod pa'i kha zas la// @
105b8(dkon brtsegs): lag sreg pa na ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi ni gnam mkha'i 'jal
106a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na// yan lag bzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong // nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzig
106a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na// grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gza
106a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bus dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra'i rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhir de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod gakyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs
106a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes
106a5(dkon brtsegs): bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyis yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes bus
106a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar rnga de brdung ba'i che// sbrad 'jig rten dga' bar rtog pa med// ji ltar smra ba zhir khyod kyi yan lag song // mi dang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes dus ji ltar rnga
106a7(dkon brtsegs): brdung ba'i tshe// g.yo ba med cing ni ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga bzhid khyod kyi yan lag song // ming dadang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa
106a8(dkon brtsegs): spa yan lag ma byung rang dbang min// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ras kyi sang
106b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang // mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pathugs su chud cing // ni gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bsod pa des// de ltar bskyod pas/ 'khor de yang dge ba'i
106b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bsngags par gyur par gzigs nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas
106b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs nal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' sde sdod// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' gsol the tshom dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun
106b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang srang 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyud de gsungs// rgyal ba
106b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad rgya thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar de khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tsom gcod pa nyan 'tsham
106b7(dkon brtsegs): na// rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de dag khyed cag rnams la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing
106b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dral la// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsngags gsol//
107a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams the tshom cad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog dor ldan 'jig rten 'das rig na// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i ying ldan
107a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas tshim// de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan brtsom par bgyid//
107a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa pan mdzad gsung bsngags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'khor 'di bar
107a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun pan legs par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka
107a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rngathul nga yis pan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos// dngos 'gro ba yon pa
107a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa// phan dang ldan po'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshor med
107a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa we go khrig gang+gA'i khyim snang du dge pa legs par srung // kun tu rnam par dag lam chags ming nur 'dushes mkha' 'jas// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub
107a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang chus sam babyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus ra paskal pa bye ba bcumag gzhal yas pa// bang+gA'i khyim se rdul pasags thams cad sakhyen pa'i sal
107b1(dkon brtsegs): sa/ de dag byinas bde bar gshegs pa che dang ldan pa sangs rgyas 'arjed// sred pas sel cing 'gro ba song par sang ba'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// myong pa de dang 'isang srung ba su
107b2(dkon brtsegs): chad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas glags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni ning gri 'byor pa ga' la yas
107b3(dkon brtsegs): te// 'dren pa'i chen po rnams kyis bsal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ri// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyi gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zang mi rus// nga tshe de dag ye shes sobs
107b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan nas bya rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dge zhing mchog rnams su skyo ba'i thams cad mkhyen la basbyangs pa'i/
107b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phan la mya ngan 'da'// de dag ra ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du shes sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems pacar
107b6(dkon brtsegs): yid 'byung ba'o// de la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing bslab pa'i lam la myur du bar 'gyur// der mi rnams ngag gi sgra
107b7(dkon brtsegs): skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med ni med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub ni//
107b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rnal gnas par 'gyur// spa gang thos nas de dga' 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i spang shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang
108a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med// de re sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i spyad dbyangs
108a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung / de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni sdang dang // gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las
108a3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'byung ni mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas
108a4(dkon brtsegs): nas// drang srong chen po de dag smod lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te// zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon 'am
108a5(dkon brtsegs): yangs pa chen po zhi bas 'gro ba mthong gyur na// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med
108a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// smon lam de dag rgyas pa thob par nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces sor// de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pi spyod pa bsen par bgyis
108a7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa lung snyan pa'i le'u sdeni cu ba'o// de nas 'od gsal gyi lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa ya
108a8(dkon brtsegs): mthang lung bsan pa yang thos nas/ tshi ma ning mgul ri rangs te/ rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas/ sman las sangs de bregs phrag pa gcig tu ba gos nas/
108b1(dkon brtsegs): sa mo grams pa'i spangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsam to// bcom ldan 'das
108b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas/ chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ma mchis te/ des chos tham
108b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa/ sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / lajam
108b4(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / pra ba'i spobs pa dang
108b5(dkon brtsegs): thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can tu 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad sdang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang
108b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du/ rnam par rtag pa dang rnam par spyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/ de 'di snyam du chos thams cad
108b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o// gang rnams par rtog pa de na thams cad song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
108b8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab du thob cing / de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas
108b9(dkon brtsegs): slad du smid
109a1(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/ kun tu dga' mtha' yas pa/ mang gyis pa mngon par 'dus ma dgyes pa/ yongs su
109a2(dkon brtsegs): grub pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs
109a3(dkon brtsegs): su drug pa ma mchis pa/ martags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ mnyes
109a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par ma shes pa/ ma spos pa ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring 'am lags
109a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma btags pa/ gdams pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'brug par
109a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ bdag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ go bi ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ rgya
109a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa/ spyad par 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis paM/ mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma bzung ba/ mabor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchi
109a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'chim ma mchis pa/ gang du ma mchis pa/ yongs su dang dus mchis pa/ yongs sum bdang ba ste/ mashes bci ba'i sus kyang sa bgyis chos gang mang
109b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa'i rgyu 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma lags pa yang ma lags pa ste/ chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba ma lags so// a ni gnas pa yang ma lags/
109b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang
109b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ me dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags/ mi spong
109b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa yang ma lags/
109b5(dkon brtsegs): a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mi sa'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig
109b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad thams ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags
109b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha skad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
109b8(dkon brtsegs): gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi
110a1(dkon brtsegs): rlos kam lags pa de dag ni ma lags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang mi grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'akag
110a2(dkon brtsegs): pade dag 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rdzogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dus ma byAgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi te/ de ni chos thams cad
110a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi'o zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper ma rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams
110a4(dkon brtsegs): cad du blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa ni ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdogs par gsungs so//
110a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ brag cha la tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper
110a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na smyig rgyu la chab du gdags
110a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bri snad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha skad blta bar bci'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/
110a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha srang blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i skad du/ rmi lam gyi bya
110b1(dkon brtsegs): batha snyad du bgyi'i// rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' ba'i bgyi ba'i slad du/ mi g.yor dang / sdig rgyu dang / brag ma'i bya ba
110b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag cha la bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das de
110b3(dkon brtsegs): ni chos thams cad sdang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon
110b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen to 'on kyang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rngam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten
110b5(dkon brtsegs): blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis yong mi chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong / sgyu ma gsog dang smyig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du
110b6(dkon brtsegs): shes can// byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang 'chang // de bzhin byis pa'i skye
110b7(dkon brtsegs): bo sbyig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bos zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de'i dbang po 'das// gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la drangs
110b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa tshe dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang / 'dod chags zhe
111a1(dkon brtsegs): sdang gti mug dug can nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang // blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal
111a2(dkon brtsegs): ba// de nams dring ga rjes 'brang byis pa ma mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar par brgyad pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs// bde gshegs khyod kyis a'i yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan// de la yang dgra blo chen sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud
111a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi pa mngon 'chang rgya// yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen nges pa
111a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni tshul gyis dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob gyur cing // grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen bsnyes ma
111a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol myur phyir dug med bde zhing gdug po thams cad 'jom par mdzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang dag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang
111a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyis chos// de'i tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/
111a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid na mi bdag nyon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing ni byed
111b1(dkon brtsegs): med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med// gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur// grol zhing mdzad shizhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// brtsa
111b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi sreg rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil non bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis
111b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed sems kyang na// las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag tshal// des na da ltar bde gshegs ni
111b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs dbang po ni zhing nges pa ste/ bde ba'i blo mnga' dag bcad dri med chos kyi sa rab tu mchod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso la bstod pas bsod nams
111b5(dkon brtsegs): gang byung ba// ji snyed dpal sdug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog/ bsod
111b6(dkon brtsegs): nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bas pA pa yongs su dag pa dang / tshul gyi
111b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur ba mkhyen nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
111b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa// bde gshegs thug
112a1(dkon brtsegs): rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal sdug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses stsal du gsol/ 'jig rten
112a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang
112a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar nyams thag sdug bsngal 'di 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya
112a4(dkon brtsegs): mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na// 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson ning
112a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur// the tshom bral 'gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i spobs bskyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung
112a6(dkon brtsegs): sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyis nal du lnga// 'gro ba'i rtsalag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal cing lung bsad paka
112a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi nam ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsungs rab legasu brjod bdud rtsi'i char po ba gang dag sgom pa 'tshal bar
112a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'dren pa chen po khyed kyis 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i mal bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du la// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan
112b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol ba nad pa'i don kyang bstad du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog zos na 'jig rten 'tshal don chen shin du thob par 'gyur/ thub pa de ring su nig dge ba 'phel cing grag
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bdon du gnyer/ su nig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de ngag thos shing dgar gyur nas// rdul
112b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta bul la tshigs su bcad de sngar bka' stsal pa/ rnathul khyod
112b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs/ bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing // spo bas pa che 'byung de phyir gang
112b5(dkon brtsegs): dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas banyan par bgyis// 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dge sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/
112b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs// byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyang spyad pa/ byang chub 'gro 'dod gang
112b7(dkon brtsegs): ston med lam sngor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu bsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos nas// sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob
112b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de dag stobs skyed tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa byang chub yid des 'gyur// bu skyes ma zhig dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams 'di
113a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med par za ba'i tshul ma sa/ sems sa da ma drangs pas rgyas ma bdas sa cung ngas 'byas nas tu 'jig rte malas parang gyu gyu rgyal kur mther 'gyur/ de dag sa
113a2(dkon brtsegs): dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgyar bgrangs par// yangs shing shin tu ngag la mtha' dag
113a3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung sangs
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang na 'di nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur// don rang
113a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya bgrangs gang+gA'i bye skad 'gyur// rtathul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya nga
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bzlas pa bas// gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams de bas snga mas grangs sam dper kyang bya bar mi nuso// de bas byang chub
113a7(dkon brtsegs): dazhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// dbul 'di lnga 'dren pa thams cad du khyed pa 'byung ba rnyengs min// de mi sungs para'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas
113a8(dkon brtsegs): mangs gsungs// de phyir bran mod pa'i ni bde byang drub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mo khyen pa tshul ma khas ngal bsten par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don
113a9(dkon brtsegs): byed gsung dag de 'dra bros gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur// khrag khrig lnga rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab
113b1(dkon brtsegs): da par byed// dga' das sa suHsa dbang phyug khyong lnga phrag 'tshal la zhes snga yang phyung // ni bsngags na skye zinan mangs song pas rgod 'gyu shing bar mdzang//
113b2(dkon brtsegs): dug gsum ni mdzad sems cad dug ni sdug tu gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu drug ming 'gyur zhing dgra meng 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren las tshul chos mi zang srung
113b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyud las 'grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'us nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / bam po brgyad do// / de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag ji/
113b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu gnyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar ngag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dgar
113b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid bde ba skyes ras/ bdag cag rdul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yang brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
113b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i
113b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor bag sdug myong bar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong la/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa
113b8(dkon brtsegs): gnod par bgyis kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i lag pa chad dam/
114a1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ rna ba dang / gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sA lcag gis gzhus sam/ swa lcag phyed 'tshal lam
114a2(dkon brtsegs): lcag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog du bcug gam/ mtshon cha dam po la rgyas btab
114a3(dkon brtsegs): bam/ byis pa'i spyi gtsug ltar bcings sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar gdugs sam/ bu ram shing brdungs pa ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam du zhom pa ltar bcom mam/ 'bru mar gyi mar
114a4(dkon brtsegs): me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar me'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/ stag gi khar
114a5(dkon brtsegs): bstabs sam/ skar ma ril bya ba ltar dril tam/ byi bo'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/ nyes byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kaR+ShA pa Ni tsam du gtugs sam/ 'bras
114a6(dkon brtsegs): bye bcos pa lngar bcos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom pa yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar 'gyur ba dang / mig byung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gram/ gsad pa'i
114a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas su khrid ngo rnam pa thams cad du mgro gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par gyur to/ bde ba yang ma legs mi bde ba yang mo logs pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad
114a8(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis
114b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la kha zas sbyin pa de dganye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bzhi sang byas pa dang / mchong pa
114b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar ni ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gze ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang
114b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad du srog bcod pa'i bar du byed pa de drag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
114b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de yid la byed pa de dag dang ldan zhing / de lta bu'i lus dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes
114b5(dkon brtsegs): su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la sten cing / snyen la sgom zhing mang du byed do// de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo//
114b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe'adi
114b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag tu bya
114b8(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du na na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chem
115a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngar 'gro thams cad rab tu gsal ba dang
115a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslob pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas
115a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las rnams par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems
115a4(dkon brtsegs): dpra' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dag rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin brjod nas//
115a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// dge rgyas lha yis 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'dri na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa
115a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang ma mchis skye// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ci bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs smra sun ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa
115a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha ming bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs// 'dzin sems can srog dang byed du gsol ba gang zag ma mchis te// ma
115a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bzhig cing stong par rnam par bzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas
115b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rdzogs par dka'/ khyams pa dge sbom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la// sems can rnam par bzhig cing 'tsha
115b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan// des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par
115b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang // lha'i lhar myur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje brtse ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal
115b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ci bzhin kun tu mtshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni
115b5(dkon brtsegs): bskul gyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dges pa skyes nas rab tu dges pa'i thugs kyis mi dgas rnam par gsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni sam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ci
115b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das mi dmigs// 'on kyang 'khor
115b7(dkon brtsegs): bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa skyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs ras thub pa
115b8(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstar// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang chad med gnas pa de ma gzig
116a1(dkon brtsegs): rngubangs pag med gang yang sa gzigs pa ga yod mi yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thung bston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis// thubab tu
116a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam par spangs pas su btsal mdzad nam brjes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa ma gsungs ma lags babrel ba yong mi mnga'// bde bar gshegs pas lung la song ba'i sgom pa bsgom
116a3(dkon brtsegs): par bgyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyo ba la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la/
116a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor 'tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal nam bcas te// de ltar gang dran pa sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas son
116a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te matsal nam brnyes la// gang gi nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang //
116a6(dkon brtsegs): thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis zhes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di dag la gnas ston la mchod pa gyis// 'jig rten phan par
116a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod dam gzigs// bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'din rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa brdam
116a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bani po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skye ba la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bani lags
116b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na yang ma mchis te// de bas gang gis bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na yang de ma mchis// stod pa'i tshul 'ang
116b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang rnams 'dzin bgyid na// 'di dag thar pa nyid kyis lam ste 'khor ba la
116b3(dkon brtsegs): ste 'khor ba lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig nges ra khyod la mchod pa 'tshal
116b4(dkon brtsegs): thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyisra lam bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gang // 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// yang dag 'phrul dang ni rkang dang
116b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa mi dmigs te// tshad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa// thams cad mkhyen kyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na 'ang ma mchis te/
116b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis gyur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs// des na bde gshegs dpe med
116b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar par mdzad srad du 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs// rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i
116b8(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di bsgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni bsgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di ltar lha 'khor bathe tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la myargyal// sangs rgyas rnam
117a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma
117a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad du khyod la mchod/ byang chub yan lag bdun po dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams
117a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro ba drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba ma mchis ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la
117a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis ba ni phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bsan// brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug
117a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mtha' mar byin pa bsgoms shes gsungs// mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'dri la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags gnyen por ni gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pas gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sem
117a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min// 'dil lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod snang rtag tu brtson// sdug
117a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'i dpyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang bsgoms shes gsungs// bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ban mongs pag chags bcas dri de dag ni// drung po ni gnas sdig
117b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad song ste// 'di la la tshogs gang du yang the tshom ma mchis skyor bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu'i lus la pa
117b2(dkon brtsegs): ston mdzad de// gsod dang khrig dang ma yin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang / gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams// mi dge'i las
117b3(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo
117b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis snod pa ste// bde gshegs thub pa zag pa ma mchis rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas
117b5(dkon brtsegs): sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di sten pa// mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bde gshegs ye shes nges ni
117b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis// 'di lnga tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa mtshal// de ltar dge rdzas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
117b7(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod par yang mkhyen// de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam
117b8(dkon brtsegs): pas sgrub pa yang thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan par thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ skye bo 'di kun
118a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba khyu chog khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad 'di ni 'jig rten bsan// rgyu ma mchis par
118a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi
118a3(dkon brtsegs): sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te/
118a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blong dgi ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bde bshegs mi mchog dge thugs can ni de rings su zhig blo gros bskyed// dri ring gang gis 'chi ming ni brtogs
118a5(dkon brtsegs): shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su nig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba// de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di lags par gsungs pas tshim
118a6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa de dang su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul
118a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas gang nig de ring nges pa thob par gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dad pa bskye dgu rnams la
118a8(dkon brtsegs): byams gyur cing // byang chub mthar phyir blo gros bstan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum pa dang bsan bde gshegs bsad pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod
118b1(dkon brtsegs): nams brgya'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsal bdag nyid gi the tshomakhum// 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsol thos gyur ra// bde gshegs rnams man/
118b2(dkon brtsegs): gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dor zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde
118b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// nga'i 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rtabul
118b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa// khyod kyis bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de zad mi 'gyur// de ni khyed la bsan gyis
118b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs de dag nga'i chos nyid la ni the tshom med// kun kyang yi rang sar bzhi yod kyis tshigs su bcad dgasra gi nga la bsngags
118b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te// the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur// da ltar sngon gyi rgyangs 'dir yang chags
118b7(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pas la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa ut+pal la la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu cher 'gyur
118b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dad pa'i yang
119a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems kyi tha ba spangs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi dog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya
119a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan zlog par 'gyur ba na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas 'gyur te// de tshe ning rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag
119a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod pa
119a4(dkon brtsegs): te// ring po srel de dag mchod ras mya ngan 'das pa ni ba 'chi med par thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams
119a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de de rgyal ba'i drung du 'du// ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su// khyams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dod 'gyur ba// de ltar
119a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob rogs deng dgra rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dod// bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams
119a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ngo mtshur gyur pa de thos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi lha'i bdag nyid chen po de che thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed// bdag
119a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs// dag rgyas ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
119b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de che 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lha ma yin rnams nas// dge rgyas kyi ris lnga'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang bzong // lung bsad pa yang thos nas/
119b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yang bde ba skyes nas/ tshul gcig la nus pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par ma
119b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs mi mchod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol po'i spobs pa dang / thogs
119b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel pa'i spobs pa
119b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa
119b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa thob cing / mi mchod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang
119b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//
119b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par
