120a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems cad ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la
120a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang /
120a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon la 'jug pa dang / smon ma mchis pa 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang /
120a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang par 'gyuraro// de'i phung po la
120a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yongs su grub pa ma mchis
120a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang rang bzhin ma mchis
120a7(dkon brtsegs): pade ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// chu dang me dang rlung ni ring ba ni ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa
120a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni 'das pa nis gdags par mi bgyi// ma 'ongs pa des gdags par mi bci/ da ltar byung ba zhes gangadags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ne na/ 'di ltar gzung
120b1(dkon brtsegs): ni dngos po ma mchis pa skye/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'grag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de
120b2(dkon brtsegs): gdags su ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i gzungs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas
120b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhir ni dmigs su ma mchis na/ 'das par lta ga la 'gyur// ma 'ongs par yang ga la gyur/ de ltar byung
120b4(dkon brtsegs): bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bsan gzugs kyi phung po la ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes phung po rnams kyang de bani
120b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug
120b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// gzungs de yang ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam dang / ma gtogs par gzungs
120b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la phung po yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmig so// de ci'i srad na
120b8(dkon brtsegs): gang du'ang phung po nas bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos gang ma bgyis pa de la srung ba yang gal mchis te/ phung po na srungs pa'i slad du po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang khang bzangs
121a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung khol ma dang / ba gam dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / skar khung dang / blta ba dang ra
121a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / shing tegs dang / 'o bas dang / chos mang po stegs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du/ phung po zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba de yang de bzhin te/ gzugs de yang ngo//
121a3(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la srung ba lta ga la mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
121a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la srung ba lta ga la mchis te/ sbyangs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang
121a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// de ltar po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi
121a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ mig gi ci'i skye mched ces bgyis na sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do// de la mig gang zhe na 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i kham
121a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o// de la sa'i khams dang ba'ang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang /
121a8(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang pa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni
121b1(dkon brtsegs): sa shes gdags par bkyil ma lags ma'ongs pa dang dgar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi bam lags sa// ci'i sa 'dinar tshig gi skye che ngos pa ma mchis pa
121b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang lam skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mche
121b3(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam mdogs par de rigangs
121b4(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du ne na/ chos gang la mig tsa 'am/ skye mched ce 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ ming yang ming dung rje
121b5(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis so// rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang lus dang / yid dang gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzung
121b6(dkon brtsegs): thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa thob bo// de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob pa ni/ mig ni mig ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba
121b7(dkon brtsegs): khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos grang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs
121b8(dkon brtsegs): sum grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang la ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang /
122a1(dkon brtsegs): gikun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma togs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar kha zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags song
122a2(dkon brtsegs): ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni/
122a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i srad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa/ de dag la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang la ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das
122a4(dkon brtsegs): shes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma
122a5(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa tha snyad ma mchis pa brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod pa ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/
122a6(dkon brtsegs): ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa
122a7(dkon brtsegs): rten ma lags/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi bam lags/ so so'i skye bo'i ma lags/
122a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags sa ma lags pa yang ma lag so// de ni de bzhin cid pa
122b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin cing dang / gan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba ma lags dang mtshan cing ma mchis pa sa/ rngasrung tsam du btags pa'o// deng sa de bzhi gshegs pa kres pa ci ste da
122b2(dkon brtsegs): nim lagaso// de ci'i srang du zhen/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi
122b3(dkon brtsegs): dang chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por bdags kyang
122b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dod/ khams dang skye mched dang / dbang po dang bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de mi gang gis bas
122b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'dir lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams ni ming gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang des sa'i khams dang nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan
122b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang mi gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
122b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ming gang dang gang du gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang me dang rlung dang / namakha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos
122b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa rjong go bcom ldan 'ad
123a1(dkon brtsegs): de la dbang po la 'jug pa/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di sa ste mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lcen
123a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / me'i dbang po dang / po'i dbang po dang / sreg gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang /
123a3(dkon brtsegs): dang yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang sems kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang ba dbang po dang / brtson 'grus
123a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po
123a5(dkon brtsegs): rang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang po ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
123a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gang la rang ba'ini ma mchis pa de ni ga dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba'i don mi 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes
123a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes bgyi bar gdags par bgyi ba lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltang byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs
123a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig lam lags shing dbang po la ma lags pa de ni tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chad pa
123b1(dkon brtsegs): slong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags/ ma mchis pa 'di ltar ming du gdags par bgyi/ den dam par ni sring pa yang mi dmigs chang ba yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du mi gang
123b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po yang chang seng ba ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gsob gsog leg pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa'i drid pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/
123b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar ming du gdugs par bgyi/ don dam pa ni mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po yang mi dmigs na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas//
123b4(dkon brtsegs): ci tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams bzung ba'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing / dbang po ba
123b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang gis stong pa de la/ des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni bdun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gso ba gsog/ log pa slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa 'dring pa/ glen pa/ rmongs
123b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin bral zhing ste/ de ni mi skye ba'i mi dmigs// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes bgyi bar gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltar byad
123b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dag dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa ma mchis pa/ bdun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ bdags su
123b8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
123b9(dkon brtsegs): nos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa
124a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mthob pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma mthong ba
124a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mi rnyed pa rnyed par bgyi ba lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing ma mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// 'di la ste dper na mi zhig rmi la
124a3(dkon brtsegs): na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur sprad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sang de rjes su dran la/ de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/ thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du
124a4(dkon brtsegs): zhen rmi lam na yang mi nges bkong ba dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' mgur smad pa de dag ma thob pa rnyed na/ thal ba las sang pa'i che lha smos kyang ci 'tshal ste/ theb pa
124a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang /
124a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyi dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/
124a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dag dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po
124a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na ches kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ ches thams cad la 'jug par bgyu kyang / chos kyi dbyings
124b1(dkon brtsegs): sa kyang rjes la 'jug pa
124b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni sten
124b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ sems can med pa/ sreg med pa gang zag med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ de la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis sem nyi ma mchis so//
124b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sdug bsngal ma mchis pas rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal
124b5(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu mA ma dris pa'i slad du'o/ ma 'a#
124b6(dkon brtsegs): sa/ 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun dga' byung ba ma mchis pa la snang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i
124b7(dkon brtsegs): slang du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags ste/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni/ 'gog pa ma lags pa/
124b8(dkon brtsegs): gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs ste/ 'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na/ lam du 'jud pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lab yang ma mchi
124b9(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs te/ gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis
125a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha dad pa bgyi ba ma mchis so// ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi
125a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni ma skyes ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ ma gtags pa/ gdags par mi bgyi/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan pa/
125a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pas/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma laH
125a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mthong ba/ mngon par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba lags pa/ khong du ma chud pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/
125a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ maring ba rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma theb pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa thos par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma mthong ba/
125a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma sgrubs pa/ bsgrubs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon tum brtsis pa/ mngon tu bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/
125a7(dkon brtsegs): nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba la ma la gos pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/
125a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa ma lags pa/ rang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ rjes su rags pa ma lags
125b1(dkon brtsegs): pa khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun dag nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/ lam ma lags pa/
125b2(dkon brtsegs): lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jig pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi bzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu
125b3(dkon brtsegs): dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sreg ma lags
125b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sreg ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pas ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos
125b5(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma lags pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa lpags pa/ smon pa lags pa/ smon pa ma mchi
125b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ gnas pa mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/ nad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/
125b7(dkon brtsegs): mgral ma lags pa/ mas pa/ brtan pas lags pa/ mang ba na pa ma lags/ mngon par men pa ma mchis pasngags pa/ rten pa ma lags pa/
125b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma 'phags pa gnyis ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi
126a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa lags pa/ mngon par bgyi ba lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
126a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ se so'i skye ba'i skyedang yul ma lags pa/ 'phags
126a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi skyed
126a4(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa/ skyed yul yang ma lags skyed yul ma lags/ bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/
126a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas ches kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes par nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
126a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa re ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
126a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di sa pa rig pa ring bzhini dang bral ba'i// chos gang la rang bzhin ma mdzes paden dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang ya dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang
126a8(dkon brtsegs): sum grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar/
126b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mang ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis
126b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ gzhan du na ming tsam dang / thus da tsam dang / kun rdzob dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par rig pa de ni
126b3(dkon brtsegs): don dam par rigs pa dmigs su ma mchis so// chos gang don dam pa dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad bgyi ba ma mchis pa/ brjed du ma mchis pa ste/
126b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang / yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs/
126b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su brtags pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyad pa/ ma zhi bar rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba yang / chos gang ngo bo nyid kyi
126b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de 'du byed pa skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa'i ma mchis pa// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ gang ma skyes pa
126b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni rga bar mi gyur/ na par mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du ni/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes
126b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de la rga las mchis ste/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur ro// 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang //
127a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byon pa dang / daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming du tsam dubs kyi don dam par ma lags so// ma rig pa
127a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa de nyid byang chub bo// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas/ rjes kyi dbyings la
127a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma
127a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ dmigs
127a5(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ khong khrob ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi
127a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'// de'i slad du ches thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom
127a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ltar chos gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
127a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di sang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag brnam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
127b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so zhes mtshan/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis sa ma mchis pas/ bya
127b2(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das
127b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te// zhes mchis na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa
127b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la zhig
127b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa la yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon
127b6(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis
127b7(dkon brtsegs): so bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad
127b8(dkon brtsegs): ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ches gang la yang phan yang ba 'am/ gan
128a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa'i nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas che'i 'du byed par re zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lnga
128a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ches kyi dbyings ni ci yang 'dor ba 'am len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di
128a3(dkon brtsegs): skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon pa
128a4(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la nig
128a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ba'i ches la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ches kyi dbyings ni 'gyur
128a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi 'gyur mi ganga'o//
128a7(dkon brtsegs): bam po dag pa'o// / de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ches nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod/
128a8(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal me sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/
128b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa'i tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag
128b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// 'gro kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ci bzhin sten mdzad pa// 'dren pa'i tshul mkhas khyed kyi tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tan ma
128b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags pa la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas
128b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi bzhi ba mi g.yo brnyes// sreg chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grel mdzad/ mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la
128b5(dkon brtsegs): mgos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid steng shin tu phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed pa rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyed kyis yongs su rtags// shes pa mi ldan
128b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo phal chen po 'dir bcings rlod la spre'u thogs bzhin// 'gro ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dod// khams rnams khams kyis rnam
128b7(dkon brtsegs): par kun tu ston par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na brag cha rnam pa kun tu shin tu bral ba 'dra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ci bzhin mi shes mang pos bcings/
128b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khyad khams gsum chags ma mchis// skyed mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag
129a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags brdzun ning byis bsrung bcang bsdod pa 'dra// mi mkhas sde bochos la gcig tu dris mang po de la chags// dper na 'dzin pa rna ma chen
129a2(dkon brtsegs): por nga khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar ltung // 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid du snang ba ste/ thub pa me tog nang gi bzhin gyi dbang 'khor lnga bu shin tu steng // mi mkhas
129a3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni del chags// bya dang mche yi nya dang sreg chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing
129a4(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyis song // thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bris bzhin du ma mchis na/ mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ci bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas
129a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag rtogs rnams sre nga'i sbubs nas byub ba'i bya bzhin grol// rten 'byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste spong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung
129a6(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ mi shes rtogs pa'i slad du nges kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings// mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rdzogs rnams gze ba nas thar pa'i bya
129a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin grol// thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ci bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khya// thub pazhi pa mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral// thub pa
129a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te// de srang tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du/
129b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhyen pa lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin ches kun bsam gyis mi khyab// thub pa'i byis pa'i spyod yul lags ji bzhin
129b2(dkon brtsegs): sa kun brtags pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab tu gsal de bzhin shes par gyis// mi mkhas yang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas
129b3(dkon brtsegs): brnyes shes smras pa dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang / gang dag bde gshegs skye ba pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan pa
129b4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por yongs su dkris/ gang dag bde bar gshegs pas che'i 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang // gang dag stobs
129b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyis lag tu mchis// chos kyis de bzhin nyid
129b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ma 'tshal 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul dang min pa 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal
129b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'jig rten thugs brtse ba rgyal bas 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur
129b8(dkon brtsegs): tshul la mkhas pa ma'i mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa// spen pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i
130a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas// kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas// 'dren sras de dang tshul 'di nyid kyis
130a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phur sum tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges pa'i rtogs pa
130a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud pa nas/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad de
130a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dpal sdug 'dren pa'i rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad legs te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon su
130a5(dkon brtsegs): desad dkris// 'di ltar 'dren pa khyed kyis ni ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal ba lnga min bla mi 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa
130a6(dkon brtsegs): khyad kyigs nas 'dzum mdzad pas 'i mthong nas/ 'gra'adi kun zimam 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyis 'jum rgyu ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal ma
130a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul pa/
130a8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs te the tshom kun tu bsal dugs pa/ de thos rgyal po'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mgu bzab// bdag ste/
130a9(dkon brtsegs): zhal tu lta// mi mcho thugs rje
130b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ma na mthon po de dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems par// 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi bar dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa'i 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal
130b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/ des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur/ rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas
130b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ste/ bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin bgyid gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/ de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal
130b4(dkon brtsegs): gsel de ni rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi tha mar phyin par 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa
130b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/ tshul la zhugs shing la tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu grol mdzad ci bzhin yang dag ston
130b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshegs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig
130b7(dkon brtsegs): rten bstan mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang chod shes ngal dris pa shin tu lags// gang phyi rang yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyu'i tshul dang // de khyod bstan pa'i
130b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod dang 'gro tshe gcig yid kyis nyon mongs/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnams ni rgyu'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing // rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dpal
131a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol// khyed kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas ning yang rnam dag mdzad// sems can blo yang sbyangs pa/
131a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dag khyed la phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu bam pa med pas gsol// dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom// khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad
131a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa// khyed kyis chos rnams myur du bar mkhyen// sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing
131a4(dkon brtsegs): blta dga'i chos dga' la// myur du mdzad la phyag kyong 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsal pa// bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa// chu ba rgal te zab pa spangs
131a5(dkon brtsegs): das ma phrin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu skyong lam dang ldan pas gsol pa// 'dod chags spangs shing zhe snang spangs// gti mug spangs/
131a6(dkon brtsegs): nub med pa/ sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod zhes phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol// khyod kyi dam ches shin tu brtan/
131a7(dkon brtsegs): tshag/ rten gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyed la phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol ba// lhun sdug gcig tu gyur
131a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i/ rlung gis skyed par ma nus te// de bzhin bsad dang spang ba ma// bde gshegs spyod par mi nus so// lha'i bu mnyam pa 'idi thob pas gsal pa/ dpa' bo chen pal
131a9(dkon brtsegs): sdug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo nar bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig kha ga 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal bya
131a10(dkon brtsegs): chub den zhugs dang // kha tsog bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug bsngal ldang ba grol zhes nus pa'i bsam mtha' mkhyen gyur nas// 'dzum
131a11(dkon brtsegs): pa chung mdzad gang 'byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang 'byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di
131a12(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar bden gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas
131a13(dkon brtsegs): des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum mdzad// rtaklu la de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don tu 'dzum mdzad sku'i dbus
131a14(dkon brtsegs): nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa gtsug du nub par 'gyur// de ltar khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par bgyi/ rgyal ba
131a15(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun da'i gtsug dunupa// sdig pa gnam pa'i tshug du de ltar 'dzum pas bas na shes par bgyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin
131a16(dkon brtsegs): de rgyu rnams gsum ngas bshad kyis// kun kyang rtse gcig yid byas de ni ngalas legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don tu 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du
131b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mtshan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab ma blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo zas gsol pa// su rkyem khyengs su ma
131b2(dkon brtsegs): de da la rab tu bzhugs// yang dag mtha' yang rab tu bstan// khyod mtshungs gang zag yongs ma mchis// lu'i bu bre gros dang bas gsal pa// gnyis su med po yang
131b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo dpal bas rnam par gnon// gang zag zab la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod ches pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bos gsol pa// mchog tu dga'
131b4(dkon brtsegs): na ba dag/ khyongs kyi slob la slabs pa'i rnams// sbrul rnams bsag pa rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba yid kyis gsol
131b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin// khyed kyis bstan pa myur thos nas// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhig la gnas pas
131b6(dkon brtsegs): gsas pa// gang gis kun mkhyen khyed mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang // shes rab mtshan gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod
131b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa// zhi ba'i sems mnga'i zhi la spyod// tshigs sred yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad zhir gyur pa// ngagra rnams zhi
131b8(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhig nas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' 'grags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid
132a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo nar bdag cag tan thos 'byung zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig kha dog 'jug sa dga' ning rang rgyal bya
132a2(dkon brtsegs): chub den zhugs dang // kha tsog bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu ba cher ni 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug bsngal ltung ba grol zhes nus pa'i bsam mtha' mkhyen gyur nas// 'dzum
132a3(dkon brtsegs): pacung mdzad gang 'byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang 'byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di
132a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa den gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas
132a5(dkon brtsegs): des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum mdzad// rtakhrul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don tu 'dzum mdzad sku'i dbus
132a6(dkon brtsegs): nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa sdebs bcu'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa gtsug tu nub par 'gyur// de ltar khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par bgyi/ rgyal
132a7(dkon brtsegs): tsheg rnams den dugang 'jam de kun pa'i gtsug dunug// sreg pa gnas pa'i chug du de ltar 'dzum pas bas na shes par bzlas// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin
132a8(dkon brtsegs): de rgyu rnams gsum ngas bshad kyis// kun kyang rtse gcig yid byas de ni ngalas legs par mngon par gyis// dang po'i dzin tu 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du chen
132b1(dkon brtsegs): mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus tshong cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gnas
132b2(dkon brtsegs): dzu ba de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnams gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba dang po stobs bcu pa la ser ba byed
132b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga la skyen par bsor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur// 'bring don phyir na sra bcing che la ngal gyis bsor ba byed par 'gyur// ngal gyis g.yas phyogs ser ba ba
132b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur// gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra'i bde gshegs mthong 'gyur na/ de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par 'gyu
132b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang che gdugs 'dram mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren pa'i stong gi mkha' lding ba dang / gang tshe sgo
132b6(dkon brtsegs): mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa/ de ni 'jig rten 'das pa che'i dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum
132b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad rgyu'i rnam gsum de tsam bstan// rta thul khyed kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnams gsum po de dag shes par gyis// de nas 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig
132b8(dkon brtsegs): rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/ de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tshom med par gyis// 'bras bu che ris lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag
133a1(dkon brtsegs): ni zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tun cher smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe dang ldan pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/
133a2(dkon brtsegs): dephyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi 'di bstan// de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug du
133a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod pa// da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug du// gang zag chen po de dag rgyal ba khyu mchog pa byed po cing ga
133a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtags rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi pa yongs su btsal byas nas/ de dag de'i 'og tu dpal sdug rkang
133a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'is dam pa skyes du mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung // rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang bzhin sbyang ste/
133a6(dkon brtsegs): can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od bye dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yan ngan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de// de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur
133a7(dkon brtsegs): ni gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang // legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dug padag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/
133a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs med 'dus pa de ci'i 'dra ba// de las gnyis gyur de che byang chub tu ni yang dgazhugs par 'gyur// de re rtsal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa/
133b1(dkon brtsegs): dam yin// de dag thams cad yongs su dag ning sbyang nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig
133b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag mya ngan las 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas smon pa'i ga
133b3(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang gAnga'i klung gi bye ma pas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag 'das ston pa skyeb pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan rdzas
133b4(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi bye ma snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang 'byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs
133b5(dkon brtsegs): gas par ldan gyur te/ de la yang dag shar bar gyur te/ de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// ma mchog de'i gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nas/
133b6(dkon brtsegs): nyis dam pa gzhal yis 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'// bde bar
133b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos nyid bsnyen bkur byas nas// de lta bas na dga' bar byas las mgo la 'bar bzhin sbyor spyod de/
133b8(dkon brtsegs): rtags tu shes rab pa rol phyin dang dge pa'i bzhes gnyen rnyed byis la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun du bsten byas te// dge slong khyer cag
134a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu ni gnas zas kyis gsol pa// ches rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyed
134a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rab tu bstan// shes rab chen po de 'tshal na// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol// chos rnams/ lha'i bu zhig rtag tu rnams par lta bas
134a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba// khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyed ltar sleb pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam pa bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang theb par 'gyur//
134a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsel ba// shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa// grub chen khyed la gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur//
134a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang byed kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma khyed kyis gsung // ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na// de dag dri med bde ba thob// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung /
134a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnams mi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pa de dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes rten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag
134a7(dkon brtsegs): 9'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa// gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis// bdag dang gzhan gyis
134a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis de bzhini mkhyen// khwa'i bu gnas med tha kris kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par dzin pa khyed ces
134b1(dkon brtsegs): grags// de dag nyis sus bzugs// sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu marten bla gros kyis gsol pa// ches rnams thams cad mam
134b2(dkon brtsegs): can ma ma ris phun tshun min// sems can ma mchi lag mthil skyu ru bzhag bzhin// yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu bar snang drungs gsol ba/
134b3(dkon brtsegs): gas kyis khyed kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang la bur snang ba ste// skye dang 'gag pa med par cha gzigs// de smad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu nga yis 'dzi
134b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol ba// khyed kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med// spyong med rdol ba med par gzigs
134b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa// sgyum sna tshogs lags bgyis pa// sgyu'i mkhan pos bstan gyur no// de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gdang /
134b6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul can gyis gsol pa// gzugs brnyan ji ltar me leng la// gdab yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin ches
134b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jigs kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin
134b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa// chos nyid la ni 'khor
136a1(dkon brtsegs): zug tu spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyes pas// de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol
136a2(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyis 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ci bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis
136a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun tu nyon mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu rtogs pa phun
136a4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pas gsol pa// ches rnams yang dag ma lags te// 'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad//
136a5(dkon brtsegs): ni bu blo gres mchog gis gsol ba// lhun gyis grub cing bla med pa// rmongs pa med cing shes pa med// ches rnams ci yang ma bgyid pa// khyed kyis rang bzhin thugs su
136a6(dkon brtsegs): pa / lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa// snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med ma lags can min pa// bzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyed kyi
136a7(dkon brtsegs): zhin thugs su rung // lha'i bu mig dpas gsal pa// yul dang phyags na mi gnas pa// yod dang med pa la ma lags pa// rmi lam 'dod pa ci bzhin du/
136a8(dkon brtsegs): dag rang bzhin khyed kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol ba// bris pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// bar m-i ngag sa
136b1(dkon brtsegs): ma legs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha skad ma
136b2(dkon brtsegs): snyan ma'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsel// gang gis tha snyad gdags pa'i/
136b3(dkon brtsegs): rog tu mde dag ma mchis te// ches kun tu mtshan ma mtshan ma mchis par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon lam pa de dag la de dag nas blas
136b4(dkon brtsegs): la pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa dmigs ma mchis// su la smon lam ma mchis gyur pa// de yang de'i tshul du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting la gzhol ba/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): lo pa// rnam mthar sgo la bstan bgyis shig/ gang zhig grel 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de bzhin rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// /
136b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bum smad pas gsol pa// khyed ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te// bde gshegs khyed la spang mi mnga'// su sbed de dag
136b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas ma lags// lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa// ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char kyis sa chen dems par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chos tshar gyis
136b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa don med kyis gsol ba// thub khyod gsung ni den mchis te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
137a1(dkon brtsegs): sa tsam kun+da rab 'jigs pa//
137a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad
137a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng geng res gas
137a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ khyod kyis steng pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas// seng ge ri dgas phra me bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las gsel ba// bag yod sngon du
137a5(dkon brtsegs): btang mdzad de// khyad kyi sred pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yong rab gnas kyis gsol pa/
137a6(dkon brtsegs): ci med la rab tu gnas te// khyod kyi nyid kyi chos kyang srel// stobs bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas ches// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu srel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis
137a7(dkon brtsegs): rna pa// bgra yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// thu ba chen rang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu
137a8(dkon brtsegs): par gyu mis gsol pa// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyed la bslab pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges
137a9(dkon brtsegs): dris par myong // lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsal pa// bag yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par/
137b1(dkon brtsegs): sa cad mkhyen tu nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol ba// byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing // khyed ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje
137b2(dkon brtsegs): las pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur// lha'i bu gzhan yod brtson gyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig po rtags
137b3(dkon brtsegs): / dpa' bo chen po khyed kyis sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol ba// bag yang dga' ba'i bstan
137b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas ye shes gyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsgril// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/
137b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad che// khyed ni bag gis bzung bas na// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyi thugs ni skyen gyur// lha'i bu zhig nas brtson gyis
137b6(dkon brtsegs): gsel ba// ches rnams de dag rang bzhin ni// de nas sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs
137b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gnas la yang dag par gnas pAsmra// zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste// 'on kyang de la bzhugs mi mnga'// sems can nyen mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul thug
137b8(dkon brtsegs): bal tshor ba bzhin// lha'i bu ni gnas rab tu gnas kyis gsol ba// sangs rgyas zhing la rab tu bzhugs// sus kyang mi skyed ri bo bzhin// khyed la gan
138a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyir mi nus te// sems ni khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu ni gnas dul gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni
138a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dul// bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod par mi 'gyur// lha'i bu ni gnas nges par byung gis gsel ba// ni ba'i yid mnga' na
138a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas la// dpa' ba chen po sgom mdzad pa// ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyis tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa//
138a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis// sngon du ni gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de'i rjes su 'brang lnga'i zhi gnas rjes
138a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan pa rnams kyi 'chid// de khyed mtha' yas dbang du
138a6(dkon brtsegs): / lha'i bu zhig nas spyod yul gyis gsal pa// chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// ni gnas yin nas 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med snang ba ni/
138a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu ni gnas brlan gyis gsol pa// bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsnyems pas
138a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub brjes// de'i bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhig nas lhur len gyis gsol ba// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang yang
138b1(dkon brtsegs): bkun dag gis ma mdzangs/ ni nas me shes tha ba rung byung cing du nges par 'byung // wa'i pra lcag mthang mngan dgas gsal pa// dpa' ba can ba zhag saH
138b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad snyan pas// de la khyod kyis spyod cing // rang byung zhing ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lcag mthong byung gis gsol pa// shes rab
138b3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas shing // rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po stan ste// de lta bas lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gan
138b4(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba// chos rnam thams cad btsal bgyis te// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// byang chub nyid la gnas
138b5(dkon brtsegs): ri 'dod// lha'i bu zhig mthong nges byung ba'i gis gsol pa// gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par 'byung // rdzogs pa'i
138b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong dwags gsol nas// yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par
138b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnams 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/
138b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dga' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// pham pa'i bgyi bar yod mi nus// lnga'i bu lhag
139a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong byung gis gsol pa// chos rnams mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag gzugs pa rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing /
139a2(dkon brtsegs): ranga'abyung 'di ni thob par 'gyur// lce'i bu lhag mthong la sten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'drin khyed kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni bster mdzad pas// thams cad bsan pas
139a3(dkon brtsegs): brnyes nas ni// sreg chags bye ba grol bar mdzad// lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen pa// 'dren pa dam pa man
139a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos ma mkhyen pa'i// 'jig rten de'i sgrol mdzad// lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing /
139a5(dkon brtsegs): sa kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang bral bas gsol pa/
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shig/ skye bo mang po 'grel pa bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam
139a7(dkon brtsegs): ra rje bas gsas pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par ral/ chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// num pa ma mchis sdang mi mangs// thub pa 'jig rten thams
139a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po ches kun ni// lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'dug// rang bzhin med par
139b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam mthong na// de ni rang byung byang nab lags// lha'i bu lcag mthong snying pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong snyisnyeng pa ste// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/
139b2(dkon brtsegs): jig rten sdug bsngal 'angadi gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po shin du skyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gres gsol pa// byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten
139b3(dkon brtsegs): khams pas nges par 'byung // de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thob// grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'brel// lha'i bu sred pa nyid la spen gyis gsel ba/ sbeng pa nyid
139b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos sten pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing // 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la
139b5(dkon brtsegs): mos kyis gsol pa// stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs// dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la bsten//
139b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong pa nyid spyod yul gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun tu gyi spyod yul ni// ches rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bo
139b7(dkon brtsegs): de la spyad par mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/ skyen dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la
139b8(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu steng pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas/ gsol pa// stong pa nyid ches la sten bgyid cing // sangs rgyas
140a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang gis 'dren pa
140a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags gyur pa// de ni yang dag 'phags zhes gsungs// stong pa nyid chos la sten bgyid pa// ma slad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol/
140a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang // mya ngan la'adas min sten pa mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren// drang srong chen po byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang
140a4(dkon brtsegs): par shar gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid ni la brten nas ni// khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar// stong pa nyid la gang bsten// de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong
140a5(dkon brtsegs): du la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid rten pa// mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing lha med rnams// byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur//
140a6(dkon brtsegs): ne'i buzung pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsal pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid spen bgyid pa// sangs rgyas ches rnams phun sum tshogs// rang byung bam pa med par 'gyur/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten den kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang sten pa// del
140a8(dkon brtsegs): bdud rnams bye ba'i phrag/ slong gis dkrugs par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan ma mngal mngon pagyis te// dngos pa thams ca/
140b1(dkon brtsegs): tsA pa zhi gnas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams gnas 'byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la chags pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la byung
140b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi bzhing la sbed pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bzhig rnams kyis// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med par spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
140b3(dkon brtsegs): sa kun gyi spyod yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshan ma mi dmanga' rtogs dkar zhing // zhing spyong khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skems
140b4(dkon brtsegs): sol pa/ grub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad no// mtshan ma med pas sgom gyur to// yab kyi dkor mi 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir bgyid/
140b5(dkon brtsegs): ni bumatshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni skyong mdzad pas// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang // khyed kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal te/
140b6(dkon brtsegs): wa'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing // dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa
140b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de bas khyod kyang phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ thub chen dpal po chen po khyod // mtshan ma med la rnam par ral/

141a5(dkon brtsegs): gre skal pa// de dag rgan ni gal mchis// lha'i bu smon pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun du mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten drag

145a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams ches kyang byings langs blangs// 'dren pa khyad kyis sras de dag/ mtshan cing cig gis des byangasas// sku'i durjes kyi dbyings kyi spyang chum rgyas mamam
145a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kun gyi spyad yul ni// rjes kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyed ni gang spring pa'i// yeshes de ni bas ma ma khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings pa
145a4(dkon brtsegs): pas gos la pa// chos kyi dbyings la ga shugs pa// de dag yi shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the nam med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas/
145a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la bab gyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyis gsol pa// ches kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag slebs pa'i spobs skyed pa// bsam
145a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jig pa med pas gsol pa// gang la de dag gnas pa// 'jig pa med pa theng med pas// de dag rnams
145a7(dkon brtsegs): rang srapas// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsal ba/ khyed ni ches dbyings mkhas pa ste// ches rnam
145a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du mkhas// lag mthal sbyang banag bcan chos kying byings kyi rnam par san// wa'i btsas kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa// chos rnams
145b1(dkon brtsegs): de gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyis la zhugs// mi gnas num pa ma mchis te// gzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas
145b2(dkon brtsegs): // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'o// ches gi dbyings la khyed spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'al// wa'i
145b3(dkon brtsegs): ngos la rtog smra pas gsol pa// gang dang gang gis sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings ston// de'i phyir rtags dang gzugs
145b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ibu ches kyi 'du byings la brtson gyis gsol pas/ mngon par brtson pas chos dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs pa'i
145b5(dkon brtsegs): sa// ye shes pa rol byin par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyed kyis skye bo 'ang // chos kyis rab tu ches par mdzad// chos kyi
145b6(dkon brtsegs): mas mkhyen pa// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi ting rnyed pas gsol po/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du
145b7(dkon brtsegs): lnga/ chos dbyings rnams par mkhyen pa 'i// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren
145b8(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// chos dbyings rnams par mkhyen pa yi// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/ mi mchog 'dren
146a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te// rnam par 'dren pa sngon stobs bcupo// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gzhan pas gas
146a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ches kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig pa shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par
146a3(dkon brtsegs): bres pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyis bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyed kyis
146a4(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyed kyi sras// gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// bsal ba'i 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa
146a5(dkon brtsegs): byung nyid du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu gnas la skabs pas gsol pa// chos kyi dbyings la bsrabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chubazhugs// rang byung nyi
146a6(dkon brtsegs): sa// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsel ba/ gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal pa// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la
146a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams byed pastong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yongs su mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa// gnas med gang gi rig gyur
146a8(dkon brtsegs): rag bdag cag bdud kyi rtogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyed cing // mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'// lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas
146b1(dkon brtsegs): gas b+hA ba gnas cang 'a shes mkhas pa na// ches cing 'ani ba gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshang du ni// jis na'i yis dang dran/ kwa'i rdzu
146b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ nus pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa'o// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgying pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med de zhes
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gi
146b4(dkon brtsegs): sa// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// sngon chad ni rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal
146b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis thugs su chud// las kyi nas kyi rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa// chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyi rgyu zhes khyed
146b6(dkon brtsegs): khyen// gang gis rgyu yis bgyid de yang // gang zag mchog gi thugs su chud// lnga'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na//
146b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams las gang bgyi 'gyur ba// de'i rgyu dang len pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsel ba// phyogs bcu'i
146b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di dag gi// sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las// gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyed kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyang
147a1(dkon brtsegs): yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te// gnas dang skyes pa'ang ma mchis so// de bas khyed ni gang
147a2(dkon brtsegs): das mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// las dang rgyu dang de bzhin nas// dus la rnam la smin gsum dang ni// ji ltar de'i ge len pa dang // khyod kyis
147a3(dkon brtsegs): pas de srad mchog/ lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu deng las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/
147a4(dkon brtsegs): bas mnyam pa nyid// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/
147a5(dkon brtsegs): ba tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len dang // gnas dang rkyen rgyud kyis rnams// khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen
147a6(dkon brtsegs): par bstan par mdzad// lnga'i bu slebs kyis rnam par brtse bas gsel ba// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang / gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyis rnams
147a7(dkon brtsegs): ga yang ba rtse// rje ming 'byung ba zung kyis mkhyen// sna'i bu skabs kyis gsal pa// rgyu dang rkyen dngapas rnams dang // rnam par smin pa sen pa rnams/
147a8(dkon brtsegs): desum bzhini snang shes// seng ge ji khyed ces gsungs// lha'i bu slebs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsel pa/ 'jig rten las ni gang migags// khams ni gang
147b1(dkon brtsegs): rapa// de ga dang pa gnyis gam zas mkhyen// de bas khyang no gra med// lha'i bus pas dang ldan gyis gsol pa// khams gang lan chen bgyis thung // gang gisam
147b2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang // de'i rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lnga'i bu sdebs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni rten bgyis shing /
147b3(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba yi// sems can khams ni khyed kyis mkhyen// phrag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis ni
147b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa// de kun bla na med pas mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyis byin
147b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa de ni khams dang ni// 'du 'dzi shes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa
147b6(dkon brtsegs): nide len dang // shes rkyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa des// de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa//
147b7(dkon brtsegs): sa can gang na gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas
147b8(dkon brtsegs): nisol pa/ ye shes gang gis khams de ni// 'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi// mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan// lha'i bu kha
148a1(dkon brtsegs): nas nges pa byung gis gsol pa// khams gang la ni sten bgyis nas// 'dus byas dgal ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// khyed la
148a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyis rjes su song bas gsol pa// khams gang la ni rten bgyi bas// yon tan ji snyed skyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma
148a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni spen bgyid cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyi dogs med mkhyen/
148a4(dkon brtsegs): lus pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pas/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyid pa// 'gro ba ci 'dra mchi ba dzi// sems can rnams kyis lam
148a5(dkon brtsegs): dag mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa// phung pos
148a6(dkon brtsegs): yeshes nges par 'jug/ zhwa'i bulam gyis nges par byung gis gas pa/ sems can yang gte sa to// ngang chu ga sa mang pa/
148a7(dkon brtsegs): / rdzogs pa rdzogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bul ma la thos pas gsol pa/ ma nges phung bar gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/
148a8(dkon brtsegs): dbu ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyed kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyis rdzas gsol ba// sangs rgyas brdatsam nyid lags te// de bzhin skabs dang ya
148b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs can yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs// lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsal// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med
148b2(dkon brtsegs): shes sa pa gzhan yang med// den dam nyid du bstan te zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyed kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas ches la
148b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs pa sa// de ni de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// 'dod ltar 'dod dgur rnam par phul// lnga'i bu ches la 'jigs med kyis gsal
148b4(dkon brtsegs): rje nadon dam dang // don de rab tu bstan mchis kyang // rkun rdzob dang ni don dam dang brda' yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis
148b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ba thams cad rnam pa gzhan// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis rnam pa gnan// khyed kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i
148b6(dkon brtsegs): pa brtson pas gsel pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyis rgyud na'i gnas ma mchis// leg par nges rnams kun tu 'gro'i// drang srong chen
148b7(dkon brtsegs): byad kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mes pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ mkhas gang la la ni rten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags khams
148b8(dkon brtsegs): la sngags lta ba// de dag thub chen khyed kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongs su brtags pas nas// 'dod
149a1(dkon brtsegs): chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ci bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu byams pa nges par byung gis gsol ba/
149a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis yongs su brtags pas// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyed kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par 'byung gis
149a3(dkon brtsegs): la pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// gti muge khams ni rab tu byung // del mes pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong bas
149a4(dkon brtsegs): na gsel pa// brtse byed 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de lams par nges byung ba// de dag thub chen khyed kyis gzigs// lha'i
149a5(dkon brtsegs): nga/ sa sa sa

149a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin padag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab du mkhyen// kwa'i bun ngan snying par byed pas gsal pa/ 'khor bran ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gi d+hA ba nan tan dang /
149a8(dkon brtsegs): mas pagyis gyur ba yang // spang ba med pa khyeng gis gzigs// khwa'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsal pa/ sems can gang gis khams gang da / bsem ma
149b1(dkon brtsegs): gyu pa mo// rdzun ma da kyis rab tu mkhyen// des ma khyed ni dga' bar bdang // lha'i bung ba pel skyed pas gsos pa/ sbyor bgrang gis skye ba dang // gang kyis rgya chen
149b2(dkon brtsegs): / ba dang nin rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang ba nges par 'byung gis gsal pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur ba dang // sreng
149b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par ti/ kA // sred pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dbang po nyams chung rnams dag
149b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ka za da chags dben par 'tshal// sred pa rnam par zhig pa yang // rkang gnyis dam pas bstan pa mdzad// lnga'i bu dbang po rnams par rgyal bas gsel
149b5(dkon brtsegs): zad brten// rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sbed pa rnam par zhig pa yang // sred pa dang bcas pas khyed
149b6(dkon brtsegs): lA/ ljang bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa// 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // zhing shes dang mi shes dang // sred dang zhing nga dbang po rnams// rnam par
149b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs na sngon ma dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsel ba// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa// gnod sems med dang bden pa dang // dbang po rdul po sten pa'i
149b8(dkon brtsegs): che khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lta ba'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsungs// sems can shes pa
150a1(dkon brtsegs): / rjes su skye// zhe sdang khams ni ni bar bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa/ gnod sems med dang byams
150a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// ngag dang nyon mongs mi dmigs te// des ni 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ log par rnam
150a3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa dang // log par nye bar sten pa yang // nyon mongs dam phyir kun tu sbyar te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol ma/
150a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos po la 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni sgra chen khyed kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod
150a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mun pas snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtse bas gzigs/ snang #

150a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grags pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs spangs phyir shes gang gis// shes pas de la rtogs bgyid pa// de yang sten pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas khyed la mngon par ra #

150b3(dkon brtsegs): da pa sus// 'i bu da nas pa gas ces sa sems pa pa tha pas

150b6(dkon brtsegs): ni brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud// des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'// lha'i khu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs
150b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur de las skyes par de dag mkhyen// de bas khyod la de zla med// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/
150b8(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po rnams par byang ba dang // bstan pa'ang khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen// de na khyod la ngo zla med// lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba da
151a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug dang 'dzin dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag/ ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bsan// lha'i bu las byung gis gsol pa/ bsam
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan rnams thar rnam byung dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang ting nge 'dzin// bag yod pa las byung ba ste// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol
151a3(dkon brtsegs): pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa// bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang // ljang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni rlung ltar chags pa med pa// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas
151a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa bye ba grang du med du// srid pa'i de ni sngon zhugs tshe// srid pa'i skyon dang yeng ma 'dres// nges na khyed la den zla med// lha'i bu sen gi mtha' la gnas pas
151a5(dkon brtsegs): gas le / TA b+hu bye ba grangs med du// byang chub gzhan yas chol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongs su srung bas na// nges na khyod ni dpa' bo legs// lha'i bu sngon gyi ma
151a6(dkon brtsegs): la rtsegs pas nga lus pa sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ blo mcheg gsung che gsol bas na// slebs pa sna tshogs rab mnga' ba// rnam par 'dren pa des nges byung /
151a7(dkon brtsegs): bcur gyi ma thags byang bas gsos pa/ stan nang 'khor bar skyed pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten snyan rnams khyed kyis gzigs// ngesan
151a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod na tshul 'amakhas// lha'i bu sngon gyi mthang byin gyis gsol po/ sde mthar chos rgyal mang ba'o// dpa' bos spen chang skyed mdzad pa// thams cad mkhyen du nges par bya
151b1(dkon brtsegs): skyems sa bras la phyag kyang 'tshal// sna'i bu srin gyi stan la phun sum chags pas gsel pa/ byang chub mcheg ni brtsal pa'i phyir/ bskal pa bye ba zangs med du// sangs rgyas
151b2(dkon brtsegs): byi mtha' las rje// dol khyod kyis sa bon btab// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsel ba/ bskal pa bye bar brtags mdzad pas// chos kun sems can med pa zhes
151b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams thamamakhyen// 'du 'phro thams cad rgyal bas gsung // lha'i bu sngon gyis mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas
151b4(dkon brtsegs): min rab mkhye pa 'dran pa srong mdzad pas// des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min rten bgyis nas/
