156b38(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa// 'jigs pa kun las yang dag rgal// zug du thams cad kun tu ston// skems pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga' ba// thams cad zil nen phyag kyang 'a
156b39(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol po// rnams dang ni dri ma dang // bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yi// khang kyichis la rgal mi nus// de bas khyangs brnyes
156b40(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ lha'i bu seng ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs su mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas 'gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'// bdag la rnas
157a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis sus rgol zhes// bde gshegs khyed la rigs mi mnga'// lha'i bu skrag min gyis gsol pa/ seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis skrag
157a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te// spu bkod nags na ngaro sgrogs// de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang // mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste// lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na/
157a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs me gzigs nas gsung yang sgeg/ lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa// 'jig rten gsum nam
157a4(dkon brtsegs): nami/ rgyal ba bdag gi skya bas// lha'i bu seng ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa khyed
157a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis// khyed la gang nyel de ma mchis// lha'i bu mdzad 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ seng ge nga ro gsung sgregs te// khyod kyis chos kyi mdzad bzung bas// srog chags bye skong dag gis/
157a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su mthur gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can// dpa' chen de dag thob chen thob// byang chub
157a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu sems brgya tshang // gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi bstan pa su byas te// byang chub mchog tu sems
157a8(dkon brtsegs): bdung ba te/ sa 'jig rten sems can che// gang pag mitshig de bdag 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dgan nol med pa'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs
157b1(dkon brtsegs): gasbyangangs nas// sragachags bye bsnang dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/ lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsal pa/ yus nga dus nas mi dbang na
157b2(dkon brtsegs): sa sau rgyas bskal pa lags bsgrubs pas// de slang khyod ni sems rgyung dag/ mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ zag pazang ba'i
157b3(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyas gyis// s+yA ge'i ngaro bsgrags mdzad de// dam bca' la mngon zhugs na// rgol ba 'di ni nas yongs ma mchis// lha'i bu kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa
157b4(dkon brtsegs): da kyi gsung la sngo ba'i ba'i// lha dang lta bu mi dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// des na thub pa stobs dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pazang las mkhas pas gsol pa//
157b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dam pa'i zag po ni// mo lus yongs su bas pa ste// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha// lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/ khyod la nyon med
157b6(dkon brtsegs): sa bang khyed la gang nal pa// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te// des nas sangs rgyas bsres mi mda'o// kwa'i bu sems ni bas gsal pa/ 'dod cagasu
157b7(dkon brtsegs): zhib ste gti mug bag chags bcas par ni// nyes spyad las kyang ni bas na// sems ni khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang
157b8(dkon brtsegs): gis nyon mongs gang // bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i che// de la khyod kyi mkhyen/ kun 'jug/ des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol
158a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa gang la bslab pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te// thams cad mkhyen pa de skad du// nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas// lha'i bu rnal
158a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor bla zas kyis gsal pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis zo// rnal 'byor las ni nyams ma mchis// des na khyod kyis nyirna mongs kun da gachags bcas par yongs su gsapa/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): klu'i bu zhi pa rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so// lha'i bu bag nyal phyug gis gsol pa/
158a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi ngag sa ma lus gsal// khyod la skyon dri yongs su ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub// lha'i bu mtha' la gnas pas
158a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol po/ zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na// skye ba yang skye ma las te// thub khyod skye tha ma pa// des na mgon po bsrings mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshangs srungs gis gsol pa/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur// mya ngan khri zhing rnam par skams// gdung ba med la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shing gtags bton gyis
158a7(dkon brtsegs): gsas pa/ rtsub parnams cad mkhyen pa khyed// ma rig shing gtags rnams kyang bsal// sangs rgyas skyed pa rnam par sbyangs// de bas ston pa bsrings mi mngan/
158a8(dkon brtsegs): blo snang pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i tshe las yang dag rgal// rnam par pa 'dren pa bya bo byas// khyod kyis snang ba yang dag phyung // 'jig med khyad
158b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ngan yang grub// kwa'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa/ nyon mongs thams cad rab tu shig/ bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'
158b2(dkon brtsegs): mgon pa khyang sa byag/ grang 'tsham// lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos rgyal mtshan sbeng // nga rgyal rgya la mtshan rab tu brnyil// chos kyi las srang ma
158b3(dkon brtsegs): yas pan dpa' bran mo khyed kyi bstan// lha'i bu ches kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsel ba/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas po// thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa// sems
158b4(dkon brtsegs): kun gi dgye bshes macom ye shes mche la phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu ches kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa// seng ge'i nga ro rnam sgeg kyang
158b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyalasas cing // sangs rgyas ches kyi ngan kyis skam// lha'i bu ches den du gnyer ba gsol ba/ sangs rgyas ches rnams dor gnyer bar// khyed kyisras rnams sems
158b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing / khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu ches kyi skem gyis gsel ba/ khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// sangs
158b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ches rnams btsal ba'i phyir// sreg chags bye ba sgom gyur te// brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu rtson/ bam po bcu gcig
158b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// // lnga'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing // 'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i
159a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba'i mchog 'gyur khyod mthong nas// brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/
159a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa zab cing blta' dka' ba'i// chos ni khrod kyis rab bstan// khyed kyi sras kyis thes gyur nas// de dag bla na med byang chub tshol// lha'i bulbu ba med
159a3(dkon brtsegs): skye gsal pa/ khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas// khyed kyis sras pa dpa 'dres pa// lus dang sdigs mismra par// byang chub den du gnyer ba bgyir/
159a4(dkon brtsegs): du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// thub pa bsres pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'dir thos nas// gzhan du sems pa ma
159a5(dkon brtsegs): ma/ brtulha zhus sa mchog can byang chub tshol// lha'i bu gzhan du 'gro bas gsol pa// mi dbang khyod kyis gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis
159a6(dkon brtsegs): kyad gzhan du ni ma mchi ra// blan med pa'i byang chub tshul// sna'i bu'i ba gnas kyis gsus pa// sing ge'i di bsgrags
159a7(dkon brtsegs): ma sus kyis zas zlar ni byang chub mnag la nyer gyur cing // de dag nang gnyis ngem par 'gyur// sna'i bu skabs pa nye bar gyur pas rnams
159a8(dkon brtsegs): ma/ grags chem khrid kyi gsung ba brjod pa'i// srabs pa de ni thos gyur nas/ sangs rgyas ches la khyad kyi sras// kun kyang dka' bar ba mgyud
159b1(dkon brtsegs): 'i thamabs pa zab pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten khyod kyis gsung skyugs pa// ma smad sras kyis thos gyur nas// de dag sngags pa ram du yang // sangs
159b2(dkon brtsegs): las ming ni nag/ lha'i bu rtag tu rab tu dgas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khrod kyis gsung bsgrags pas// sdebs chen khyod kyis sras kyis rnams/
159b3(dkon brtsegs): gtu rab tu ra chang // pa srang de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thes gyur nas// rkang
159b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dam da kyi sras// dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis par// byang chub mchog ni tshel bar bgyid// lha'i bu thegs med yid kyis gsol pa/ khyed
159b5(dkon brtsegs): ma thos pas na// sems rangs gyur cing yi dga' ste// de dag yid ni nam du yang // byang chub nyid du thos ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la
159b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa/ ches rnams gang la bstan bgyis bya// dkar po'i phyogs gang dag mi 'gri bcing // de'i bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i
159b7(dkon brtsegs): ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dkar po'i byegs la spyod pa la// bar chad 'byung bar mi
159b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang med par thub pa mkhyen// nges na ston pa bsgrengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pi/ dge la
160a1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa// nag po'i phyogs kyis rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs ni des mi gos// gnas kyang med par thugs pas mkhyen/
160a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i bu rig pa la mkhas pas gsel pa// nag po'i ches ni nam du yang // dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par// rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/
160a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig pas gsel ba/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres pa// dpa' bo chen po khyed kyis mkhyen//
160a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs brtags pas nas// dkar po'i phyogs la 'grib par 'gyur// lnga'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa/
160a5(dkon brtsegs): dukur pa'i phyi phyis ni mi 'byung ste// de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur pa// bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i bu thar par 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag po'i
160a6(dkon brtsegs): phyog stsalakyi ma/ ba 'deng ba mang la yaM// khar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// de nas na rgyal khyed thams cad mkhyen pa'i// lha'i
160a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i se 'aM chos gsal ba/ sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas// kun nas nyin mongs shes bya zhes// dpa' chen po khyed kyis gsungs/
160a8(dkon brtsegs): des khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid cing // kun nyon mongs ma 'tshal na/
160b1(dkon brtsegs): dri'adra ga/ de lta bur ni man tan gyi/ lha'i bu zhom
160b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos ni zhes mi nus// de sang bde bar gshegs mi gsungs// lnga'i bu sdig pa mthong gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la sten byas kyang // dge ba
160b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grib gang sla ba// de ni thar ches sal med pa// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu gdu rnal bar bya bas gsol ba// chags pa 'dul bar
160b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dang / ga mug 'dul 'dod// thub pa'i spobs pas gsol pa// ngag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa// mkhas pas gang rnams mi nyes pa
160b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag spen pa sangs rgyas min// de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs// lha'i pu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos
160b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang bstan pa// de bsten nyon mongs mi bzad ces// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lnga'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/ chos
160b7(dkon brtsegs): nyis rnams// zad pa 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la// yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces// rgol ba'i 'di na yong mi dmigs// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la brtson pa
160b8(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba/ rgyal ba khyed kyis nyan thos la// gang gi don du chos bstan// de brtson bgyis pas mi 'thob ces// 'di na khyed la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mi
160b9(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags spangs phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes
161a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod rgol ba yod ma mchis/ lha'i 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes gyis gsol pa/ shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// ne sdang spangs phyir ba
161a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa/ de sbubs de se bar mi 'gyur zhes// dgra 'joms khyed la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mig rnams par dag gis gsol pa// shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyi
161a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de la rten bgyis kyang // gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur// 'di ni khyod la rgol ma mchis// lnga'i bu rnam par rdzogs pa 'dzem gyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog
161a4(dkon brtsegs): bar ni// dbugs 'byung rngub dran gsungs pa/ de la brtson bgyis mi ni zhes// 'di ni khyed la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa ltar ldan pa
161a5(dkon brtsegs): byas gas pa/ da snyam pa spangs slad du// stong pa nyid khyed kyis bka' stsal pa// des ni de bzhin mi 'gyur zhes// 'di na khyed la rgol ma mchis// lho'i bu
161a6(dkon brtsegs): ma pa ga pas gsal ba// nga'i skam pa'i rgyal sras slad du// mtshanam med pa khyed kyis gsungs// bkren kyang ni bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'di ni khyed nams
161a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis lha'i busems rgyun rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi// 'on mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// des ni zin mongs mi ma
161a8(dkon brtsegs): ces/ 'din khyod la rke li ma mchis// lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par shig gis gsal ba/ phyogs dang gnyen pa'i rnam pa dang // nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug da
161b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med par rgol pa ni// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu rba skad shin tu shes pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang // zang dang mthang thasla
161b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa mnyis rgol bgyid pa// thub pa de ni ming tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyis las 'dul bas gsol pa/ mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas// khyed kyi sku
161b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrin las ka// tham can pa lus mkhyen pas// des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ sems can
161b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thags brtse bas// dpa' khyod sku yi phrin las ni// mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags// 'jig rten mgon po phyag kyang 'tshal// sA'i bu lus kyi las
161b5(dkon brtsegs): mas gsal ba/ sku'i 'phrin las rab nges par// sku'i 'phrin lus kun la slad slad du// 'jig rten sgren ma khyod mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/
161b6(dkon brtsegs): hU~M lus kyi las kyi thar shin tu mthong gis gsol pa/ sems can kun la sman slad du// 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sku'i 'phrin las dag pa dang // legs par
161b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtags dang ldan// lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin du mnyam par gzhag pas gsol pa/ shin tu mnyam par bzhago sku dang // sku'i 'phrin las rnam par dag
161b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan sems can bde don du// gang zag mgun ni sred pa mdzad// lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol pa/ snyan cing yon tan ldan dang // brtsub pa yongs su spangs
162a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung // mkhyen pas shin tu yongs su rtags shing // mgon po khyed ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i bu dus su smras pas gsol pa/ dus su don dang
162a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang // don med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // gzung bar 'os dang brang 'os pa// 'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad// lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/
162a3(dkon brtsegs): kha cheru du 'gyur ba yongs su spangs te// 'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba// dben med 'bras bu rnam par smin// sngon cad khyed kyis gsung du brjod// lha'i bu mi srubs pas
162a4(dkon brtsegs): srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni// srid pa rnams su brdzun ma gsungs// de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun// 'jig rten dag na thos ma mchis// lha'i bu yang dag
162a5(dkon brtsegs): pa k+Sha sel / 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas ches rnams btsal slad du// thub pa'i gsung la sdod pa ni// yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu mthun lags/
162a6(dkon brtsegs): bri yang mtha' las nges par 'byung gis/ gsas pa/ mamachog zud gyis bden pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang na pa 'di bsgrub// rjes kyi yang da pa
162a7(dkon brtsegs): nang das pa khyad zas mkhyen// zhwa'i bu yang dag pa la rnam pas gsal pa// 'dus byas dag gis chos kyi rnams// yang dag ji bzhin bzhi ba dang / sa
162a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang // mi'i dbang pos rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la rtogs pas gsol ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa yi// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag/
162b1(dkon brtsegs): ra rgyal ba ranyamA ma mchig/ 'jug bu mi/ de
162b2(dkon brtsegs): gi tshig gi las kya mkhyen// lha'i bu yid la rtag pas gsol ba/ mi'i dbang po'i thugs kyi las// ji la snyed gang dag 'grel thugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro ba ma grangs rgya
162b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsel ba/ 'grel thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gang la khyed ni skyed mdzad pa// de 'khrugs ni dul par 'byung // 'bru
162b4(dkon brtsegs): phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams dpyad nas// rnam 'dren thugs kyi 'phrin las 'jug/ thub pa yo shes sna chog
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mkhyen bzhini kun tu rab tu 'jug/ lnga'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las// sems can thugs rjes gzigs pa 'byung /
162b6(dkon brtsegs): ts+tshats+tsha maud la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa las mkhas pas gsel ba/ sprin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus
162b7(dkon brtsegs): na dag la yang // gang gis gang la sngon smad pa// sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa rtogs pas// byang chub mchog ni 'tshal mdzad cing // gang drung
162b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon gyi spyad pa// sngon gyi spyod pa yongs so brtags nas// sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa
162b9(dkon brtsegs): bye ba grangs med du// gang tu khyed kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi thugs yid thos mi mnga'// lha'i bu n+dan gyi tshul la yongs su rdzogs
163a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi// ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la// rnam par 'dren pa khyod
163a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhus// lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges byung gis gsol pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu med pa yi// ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis// zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad
163a3(dkon brtsegs): dbabar// lha'i bu srin gyi gnas la rtogs pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes par ba mang dang // bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gzigs nas sems can rnams la
163a4(dkon brtsegs): sa can long ba rnams kyang 'grel// lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsel pa/ gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis
163a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nid pa ma he zad bgyid pa dag/ gzhan dang gzhan yang khyekhyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu srin gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen
163a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gra rdzogs pa/ kyi gas 'das dus kyi// las dang bsam gtan sems 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnams la theb mi mchis// lnga'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' lamal
163a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang // smr-i dang las kyi rnam smad la// thigs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// lha'i bu
163a8(dkon brtsegs): 'as pa'i skyeng yul gyis gsal ba/ brtan pa 'phrum khas khyod kyi// mkhyen pa byings sems can gyi// bas ma dang las kyi 'bras bu dang // 'gro rnams pa
163b1(dkon brtsegs): glegs ma mchis// sna'i bu srid pa las bskyed kyis gsol ba/ khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi// ye shes mchog ni rtags te/
163b2(dkon brtsegs): srid ma'i skyed yul khyed kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu za sad la spyod pas gsol pa/ las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rnam par smin pa myeng ba dag/ de dag thams cad ming tsam cu
163b3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis rnamapa bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bung lngar byung ba la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// daltar byung la thogs ma mchis
163b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas med sa/ rgyas zhing rnams ni// 'jig rten mgon po rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam par spyod pas gsol pa/ mi'i dbang po rnams spyad nas/
163b5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs bgyid pa// dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par// nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigaso// lha'i bu gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/
163b6(dkon brtsegs): dus su gnas pa ma mchis// ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te// dngos po thams cad med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par
163b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal bas gsal ba/ 'das pa dag dang ma 'angs dang // daltar byung ba'i phung po rnams// ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par// skyes bu dam pa stan pa mdzad/
163b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum sems can thams cad la// snying po sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang // brag cha ltar bur khyed kyis bsran
163b9(dkon brtsegs): so par ma bstan de/
164a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dus gsum dpogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// dus gsum po dag kun tu yang // sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas na/
164a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mas yongs su rig par byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyed kyis// byang chub mngon tu bgyis gyur pa/ de dus tshun
164a3(dkon brtsegs): bos pa la// bri bar gyur par yod mi dga'// lnga'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten ske ma'i snang ba ni// rab tu rgyun cang mi 'gyur te/ rtag par
164a4(dkon brtsegs): pa des// khyed kyi sras rnams mes pa che// lha'i bu mos pa mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad+ma ji bzhin// khyed kyis mes pas mngon
164a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags 'jig rten dag gis mi gas te// pad+ma chab kyis ji bzhin no// lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mes pa ni/
164a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbying sa/ zhes brjod pas// gnyis med gnyis bgyi ma mchis// smad ba med pas khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/
164a7(dkon brtsegs): 'i brjid can pa'i brtson gyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur// mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyed// brtson 'grus btang ba yongs su ma mdzad// lnga'i bu dran pa duH
164a8(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pas gsel ba/ dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni// thams cad kun du rjes su 'jug/ mdzad kyang mgor ba khyed// dgengs pa yongs su ma mchis// lha
164b1(dkon brtsegs): sems nam rnams kyi spyod pa mchim/ 'drer pa spyod pa'i dab
164b2(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam par gnag pas gsol pa/ mgon po rtog tu mnyam gnag ste// sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/
164b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig nor sgren mar gyur khyod kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma ni// bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis kyang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod// lnga'i bu rnam par grol
164b4(dkon brtsegs): bo la mkhas pas gsol pa/ rnam par grol dang ma grol ba// gang slad khyed kyis ma brnyes pas// mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni// rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'/
164b5(dkon brtsegs): lde'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la badzin pas gsol pa/ thub pa khyed ni rnam grol nas// ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na// rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni// yang dag
164b6(dkon brtsegs): mas mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pa kyis gsol pa// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyi// slong la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste
164b7(dkon brtsegs): das ni sangs rgyas lags zhes bstod// lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/ srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du// bde gshegs khyed la chags mi mnga'//
164b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na// rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyed la ni// rnam pa kun tu
164b9(dkon brtsegs): bsnyel mi mnga'// mgon pa'i dgongs pa nyer gzhag pas// thub pa 'bru mar snyed dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la
165a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par ma gzhag sems mi mangs
165a2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'om 'dres sangs rgyas ches kyi rnams// sreg chags kun gyis shes par dka'// lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/
165a3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs pa khyed la ni// ma gtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste// mi'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos// ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon
165a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ skyes bu khyu mchog khyed la ni// 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa// khyod kyi chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/
165a5(dkon brtsegs): po bangs pas gsol pa/ sems can snying po bla med// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa// sangs rgyas byang chub
165a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brod ldan glang po dang // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhon 'phrul dbang byed dpa
165a7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / 'od gsel dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bsten pa yang thos// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi sgra dag gi
165b1(dkon brtsegs): bstang pa brjod pa yang cas nas// de mtshar thob par gyur te/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas/ 'di ltar sngan cad ma thos pa'i rjes kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su
165b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyunem nur dang / the tshom za bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ kye go'u tam san chang ma thos pa'i ches bstan 'di thos nas bdag cag
165b3(dkon brtsegs): ni kun tu rgyu'i gnas kyi ming rdal/ khyim gyis gnas kyis kyang 'tshal// khyim gnas kyang mi 'jal bar gyur cing / 'di ji ltar sun mthong ba'i chos kyi tshul 'di
165b4(dkon brtsegs): bres nas/ sa 'di la ni ma nur dang the tshom du gyur te// sems deng bar yang ma gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge sbyong go'u tam khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa ma mchis so// de ci
165b5(dkon brtsegs): sma 'di ltar dge sbyong gdum khyed kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya 'di lta bu'i mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas/
165b6(dkon brtsegs): bdang / cag gis lha'i bu 'khor rgya chen po 'di dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal chen go'u ta ma khyed kyi legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing yi rangs par gyur pa
165b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ des na bdag dge sbyong go'u tam khyed la dad pa ma mchis par gyur to// kye go'u tam gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis ches thams cad ni de bzhin gsheg
165b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes smras pa de la/ ji ltar ches thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag the chemacher 'tshal lo// dge sbyong ge'u ngam khyod ni ci nas bdag cag legs pa
166a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'i don de rtogs nas mun pa med par gyur te/ sman 'di las ldang bar gyur pa de dag bdag cag la chos spyod de sram ste// bdag cag dge sbyong go'ung ma
166a2(dkon brtsegs): khyed la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan bu stegs can spyod pa can dang / rgyu rnams la 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// kun
166a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag de'i phyir khyed nyid la dris/ khyed nyid kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan theb zhig/ dge skyeng go'u ngam legs so zhes gsol te/ kun tu rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa
166a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ma ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces gastsal to// kun du rgyu dag khyed kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/ de dag gis gsol ba/ kye go'u dam bdag cag gis
166a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan bcos yas thos na/ gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par gyur te/ gang 'di pa dang ma gnyis kyang chags pa dang / chags par yang gyur pa dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i
166a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtogs pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas/ 'dod chags kyang 'byung ba'i de'i tshe mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
166a7(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyu ga 'di macim mdusams// pa ma dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i ni// 'did chags de sems las blangam// gsalab kye be'u tam ma lags so// ma'i rnam par
166a8(dkon brtsegs): ga pa las byung ngas/ kye ge'u ngam lags so// de pa'i sems las byung ngam// kye ge'u ngam ma lags so// pa'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye ma go'u tam ma lags sa
166b1(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag 'di la ci lag snyam du sems/ pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ni ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye mgo'u tam de ni ma lags so// kun du rgyu dag 'di pa gcig snyam du
166b2(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye ge'u ta ma de ni ma lags so// rgyu gang dag 'di la ci snyam du sems// pa'i kun rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/
166b3(dkon brtsegs): kye ge'u ma de ni mang lags so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ci snyam du sems// mngal na gnas pa de lha las shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye ge'u tam ma 'tshal te// kun tu rgyu dag
166b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ci snyam du sems// mngal na gnas pa de mi dang lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // gzhin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du
166b5(dkon brtsegs): zhuga'adzin kye ge'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ci snyam du sems// mngal na gnas pa de dag zugs yod pa 'am// gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam//
166b6(dkon brtsegs): kye ge'u dam ma 'chal ko// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ci snyam du// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye ge'u
166b7(dkon brtsegs): ta ma ma 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab cing dra
166b8(dkon brtsegs): sde mkhas pa zhes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtags pa'i yul ma yin la/ bilta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas// de ni khyed yur ring por gzhan du bltas
167a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gzhan durgyas mos pa dang / gzhan du dad pa/ gzhan du rtson pa/ gzhan gyi sa pa'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par
167a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus med kyi// kun tu rgyu dag 'on kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me dge tshul dang 'dra ba'i bla zhes gnyen la rten nas ches zab me rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/
167a3(dkon brtsegs): kun du rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang 'dra'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ tshe 'di nyid la mig la ma yongs su dag
167a4(dkon brtsegs): de/ mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas rgya
167a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyab dang dra nga'i gshes gnyen la brtenan// shes rab kyi mig rnam par 'gyur te// ngas kyang ches zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// kun du rgyu khyed kyang yun ring po
167a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du dkyus pa/ sngon rig pa'i gdams ngag gis bskus pa/ nas ma yin pa la ches su 'du shes/ thar ba'i ma yin pa la thar bar 'dri shes pa/ 'byung bam
167a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa/ chud zos pa rnams kyi chung gzan pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na long ba'i dmigs su long bas byas nas/ gang 'di bkri ba
167a8(dkon brtsegs): da khridi pa de gzhig yang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang la smon pa ma yin par/
167b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mim mongs [।] rdzobs thams sa rgya 'aM yid zla #
167b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no zhes khas che ba dang / 'byung la mkhas pa ma yin pa/ bdag cag ni 'byung ba'i la mkhas pa'o zhes khas che ba dang /
167b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba mthong ba yin no zhes mkhas rtse bI dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni stegs byed pa yin no zhes khas che ba yin te/
167b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'i zhes khas che zhing gang rjes su ston par 'gyur// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chung bar byed pa de ni log par
167b5(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang byin pa de ni log par byin par 'gyur// 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par 'byung ba de ni leg par ston par
167b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur du rnams byed pa'i ma mchis par gang sbrel ba de ni log par 'gyur te// de dag ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal theb par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na
167b7(dkon brtsegs): ba lang rje rab ka mkhas pa ma yin pas// rab ka ma yin par ba lang bsgral na de'i ba lang de dag gis pha ral dang tshu rol gyi 'gram ma rnyed nas 'khyil te/ de nyid du tshul
167b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang rdzi der ba ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed
167b9(dkon brtsegs): pA khas che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag nga ni ston pa nyid yin la ston par khas che bas// gang rjes su smin pa
168a1(dkon brtsegs): de yang dag par rjes su ston pa yin// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su khas che bas// nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de yang dag pa
168a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par byed pa yi// 'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yin la/ 'byung ba la mkhas par khas che bas nga gang byin pa de yang dag par byin/ 'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la 'byung
168a3(dkon brtsegs): brten par khas che bas/ ganga'i byang bsten pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa nyid yin la/ mu stegs byed par khas che bseng gang sbrel ba de yang dag par
168a4(dkon brtsegs): smras smin de/ smon pa'i ches rab tu shes nas ni rjes su sten pa/ sangs rgyas kyis nes rab tu shes nas ni khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/
168a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mthong nas ni don/ mu stegs rab tu zhes nas ni sgrol bu de yang mu stegs bde bas rab tu sbrel ba yin no// 'di lta ste kun tu dag khyed kyang thar pa 'dod
168a6(dkon brtsegs): po yin la/ nga yang sten pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te/ yang dag par smin pa/ yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa/ 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'byung ba mdza
168a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis/ de phyir nu ba lpags dems paskyed la/ dran pa nye bar rdzog sa/ yid 'dun par gyis la/ mthob pa'i ches rnams tha
168a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang // sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma seng pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam 'grogs par bya ba dang /
168b1(dkon brtsegs): sngan ma btsal ba'i lam bcal bar bya dang / sngon ma theb pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsom shig/ kun du rgyu dag ches gsum mngon du gyur
168b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug ces gang smras pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas khyod la bshad do// kun tu rgyu
168b3(dkon brtsegs): dag del ma zhes bya ba gang // smras pa de ni sder gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen tu gsungaso// pa zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so// dri za zhes
168b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phags pa'i tshig bla dgas so// mer mer pa zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang bzhi'o//
168b5(dkon brtsegs): mi'i ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i gzhi ste// 'di ltar ma'i mnga' na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang rgyu/
168b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la gnas rtsa ba dang shing gal ba dang / sman dang nags tshal dag skye ning 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyuraro//
168b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'phel nas skye bar 'gyur ro// btsas nas rnam par
168b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phel lo// 'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur te/ 'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes par de dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag de skyed par
169a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ 'gro ba ga dang gang nas de dang de skyes pa dang 'dra ba'i spyod par 'gyur to// de dag kyang mkhas pas zhes par bya ba yin gyi/ glen pas
169a2(dkon brtsegs): ni ma yin no// yul ring nas 'grogs 'grags pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ yul krung dus ma yin no// yang dag par sems pas zhes bya ba yin no// mi brtson pas ni ma yin no//
169a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyudag ste/ kun du rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste skad ga' po yin/ skad brtags
169a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi sA pA bya
169a5(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/ skad ljang ljang po yin/ rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ ri rgyug par mthong
169a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yan mdaga' bar bar mthong ba yin// lcags zangs kyi nang du btso bar yin/ la gnang dbyug pa thegs pa'i mingangag mthong ba yin// srin po dag gis bdag 'phangs
169a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid gnad par gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/ khyed ga gis bdag drung nga bar mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag bskor bar
169a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar min/ bdag cing grang po dang sbrul gyis gces par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir 'bras na phyogs mchis pa yin/ sems can kun la yid mi rtogs pa yin
169a9(dkon brtsegs): tekun du rgyu dag rnam pa nyi bu po 'di dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o// kun tu rgyu de dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas ni
169b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzus pa'i yang zag gi mtshan nyid 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/ le le che ba yin/ mang duza pa yin/ sa la chu rdung ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa med
169b2(dkon brtsegs): sa yin mal bar sla ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin// 'dam rdzang la dga' ba yin/ yang dang yang ses rtsa gcod pa yin/ rgyun tu rkang pa'i mthe bas san pa yin
169b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang kya gyi 'a glang ma 'dra ba yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la seMs 'debs pa yin/ kun tu rgyu bskums te nyal ba yin/ sa la nyal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas mi 'dod
169b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin yang dang mnam mkha' snyam pa yin/ yang dang yang ma smin pa za ba yin/ gzhan du smra ning gi na du byed de/ g.yo byed pa yin/ babababadu skyed pa yin/ rje 'aman
169b5(dkon brtsegs): bdas dang kyis shes par rmi lam maM ba yin// rmi lam na bdag gnas su seng ste rtsa za bar rmi ba yin/ sbrul gdugs pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid khri
169b6(dkon brtsegs): khrod du bzhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa gang zag gi mtshan ma rnams pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni
169b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa'am/ bskal ba las lhag par brjod kyang zad par mi nus so// kun tu rgyu dag de la gzhin rje'i 'jig rten na shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag
169b8(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i mig la bu yin/ rtag tu skem pa yin/ ser sna che ba yin/ 'dod chen po che ba yin/ 'thob pa mi rnying ba yin/
169b9(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu bkres pa
170a1(dkon brtsegs): gan kyil ba 'in// khrab yini ma ba yin/ bangan pa rnams pad pa srid pa sa/ bdag pa thams la chags pa sam sbyin pa'i gnas dag macang ba sa
170a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma dngos pa kun las yang de bachu ba'i sems med pa yin/ dngos pa den pa rnams la'ang dag tu ba yin/ zab pa las mas pa yod/ bas rnamamag ca bras dga' ban/ gas kyi
170a3(dkon brtsegs): kun sumatshanus pa la phrag dag byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs skyed pa skyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs sbed gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du sems pa yin/ zas gter na sems bral
170a4(dkon brtsegs): tshang 'dus kyi ma rgyas kyang zhing trog len pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag gzhin rje'i 'jig rten nas go 'bas pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag ni dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes
170a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// kun du rgyu dag de la snga ma yin las zhi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ khengs pa yin/ 'thab dkrol che ba yin/ 'khor du 'dzin pa yin/
170a6(dkon brtsegs): ngargyal che ba yin/ lus che ba yin// mig che ba yin/ mig dkar ba yin/ mche bsnang ba yin/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ thub me'i blo can yin/ dben la dga' ba yin/ b+ha ba rnams
170a7(dkon brtsegs): cad rgyal chen pa yin/ so sang ba yin/ 'jig rten thams cad la bsdus pa'i 'du shes can yin/ mtshon ma rje ba yin// tshi gan pa yin/ bdag bzed pa bstod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i
170a8(dkon brtsegs): skabs can yim/ nyin mangs pa'i skabs can yin te/ kun du dag de dag la sogs pa ni lha ma yin las ni 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o// kun du myu ga de lam
170b1(dkon brtsegs): las shi 'ams pa'i gang zag gi mcha mni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang spen pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/ dge ba byed pa ya
170b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ grags pa 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzol dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/
170b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/ byas pa gzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdu ba yin/ yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag shes pa yin/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la
170b4(dkon brtsegs): rdeg pa yin/ tshig gi mthu yod pa yin/ gres gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang / tha ba mo bya ba la mngon mkhas pa yin/ pho nya nas pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin
170b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthu yod pa yan/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin// rgyu dag de la lnga las
170b6(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mdzes pa yin/ gtsang ma spa che ba yin/ 'phel ba dga' ba yin/ spos la dga' ba yin/ gdugs la dga'
170b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mi glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngan gyis mi mgu zhing / rgya chen pos dga' yin/ rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin
170b8(dkon brtsegs): glu thams cad la dga' ba yin/ skye brten po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyim dang longs spyod rgya chen po 'i dga' ba yin
171a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems byams pasngon du 'gro ba yin/ dgod pa'i da tshul can yid/ 'jas pa smra ba men/ dga' bal mkhas pa yin// rgyan sa dga' ba la/
171a2(dkon brtsegs): tsha ba'i ngang tshul lan yin/ lus kyi zhugs 'byin pa'i nga nul ducan yin/ chags pa'i mtshan ma dang michags bu'i mngan mashes pa yin/ phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yinan
171a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rtswa mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtha'is nas pa 'phos pa'i gang zag shes par bya'o// phun drungadag dadog las yang dag pa 'das pa bya ba'i phyir/ rigs hUM ba
171a4(dkon brtsegs): mas kyi mdag gis de bzhin zhes garten gang dag lus 'da' bar bya ba'i blo nas ldan par byed ba den bu'i dge 'i gra rnams la bangon par bri ba bsnyen pa ra
171a5(dkon brtsegs): ngal sems can dmyal ba nas kaM 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir 'gyur ba'i ni/ zhe sdang yongs su bstan pas de snang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas de/
171a6(dkon brtsegs): byalas des sems can dmyal bar smras te/ de'i phyir de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa rnyed nas// sems can dmyal ba'i skyid pa can dri gyur pas/ de'i mi'i nang du skyes te sbreng pa'i
171a7(dkon brtsegs): gas 'di dag rdzas nas ji bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'bas pa'i zhes bdag kyis zhes par byacing / des sems can dmyal ba'i las r+b+ba spangs pa'i byer
171a8(dkon brtsegs): dge pa'i shes garten 'tshal bar byaste/ des dag pa'i gzhes gnyen de dag ge sdang gi garten par byams pason to// byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang nub kyi phyogs kyi rnams dang /
171b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spen pa// des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur te/ de byams pa chen po bgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
171b2(dkon brtsegs): sems cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe/ gti mug la yongs su bsten pas des
171b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas/ de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir de dung 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi
171b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong po can du gyur pas/ de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te ma'i nang du skyes kyang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod par gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni dud 'gre'i
171b5(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas nas nye 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/
171b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bgos gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de las dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug gi spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ston to// des kyang dri
171b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi bag lal spang bar 'gyur ro// yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid spen te// des de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
171b8(dkon brtsegs): shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// kun durgyu dag de la gzhin rje'i 'jig rten nas ni 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngun mir gyur ba'i che/ ser sA la kun tu na

172a6(dkon brtsegs): des sems byas pa rlol tu phyin pa drug yang su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun tu r+b+ha dag de la lham yin las zhi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ srin mi gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsab rgya chen pa
172a7(dkon brtsegs): ras kyang mngo du byas la/ ngargyal yang yongs su bsten pas/ deng rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa da
172a8(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa des lham yin du smras te/ lha ma yin gyi nang na gnas pades lam yin gyi skyed pa can du gyur pas// dem ma yin las ni 'das de ma'i nang skyes kyang / sam ma
172b1(dkon brtsegs): slod dang 'gyur te/ des spyad pa de dag gis bdag ni lA ma yin nas shi 'phos pa'o// zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'angan pa

172b3(dkon brtsegs): dris kyang nga'i rgyalnga sring bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la stong pa nyid spen te/ des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag lanyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// yang na ji ltar bya ba
172b4(dkon brtsegs): blabyung ba rnams tshigs pa las byung ba'i tshul ston te/ des de'i nga rgyal gyis bag la nyal ba spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la chos rnams kyis mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/
172b5(dkon brtsegs): des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i
172b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i che/ yang dag bcu'i las kyi lam la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas des las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par
172b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pas mir skyes te/ de me'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pa/ de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang
172b8(dkon brtsegs): mi'i skyed pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyad pa dag gis bdag ni mi'i nang du shi 'phos te skyes pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des mi'i spyod pa de dag la
173a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste de dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston to// des kyang

174a8(dkon brtsegs): ngas su brdud pa dang / gang la de kun nas/ langs pa dang / gang de spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba de yang mi dmigs te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su gzung bas bdag dang /
