299'b2(dkon brtsegs): so// mo'u ga la de'i tshe glang po che'i bdag po des bdag nyid lus rlabs kyi steng du nyel te zam pa byas nas glang po che lnga brgya rgyab kyi steng du brdzis nas/ de nas rgal te dong ngo // glang
299'b3(dkon brtsegs): po che mang po bzlas nas/ bdag nyid kyi mthus mchongs pa byas te song ba dang / de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sdig can rlabs zab brkos gyur kyang /
299'b4(dkon brtsegs): glang bdag blo ldan gyis// bdag dang gzhan gyis bzlas pas na// don med rlabs zab brkos 'gyur ba// mo'u gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po dbang po rno zhing
299'b5(dkon brtsegs): mthu chen po dang ldan par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de ni nga yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che lnga brgya byung ba de dag ning ltar gyi dge slong lnga brgya po lus
299'b6(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis gzhig par byas pas brtsams pa dag yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon par gyur pa de ni lhas byin la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya po 'di lta ste/ khar+d+ha bya dang // ta mor
299'b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / shisha d+ha mtsho byin dang / ko ka li ka la sogs pa yin no// mo'u gal nga ni yun ring po nas rtag par sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams mthong bar gyur na/ de dag la ma
299'b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa byin no// sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na bde ba byin no// sems can dbul 'phongs padag la ni zang zing yongs su gtang ngo // sems can gang lam
300a1(dkon brtsegs): log par zhugs padag la ni yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// sems glang nad kyis gzir bdag la ni nad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su bsal to// sems
300a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang bkres shing skom pa rnams la ni bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su btang ngo // sems can gang sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba dag la ni/ lus kyi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas so// moH
300a3(dkon brtsegs): galang ni smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas pas/ ngas sems can rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang / sgrom las med par byas te/ mo 'u gal
300a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas sems bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la tha dad par gyur pa ci
300a5(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag le lo dang snyoms las kyis bar chad byas par gyur na/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/
300a6(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ mo'u gal nga ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no// thugs rje chen po'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
300a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i skye 'dus pa de cing du dge slong glang po che'i lag ces bya ba zhig/ 'dus te 'jug par gyur pa'i stan las langs te/ thugs blag pa gcig tu gapar nas/ bus ma gams na
300a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs la zugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhi gshegs pa las dka' ba myong pa'i /
300b1(dkon brtsegs): po 'di ga zos pas/ lus kyi sku yang ldang zhing mchi ma byung bar gyur to// deng bdag gis dngos po gcig par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di skad du ngas sngon byang chub sem
300b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe/ ji skad sbas pa bzhin du skyong la/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no zhes gsungs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ni dang po thugs bskyed pa nas/ sems cam
300b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam pazhes pa lags te/ gal te de lta bu'i thugs dam pazhes par gyur pa lags na/ nga ltar yongs su bzla bar mdzad pa'i sems can dung mi bas
300b4(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ gal te 'ga' mchis nas/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyed kyi
300b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po sngon sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam bzhes so zhe na/ sems can dung ma zang par bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa/ de ci'i phyir
300b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ dgrol ba zhig mchis par gyur na/ de la ji sad dulan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong glang po che'i lag pa la bka' stsal pa/ gas
300b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig de skad du dgol ba zhig yod par gyur na/ de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig/ khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la sems can yin par 'dod/ des gal te 'di
300b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dbyung po dang / sri mched dang / khams gang yin pa de dag la sems can min par 'dong zhes par na/ de nyid la spar 'di sang du dris zhig ci'i phung po dang / skye mched dang /
301a1(dkon brtsegs): khams 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems can yin par 'dod dam/ 'on te bral zhing gyes par gyur pa la sems can yin par 'dod// des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang /
301a2(dkon brtsegs): mched dang / khams 'dus pa la sems can yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod bdag nyid kyis lan btab zin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus pa ni sems
301a3(dkon brtsegs): can yin la/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams ni sems can ma yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa yang bral zhing gyes par bya'i ched du gsungs pa yin gyi/ tshogs
301a4(dkon brtsegs): shing 'dus pa'i phyir ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das ni bral zhing gyes pa'i spong ba la dgyes pa yin gyi/ 'dus shing 'tshogs pa la dgyes pa ma yin te/ 'tshogs zhing 'dus pa la sems
301a5(dkon brtsegs): can med pas so// des gal te 'di skad du phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams nyid sems can yin no zhes zer na/ de la slar 'di skad du smos shig/ gal te de ltar na rtsa dang / shing dang /
301a6(dkon brtsegs): gyo modong / rdob thams cad kyang sems can yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams nyid sems can yin no// zhes zer la/ de dag la yang
301a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / skyem ched dang // khams yod pas so// des gas te 'di sang du de dag la sems cad med/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang med pa'i phyir/ sems can ma yin na na/
301a8(dkon brtsegs): zer na/ del 'di skad ces smos shig/ gal te de sbyar na sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas phung po dang /
301b1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang / khams dag la tha dad pa yod par mi gsung bas so// des gal te 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las sems can yong bar gsungs pas/ de'i phyir sems
301b2(dkon brtsegs): can yod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyed nyid kyis lam btab zin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las yod pa dang med pa las dben pa zhes
301b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas so// des gal te de wA 'o na ni lam gyi 'bras bu yang med par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du khyod kyis gang zhig la 'bras bu yin par 'dod ces dris shig/ nges
301b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'di skad du bdag ni don ngas par nges par gyur pa gang yin pa de la 'bras bu yin par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skang du rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa'i ni ska dang tshigazeng
301b5(dkon brtsegs): la sgra dang tshig med pa la ni nges par yod ce'am/ med ces brjod du med pas/ khyod kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la 'bras bu yin par 'dod la/ rnam par nges pa'i nga
301b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa la ni sems can yang med/ sems can gyi ming med pas/ de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can yod do zhes gang sbas pa'i tshig de rang nyid kyis bshig pa yin no zhes smos
301b7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ gzhan yang glang po'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las chos rnams 'gag pa med pa gsungs pa yang sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pa yin te/ ngas de ltar
301b8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pas/ ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i chos rnams sems can la mngon par zhen pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / spos pa
302a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med cing 'byung ba med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no// glang po che'i lag gis de ltar ngas bstan pa'i rna
302a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi don shes pa des ci yod pa'i ched du las kyi spyod pa slong bar mi byed do// gang gis yod pa dang / med pa'i ched du las kyi spyong pa med spong ba des da ltar sems can yod/
302a3(dkon brtsegs): padang / sems can med par mthong bar gyur te/ glang po che'i lag 'di ni rten par chos rnams rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi chen nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la ni rjes su dran gyi
302a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kyi rnam par rtag pa yang med/ dri ma yang med/ yongs su dag pa yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ lam yang med/ lam gyi 'bras bu yang med/ ring po
302a5(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ zung ngu yang med/ gru bzhi yang med/ zlum po yang med/ dbyibs kyang med/ kha dog kyang med pas/ de'i phyir chos rnams kyi sgo gcig kho na ste 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin
302a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgo zhes bstan pa yin no// glang po ni'i lag 'din chos kyi sgo mthong ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis chos mthong ba'i sgor zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// glang dotshe/
302a7(dkon brtsegs): pag 'di rjemamadu sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur bas chos sa 'gags pa dang / 'gag par dang / 'gags par 'gyur ba'i 'gag pa'i mtshan cingag
302a8(dkon brtsegs): min ma ma mam/ bcom ldan de ni ma lags so// 'di'i sum du sems/ chos gang gis sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i chos de ni skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar gyur pa'i sre 'i
302b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig sen snyam mam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// glang po che'i lug gal te de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'gag pa ma bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dang
302b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// glang po che'i lag des gal te 'di skad du sla'i mtshan dang ldan pas/ bdag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par zhugs nas/ skyer ldog par rmi
302b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes sbas pa yang / sru'i mtshan nyid phyir mi ldog par mthong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gags pa zhes bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du dris shig/ ci khyod spu'i mtsha dza
302b4(dkon brtsegs): su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod dam/ des gal te 'di skad du/ bdag ni su'i mtshan nyid yongasu grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod do zhes zer na
302b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad du smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab las ni sku'i mtshan nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan nyid yang de bzhin
302b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yin no zhes brjod na ni/ gyo mo dang rdo ba dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyur ro// des gal te 'di skad gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ring
302b7(dkon brtsegs): klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mi bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smos shig/ khyod kyis smras pa
302b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ltar ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par rigs/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor lo
303a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i rgyal po yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa so// des gal te 'di skad du mtshan ni can gyi chos la 'jug par gyur pas/ mtshan shes pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas/
303a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de dben pas so zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smos shig/ gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni/ khyod bdag nyid kyi
303a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
303a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'od cig/ des gal te 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dadu/ ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang /
303a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa de ga shegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston te zhes zer na/ de la 'di sad du smos nig// khyod /
303a6(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcul sogs pa ning bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid mon// zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ri la bu yin pa shod cis/ des gal te 'di nang du rtsis /
303a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang / mnan dadu bzhig yinan ma shes pa na/ dengs 'dig du kying cing macan nyid sus rgyas min zhes ze ba rang gyi/ mdza shi ni sangs rgyamams nas rnas nga/ ras pa
303a8(dkon brtsegs): teya 'di na du byings med cing // bdog med pa'i chos gzhan nigs sa rgyas stongs bcul sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med par 'gyur ma zhes na/ des 'dis dadu smos shig dbyings mod kyi/
303b1(dkon brtsegs): khadag ridapa'i chos ji snang dbyings dang bcas shing / khadog dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur/ gzhan mang khyod sdegal te dbyings med cing kha dog med pa'i chos lasangs rgyas zhes bya /
303b2(dkon brtsegs): mdza ni gzhad dbyabs med cing ba dag med pa'i chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas yin par gyur pa dren so// gam tatam de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyu nas spongs brgya sa/ mi 'gas pa bzheng
303b3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang de'i mtshan nyid med par gyur
303b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rig so zhes brjod par bya'o// glang po che'i lag nga'i nyan thos rnams ni de ltar skyes bu blun po rnams rab tu gdul bar byed do// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bla na med pa yang ngag
303b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas na/ seMs can thos cad yongasu mya ngan lnga bzla bar bya'o// zhes smon la tab pa mod kyi/ dbyang chub kyi snying po la 'dug na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
303b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas pa na seMs can yang ma da mig/ sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ ngabyang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel ba 'byung ba'i yan lag sa
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi pa'i chos dang po 'di yod pa'i phyir/ dngango po 'di yod/ dngos po 'di med pa'i phyir dngos po 'di med par rtog pa kho nar za // dang po gang yod pa'i phyir/ dngo po gang yod/ dngango po gang med pa'i phyir/ dngos po gang
303b8(dkon brtsegs): pAgyur ce na/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa rkyen gyi 'du byed nas yod pa gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyi rnaM pa bye ba/ rnaM pA shre ba'i rkyen gyi ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyi skye mched drug/ skye mched drugi rkyen gyi rdereg pa/ re ga pa'i rkyen gyi rlo
304a1(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi/ rga shi'i rkyen gyis mya ngan dang
304a2(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams yod par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'a bcwa
304a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gags pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzun
304a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pa'i phyir/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pa'i phyir/ sred
304a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pa'i phyir/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pa'i phyir/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pa'i b+hir/ rga ni 'gag/
304a6(dkon brtsegs): rga shi 'gag pa'i phyir/ mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po
304a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// nga de las mig dang ye shes dang rig pa dang / blo skyes pas/ 'di ltar dbus dang / tha ma med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam
304a8(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba rab tu rtogs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos gnan yang gang yang thab par gyur pa med kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen las/
304b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i chos dmigs pa khanar zad de// glang ba che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar tshas rnams rab tu rtags pasad de bzhin du/ sems can rnams la yang dag par
304b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'gyur ba med par
304b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gnas par 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang sbyor bar mi 'gyur la/ phan tshun 'gal ba yang med 'byung ba lang med do// glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar
304b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pas/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o// ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyad kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par
304b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ glang po che'i lag snyan pa chen pos slob ma rnams la gang bya ba'i rigs pa de dgangs ma lus par byas zer bas/ khyud kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon
304b6(dkon brtsegs): par sgrubs nas/ chos rnams las ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gza rba tsa/
304b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na/ su nig lam ston par 'gyur/
304b8(dkon brtsegs): lam snyan pa med pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas 'di yang
305a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad mangs su ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o zhes mchin/ de la ji skad du lan gangab bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
305a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri ba yong na/ de la 'di skad du lan gdab par bya'o// de bzhin pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun
305a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang shes shing mthong la/ rtag pa sems can bzla ba'i phyir la zhes pas yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur kyang / da rung phan pa mdzar ba yin to// de'i phyir gnam
305a4(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas/ de nyid
305a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gdang bas cing rgyun mi gcad par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin
305a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa
305a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyad cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhim gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes brjod
305a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi chos thams ca
305b1(dkon brtsegs): yangs sa tshal ba la chags par thugs chung pa lags te chas thams cad legs par thugs su chung ba'i skang du/ spu dang gasrung dang / thugs kyi zi las mkhyen
305b2(dkon brtsegs): sman dra gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'bras pas na/ bcom ldan 'das sngan byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyad pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mdzad //
305b3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad mdzad pa bzhin du gsud par gyur ba ni shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhin no//
305b4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin te/ glang po che'i lag khyad kyis ji skad smras bzhin du nga ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyad cing /
305b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras par gyur pa yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas/
305b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can la phan 'dogs pas lha dang bde ba la 'god pa dang / thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i
305b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu phyin nas/ da dung ma rgal ba dag yongs su zlos zer ba la/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
305b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das nga yin no zhes sba ba gang len pa de ni yang dag par sba bas sla ba yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ su zhes bcu
306a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed cing / bya ba byas pa'i drin zo ba yin zhes zer ba la de ni nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems
306a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang la la ni gang la byang chub zang cig byas pa'i dngos po de yang chud zad par mi 'gyur ro// glang po che'i la gang ni dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
306a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun cad/ bar der nam yang sems la ldog cing gyur pa yang med la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen
306a4(dkon brtsegs): cing mos par gyur par yang dog par rjes su mi dran dus chos de thos nas sems rtse gcig tu 'khor rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba la gzud par 'dun
306a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa kho nar zad // glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ da mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i tshe shes rab gsal zhing rno la/ mang du thos
306a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze gnon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i zhes
306a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mthong zhing / rab tu byung ba'i phan lon mthong nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ lam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thang du 'angs
306a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ngas chos bstan pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing / sems la rang dbang thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang/
306b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu zhugs se
306b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms blangs nas nga la rim 'gro byas so// nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'dzi
306b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mchod pa blang ba mi rigs so snyam du sems par gyur to// drang srong de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir/ de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang / ngas thos pa
306b4(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pas/ chos de thob par bya zhing / mngon sum du mi bya ba'i phyir/ nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to// glang po che'i lag des nan tan brtsam
306b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus bskyed nas/ chos de mngon du byas pa'i tshe/ gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te/ mngon du lung bstan/ nga la 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la mngon par
306b6(dkon brtsegs): zhen par mi byed cig/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can tshad med/ dpag tu med pa
306b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs su zlos par 'gyur ro zhes bzlar// glang po che'i lagang de'i tshe/ de skad bsgo ba thos nas/ lam bskam pa btang bas/ sems mchog tu dga'
306b8(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par gyur nas/ zla ba byed kyi bar du dben par 'dug pa'i tshe/ dga' bas lus kun du khyab par gyur to// glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa'
307a1(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing / rab tu dga' sems kyang thob par gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
307a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub thob par rig par 'gyur ro// ba ni gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas/ gzhan dag
307a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems bskyed par bskul ba yin/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong / phrag dog kyang mi byed la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag
307a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems pa yin/ sems can nyes pa spyod pa dag la dus su rjes su 'dems shing
307a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bzang pos gtam smras nas/ de dag gi dge ba yongs su srung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyi chos rnams rgya cher gnyer
307a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhan dag la bskur ras/ ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa
307a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/ bdag nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur par rig par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
307a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan sems kyis// bla med theg la rab
307b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing // sems can dag kyang bskul zas nas// theg pa de la dgod par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba spong ba'i tshe// rtag par zag dog khang khri med// nan
307b2(dkon brtsegs): tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sems can sdig spyar mthong gyur na// 'du shes rjes su 'dems par byed// rtag par
307b3(dkon brtsegs): dang snying rjer ldan// zang zla dag ni med pa yin// rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas// sems can rnams la spel bar byed// ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar/
307b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis thams cad tshim par byed// chos pa ni 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas grub 'gyur bas// the tshom sems ni ma bskyed ces// lha rnams kyis
307b5(dkon brtsegs): ni go bar byed/ byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par byed// dngas pa 'di ni des bden pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas
307b6(dkon brtsegs): sa 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ brtson 'grus dang ni sman lam dang // dran pa dang ni shes rab dag/ bdag nyid rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur
307b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te de banin gshegs pa rnams/ 'jig rten du ni 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di 'dra'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ gang zag/
307b8(dkon brtsegs): chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing / rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // thams cad sems ni ra ba dga' zhing / lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur/ bstan
308a1(dkon brtsegs): bcos gtsug lag tshig dang don/ tshig 'bru tshigs bcang rtsis dang grangs// de dag thams cad legs rtogs pas/ sems cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/
308a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rno zhing shes rab ldan// bya ba stobs la mi bltos par// thabs dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gis// thams cad yongs su grub par nus// dgra rnams rab tu 'dul
308a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang // lus kyi no sha mi bltos par// shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis// rang gi sems ni 'dul bar byed// sems can rab tu brtse ba'i phyir// 'jig rten
308a4(dkon brtsegs): du ni skyes pas na// rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang smra bas na// de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig
308a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir de ltar rig ce na// bdag sems shes zhes sems phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu/ sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas na// der song chos ni rab nus nas
308a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs/ sangs rgyas zhus lan gsungs pas na// the tshom dag ni nad par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas// thams
308a7(dkon brtsegs): cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstar nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar khrong ston pas/ de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// sems ni dga'
308a8(dkon brtsegs): bathob par 'gyur/ shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang // myi nang kun la chags med pas// de phyir dga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par shes/
308b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa mas// bzang pa rgya nam thab pas na// dbyer dga' ba chen pa yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas grub par shes// tsas rnams srams
308b2(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas shing / chos bstan mi rung rig pas na// de 'dra'i shes rab thob 'gyur nas// lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur// de'i sems ni nang mi gnas/
308b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol na yang mi gnas te// 'du shes thams cad 'das pa na// de phyir bzod pa bla med 'thob// yun rings byams dang snying rje yis/ sems can kun la sems
308b4(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ dbyer bsod nams de la dbang // sangs rgyas chad med mthong bar 'gyur// de yi lus ni thams cad kun/ sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med/ de 'dra'i badz+ra
308b5(dkon brtsegs): pa thob pas na// chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/ su zhig rjes su sla ba mi byed// rab brtan dam chos gang gnas pa//
308b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lam ni gnyer ba dag/ rtag par nan tan chos gnyer bya/ chos kyi bdag gi khe btsal nas/ byang chub la ni phan
308b7(dkon brtsegs): gdags bya// brgal ba'i lan btab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu dang
308b8(dkon brtsegs): bas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dris na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chas rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu/
309a1(dkon brtsegs): brtan par gnas par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ nga ni yun ri
309a2(dkon brtsegs): po nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi ngan 'di nyid rab tu gsal ba
309a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos ni gang dang gang zab pa// de ni sangs rgyas lam nig yin// rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa// chos ma yin paspang pa
309a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rtag tu yang dag lam spyod pa// log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams la rtag sten pa// de ni lam la sten par 'gyur/ de na mi kham rnams spangs nas/
309a5(dkon brtsegs): kham ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur// kham ldan gnas ni thob 'gyur na// brtson 'grus brtsams pa chung mi za// gnas gnyis su ni mchog tu btsun/ kha dag gzugs ni
309a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'gyur// g.yog 'khor dag ni pun tshogs shing / thams cad kun kyis mchog tu 'gyur/ brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag ni// chug khrims bzod pa'i phyogs lagan
309a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus byugs la ra ba gnas shing / bsam gtan shes rab 'bol bar byed// rtag tu sems can thams cad ky-i// sa samachag dag ni byed par 'gyur/
309b1(dkon brtsegs): yan tan kun gyis mchag zlar bar// ngan rag 'jigs pa'i yang med// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang bas da can gsapa // bcus
309b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de// bdag cag ni sngon dang pa nas le la can dgyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba mchis
309b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa mngon par yid ches pa mchis pas na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par 'byung
309b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa lags so// snyam sems pa lags ma// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni des slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzeng bstad cing / spo ba bskyed nas
309b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la dgod par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang
309b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos rba sha stag mdzad de de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang /
309b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na/ sems can gzhan lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal bas sa// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po de dag ni/ byang
309b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shin du
310a1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i dngos po de lta bu chang ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de
310a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can
310a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs su bzla bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis
310a4(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smra ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams
310a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thams cad kyi
310a6(dkon brtsegs): ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu dka' ba tshad med/ dpag tu med/ grangs med padang
310a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / klu dang / than
310a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' ning yid ches pas mngon par bsnyad do//
310b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa dkan mchog brtsegs pa chen pa'i mang snang zag brgya pa las/ gang ba'i 'dus pa te/ 'dus pa
310b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun rdzogs so// @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya raswa pA la pa ri br-i ts+tsha na ma ma hA lA na sU tra/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa yul 'khar snang gis nus pa zhes bya ba theg
310b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
310b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kha ba na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong snang nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga sdang thams cad kyang spobs pa
310b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa/ bzang pa thab pa bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bzungs
310b6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
310b7(dkon brtsegs): nas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha sta ga la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun tu mig dang kun tu lnga
310b8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'ad gzir dang kun tu kun tu'ang dang / blams mchag dang blo zas 'dil dang / blazas mtha' las dang / bla bram rgya tshon dang / blo gros mi bzang pa dag sa na
311a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par bla gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam
311a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal la sogs pa'i sems dpa' dpe' med drug cu dang / bzang skyong la stsogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin
311a3(dkon brtsegs): dang lha'i bu mtshan bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po dang mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang /
311a4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khar brgya snang du ma yong ba thams cad dang / 'khar de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang
311a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs cig du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po seng ge'i khril bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par/
311a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags/ nyim ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad snang bar ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya byin ltar
311a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra ni bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni stod/
311a8(dkon brtsegs): mo'i phung po chen po lngar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i skra dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar
311b1(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu 'bar zhing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas don tu rnam par nges pa chos thams ca
311b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor nang du bzhugs shing / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi sgra bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang / ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos
311b3(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/
311b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyu po zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dus
311b5(dkon brtsegs): pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas/ shin
311b6(dkon brtsegs): lhang der bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul
311b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag
311b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas gzigs langs kyis/ zil nam khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal// rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa// lhun pa lho mi tshogs kyi gnas lta bus/
312a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje'i mtsho yi dbus su de bzhugs te// 'ad gzer stong phrag brgya dga'/ byed pa mdzad// tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i
312a2(dkon brtsegs): mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar/ bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du/
312a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis smras pa ye shes yon tan phyag/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal/ gling ba ni mi bdag po snang
312a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar/ 'jigs pa'i lam du 'dzum pa rab mdzad cing / thugs rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzad/ mkha'
312a5(dkon brtsegs): la nyi ma lham me tha le ba/ nor bu me 'od mog mag byed 'di ltar/ nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od/ sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal/ dri med zla ba nam
312a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi grang gsal ltar/ shin tu rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal/ rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra/ kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/ ji ltar ri ba'i
312a7(dkon brtsegs): zom la me 'bar ba/ mtshan mo mnyal tsam na kun snang ltar/ gti mug mun pa ma lus btsam nas ni// drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'ang kyang gsal// med po
312a8(dkon brtsegs): sul bstan pa'i sgra sbags cing / sa la ri dgas cha gas rnams sgrogs bgyi ltar/ mi dbang spong ba bdag med gsung skrag cing / pha rol mu stegs can rnams sbas
312b1(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// nang bu'i rgyal ba bzang po bzi brjid 'bar// nar bu thams cad zil nan lAm me ltar/ rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mngaga'ang zhing / 'gro kun zil gyis
312b2(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas lham me bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma yin/ lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur/ bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus
312b3(dkon brtsegs): thabs rnams dang // man tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ mi'i dpa' bo 'gro la lham me ba/ mgon po yon tan rje mtsho dpag gis mthong / gus pa skyes
312b4(dkon brtsegs): shing dga' rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthal la bdag gis gtugs/ yon tan kun gyis 'byung gnas 'jig rten sngon/ grags pa nam mkha' rgya chen
312b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs mnga' la// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams dam pa 'dir/ 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
312b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ thal ma sbyar te/ mig gnyis mi 'dzums par de
312b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lha/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par spyod/ zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag mi nus pa/
312b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par spong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
313a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su dam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa la ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul
313a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom
313a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa na nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'/ mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la rims/
313a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni 'jug de bzhin gces
313a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku/ zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad la mngon tu phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyin pa'i
313a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam par spyad cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal ba
313a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi smra bar 'dug par gyur te/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lal 'khar srang mnyan yang dra dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba bsum 'as nas/ cham pas b+h+yas
313a8(dkon brtsegs): nas chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang / tshes gas thos te// dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring bar ma lan bdag dang / lhas
313b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis bral zla brgya dang / rnal ba'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pa gsal ba dang / bya nad kyi phung pa'i rig la bde sa mdzad// de nas rgyadang ldan pa 'alal ba byung
313b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mag bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
313b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khar srung gis thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskrad de// mi mchog 'ang mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal la/
313b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phrag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// sring gsum mthar byon thub la phrag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bye ba
313b5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'bram kun tu yang / 'dren pa dag ni khyad kyi bsngags pa gsungs/ rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing // yan tan rgya mtsha thub pa'i chog tu mchi/
313b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas// de dag khyad kyi yon tan 'phreng brjod cing // yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du
313b7(dkon brtsegs): mchi byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na/ khyad kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/ sems can rnams kyi ched du spyad//
313b8(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod/ 'dren pa khyod kyis sprin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab thabs kyi dbang gis pha rol gshegs
314a1(dkon brtsegs): des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang / mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs/ sems
314a2(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs/ mnyam med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las byung dang /
314a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol ma gyur// de ni bcom ldan mi'i mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spang // gang gis sems can ngan song
314a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum mchi dang / gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i lam/ 'gro ba legs pa bgyis dang nings bgyis mkhyen/ 'gro ba par mdzad gang dag 'das rnams
314a5(dkon brtsegs): dang da ltar lha dang mi yis mchod sems dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen/ dag pa'i zhing dang bran
314a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum tshogs 'khod dang // byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang nyan thos dang / drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad/ rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen
314a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang / rgyal ba'i srid pa mchog pa ci 'dra dang / der ni chos mdzad 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba/ de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen/
314a8(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum rnams gsum rtag par stobs bcu yin/ me zhes mkhyen pa sgrib pa ma mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun lathugs ni chags mi mnga'/ phyag 'cha
314b1(dkon brtsegs): bral ba ma zhes mtsha khyud la/ khrung dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis gal lhag/ skar sa rnams kyis nam mkha' sbas paltar/ mdun rnams kyis grangs ra
314b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi/ lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid/
314b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lnga li gnas/ khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags/ khyad ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'/ dbu zla mo 'jam zhing g.yas su
314b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil bar gnas/ lhun po rgyal po lta bu spyi gtsug 'phags/ bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lha mer bzhugs/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing
314b5(dkon brtsegs): khyad kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes/ 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa/ spyan ni ut+pa la 'dra zhing yid du mchi/ zla nya dri med mkha' la jilta
314b6(dkon brtsegs): bar rnam 'dren khyod gi zhal ni lham me ste/ lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/ zhal bzangs mi'i phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dang pa ma bya ri dgas rgyal
314b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi skabs/ gleng ba rmugs pa la~M gyis michis pas kyos/ sa rnams g.yo bar mang cing rab gshegs po/ snrubs bcu brtul tshugs brtan la phyag 'tsha
314b8(dkon brtsegs): wa phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum mdzes pa/ sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas smras/ bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha dar reg cing sleb/ sku mdog gser 'dra chud
315a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phyag 'tshal la/ 'khor lo bkrabs khyab pa'i nabs 'dar bas/ sa steng ri mong ma dzad cing rab tu gshegs/ nabs kyi 'ad gzer gyis rnam
315a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa'o// mi rnams bum nas lha'i 'jig rten mchi/ chos kyi rgyal ba nor bdun sprin chen po/ chos kyi rgyal po dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston
315a3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ bsam pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims na dang shes rab thabs kyi mnga'/ de mos skye mched 'phel bar
315a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa yis// nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par 'gyur/ rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/ grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grol/ bde
315a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba/ bde bar rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston/ gang na skye dang 'ching ba ma mchis shing / 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung
315a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba/ gnas mchog ni pa 'dus ma bag+h+nAMs pa te/ thugs rje snying nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ chos kun dbang gis pha rol gshegs pargyal/
315a7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bdud pa/ bdag gis 'di ma bsod nams gang bsags des/ 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya shog/ de nas ched
315a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bral mo sbyar te/ sman las langs te/ bla gas phrag pa gcig tu
315b1(dkon brtsegs): gab te/ bras ma galas pa'i ljangs la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde lags su thal ba sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sang ces gas
315b2(dkon brtsegs): gal te nus nas nu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa yang dag par rdzog
315b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag blugs 'ga' zhig nu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khar srung la ci dang sa 'dod pa dris shig
315b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pa/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsal to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dra dang ldan na/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khud thub par 'gyur/ gnan
315b6(dkon brtsegs): la rag mkhas pa'i shes pa thob/ myed pa'i shes rab thob/ spobs pa rnam par nges pa thob/ snang ba thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug lam dang / sems
315b7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/ sems can 'jud pa la mkhas
315b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po dag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang //
316a1(dkon brtsegs): nu ba thams cad grub pa dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
316a2(dkon brtsegs): skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad par des/ yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'gyur yang / ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchi
316a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam nges pa/ mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lnga bu/ sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bstsags pa/
316a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags/ byang chub spyong mchog dri med deng bdag gsung / gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/ ye shes mi zad ji ltar
316a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur/ gang gis skye bo dgas pa bcod par 'gyur// zhes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa mang po ni/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal
316a6(dkon brtsegs): nyen la lta bgyid pa/ spro ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed ces/ de dag don dge ston par 'gyur/ dag pa'i ning dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / che mchog dang ni phun sumachog
316a7(dkon brtsegs): bcing / sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang / byang chub spyang badri med bzhad du gsol/ bdud 'jom sa mdzad pa ltang masnang bas/ med pa brgal ba rnam
316a8(dkon brtsegs): reg mdzad pa/ chos kyi tshul yang bskrad par mi 'gyur bar/ sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol/ gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum tshogs/ snu
316b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung gis 'khang rnams tshim mdzad pa/ bde gshegs smin ltar 'grol mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas spyong yul legs par bstan du gsol/ ka la bid+ma'i snga skar bzung
316b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis b+hA nang na rab 'jig pa/ chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khar rnams lngag lags kyis/ gtso bo bdud rtsi ro las tshim mdzad mdzad/ byang chub
316b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis/ chos la 'dran pa zlog pa'i mi rigs te/ 'dren pa bstan mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags/ rin can dam pa bsgrub 'dus la bab/ thub pa
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis/ bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen/ rgyal ba btso bring ma lags don tu gnyer/ spyod pa dam pa legs par bshadad gsal
316b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khar spyang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khar spyod legs so legs sa/ yul 'kha
316b6(dkon brtsegs): spyong khyad skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khar skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / par dang / da ltar dang /
316b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzungs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa leg pa/
316b8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong khyad de byor/ legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad / bcom ldan 'das legs so/ zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa
317a1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa te/ yul 'khor srung byang chub ses/
317a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bani dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di thob po// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang /
317a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgoms pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin bsam pa theg pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa/ byang chub lam las/
317a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog yin pa// g.yo med tha ba med cing rgyu med pa// ye shes mtha' dang ldan la de dag yod// skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal
317a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas ni// med pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bral ba'i phyir/ de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor// nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa// bra cig pa bzhin 'gro ba nas
317a7(dkon brtsegs): la lta// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes// gang zag mchog gis bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khang du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems
317a8(dkon brtsegs): can mad ma yin// 'dus byas sbrum rmi lam 'dra ba la// byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag ji skad cig sbas po// de la nan tan byed cing kun tudan/
317b1(dkon brtsegs): dral zhing ni la rtag tu ston rnams spangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dpa'// yul 'khar snang ban pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ci dbugs zin
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bathob pa ste/ bzhi gong zhe na/ gzungs thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyen pa dang / ches zab mo bzod pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag pa
317b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la chos nyid 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad
317b4(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung ba'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba// gzungs rnams grags pa chen de dag gis rtag tu thob// rnam yang cung zar mi 'gyur ba'i
317b5(dkon brtsegs): zla gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pa rol byin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge bo'i bzhes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren pa smra
317b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la sten pa ma yin te// tshig byed bdag nyid med ltar de dag ring du rnam par sbas// dpa' bo stong pa
317b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ldan pa'i za ba mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan// sangs
317b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas tshul khrims bla myed sems can rnams kyang sbyar// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khang pa rnams dga' bar byed pa rnam
318a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor snang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ban 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / lu
318a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor stong rjes su mthur pa'i chos thos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ban 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor snang bdag pa thams cad yongs su
318a3(dkon brtsegs): gtor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems
318a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'khor ba na 'khad pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed
318a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/ rdzogs pa'i sangs
318a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshal tshe na sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal
318a7(dkon brtsegs): po de// 'dren pa dam pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsams pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu spyod// dmigs med chos thos chos
318a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang // 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyid mi ste/ de ni bdag pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med// slong mnye bar/
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul dang 'khor dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong zhing de'i sems ni gang tu 'ang g.yo ba med// yul
318b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor snang byang chub sems dpa' chas bani la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang /
318b3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung byang chub sems dpa' chos ban po/ rnyed pa dang / bkur stil lta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor spyad byang chub sems dpa' khrim la 'dris par bla
318b4(dkon brtsegs): la blta bar mi zla ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' lus dang sreg la blta bar mi bya ste/ yul 'khor srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag
318b5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// snron gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi lta// yon tan ldan
318b6(dkon brtsegs): banges pa de dag dgran par dga' zhing dbang po dral// de dag gang du yang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dres me byed// bse ltar gcig pu gnas shing bsam
318b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dri med dag la mi 'bral// de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma tho ba yid rnam med// 'dad pa chung ste ngan don cham la dga' zhing sna dang tshul chos grang
318b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can don brir brtson 'grus yid ldan sprin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyen bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol byin/
319a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lnga sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnams spangs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bur bcad kyang de dag
319a2(dkon brtsegs): sems la g.yo' ba med// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir tsam// yul 'khor skyong bani po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtu
319a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par byed pa'i chos te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ yul 'khor stong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khar snang
319a4(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang mthun par byed pa/ byung
319a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i
319a6(dkon brtsegs): chos te/ bral 'khor stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med pa'i chos so// de la 'di chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas
319a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // de dgang ni khrims ldan legs sdom tshul khrims can tshul khrims de'i
319a8(dkon brtsegs): la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// nga dag bdag gi 'du shes thog gi 'du shes med// gzugs kun ma dang shing dang rtsig pa 'ang
319b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mthong/ 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong / 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul chos med// bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu spyod
319b2(dkon brtsegs): thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa yon tan mthu chen du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad gzir pa// 'gro ba mgon
319b3(dkon brtsegs): med med pa'i brtson 'dir lhags nas// ni ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi grung sbyar te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las rnam par byed// 'dras bus gyur par 'jig
319b4(dkon brtsegs): rjem bams pas ska bas mgon dang / dpung gnyem sbed pa gzhan ni gang yang mdo min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs bsngal zhes
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dephyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam gtab// yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ ba ni gang na
319b6(dkon brtsegs): na bde 'gro tho ba ste/ ro lang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / phrad pa dang / bla mo la sri nu byed de/ de yang zad med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang / bas mtha' gnas mal
319b7(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' ste/ de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
319b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa rags dang sul la rtag tu gnas
320a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed/ de dag rtag tu 'khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min// chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin// zab za'i chos la mkhas shing spongs
320a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la sri nu byed// de dag ci skad smras pa de bzhin de dag ltar/ bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal
320a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam
320a4(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu sems can 'jud// dge ba bcu po la yang yang dag sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag ring por mi thogs de dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub
320a5(dkon brtsegs): rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
320a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yongs su spang ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba dang / tshul tshas pa dang kha gas ga dang /
320a7(dkon brtsegs): thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod
320a8(dkon brtsegs): cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i
320b1(dkon brtsegs): chos so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// tha ba dri ma med cing wa sems
320b2(dkon brtsegs): med/ de ni su la'ang smyan tshal byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul chos med cing spro sems med/ khyim gyi blo gros yang dag mya ngan rtsa/ skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring
320b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// spangs te de mi lta bar byung na// mthar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/ dgon pa pas mtha'i rnams sten pa na/ shes khye thob pa kun la mi brten
320b4(dkon brtsegs): cing lus dang srog la'ang lta ba ra mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na// ngan don tsam gyis mchog par
320b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin byed cing / rtag tu bya ltar stsogs pa spangs na ni/ 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bse ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // seng ge lnga
320b6(dkon brtsegs): bur 'dzags pa yod ma yin// ri dgas lta bur 'jigs pa yang mi rton// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas
320b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rab tu thar par bya phyir 'bad par byed// gal te bag yong dge ba'i spyod na// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di'i dpung gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'ad
320b8(dkon brtsegs): pa na 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdig rtag tu rnyog sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// stong pa nyid
321a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshan ma med pa la mos// 'dus kun la sbrum lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can ni dang dul la dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu/
321a2(dkon brtsegs): ci nas byang chub de ni sgru ba byed cing // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su spyod// gzugs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal rgya dag bzod
321a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas na// gang zhig don du gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma chos pa// blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang bskyed/
321a4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /
321a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems
321a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong tshul chos pa dang / kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs ste/ yul 'khar
321a7(dkon brtsegs): stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis g.yang sa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags
321a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bla ma rnams dad pa ma dang // de dag rtag tu gus pa byed pa rnyed yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo' g.yan can de// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs//
321b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyeng la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang gam sbyar dga'/ kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang // 'din bdag dang mtshungs pa
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mngan pa sba// de dag thams cad phan tshun snang bar sems pa ste// glags chal pa la rtag tu bcan pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshad la dga'// de dag dag
321b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod yan tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba'i// de dag 'chang 'dru ba dang thub pa dang /
321b4(dkon brtsegs): phra dog dbang gyis chos 'di rab par byed// byang chub lam la rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spang
321b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams par 'gyur// yul 'khar byung bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos ngan
321b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ yul 'khor snang le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor srung ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam
321b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khar skyong ba
321b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchod pa la zag dog dang / ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos de/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
322a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma dang le lo rtag tu mad
322a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gro che dbyug pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'di
322a3(dkon brtsegs): ni phrag dag ste// de dag bems ni gnas pa yang ma yin// glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshal ba can// sul 'khrul yang gang la gleng bla snyam// de dag nga'i bstan pa 'a
322a4(dkon brtsegs): las ring // de dag yon tan ldan la sdang sang gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/ ngan song shin tu mi bzang 'bar bar 'gro/ de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod
322a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten
322a6(dkon brtsegs): phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mad brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// da ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la// gal te thor 'dang bag yod sbeng bar bgyi// yul 'khor rgyang
322a7(dkon brtsegs): mas pani pa ba ma byang sa bas sa dpa' bzhin pa ma thas/ bzhig she na/ phral la' byu byung chub sem pa dang ga pa brags gcam
322a8(dkon brtsegs): bag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor slong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gang zag bston par ma bya ba dang / khrel 'khor srung byang chub sem
322b1(dkon brtsegs): rabs dam pa' chos spang ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khar kyang byang chub sems dpas zang zing la rnam pa'i yang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/ dram
322b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khar myang gang zag pa ni pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i cha tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag pa'aphrul to//
322b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ldog pa'i bshes gnyen rnamathong zhing // gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper na mkha' la zla ba lang
322b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag dang srog dang gso' bar zhen pa dag/ de dag drug phyis bzhin du rtag tu sbyang // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mig
322b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ma mchog rnams kyi ni ba'i mchog/ 'dod chags bral ba bdud ci 'thung spang ba// de dag dper nang na sngags rdza ba bzhin thong // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'chang rgyang 'ang
322b6(dkon brtsegs): zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dres par mi bya ste// de dag me'i 'bas bzhin spang bar bya/
322b7(dkon brtsegs): gang cig bdud ni 'dul bar bya ba dang // 'khar lo ma pa bla med bskor ba dang // de ltar sems can ngan yang byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bzhes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig
322b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chu ba dam pa 'chang rgya 'dang // de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang // grags dang 'chang 'dra phrag dag spangs te// sangs rgyas me shes rtag tu bcal bar bya// yul 'bar byung
323a1(dkon brtsegs): / bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa/
323a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khar stong phrag dag dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par
323a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang bzod pa'i long
323a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos sde/ yul 'khor skyong ba ni po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par na
323a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dgas la chos ni 'dzin gyur cing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/
323a6(dkon brtsegs): de la mi shes pas ni brlab byed na// des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshal// shes pa mdag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tu
323a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal khengs 'gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing // sangs rgyas la yang mas pa mang man pas// chos dang chags la de rnams pa med// bsra ba dang sbyangs pa rnams
323a8(dkon brtsegs): de mi mos// sdig pa'i bla can ngan sang gsum phyogs pa// de ni mi nang 'di nas 'chi 'bas nas// las kyi dbang gis ma mkhas rnam par tshangs// dmyal ba'am 'an te drang 'phra' la
323b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams sam// yadags 'tha ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed // gang zhig 'jig rten sngan 'gyur blo ldan zhing // mi'i dbang ba sdug bsngal mthar zin pa/ de las ngam mang lam mas
323b2(dkon brtsegs): rab spangs te/ byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya// bam po gnyis pa'o// yul 'khor spyad bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
323b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis sgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du shes
323b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang ye shes dang ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la bsten pa byang chub sems
323b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dres par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni
323b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// nag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing /
323b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan sgom// ltar gyur de dag gis ni de bcings te// glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dren byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang //
323b8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig bag med rtag kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// mi rigs spong pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig
324a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag dang // skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pa// brnyes par byed la rlom sems bor nas ni/ byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur/
324a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ma lus mtha' las bzod bya ste// bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/ sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas gyur/
324a3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol phyin drugs dang yon tan dang // stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas/ rga ba'i dra ba 'grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/
324a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bsam mi khyab par spyod sprad che// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don tu// sbyin dang dul dang nges la rtag tu spyod/ gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas
324a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' ste// byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par spangs/ brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma 'gyur// skyes chen
324a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mi zhes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i btsan rang 'gro ba lnga 'khyams pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i tsA ba mthong nas ni// sngon cid 'dir ni snyi rje rgya chen stod/
324a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs// bskal pa mang bar byang chub mchog tshal zhing / rang gi phub bram chung mjug/ 'a'adas pa'i rmas da shin tu
324a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'bras bu chun 'khor nyams dga' ba'i/ nags su thub par mi bzad dkar gyur// sum mtshan rtsa
324b1(dkon brtsegs): bas lag pa rkang pa bcad// de med ni sdang ba'i yang mthar// nags dang yul na snga mangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla marnas pags pa na/ ma'i dbang poms pa'i ma
324b2(dkon brtsegs): snun kyang / yang ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du galangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/ da ni byang chub mchog gi
324b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i phyir// lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnam
324b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan la legs shes bsgrags// gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa ni// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgya mtsha skams
324b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ nar bu rnyed nas sems can dga' bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes byas gyur tshe// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas// de tshe nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// nga 'dir
324b6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang //
324b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur che// sman pa mchog gis nga'i ched du ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'tsho
324b8(dkon brtsegs): ba ngan byer sngan chad skyong ba na// rtsal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// chung ma ma dri khyed las mi 'bri ba/ bur baitsas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang // gang che brtson 'grus
325a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bar zhes gyur che// dasngan lo ni stong du chang ba lang // bya dka' brgyad bcu rtsa ba ni bzad par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang dang // rgyal ba
325a2(dkon brtsegs): gzi byin dri ma med gyur che// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// da ni
325a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe// mi bzang mig can khros par gyur nas ni// de'i nga'i mgo bo baspangs pa na// de tshe nga yis mgo ba bcad de byin// da ni bsod nams mnyan zhes
325a4(dkon brtsegs): bya gyur che// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam sang s+ho// thams cad du yang rgya che spyan gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyi ngas pa nag go// sad pa rnams na snang ba gang
325a5(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na// bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis// lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas// gang ched sngon mi'i rgyal po ni// rin chen
325a6(dkon brtsegs): gtsug pud gyur tshe me tog dang // spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi// cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo // nga sngon rgyal ba mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe// shing
325a7(dkon brtsegs): bal 'dab ma 'jam pa lta bu dang // pad+ma 'dab gnyen lta bu'i 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na// snying rje med
325a8(dkon brtsegs): cing mi bzang rab gtum pa/ sring ma brgya ga shin tu char bcad nas// rgya shugs gling dra mi rnams bkod par gyur// gang tshe mig bzangs zhes byar gyur ba na// byam pa
325b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ad dang ldan zhing yid mongs pa// srin mo dag lan chung 'du shes pa// tshor ba lnga brgya de dag thar par byas// gang che bsod nams 'od gzer gyur pa na// lnga'i bu mo lnga
325b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gzugs ldan pa// bud med bye ba phrag pa ni spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // sems can ngan phyir nga ni spyad pa na// dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mngag
325b3(dkon brtsegs): can gyi/ rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel pa rgya chen btang // rgyal po ut+pal mig ces bya gyur tshe// pad+ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig/ 'di du
325b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa'i// 'gro ba'i don du da yis btang ba byas// sman pa'i rgyal po ste 'drar gyur pa'i che// sdug dang bral bas gnyen pa mthong nas ni// bud med
325b5(dkon brtsegs): cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa// ngas ni snying rje yongs su thar bar byas// sngon gyi sred par kun mthor gyur pa na// nad kyis btab pa'i mi ni ngas mthong nas// nga'i rang gi
325b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag kyang byin gyur te// mi de ngas ni nang dang bral bar byas// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga yi lus las rus pa phyung nas ni/ nad kyis rid par gyu rol rkang
325b7(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing / 'phangs shing yid du'ong
325b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srog btang ste// phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar bar byas// rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo
326a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan can pad+ma lta bu le// lag bzugs kyang ma ltas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i che// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don pan 'dod de/
326a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang bar byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dga' ba'i lha/
326a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs bzang zhes ni bya gyur che// bud med bkres skom nyams tha gangs
326a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas// gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gnon pa yi// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang // rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba'i rgyun
326a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang // rin cen du mu shing rta gos dang banon// gtad par dka'i ba rnam pa du ma btang // rtul po byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtshalas ni byas pa mi gzu
326a6(dkon brtsegs): rin chen phyir ni des ni dmig/ phyung // 'on kyang ngal gyod pa'i sems med do// srog chags gangar sngan srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas/
326a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba zlas// de ched ni sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad bstod che bya sreg gyur pa na// rgan la bsnyen bkrar bya bar rtag dga' ste// nga ni rim gro gas la
326a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i ngan phyir nga yis ni// snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste// gdol ba'i mi yis mda' rnams
