326b1(dkon brtsegs): snun kyang ni// spre'ur gyur tshe ngas ni mi dam btang ngo // rgyal ba dbang du gyur tshong lis ni// glang pa bla ma rgan dran lus btang ste// shin du yid 'ang zab kyang ngas ma zas//
326b2(dkon brtsegs): de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar gyur// bgrod dga' gangs can ri la dreng dbang gyur// nga yis zhag bdun par du bsrungs pa'i mi// de yis gsod pa la btang byas kyang / ngan
326b3(dkon brtsegs): de che khang khro byas pa med// kha ba kun+da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// drug dang bcas pa'i mnga' yis bsnun kyang ni// mche ba
326b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa byin gyis khros pa med// 'jam pa'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phrug gu rnams la gnod gyur to// mthong ba tsam gyis bya de gzhi gyur nas// lha tshogs
326b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis me tog dag kyang gtor// ri dgas gyur tshe gang+gA'i rU bas shugs kyis// khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa// de yis bsod pa dgan khrid de 'ongs//
326b6(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang nga ni de la yong ma khras// rgya mtsho'i dbus su san to mgon med pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas// bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe/ rus sbal
326b7(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// da ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur te// sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya stong
326b8(dkon brtsegs): dag gis zos par gyur// srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa na// nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bur yang gyur byis te// sems can bde
327a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing nad kyang med par byas/ ri dgas rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mnga' las bsnun kyang khrom pa'i sems med de/
327a2(dkon brtsegs): de che gsod lang yis byams pa byas// drang dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe/ srin mo'i nang du song ba'i tshang ba rnams// de las snying brtse snying rje bskyed
327a3(dkon brtsegs): nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyad che// 'dab chags kun lar ning gyur che// 'dzad pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang drang ni sang ma gyur// gel ba nags
327a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bong chags gyur de la bstan// thub pa nas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa// de'i ched du ngas ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po'i me tog 'bras
327a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ne tsa'i tshe// sdong po skams kyang ngas ni de ma btang // de tshe brgya byin byas gzod mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas// da ni sgra'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// mi yi rgyal po klu
327a6(dkon brtsegs): yas yul btsam ste// sgra'i tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dgengs bton no// nga sngon ne tsar gyur te pa ma'i phyir// sA lu blangs te mi yis bzung
327a7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ ne ma ci byi nga ya sA lu len// ma tag sman 'di ma 'angs bya sems sam// rna tshangs spras bzang po gsan dragasal// bdag ni chu bas khyod kyis 'bras ma len// ba mdanan nan
327a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni gas pa'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sa la blangs// gang che thog ma sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe// 'gro ba kun lags shas sbyin ma nas// de skad tshig sras de ni bdag thos ni
327b1(dkon brtsegs): dam na bdag gis kra bar gnan mi 'gyur// na ma lags ma mams dga' thar/ ma 'ang ma ma'i nang na kan// khyang mam ma nang ni dang 'phrulda na// legs sa kyang na dram na
327b2(dkon brtsegs): dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshal ba na// sngon chad spyang pa de la mags pa nas// snang pa'i chen dpa' ba brgya la lang // nga'i yid ni spro bar gyur pa med// rang ba dang
327b3(dkon brtsegs): dza'o na te 'i yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin bcan 'grus dang // bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ras spyong ngo do// sha dang rkang
327b4(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin lpags pa khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phyag na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas// gang la sbyar ma N+Dal bar gyur pa
327b5(dkon brtsegs): yi/ sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa mdzad// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab btsan to// sngon spyod chen nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyad pa'i tshe nang yis gang bsten pa// brtul nugs
327b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang // spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de'i tshe tshad ni// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya
327b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// de dag zag dang khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnyid gnon khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang / bstan pa sun par byed
327b8(dkon brtsegs): cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na// 'di ni rgyal ba'i gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga yis slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor 'gyur// mang
328a1(dkon brtsegs): du thos pa'i smra ba'i gtso bo yin// de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' min zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi// bla ma
328a2(dkon brtsegs): ni dpag med yon tan chung // des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang // rnams bcis kyang gang zag
328a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag med bstan// tshul khrims sdom dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de'i dal ba don med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yang na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes
328a4(dkon brtsegs): med gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed
328a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsungs par nam khang mi 'gyuraro// ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi rdol che la rgod gtum zhing // drag
328a6(dkon brtsegs): dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni da yi bstan la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdo byed cing / chos gos gang rnams kyang ni dkyog par byed// chos gos thogs
328a7(dkon brtsegs): shing chang dang phyogs myas nas// grong dang khyim dag du ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa man tan
328a8(dkon brtsegs): phung po 'di sngangs nas// de dag rtag tra phrin yig khyen par byed// de dag pa lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phrugs dang bran po bran mo grol// zhing go las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// btsun
328b1(dkon brtsegs): yong ldan cing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dag 'phag min tshig kyang mi sgra med// bya ba ma min pa yang gang yang med// de dag rnams sa mchod rten nor dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang ga
328b2(dkon brtsegs): zag nar de mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byar pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan brjod byed de// tshul khrims 'chal bslu bzhugs nas ni// bud med 'jig byed mi bzang
328b3(dkon brtsegs): rab ces brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar// khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min// khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yong bar thur
328b4(dkon brtsegs): rang gi khyim du de dag chos gas dang // las dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba/ de'i chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyan mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min// 'dzad
328b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bsnyen bya ma yin te// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nye zhi min// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma
328b6(dkon brtsegs): dul ba/ de dag sgrub ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyid dang mtshan dang 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan byin
328b7(dkon brtsegs): min te/ de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni//
328b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi// slob ma'i tsho gas de dag las nam lang ni// rim gra na du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis gnod dang mdze can mang // lus la
329a1(dkon brtsegs): sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang // 'ongs shing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams//
329a2(dkon brtsegs): deg dge slong yon tan rtag mi btsun// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dgas sor thar dang bslab pa dang / 'dul ba la yang gus
329a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang rnams rang dbang 'gro ba ste/ lcags kyu btang ba'i glang po ci bzhin 'dra// de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni/ sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur
329a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang / bsla ba dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang
329a5(dkon brtsegs): brjed nas ni// rgyas dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi zad mnar med lhung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing / rkun po'i gtam brjod
329a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ang rab tu dga'// nye du bsten la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/ de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/ bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ rtag tu
329a7(dkon brtsegs): chug lag khang gi las la brtson/ gnas la rkam ning khro gnyer 'byin par byed/ de dag slob ma 'khar kyang ma dul pa// ngan drug lag bang gi lag gi bA/ bdag gi da
329a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'di dgangs byas te// dge slong gang dag pa'i rjes mthun pa/ gtsug las khang 'dir 'di dag gnas yad// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing man tan ldan// chos 'dzin
329b1(dkon brtsegs): sgra za mdan la mngan brtson la/ de dag rnams ni sdud par ma byu da// 'di ning yi gnas su bskas pa te/ 'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa yin/ 'di ming yi dba' bar
329b2(dkon brtsegs): zung ba yin/ zad ci gnas ni gang yang med kyis song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkad de/ mal ma rnams kyang ma lus pags zin la/ 'di ni rnyeng ba 'byung ba lang
329b3(dkon brtsegs): yin 'dir rnaH nig spyad ces dge slong mang / de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ nam du yang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de dag khyim pa lta bur thugs 'gyur zhing / cha
329b4(dkon brtsegs): chas rnams dang galag 'khor mang par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i dus nang ma bu de dag/ kun tu smad pa byas par gyur nas ni/ de dag nga yi tshig ni dran gyur te/ bas mtha' dag
329b5(dkon brtsegs): nags su de che gnas/ kye hud rnyed pa zil gnon yon tan ldan// dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/ rgyal ba dam li ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par
329b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ bri nas tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag rtag par yongs su bsdus par 'gyur ba te/ de dag grong dang grong khyer yul 'khar rnams/ spangs nas dgon pa nangs
329b7(dkon brtsegs): su gnas par 'gyur/ 'byed dang zug zer zab mo dga' ba dang / yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/ de dag skye bo'i ston par grags gyur te/ de dag
329b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa'i tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga'i bstan pa yon tan gter/ yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/ 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phran
330a1(dkon brtsegs): do ga dang / rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/ ji ltar rin ce na 'byung gnas brus pa dag/ pad+ma'i rdzing bu yongs su skams pa dang //
330a2(dkon brtsegs): rin chen mchod sdong chags par gyur pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshon dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi zad tshe// dge
330a3(dkon brtsegs): slong dral ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la sten par dga' ba rnams/ de dag bzang 'gro gal yod de ring / 'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas
330a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// la brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ mi bzang drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ ci steng yis
330a5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag rten pa/ long ba'am 'on pa'am nar bar skyes par 'gyur// lus la
330a6(dkon brtsegs): tAg tA sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mdzang na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig yanga'i spyod pa sten pa ni// de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/ de
330a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing // de ni rtag tu sgra 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag na dang sdug bsngal baN+Da las gardungs/ mtshan dang shing dang bong pa rnams kyis bsnun/
330a8(dkon brtsegs): bkres dang sdom pa'i 'jigs pa'i longs su gdungs// yang na de ni nag par rab tu brnyas/ sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/ nges pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod
330b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ar la legs pa'i spyad la rtag tu sten par gyis// 'di nas phyin cad 'gyod par gyur ta re/ gang ni ga sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang / bsrab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la
330b2(dkon brtsegs): dgar ba dang / gnyen dang rnyed dang grangs brdad srang bral// de ltar rtag tu mngon par btsun par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyum lba bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam la bu dang /
330b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa kun dang mi ring bral 'gyur zhing / 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtags la/ pha rol phyin dngas dang stobs rnams la/ rtag tu rab tu sbyar zhing 'bad par gyis/ ji srid byung
330b4(dkon brtsegs): chu ba mchog sangs ma rgyas par/ de srid brtson 'grus rnams kyang nyams ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste/ dang po'o// / yul 'khor snang ba
330b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag pal che la skyon de dag 'gyur bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi btson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni ga
330b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dag mchod par 'gyur/ myi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la b+hi stang byed par 'gyur/ zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la
330b7(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byed pa dang / gal dang ldan pa dang / bya kha ltar mu tshor smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du wAr len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par
330b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug go/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur
330b9(dkon brtsegs): de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur/ snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par las
330b10(dkon brtsegs): 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi btsan pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snad chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang /
330b11(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnang sems
330b12(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khar gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyad par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'di'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa dan du
330b13(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed btsam gyis rab
330b14(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lnga smos kyang
330b15(dkon brtsegs): sod ces/ rang ga nis sa rgyas kyi mamatan rnams par nas// shes kyi kha dang / rnye pa tsam gyis bdag ga srung nas bdag nyid 'amache bar 'gyur te/ yul labar ma
330b16(dkon brtsegs): ni bang pa gangs bung da 'jas su mthun pa'i byud pa yang ma sman/ yangs rgyas kyi lags sa sa la nas/ rangags na pang 'gro ma ngam byang chubs thas
330b17(dkon brtsegs): 'ar la legs pa'i spyad la rtag tu sten par gyis// 'di nas phyin cad 'gyod par gyur ta re/ gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang / bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la/
330b18(dkon brtsegs): dgar ba dang / gnyen dang rnyed dang grangs badzad srang bya la// de ltar rtag tu mngon par btsun par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyum lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang /
330b19(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa kun dang ma ring bral 'gyur zhing / 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtags la/ pha rol byin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/ rtag tu rab tu sbyar zhing 'bad par gyis/ ji srid byang
330b20(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog sangs ma rgyas par/ de srid brtson 'grus rnams kyang nyams ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste/ dang po'o// // yul 'khor skyong blang
330b21(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'gyur bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag ni mi btson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni gam
330b22(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dag mchod par 'gyur/ myi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la sti stang byed par 'gyur/ zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing / chags pa mang ba dang / khyim la
330b23(dkon brtsegs): ser sna byed pa dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya kha ltar mu tshar smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye duwAr len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par
330b24(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'thun
331a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur/ snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par las
331a2(dkon brtsegs): 'che bar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi
331a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos 'gro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnad sems
331a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'di'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa dan du
331a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed btsam gyis rab
331a6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang
331a7(dkon brtsegs): si gis/ dedag ni sangs rgyas kyi yan tan rnams par nas// shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa tsam gyis bdagangs sbyang nas bdag nyid khas che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'ab ma
331a8(dkon brtsegs): ni bang bgangs zung dag 'angs chu mthun pa'i thad pa yang ma sran/ sangs rgyas kyi mazhes sa ga la nig/ ring sa man pang 'grolang ringan/ byang chub sa sa
331b1(dkon brtsegs): dgas/ yul 'khar srung gang zag des bu dag la/ byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yang bar sla ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mdza' 'khang
331b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi'i rang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i bzhes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor snang chos brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir na
331b4(dkon brtsegs): na yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas che ba la nga byang chub ces nga mi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag go zhes nga mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub sa kyi spyod pa
331b5(dkon brtsegs): nga mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// shes rab 'chal
331b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la the tshom gcod pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o// yang dag pa'i
331b7(dkon brtsegs): yan tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs
331b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang 'phrad pa'o zhes nga mi sla'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa'o zhes ri mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa'o zhes me sba'o// chos mi shes pa
332a1(dkon brtsegs): la chos 'dod pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang / bcas la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ci ltar skyes bu blun pa de
332a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la nga de ltar smod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan nga smra la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas bcom ldan
332a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te/ yang dag ma bsdams nod cing khengs pa can/ ma gus nga rgyal ldan ning chags shes che// rkan mangs zil non tha la
332a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchogar rab rib// chags pas zil gyis non la le lo phe la// le los zil gyis non na dad pa rnams// dad pa nyams na
332a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khrims 'chal par gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur pas rab tu 'byung gyur te// mchod pa rnyed nas dngul las grol bar
332a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jur/ de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su// gsag ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnying padan du gcer bas dgon par 'gro/ de sang nas kyang gas dang zhe
332a7(dkon brtsegs): tshal/ mngan shes rig dang sbubs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas phyir yang de ni nyid 'dzin// grangs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan sangs// mkham 'gro ba rnams dang dadras
332a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang lang ba dang // mngag ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyad pa yangs rnams dngas/ bag med rnyed nas dran par rab
332b1(dkon brtsegs): tra nyams// gsangs chen padam bzad byu bar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med// gal te 'dir ni dzab pas byang chu na// de thaM rnam tham kyis
332b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub zab// rnam par 'brang rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar// chags pas cad ni de skar mi rigs so// bsad nams nyams shing gnan gyi chung ma chags// rdum
332b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyi ye shes gang ma thob// de dag bstan la mi dgas tur shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshal ba
332b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so// de ni snying gis spre'u la dam byas ltar// nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir/
332b5(dkon brtsegs): nga yis rang gi srog ni 'phadab pa'ang btang // chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa// don med gyur nas bstan las lhung bar 'gyur// nga ni sngon chad legs
332b6(dkon brtsegs): par bshad don phyir// g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam por spangs te nan tan gnas// bstan pa
332b7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs yon tan 'byon thos la// de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba lam gsal med dang mchung
332b8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/
333a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de banin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang na bas
333a2(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
333a3(dkon brtsegs): don grub po zhes bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od gzer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od
333a4(dkon brtsegs): gzer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stod la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jam bu'i gling de na grong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba
333a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor sbyang rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de grong khyer rin po snang ba zhes bya ba//
333a6(dkon brtsegs): ra nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa lta byang du brgyad pa ga chang bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi brir rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs rim su bris
333a7(dkon brtsegs): pas mdzes par byas pa meng do// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyis che'i tshad ni bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal ba 'ang gzer ldan gyi phra
333a8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi 'od gzer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dag bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig mad de/ de bcas mthag
333b1(dkon brtsegs): tu dran pa che sna bdun ma gter snang byung bar gyur te// rgyal ba'i khang bzangs kyi nang du yang rin pa che sna bdun gyi gzer mi bcu'i tshad cam byung bar gyur te// yul
333b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khar byung rgyal bu gan du bsad nams kyi 'od gzer de bcas ma thag tu 'jam bu'i gling ba'i sems can thams cad yi rangs par gyur te/ sems can gang dag
333b3(dkon brtsegs): btsan ra na 'khang pa de dag kyang btsan ra nas thar bar gyur to// yul 'khor snang rgyal bu gnanu bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i
333b4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gyi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu
333b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la gzhan na khyod bag yod par gyis shig/ mi rtag par sa sar brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhan nu mi rnams kyi phrad na
333b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po tshang pa ste/ ni 'ab bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig rten pa la la 'jigs par lta bar bya zhing lam dang b+ha ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis zhig tsam bskul te/
333b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re// bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re// bde bar gshegs
333b8(dkon brtsegs): pas bag yod rab tra bston cing // bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smad// des pa gang dag 'di la bag yod cing // legs sdom 'ga' la ser sna med
334a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can kun la snying rjes byams yid ldan// de dag ring bar mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang /
334a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nad ltar dag dang gang ma byor// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// bag yod las nyid la yang shin tu gnas/ bza' dang btung dang gas dang kha zas dang /
334a3(dkon brtsegs): gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan// bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/ rkang pa lag pa de bzhin rna dang sna/ smang
334a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na/ byang chub yon tan kun gyis rab rdzogs nas/ de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med
334a5(dkon brtsegs): nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/ 'dus byas gar la lha dang sgyu ma 'dra/ 'dod pa med pa dgon par gnas par gyis/ srog ni brta rnas pa med de rtag tu g.yo//
334a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jigs pa can/ brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min/ gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yis/ ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni//
334a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mdang 'dzin par byed pa med/ mi yis dge dang mig gang byas pa/ de ni rtag tu byi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i sgra yis bskal med rgya mtshar ni/
334a8(dkon brtsegs): med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad te/ khyod kyis maM pa ram byas ci yang med// don med nyid drung la bsnyen par gyur/ dgrar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub naM/
334b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs med ga 'bang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// sha dang khrag dang lpags pa de bskams kyang / de ltan yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/ bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par nga dal
334b2(dkon brtsegs): ni ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'/ bsgom pa byas te bdud kyi phyugs gsal na// sangs rgyas la shes ring bar mi thags 'thob/ gnyen ga shes bzang la cag du mangs
334b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten cing / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ de dag rtag tu bzang 'am khrid par byed/ lam gol las kyang dag tu zlog par byed/ brtson 'grus shing
334b4(dkon brtsegs): tu brtan la lags byas te/ lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas/ rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par/ sangs rgyas lam nyid la gnas par gyis/ sngon gyi mi mched dam pa
334b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa/ tshol ba'i chen spyod lam dam pa dga'/ khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/ dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/
334b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/ skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spangs la/ lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par/ bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/ lul
334b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyang de nas gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis de nas bzung ste/ lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang dag
334b8(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur/ ces par ma gyur/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyod par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du/
335a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur// rgyal srid dang nor dang / khyim dang grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos pa
335a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pu sems par gyur to// nang du yang dag par 'jog la lhur len cing / 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang dbugs 'byin
335a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba smra ba'i rna
335a4(dkon brtsegs): can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang / sa so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo'i mi btsun
335a5(dkon brtsegs): nang na gnas kyis/ bdag gis cang mi sba bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas/ de phyogs gcig tu cang mi sba bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang
335a6(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gyis/ gnon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shig tu grong
335a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su lam spang bdun brgya bden byas so/ rin po che bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/
335a8(dkon brtsegs): tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla ze dang ldan pa dang / rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskur to/ lam sang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i mug shing
335b1(dkon brtsegs): skang bcags pa/ rin pa cha 'amag shang thams cad kyang ring pa che'i skang pa d+mas khrim rnam/ rin brgya' chung pa thams cad kyang grags pa zhen nga ta ma'i 'brang bye
335b2(dkon brtsegs): spel na/ de dag rlung gis bsrod de bskul na 'di lnga ste dper na/ ram ma sa la snyan brgya stang gi sgra sman palta bu'i sgra 'byung // lam sang gi sa thams cad na bram zlum
335b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang mkhas pa dang pa da la bab pa skye ba thams cad kyis spang ba'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya bkad// de dag thams cad la rgyal ba 'ang bzer ldan gyis khyad nyin mtshan
335b4(dkon brtsegs): draglu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag paradaga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam
335b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma spa shig ces bskul/ lam srang de dag thams cad kyi slar yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/
335b6(dkon brtsegs): btud ba 'ad pa rnams la ni btung ba/ gnan pa 'dad pa rnams la ni gnan pa nas/ gos dang / sram dang / 'breng ba dang / byug pa dang / sa pa dang rgyu brten dang / 'dra bang
335b7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+ha ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang /
335b8(dkon brtsegs): rta dang shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe
336a1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer gyi dbus gnon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug du dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bres pa rta ba bas brgyas
336a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa byas pa/ de'i nang du khang bzangs gcig byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag ba shams so// de'i dbus su bskyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi
336a3(dkon brtsegs): shing ldan pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ldan pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skyong bskyed mas tshal de'i
336a4(dkon brtsegs): dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel lo/ gang nas spos chu 'ab
336a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so// rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo// me tog ut+pal dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar ba
336a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rtag par rgyun tu rgyas so// 'khor yug tu yang rin po che'i shing ljo nad pas yongs su bskor to// dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams
336a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang yangs su rgyas so// dzang de'i 'gram du rin pa che'i shing ldan pa brgyad pan+d+ha bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ldan pa thams cad kyang rin pa che'i skud pa rnams kyis spya
336a8(dkon brtsegs): cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i 'phreng bye bas sbrel to// de dag kyang rlung gis bskrad cid rlung gis bskul na 'di lta ste dper na/ rol ma sa la snyan brgya srung blangs pa la rje/
336b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung nga// gnan nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu'ang zhes rdzing de'i steng rin pa che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang pa zangs der rin pa che sna bdun d+ha
336b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zag bzhi pazhams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du yang ras btsas bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting par gyur te// gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsad nams kyi 'ang gzer ru
336b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i khri rin pa che sna bdun las byas pa 'bang du mi bdun tsam yang ba bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcas bu bye ba zag brgyang sas bdun bting bar thur
336b4(dkon brtsegs): tha thams cad kyi drung dra lang pag por nas a garus badregs shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me rtag 'grems pa bred nga/ gser gyi wa lnga bres so// gzung
336b5(dkon brtsegs): b+hi pad+ma rab tu sbyangs so/ mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba bris sa/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyangs so// rin po che
336b6(dkon brtsegs): shing ldan pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya spangs so// skyed mos tshal kun tra yang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgra bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag
336b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ de dag gi 'ad kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor srung skyed mas tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tsa dang ri skegs dang // khru
336b8(dkon brtsegs): khrung dang / khra bla ga dang / rma pra dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / kran la dang / ka la bid+mo dang / shang shang re'u 'kha dang / de dag srang 'byin cing sgra sgrog na dga' chal gyi
337a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhan nu'i langs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshags pa/ ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas
337a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams rtag par rgyun tu bshams par gyur to// de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lan na nyi shu len pa'i steng dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der bcud na/
337a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'tshag chas kyi bya ba zhes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer
337a4(dkon brtsegs): der btsud par gyur te// pha ma gnyis kyis de la bra mo bye bo byin no nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang grong rdal ba'i mos bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bum bye ba byin
337a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang na tshad lo bcu drug lon pa glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas
337a6(dkon brtsegs): ba grar mkhas pa dgod mkhas pa skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba gzhon pa/ gnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas
337a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi skems pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/
337a8(dkon brtsegs): bcar yang ma lnga pa/ kha nas me tog marga la'i gsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las can dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu ma lngar gsal pa/ shin tu ming du'ang ba'i rtsa
337b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ sgra dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang naHsa za gzhan nu bsad nams kyi'ang bzur gnas sa/ smad byung sa dang bral ma sa
337b2(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'i bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gis dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi dra snyam pa'i sems
337b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na/ gsad par bya ba'i mis mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer
337b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis bud med dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mo 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar dra bdag na
337b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa/ 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag phrad pa'i spyad pa spyad cing des bdag thar pa
337b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhig gra snyam pa de lta bu'i sems/ 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma gzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang
337b7(dkon brtsegs): ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg bya'i mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od gzer ldan la lha gzhan nu ni mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad/
337b8(dkon brtsegs): dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// / bam po gsum pa ste/ tha ma'o// / yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan rgyal po brgyad khrid
338a1(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus bdar te/ mya ngan gyis sa
338a2(dkon brtsegs): la skyel to// des langs nas rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bu cig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros// da ni mya ngan
338a3(dkon brtsegs): gzir te khyim nang sa la skyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smos// de 'dir de'u ri chad pa chen pos gcad par bya/ khyod kyi ched dra ngas 'dir yid kyis
338a4(dkon brtsegs): gang smras pa// lha'i khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer deng ltos shog/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de mur smos/ brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ ba
338a5(dkon brtsegs): mig can mig mdzes myang ngan nyam thag pa// lha'i bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshegs sgra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin
338a6(dkon brtsegs): lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag stan/ glu dbyangs pheg rdo ba dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes/ khyod dga' dus la deng ba brtsa
338a7(dkon brtsegs): nganam byed cig/ pad+ma rim pa la brar rtse phyir deng lus dman me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mas chatshal// sna tshogs sbeng ba nag lnga'i tshugs shing ta 'dra/ sa
338a8(dkon brtsegs): sheg khyod kyis na chod 'di ni thag ma yin// dga' ba'i dris la bab kyis dang 'dir bra dga' gyis/ khyod kyi khrum ched rdzing 'a cwa la rnams kyi yang 'dra// mu
338b1(dkon brtsegs): dang badra dag gas rgyal gyis gang / bdurnams kyang brang brgyags pa mchag gis bcan// ngal bla ma mas su na ga dga' ma byung // ngang bas bla nas tha brug shA
338b2(dkon brtsegs): dang la zin gang shang seMT dang kun la// yidi 'das ldan gas na sram dang ldang 'dra// rdzam nas mi gang 'di la dga' bzab mi 'gyur/ phanal med khang dag ma
338b3(dkon brtsegs): drar bcu mnar bu gcug/ gser dang banA nas smras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra/ rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnam pa snang rab bting ba// gsar dril gser gzhala' 'a
338b4(dkon brtsegs): basmra sman pa/ zabacad brtan pa mchog gis la sman skasags pa/ khyud kyi ched du kyang rnams sum basbyin rgya na// bum snang dag rnam cha gzhan pa'o// 'dzin pa
338b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' tshal lnga'i bu ma rnams kyi 'dra ba sgog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'angal ci'i phyir// gnan nu khyod kyi chen grags lnga'i bu'adra ba/ bu bde dag rnams dang
338b6(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig rtsed mo gyis/ khyod kyi pha dang ma lang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/ 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod dan/
338b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyer/ yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar ba don gnyer ba la smras pa la ba gas
338b8(dkon brtsegs): cig lnga cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyan mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa/
338b9(dkon brtsegs): par yang ba li sems kyis dga' mi byed//
339a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yangs che/
339a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten// bud med 'di dag 'phags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag
339a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang ngan mi gnyer/ khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar drar khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi/ glu dang gar dang
339a4(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i dbyangs sgra bzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byis pa'i skye
339a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu nyon mongs khal// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/ dgon tung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams
339a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad shig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga'
339a7(dkon brtsegs): bar phyir zhing 'dod// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhi na/ rgyal po khyed dang pa dang lhan cig skyes
339a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min// bdag cag thams cad cu rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma 'gyur bag 'od
339b1(dkon brtsegs): da / mad bang dngal bab pa mchog cer ma rung / yug kyang ra rgyu ltar myur 'am sbyar ma rung / 'dus zas 'di zang zas ldan 'dra na ma chung // rnam pa
339b2(dkon brtsegs): mamang gsum 'dad la chags pa ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/ 'dzan
339b3(dkon brtsegs): rten pa na bsong brtses sangs rgyab 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal pa bag med skad la byang chub yang ma lags// rgyal ba gang zhig 'dad pas pa yen krung sems 'jam pa
339b4(dkon brtsegs): dmi bzad nams chung bdaga' ning mtha ris ldog che bzhin du rgyas pa nam yang spang ma bgyi/ rnam par bcug pa'i bya sar ji sar dbugs phyin 'gyur// mkhas na
339b5(dkon brtsegs): sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung ba gshed ma 'dra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grang stong mtshungs// rgyal ba 'di na drug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams rgyas
339b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal gnas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas// rgyal po de ring
339b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdan dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis ni ba'i
339b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi grwa ni mAr du sbyar// stang chen du ni bcings pa rnam thal rab bsngags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan 'grol ma
340a1(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi// long ba mag sbyin sred pa'i khri shing bskams par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas/
340a2(dkon brtsegs): de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drar mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying brtse snying rje pha rol phyin pa sbyin// sems canangon grub lhag mthong glog gi 'breng ba dang / byang
340a3(dkon brtsegs): chu ba yan lag bde bsal char rgyun dra ba yis// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsal bar bgyi// rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis ste/
340a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis//
340a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung // byang
340a6(dkon brtsegs): chu ba lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus//
340a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod sgra yi// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de ltar min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs gcig myur
340a8(dkon brtsegs): dra bzhung // yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsal// gang dag bsam pa ci bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med
340b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal tshang zla ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med chags kyi nang dra gnas pas byang chub dang // grub ba ni bzla meng gnas mthab mnas// maman par da
340b2(dkon brtsegs): pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khang mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khar srung de nas rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'ang ga zer
340b3(dkon brtsegs): khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang ni
340b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'di lta ste/ 'greng pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song stes brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi dang
340b5(dkon brtsegs): la bab pa'i dus kyi che// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang las 'gro ba dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsdus
340b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor sbyang rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma 'jag cing
340b7(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa// lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung rin
340b8(dkon brtsegs): nu bar bgyi// su la yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhung / tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor srung de nas lha de dag gis
341a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer la tshigs su bcad pas ltar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyad kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don
341a2(dkon brtsegs): grub blo zhes byas te skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs// de gzhan spyod mkhas bsod snyoms shes rab yon tan mchog/ de'i dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam
341a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal ba blta 'tshal de'i gzugs ci 'dra// de'i kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig
341a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar smad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ce 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi'ang/
341a5(dkon brtsegs): gzer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// de'i gtsug tor ri'i rtse la gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su khyil ba ste// de'i mdzad sku
341a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la nyi ma lham me lha/ nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon pa 'dra// mi dbang ser ge'i 'gram
341a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rang byung bim pa'i sgras// sems can lhan cig 'ang gzer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed/ stong gsum rgyas 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang sems/
341a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag/ bzhi bsu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyiman
341b1(dkon brtsegs): bzam/ dang ldugs na ba langs rang ginal ga dang khebs// rgyal pa de'i gzung na ri mchog 'du ma 'dun// shin tu tshim byed 'brel snang thu
341b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs dbyangs shin tu rig pa'i sal snyan snang 'dra ba/ ling gnyis 'dzem pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha'i sgra skad tshim byed pa/
341b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan sna tshogs chang bar byang chub yan lag mthun// chos kyi 'phreng ba'i yid 'od brgya stong rab brgyus pa/ sal sman dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu rnams dga'
341b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma tsi ki la bdi khu byug drar pa dang // ma bya dad pa skastan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med
341b5(dkon brtsegs): don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shel lngar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba// gnan gyi spyad
341b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun pa zhus na tshim byed pa// chos dbang phyug de'i gsum gi yon tan 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes drung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/ dbyug pa
341b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bur phyag ring de'i mdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing zlum// rgyal ba de'i sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog/ bsgrags
341b8(dkon brtsegs): sra 'khrol cing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta'i 'dra// rang byung e ne'i byin pa glang po'i snga 'dra'i brla/ zhabs
342a1(dkon brtsegs): mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros stabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi sbubs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i
342a2(dkon brtsegs): stabs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' la me tog char ba ba me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de'i rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang
342a3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi'i seng ge de 'dra'i mtshungs pa sems
342a4(dkon brtsegs): can med// yul 'khor chung de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa zas nas tshim ni
342a5(dkon brtsegs): mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor slong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'ong gzer 'di snyam du sems
342a6(dkon brtsegs): te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i srab ma phun sum
342a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang / ji ltar
342a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lha yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs pa mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med
342b1(dkon brtsegs): rmad pa dang / rnga stur ma dag pa' mun nas mongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed rnams nags par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems 'dus dka' ba dang / daltar dung 'azu
342b2(dkon brtsegs): zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yangs sum shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba'i sa dmigs ma ba
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar song ba'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar snying pa yang na skye ba
342b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun gcad dga' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'dzag par byed pa dang / ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang /
342b5(dkon brtsegs): lngar 'jug par b+hA ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa zhes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dpa' ba ltar 'dem
342b6(dkon brtsegs): nus te/ 'dad pa'i kham pa nyon mongs pas rmongs pa sems tha ba can bag med pa la dga' ba byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'ja
342b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
342b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lhag la 'gyur snyam du'o// de yang 'di jimam du sems te/ bdag bla nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyis par chad
343a1(dkon brtsegs): byas su 'od gyis/ bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchod do// snyam mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gnon bsod nams kyi 'od gzer bcom ldan
343a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba der logs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing
343a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzigs zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
343a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'od phyung nas/ 'od de rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer la reg go// 'od de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya snang 'a
343a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shing ta la'i 'phang la tsam byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de las kyang 'ad gzer brgya stong byung te/ snang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi
343a6(dkon brtsegs): gzer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer pad+ma ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
343a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du mdzad do//
343a8(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dan grub blo des 'di de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu sdong po bcad pa bsgyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du pas
343b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya skang dbyug 'tshal te/ yul 'khor srung de nas rgyal po gnan nu bsad nams kyi 'ad gzer gyis bcom ldan 'das de ban/
343b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa don grub blol tshigs su bcad de gsal pa// bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas gdang // tshogs ches sman pa'i rgyal ba khyad rnyed dang// ji ltar
343b3(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon pas bstan du gsol/ 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa ni// mtshan mo par snang lnga las thos lags na/
343b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas skye ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig du deng gyur
343b5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ dad pa 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shig/ dbul bar gyur pa dag na bsdu bar mdzad// mgon po bcing
343b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni deng dkrol mdzad// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung stan// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du
343b7(dkon brtsegs): gsal/ mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// mar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag ni zung rngu phung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro ngan las
343b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag thar mdzad// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen bgyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/
344a1(dkon brtsegs): srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub// bdag
344a2(dkon brtsegs): gis dal ba gdod rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyad pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i
344a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung stan// yul 'khor snang de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gnan
344a4(dkon brtsegs): nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gnon du bsod
344a5(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od gzer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob po// mngon par shes pa lnga yang tho ba ste/ de nam mkha' la gnas te/
344a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor te/ mngon par gton to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nas
344a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od gzer bar snang ngo las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de banin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/
344a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med mngon dga'i nal/ gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'dra'i srid pa gsum ma mchis/ mnyam
344b1(dkon brtsegs): mad mnan can khyad la drug 'tshal la// rgyal ba'ad busku 'angam mdzes snyam ning bzang // khyad kyi gzugagatur 'di ma ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tu
344b2(dkon brtsegs): mthung khyad dang mtshungs ma mchis// thu ba pa khyad kyi smin 'tshams mdzad kyu midzes/ kun da zla ba kha bdud lngar dkar/ thugs rje gang gis 'grob 'dzi
344b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa/ stan mchog bzang po ud pa la sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri med spyan la byug 'tshal lo// ljags lang srab bzangs kyi mngag 'drad
344b4(dkon brtsegs): de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khye bas// chos gsungs pas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam sngam gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshams
344b5(dkon brtsegs): bzangs shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/ bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba/ 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dral bar bgyid// bden gtan snyan pa
344b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyud kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis ning brgya dag kyang sdang bar bgyid/ 'jig rten na ni tshangs
344b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du brlag/ e ne'i byin pa nyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i sbungs
344b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan gtam shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs sa dang ri dang ngan pa g.yo bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod
345a1(dkon brtsegs): lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mngag 'dra// 'grub gzugs 'di lnga bas dmas mi 'gyur/ khyang ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs pa
345a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ khyed sngon bskal brgyad ni dga' thub spyad/ khyod sngon 'dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems car kur la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog
345a3(dkon brtsegs): tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyad ni sprin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyad ni bzang dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/ khyad ni bsam
345a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan shes rab 'ang gzi mnga'/ mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sgra bangan pa'i tshogs can 'jom// khyad ni seng ge lta bu
345a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du spags// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ mchog tu dga' mdzad khyad la phyag 'tshal lo// thub bsku gsung thugs ni rnam par
345a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bdi'i skad// srid gsum pa rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro'idi
345a7(dkon brtsegs): snum lta bu dang // gAr lak+ta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med/ chos rnams sdug rgya chu zla 'dra bar mthen/
345a8(dkon brtsegs): stong bzhi pasgo med pa'i tshul/ mags pas ni 'gro ba 'khyam 'gyur te// thugs rjes thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis/ de dag rnams ni 'jad pan
345b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa lags/ 'dod chags la sogs nang mang brgya dag gis/ sngags par gyur pa'i 'tshal nag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can rgya dag mangs 'a
345b2(dkon brtsegs): cing zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/ skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan nan// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa rgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs
345b3(dkon brtsegs): nas ni bru ba pa thegs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas myal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ kau kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen
345b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dmigs su ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ 'phags lam de nid
345b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sngon chad kyi// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen la yid du
345b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi ci lnga'i bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis man nA nas gsung ba mdzad/
345b7(dkon brtsegs): bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung / de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg
345b8(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha'i bde ba ni// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis 'job// mi'i bdag po 'gro
346a1(dkon brtsegs): la ban bgyid pa// blug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba
346a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bachu ba kun byed pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'am
346a3(dkon brtsegs): rten bdag po dang // yongs su dga' ldan lha'i dbang po dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab bdag 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/
346a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam med khyad la mtshad dang mthong ba dang // thos pa 'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam
346a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa// 'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam la zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god// bsad
346a6(dkon brtsegs): nams gter khrod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dam pa ma thob par du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur
346a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dag cing mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par
346a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sags// man tan rnam pa du ma thab par 'gyur// mtha ros thar pa ma'i bde ba dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bamad nas/
346b1(dkon brtsegs): gter zab 'gyur// zad kyi brdad dang grags pa rgya chen pa// phyogs mang kun gyi zhing mnga' brgyar yang mchis// rgyal bakhrang kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// rba/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs rnams 'khar du rtogs par spags// rims nang bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthang na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dang/
346b3(dkon brtsegs): po zhi bzhi dgyes pa// mi mchog dam pa khyad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga tho ba mkha' la gnas/
346b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te// dri med chos ni 'grol la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun
346b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi mthar phyin der bsdad pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'bang thob par shog/ yul 'khor srung de nas mtshan
346b6(dkon brtsegs): mo de'i nam langs pa dang / rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gyis gnon nu bud med kyi 'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis
346b7(dkon brtsegs): grang khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed ci'i phyir du// de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'od
346b8(dkon brtsegs): gzer mi gda' ba'i slang du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gnon mu'i phyir sdang po bcad pa sgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te/ langs nas du
347a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing grang khyer der lan stong du yangs su btsal to// yul 'khar skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang ba des/ rgyal po 'ad gzer ldan la 'di skad
347a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gnon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bskur ba'i phyir shar phyogs 'a
347a3(dkon brtsegs): su song ngo // yul 'khor skyong der rgyal po 'od gzer ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
347a4(dkon brtsegs): stong brag cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs chag la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo
347a5(dkon brtsegs): gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / rgyal
347a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od gzer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can dam pa lnga
347a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang la min rgyal bas bkur/ skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod su sum
347a8(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis sbas ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs
347b1(dkon brtsegs): mang 'grub pa'i sbrul phyag 'tshal ma// brnal pa zla ba brgya ba sam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bsal ba zab pas mangs ngas rgyas pa spang bamajan
347b2(dkon brtsegs): snga ma cad mchad na brgya phrag bsam gyis ma khyab mdzad// deb na khyang sgra bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrim pa ting nge 'dzin du
347b3(dkon brtsegs): ra ba dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor
347b4(dkon brtsegs): bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid mchi yi gzugs kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags// rang gi phyogs
347b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku'i tshad ni gda' ma lags// khyad ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'/
347b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad// thu ba chen nam mkha' lta bur thams
347b7(dkon brtsegs): cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam pa ston pa mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun par gda' ba mdzad// da ni lha mi bcas 'dra
347b8(dkon brtsegs): nad gci shin tu lho// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho la sa gdon ces gsung yang phyung // zla ba khyod chos gang la lang the tsom mi mnga' yang // yi ge shes slob ltar 'dzin
348a1(dkon brtsegs): rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'// yab dang yum dang /
348a2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bud med rnams kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lngas yongs bskor nas// nags nas gnas gci
348a3(dkon brtsegs): po nas 'byung bar gda' ba 'ang mdzad// khyad ni bdud bzhi pam par mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' bston pa mdzad// sngon chad 'khor
348a4(dkon brtsegs): lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor nas kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo skor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag lnga 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan
348a5(dkon brtsegs): bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsung / rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung // khyad kyi
348a6(dkon brtsegs): bsad nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis ning mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung/
348a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par d+har la phyag 'tshal la/ sems can kun gyi bgyi bar snum lngar gda' yang /
348a8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod ni gang dri bzhud pa 'am gyon ma lags/ sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don tu gang gis byang chub mchag zab pa/
348b1(dkon brtsegs): lam mchog ma'i dpa' ba khyad legs gsungs// bdag gis chas shing 'dzin myur du sangs rgyas nas// ma dpa' 'gra ba 'don du chos nyid bshad par raH/ ma
348b2(dkon brtsegs): bathub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/ sringad gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bsod nams gang bsgru bas des/ 'jig rten byung
348b3(dkon brtsegs): chub bla med ni mchog thob par sho ga/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od gzer ldan do'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
348b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khar spyad de nas rgyal gzhon nu
348b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nas kyi 'od gzer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi gro
348b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer du gdug tshad gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsal// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer 'thugs brtse bar dag
348b7(dkon brtsegs): cang mi gsungs par gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor spyad de nas rgyal bre gnon nu bsod nams kyi 'di gzer gyis/ pha ma de gnyis dang grogs de dag dang
348b8(dkon brtsegs): bud med de dag la sbas pa// khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas kyang grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gnas
349a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis snga skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang // yul 'khar spyang de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi'
349a2(dkon brtsegs): gzer gyis ci nas kyang grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro tho ba bkad pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas de klung de bzhin
349a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dge slong kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsal to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor
349a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i 'chag sa bshams pa steng du rin pa che'i dra ba'i bla bres pa g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar
349a5(dkon brtsegs): bo'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin
349a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de phyed nyin mi sbyin gyi nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur bar byas so// de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis
349a7(dkon brtsegs): non par mgyur// bdag la dga' ba ma byas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir/ gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
349a8(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang sreg la yang mi ldan/
349b1(dkon brtsegs): dngam pa gzhan lha la mas kyang sa dgas/ b.ram pas der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs par thams cad kun du bzung ste/ de btsun gshegs pa la lam
349b2(dkon brtsegs): sram nus so// bar srabs der khrus ma byas mar dang 'bru mar gyis khrus ma bslus/ rkang ba ma bsdus ngal ba'i 'dra shes ma bsgyu dang // phan za ba dang bshad
349b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la zhen pa
349b4(dkon brtsegs): byas so// gang tu de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'greng ba thams cad dang /
349b5(dkon brtsegs): spos thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rtswa rkyen thams cad bsags te/ phyis mchod
349b6(dkon brtsegs): rten bye ba zag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar byas so// mchod rten de dag la yang rin pa che sna bdun gyi rin pa che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres sa//
349b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la yang sal snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'jam bu gling khar yug tu
349b8(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi shing ljon bskrun to// mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong nas mar me rus so// mar me'i rnga bo re re nas spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa ban
350a1(dkon brtsegs): pastong gi mar me brapas// spos dang 'greng ba dang byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// tshul de lta bus la bye ba'i bar du mchod pa
350a2(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ phyis rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang rtag tu cog bu ba ste/ nam yang glos mngab
350a3(dkon brtsegs): bo/ nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin te de gzhan la
350a4(dkon brtsegs): tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la yang re bar ma gyur na rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa la ma chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to
350a5(dkon brtsegs): de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams can dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang rjes su bslangs te rab tu
350a6(dkon brtsegs): byung nga / yul 'khor de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer gyi rjes su slob cing yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu byung gis
350a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par gyur to// snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
350a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye ba phrag drug cu cha bana'i bar du gnas te dge slong bsod nams kyi 'ang gzer gyis thams cad yongs su gzung ngo // tshul 'di la bur sangs
350b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig srung phrag dgu bcurtsa bzhi la rnam pa de/ bu'i mtshang ba byas ma// yul 'khar myang da'i mde'i dus na rgyal ba 'ang gzer ldan nes bya bar gyur par
350b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyad de skar dgas shing the tshom tha'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang dpan
350b3(dkon brtsegs): med de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od gzer ldan zhes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer zhes bya bar gyur pa
350b4(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
350b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer ces bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong
350b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dgar par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pas lhag pa'i
350b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spang ba dang / bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer de'i rjes su bslab
350b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// ngas bya dga' ba mngon par 'du byed de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi bcon pa dang rnyed pa dang
351a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang / shes kyi khye la chags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs padag sha zang ba dang /
351a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i rgyas bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / dge sbyong sran par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mu rgod dang / lub dang ngag dang sems mi drang ba dang / lhas lnga ba dang / kham
351a3(dkon brtsegs): che ba nor ba dang / rang gi de bcas pa las nyams pa dang / gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i ched kyi sman lo byad kyi mtshan ma la chags pa dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel
351a4(dkon brtsegs): med dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
351a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rig pa med pa rnyed pa don tu gnyer
351a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mi sten par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bsu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med pa/ rnying ni thob dang sa
351a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi khe la sang / byang chub yan lag brgyas khebs bar nas ni// de dag thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khwa 'dra snang ba khrel dang mos blo bral// shes kyi khye phyir bdud rtsa
351a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang du bang / nan mangs gsus song ba'i 'grul gnal// bdag 'dir yan tan ldan nas de zangs// sras ne ma'i nan dran pazang khyer dra// zab kyir nga dag rnam par ma
351b1(dkon brtsegs): b+hUng/ gnas dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra de dag stsal ltar ring du spangs// de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin/
351b2(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song // sdug pas phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar khyams/ nga'i spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas/ yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas
351b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di las sbyor// bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dga' dal rnyed kyis// de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chub dam pa 'chang
351b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya 'dar// de yis rgyal po de'i yon tan dran par bya// bsam te yang dag rtse bzhin tshul ba nin gnas par bya// de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med grub
351b5(dkon brtsegs): yan tan 'di dag rtogs pas 'phags pa'i rigs la bsten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dram spangs shig/ byis pa
351b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bur 'gro ba ltar ni khrims sa re// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phrag tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi skems shing gnan mi spad/ sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba dag
351b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la smos// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed nas chos la brtson par
351b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis nga yis mdo 'dir bsgrubs pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa/
352a1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas phyir zhing yid du 'jug par bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu ba'i chen phyis 'gyud tA re/ yul lal
352a2(dkon brtsegs): skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la/ yang gang zhig bdag 'di la bslab bo// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam
352a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrubs na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gnan brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang brgya stong gyi
352a4(dkon brtsegs): cha dang bye ba brgya sdang ki cha dang // grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon
352a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed pa'i lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med
352a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom
352a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la yul 'khar skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad
352a8(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor spong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor spyong khyod de lta bAn khyad kyis chos
352b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa de na yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par ral pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa rnam par dab
352b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyongs
