352b3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen
352b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yul 'khar skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gi mkhan pa dzin
352b5(dkon brtsegs): tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ne bA ma dang / nu chen gyi la ts+tshab ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar rgyad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa brgya gar sa
352b6(dkon brtsegs): Ar+ya ug gra pa ri prits+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/
352b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yang na rgyal bu rgyal byed
352b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gyi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
353a1(dkon brtsegs): po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song srong dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen tho ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga snang
353a2(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyad pa/ thog ma
353a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to//
353a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas khyim bdag drag shul can g.yog lnga brgya dang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba gal ba dang /
353a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal bder sang ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin bsal mag bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur ba byas nas byas
353a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag dga' 'dod dang / khyim bdag grags 'dad dang / khyim bdag legs byin dang / khyim
353a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dga' byed dang / khyim bdag grags byin dang / khyim bdag nor bzangs dang / khyim bdag tshul dga' dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / khyim bdag
353a8(dkon brtsegs): klu dpal dang / khyim bdag bden dga' dang / de dag dang gzhan yang khyim bdag rab tu mang po rnams g.yog lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / mnyan yad kyi grong khyer chen pa nas
353b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ rgyam bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dang sde lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lams
353b2(dkon brtsegs): zas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khyim bdag de dag thams cad pal cher ni g.yog dang bcas te theg
353b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsred pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par zhugs pa sha stag go// de nas rgya
353b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag drag shul can gyis khyim bdag gi 'khor chen po de 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
353b5(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la tsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te
353b6(dkon brtsegs): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
353b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
353b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyad la de bzhin gshegs pas nag tu skabs phye yis/ khyim bdag khyad ci dang ci 'dad pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / de ltar dris pa de'i
354a1(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad
354a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po la
354a3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par 'chal ba dang / theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'chal ba dang / theg pa chen
354a4(dkon brtsegs): bo la dam che ba dang / sems can thams cad gnyer ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad bsgrub pa'i skad drug cha 'tshal ba
354a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams
354a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes sems can thams cad kyi don tu khur chen po len pa dang / 'jug pa rlabs po che chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
354a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dpag tu ma mchis pa thob nas ye shes de yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du go cha 'chal ba dang / 'khar ba'i sdug bsngal gyi sgron mang po du ma 'a
354a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang yid yongs su mi spro zhing / bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor yang sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de la rigs kyi phra 'am
354b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bum byang chub sems dpa' thag pa pa gang dag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub cing /
354b2(dkon brtsegs): tsham nas gnas pa dag dang / gang yang khyim na gnas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par mi 'byung ba
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag chang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang // zag pa chen po 'di rjes su bzung ba dang / danan
354b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chud par bgyi ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i sla nga / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
354b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyis bslab pa'i yon tan rnam par gnag pa de legs par bzhad du gsal/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim gyis lagan
354b6(dkon brtsegs): nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid cing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams yongs su mi nyams te/ tshe 'di la ya
354b7(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma mtho ba'i las ma mchis shing / che gnan du yang bye brag tu mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim glan
354b8(dkon brtsegs): nas mngon par byung ste/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa spangs nas/ sgra dang khe spu bregs te gas ngur sdig pagos nas/ yang dag par dad pas khrim nas khyim ma lags par
354b9(dkon brtsegs): mthun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa yi// zab cing zhi la thur bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes
354b10(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs// mi dag thams cad ma gdogs par// dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing // de la 'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa
354b11(dkon brtsegs): du sems can sgra// de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// sgra rnams kun la ma chags// de ni rjes mthur zod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon
354b12(dkon brtsegs): sku rnams dang // gang gi sgra'ang mi rdog pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa legs// spyir dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // rtson 'grus bsam
354b13(dkon brtsegs): kun la brtson bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthur bzod pa lags// thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mi spong
354b14(dkon brtsegs): no bgyid pa// de ni rjes thun bzod pa las// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la// de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad do// de la som nyid
354b15(dkon brtsegs): rdorjes mthun bzod pa dang // bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i/
354b16(dkon brtsegs): phul nges par bstan par bgyi// ning 'di bsam gis mi khyab ste// bla med bsod nams zhing de la/ bdag gis sa bon btab pas na// bdag ni sngar
354b17(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis lags// dogs thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho'ang bas par 'gyur gang ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bsgrub pa yi// sa bon rnams kyang ma mi
354b18(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi/ byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de'i bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag
354b19(dkon brtsegs): dra'i// dpung du lA dang dri za dang // mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dadang // 'dren pa bdag ni 'o
354b20(dkon brtsegs): sa mi 'tshal gyi// mi mchog khyed kyi mkhyen pa ni// ji 'dra de ltar bdag gyer gcig/ byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas//
354b21(dkon brtsegs): ma du ni// ma chags snang ba ma mchis par// bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bskur bgyis// bdag gi byis bstong rnams dang //
354b22(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pas// gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub slad du spro bar brjod// bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing
354b23(dkon brtsegs): tsha thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la
354b24(dkon brtsegs): kaudu dga'// chos rnams spang bar mi bgyid pa// sems can can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'bar de nyid du ches smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
354b25(dkon brtsegs): mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po
354b26(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang mthun par ma byas kyi/ mi mthun par byas pas ni khyod ni gnas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes na
354b27(dkon brtsegs): chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi nas pas 'jug pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nor ba thams cad med par shes pa med pa'i
354b28(dkon brtsegs): nga po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing bor ba med pas blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha'
354b29(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa kha dog med pa/ rdugs med pa/ dbyings med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gis yongasu dag
354b30(dkon brtsegs): nga po yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad
354b31(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba med pa yin no// rgyal ba chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas ni zag// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni brtag pa
354b32(dkon brtsegs): gsal bas nye bar bzhi pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi mthun pa med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po yongs su grub pa med
354b33(dkon brtsegs): thams mnan pa'o// rgyal ban pa kyang chub ni bathong mnam ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa la// rnam pa chen pa byang chub ni rnam par
354b34(dkon brtsegs): mayin pas skye ba med pas rab tu bya ba'o// rgyal ba chen po byang chub ni sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par mi
354b35(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyus pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa
354b36(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma mthams
354b37(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa med dang bral bas smos pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las rnams par smin pa
354b38(dkon brtsegs): du byed pa med 'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral 'dus ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan
354b39(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid de lta bu la/ sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag
354b40(dkon brtsegs): dpar byed pa de dag thams cad mi log par rtsol ba ba yin no// de ci'i phyir ches na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de 'dra ba
355a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pas na/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po
355a2(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'o// / de nas rgyal po dge ba'i dkod pas/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smraso//
355a3(dkon brtsegs): dems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan
355a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong
355a5(dkon brtsegs): sa dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yin no// tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / srab pa dang / sbyangs
355a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha
355a7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang kyis yongs su gdung ba thams cad byin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
355a8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi brtson bkrus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
355b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bas pa gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / tring nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni byang
355b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyan pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongasu tshol ba ni byang chub sems
355b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid pa nyid gis tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa skyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
355b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dang
355b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis so so yang dag par rigs pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba
355b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems pa
355b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don mthun pa mnyam pa nyid kyi
355b8(dkon brtsegs): sa po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems
356a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mnyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa yin no// nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa
356a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mtshan nyid
356a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tsho gas yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yin no// lus
356a4(dkon brtsegs): rjid kyis las dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la
356a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mo
356a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las dang las kyi rnams par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa 'i
356a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa ma'im pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs
356a8(dkon brtsegs): chun rtsa tsho bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug bsngal skye ba med pa shes pa mtsham pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad
356b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mdza' bshes dang bla shes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni byang chub
356b2(dkon brtsegs): mas kyi spyod pa yin no// lan re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
356b3(dkon brtsegs): bu nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa
356b4(dkon brtsegs): chud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos dben mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su mdzin pa ni byang
356b5(dkon brtsegs): na no// don dam pa'i dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dben pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
356b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges pa bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad dag pa
356b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa mnyam nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spong ba yin no// de nas
356b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba na pa'i bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid pa de dag thos nas dga' ba dang // mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu nga
357a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos dang / rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos rgyal mtshan la mngon pa
357a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gi chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag cag gis
357a3(dkon brtsegs): bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems canaHsa
357a4(dkon brtsegs): sa dpa'i sbyong ba de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob gyur cig ces kyang smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
357a5(dkon brtsegs): rebakod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang / rgyu ma tsam gyis mchod chen po ma yin gyi/ de las
357a6(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis de dag khyod kyis smra bas shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis
357a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag smras so// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun// byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing / mdzum sems kyis
357a8(dkon brtsegs): sa par ni// bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis byang chubo phyir ni sems skyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang /
357b1(dkon brtsegs): bu nga sems kyis rlom pa gcig par ba// don de dam 'a mang rnams khyad par 'phags// yang dag mur chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // dang ra
357b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa rnams// dge skyon mang kha ba ni spangs par// bla med byang chub zhi pa thob pa med// rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis//
357b3(dkon brtsegs): su la bkur ba ste// gang zhig sangs rgyas kun+da la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung bzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyi mnas
357b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i/ gang 'ga'i snyed sangs rgyaso zhing byin dang // gang zhig rab byung 'in dang mtshan gcig du// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med
357b5(dkon brtsegs): kA ra ba byung bag yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing //
357b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grib 'phel ba yin// rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skyes pos sdong // de ni ge
357b7(dkon brtsegs): zhid de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnams grol bdud kyi 'a
357b8(dkon brtsegs): / rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyod pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// de nas rgyal dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa
358a1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dgal mi lta bar gyur cing / sgrol 'dod chags
358a2(dkon brtsegs): du rgya par 'gyur te/ rab tu byung ba la sems gal bar gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri bu lA~M bu de la 'di skad ces ga
358a3(dkon brtsegs): dus bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rlab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob legs sam/ bcom
358a4(dkon brtsegs): shugs rmib lta bu nges bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la yang bar
358a5(dkon brtsegs): // khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis/
358a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom 'angs des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba
358a7(dkon brtsegs): po dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid bsgrub pa dang / sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa spob su yod
358a8(dkon brtsegs): tsad gis smram pa/ yab padag kyang dadapas kyim ma mchi'i ba rab tu 'byung lags kyis bdag cag mi ngor bar 'tshal// rgyal pas smras
358b1(dkon brtsegs): mas byu / ba pa 'dzin gyi mam ma cad kyi mamams maca gabyung bam byu mats+tsha
358b2(dkon brtsegs): mul na pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des rgyal srid sbubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin tu chug shig/ de nas
358b3(dkon brtsegs): de drug gi nang nas/ rgyal bu gzhonanu de dag gi snying rje cher sems shes bya ba des/ rang gi pha de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras
358b4(dkon brtsegs): tam stsags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyis// de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la
358b5(dkon brtsegs): gis smra ba// ji srid tsho bar bdag ni 'tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag rgyad pa blang bar bgyi// me tog rnams dang dri dang byug
358b6(dkon brtsegs): yang myang bar mi bgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing // mchil lham mi 'tshal rin cen gtsug phud min// khri rkang gser las
358b7(dkon brtsegs): tsha zhing // rgyal po'i rkyen gyis gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil snyan gla dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing // rma bya dang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid
358b8(dkon brtsegs): sa mdun bdar bud med gas spong zhing // gcig bu ma la na mchis nyal rlung gi g.ya be/ bdag ni gling nas gling du mchis bgyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab du
359a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bgyid// khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu byung ba bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang longs spyod dbang
359a2(dkon brtsegs): rbAs chos dang dge 'dun grong mi bgyid// byang chub semam ni sgrub pa mi bgyi zhing // rtag du yid byung srid gsum sbyang bar bgyi// sbyin
359a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing // bla med theg chen blo 'di la yang // srogs chags bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi// chos don
359a4(dkon brtsegs): nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum tu// ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi/
359a5(dkon brtsegs): gas pa ri ra ba lta bu de/ rgyal bu gzhonu snying rje cher sem so lA legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so//
359a6(dkon brtsegs): nga dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des ni/ khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang yon tan mtshungs pa yi
359a7(dkon brtsegs): narab tu byung ba'i yon tan sgrubs pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas rgyal po gzhon snying rje cher sems/ rgya
359a8(dkon brtsegs): badzang du gcig gis mtshang bad rjid cig du/ bcom pan 'das de'i bstan pa la ngang bas khyim nas kyim med pa rab tu byung bar gyur to// de sa
359b1(dkon brtsegs): nga de bzhi gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'dis de ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan pam/ dngag gis ring po mthogs par mngon par shes pa lta bskye
359b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i shes pa yid bskyed par gyur to// rgyal bu bzhon snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla ba
359b3(dkon brtsegs): ku du rjes su ston par byed do// ci nas kyang srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis bla med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
359b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa lnga dang pas khyim
359b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po 'dis bla na med med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to// shA re dwa ti'i bu ci tsam du
359b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas su spangs pa byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten tu gyur cig/ dad pa skyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i
359b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal rlog pa'i bkod pa ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyid dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
359b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i rgyal// lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to//
360a1(dkon brtsegs): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de nyan nig yin pa sna pa khyod soma'i dang // yid gnyis
360a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge sbyong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes
360a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong gi tha ma gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi dang // yid gnyis za
360a4(dkon brtsegs): lgang mri blta ste// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu
360a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus ni/ rgyal bu gnon d+he cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi dang // yid gnyis za bar
360a6(dkon brtsegs): nga ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus ni// rgyal bu gzhon snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon
360a7(dkon brtsegs): rapa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'byung ba yinan// btsam
360a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gdam pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srogs chags sum khri gnyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzos
360b1(dkon brtsegs): dutu rnams rnams// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i zas 'jam dpal gnor gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so'a'am dru la khyong ni lha'i bu dang dab ma
360b2(dkon brtsegs): myo klo nus tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa dang // sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
360b3(dkon brtsegs): bur spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi// kho bo ni 'dus byas su
360b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyong zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa mtshan nyid yin gyi/
360b5(dkon brtsegs): tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra ti'i bu tshangs par spyod
360b6(dkon brtsegs): yan gyi// kho ba ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa
360b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod par zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho ni yun ring po nas nas
360b8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos las gzhol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni
361a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang // chos las gnol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po mtshangs par spyod pa
361a2(dkon brtsegs): za ba// dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin kyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin gyis//
361a3(dkon brtsegs): dar spyod pa yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang
361a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo ni lun dring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang
361a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs pa tshud
361a6(dkon brtsegs): dzA ti'i tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyi kho bo ni yun ring po nas
361a7(dkon brtsegs): ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don tu gnyer ba ma yin
361a8(dkon brtsegs): gang ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas
361b1(dkon brtsegs): nan nis pang bani// bdu bsar nga ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus sa// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ de bzhi gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bsdu
361b2(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni cho ba med cing / tshor ba thams cad rgyan pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang
361b3(dkon brtsegs): du shes med cing / 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas// de la bsten bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed
361b4(dkon brtsegs): rus pa da// sa brnyog pa yin pas// de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing / yid gnas pa med pa yin
361b5(dkon brtsegs): gshe/ sa pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing // stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya
361b6(dkon brtsegs): sa pa ni rnam pa dang / sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan med pa'i yul yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya ba mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
361b7(dkon brtsegs): dang // gnyis dang bral ba yin pa bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin nang / rnam par rig pa med
361b8(dkon brtsegs): sa/ de la bsnyed bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang / reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing / thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
362a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ de la bsten bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing / chos dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba
362a2(dkon brtsegs): byar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa ni
362a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/ de la
362a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gshegs pa ni chen po chen stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang
362a5(dkon brtsegs): sten bkur bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas/ de la bsten bkur bya ba
362a6(dkon brtsegs): sopa ni migs pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa
362a7(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na migs gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhi
362a8(dkon brtsegs): bo mang po yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas/
362b1(dkon brtsegs): mar bya ba ma rnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs paman mang rab tu nimache bar mi ba yin pas ral bskang babar bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
362b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yid dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang bral ba
362b3(dkon brtsegs): kur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi
362b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ri spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
362b5(dkon brtsegs): rlab du med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas de la bsnyer bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di
362b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// zhes zer ba la/ btsur pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid
362b7(dkon brtsegs): / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye
362b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log brgyad rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyis dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma/
363a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun nas lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'gyod pa rtsa ba yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin no// bdag tu lta ba
363a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang gang zag tu lta ba rtsa ma yin pa de ni dge
363a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar lta brdza ba ma yin dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta brtsi
363a4(dkon brtsegs): de dgo ba'i rtsa ba yin no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba mi yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa
363a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug pa ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor ba rtsa
363a6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rbA shi
363a7(dkon brtsegs): nang dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang // drug pa rtsub ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yinan// 'dod pa'i khams
363a8(dkon brtsegs): / gzugs kyi khams ca' ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khamam tsha ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa lam yin no// sbyin pas rnam
363b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i
363b2(dkon brtsegs): dun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtogs
363b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslabs pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslabs pas rlom
363b4(dkon brtsegs): bya dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon
363b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub yag lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
363b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la lta bskyed pa'i rtsa ba ma yin dang / mi slob pa'i chos du
363b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma
363b8(dkon brtsegs): chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib pa rtsa ba ma
364a1(dkon brtsegs): sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
364a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis
364a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin
364a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems mi
364a5(dkon brtsegs): saM can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'dog pa thams
364a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba dang / rnams par smin pa re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len partsa
364a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / bzhi pa dang dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa
364a8(dkon brtsegs): ga dang gzhanas yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po bcom pa'i rtsa la dang / dman po'i chos yang dag pa
364b1(dkon brtsegs): / bsas bya/ padang / bsam gan rgyar byung bar mi byed pa'i sa byu
364b2(dkon brtsegs): zu ma pa'i rtsa ba dang / thamasna cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rgyun mi brjod pa'i rtsa ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
364b4(dkon brtsegs): n+da pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa pa yin no// lus dang / ngagA dang / sems kyi rgyun gyi rtsa ba gang yin
364b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dage ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems rapa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
364b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin no// mngon par shes pa dang /
364b7(dkon brtsegs): kho gAng yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su drag par
364b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni byang chubro sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byang chub sems kyi snying por 'gro ba byin
365a1(dkon brtsegs): rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i dag rtsa ba'i rtsa
365a2(dkon brtsegs): sums dpa'i dag pa che pa chen/ 'jam dpal gzhin myur pa na ma pa sa pa ban pa
365a3(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes bya ba byin nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog rnams
365a4(dkon brtsegs): tor nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa
365a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi
365a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mngon par ldan pa yin no// de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no// de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di la snang
365a7(dkon brtsegs): yon na zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des smras pa la/ rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas lnga
365a8(dkon brtsegs): ring dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu bgang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa 'ang thos nas sems par gyur pa de yang tsha 'phral
365b1(dkon brtsegs): na po yin te/ de dag ni de las gzhin pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lnga'i bu 'di lta ste rtan
365b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang
365b3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos
365b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'dra
365b5(dkon brtsegs): tshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon lam pa med par bshad pa dang /
365b6(dkon brtsegs): ra 'dzin par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi
365b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag du la ba yin pas na/ yang dag par dul
365b8(dkon brtsegs): yang swAbar mi 'gyur/ ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen
366a1(dkon brtsegs): de sa gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di sa ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga'i 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su bzung bas ya /
366a2(dkon brtsegs): rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'bul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la brang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa /
366a3(dkon brtsegs): na pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang
366a4(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa'i dge
366a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin
366a6(dkon brtsegs): drug se
366a7(dkon brtsegs): rin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yo ba med pa dang / sems can rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems med pa gnas pa la gnas
366a8(dkon brtsegs): / nga/
366a9(dkon brtsegs): sa kyis gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing gsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing gsal ba dang bral bas
366a10(dkon brtsegs): sa pa spangs pa dang / dmyigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa med la rlom sems med pa dang / rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par
366a11(dkon brtsegs): / sems pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom sems pa med pa de'i tshe bdag dang rang bzhin du mthong ba med pa dang mthong ba med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs
366b1(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba med pa la snyid mug pa med pa dang sri pa med pa la nan mangs pa'i rnamed pa dang / na mangs pas ma yin pa'i sems la gsal bsdang ba dang / gsal bathod pa
366b2(dkon brtsegs): m+b+hathong ba dang / ye shes mthong bra la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis blugs mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rlom
366b3(dkon brtsegs): com pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon tu 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la nas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye
366b4(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams la thos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa
366b5(dkon brtsegs): sums so// kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la ci 'dri ba de dang nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras
366b6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa med pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa
366b7(dkon brtsegs): pade bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bem po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du brjod brjod par byed do// btsun
366b8(dkon brtsegs): sa thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du gnas pa 'jog par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad
367a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'god par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag
367a2(dkon brtsegs): du 'chad par byed do// btsun pa shA dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gnas kyang ma blangs gang tu yang mkhrid pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa'ang ma yin/ spangs pa'angam
367a3(dkon brtsegs): nga rung ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid de mi 'dong ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
367a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar
367a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du sems las byung ba gang yin pa chos rnams la yang bstsags pa med do// de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bstsags
367a6(dkon brtsegs): sa pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bstsags pa med do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bstsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pas nyon
367a7(dkon brtsegs): mas sa pa de la yang bstsags pa med de/ btsun pa gar dwa ti'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pami gnas pa'i tshan mongs pa rnams sangs pa de yang gyi phrul ma
367a8(dkon brtsegs): des kyi bu kyi gyis 'angam dpal gtsan zu pas 'dis das smras so// lam dpas drang chubasams dpa' rnams kyigs pa gang na la
367b1(dkon brtsegs): sasmras pa/ lha'i bsdug bsngam yongs su shes pa'i shes dang / phung po yongs su spang ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / dge pa'i
367b2(dkon brtsegs): par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / skye ba dang 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnams par she ba dang / rgyu shes pa dang / rlung mi zla ba shes pa
367b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon sum du bya ba spangs pa shes pa dang / rkyen shes dang / tshogs bstsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
367b4(dkon brtsegs): che dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spang ba shes
367b5(dkon brtsegs): nga / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtogs pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang
367b6(dkon brtsegs): na' bar shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang /
367b7(dkon brtsegs): nga ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan la ldog pa shes pa dang
367b8(dkon brtsegs): sa bang / lba ba yongs su ldog pa shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / semasas su gi/
368a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog du dga' ba shes pa
368a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsal rloHpa de bags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang //
368a3(dkon brtsegs): shangs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba shes dang / mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par
368a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yi dpa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs
368a5(dkon brtsegs): mangs thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang
368a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang mchog dang mcho
368a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par
368a8(dkon brtsegs): tshi shes pa dang / stong chen pos skrag par migs pashes pa dang / yang bshes pa dang / dge pa'i nga tharnams cad mi 'ad ba shes padang / skye ba med pashes pa dang
368b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i chos ma bzod pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi las
368b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dranas
368b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa
368b4(dkon brtsegs): ngos su tshol ba lan du bshes pa dang / sdig pa thams sa cad mi bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / thos pa'i
368b5(dkon brtsegs): skyob phra sa zla bar bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas
368b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yig zas pa dang / gnas ma yin par mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang // rjes su ma
368b7(dkon brtsegs): pa shes tsha thabs kyi jigs pa shes pa dang / par du bcod pa shes pa dang / bar du bcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i
368b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam pa roshes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' bar shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba
369a1(dkon brtsegs): dus la ma thogs pa'i shes dang / gnas pa med pa'i dang / rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems
369a2(dkon brtsegs): mas rta sa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid sngon tu 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems
369a3(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i
369a4(dkon brtsegs): phongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sem
369a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo can yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs
369a6(dkon brtsegs): dres pa shes pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chu
369a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa thob bo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji tsam du byang
369a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ shes pa de ni
369b1(dkon brtsegs): da nga ldanapas yang dag par bcu bar mirnas sa// 'jam dpal gang des bu 'i shes paskyed par byed pa des co 'drul chen pa yin na/ dam thong
369b2(dkon brtsegs): / 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis tshe byang
369b3(dkon brtsegs): druba'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin
369b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras
369b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa/ lha'i bu brtsam pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par
369b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ sbas pa lha'i bu shes rab kyis bzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa
369b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya// smras pa
369b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang / lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsom par yang byed pas de'i phyir sems
370a1(dkon brtsegs): can dag pa zhes bya'o// sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par
370a2(dkon brtsegs): ma na da par skyong bar byed pas de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gan
370a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras
370a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can rnams shin tu gdul ba la rab tu 'god pa byed pas de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sem
370a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa lha'i bu ji tsam gyis gdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang
370a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul pa dka' ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu ji ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi
370a7(dkon brtsegs): sim pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de ltar du ni thub par dka' ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltaran
370a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/ sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos
370b1(dkon brtsegs): rnya 'i byung bya chung ba desas kyisan byang na bamams dpa' mang par mas pa yinan// sa pa/ 'jas dpas sa na/ kyang du ba sems dpa sa
370b2(dkon brtsegs): sna'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par zla ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ des bun chos sla ba yi do// snus
370b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par ba
370b4(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji lta na don smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe thos pa thams cad la nan tan gyi sgo
370b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/
370b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gni phun sum chog/
370b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin da \u0f7f/ sgras tshe 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chal pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa 'jam da
370b8(dkon brtsegs): ji sngarar byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin/
371a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo ba ma yi med pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni g.yo ba med pa yin
371a2(dkon brtsegs): smra pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no//
371a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ pra lu d+hi ltar na nga rgyal med pa yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems can thams cad la 'jud par byed cing / mi dge ba mi byed pa des bu ning rgyal med
371a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ ma dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi yongs su bsdus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos
371a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos pa'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na srog gi phyir ya
371a6(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no//
371a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu grang rnam par bsams na/ chos 'ga' yang mi dmyigs pa yin no// smras pa
371a8(dkon brtsegs): 8stor na bsam gtan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khas su byis mi sdang ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/
371b1(dkon brtsegs): ga sar ses bya ba ni sgrib par mi byed pa yinado// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa spu'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi
371b2(dkon brtsegs): de rnam par lta ba yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad nam mkha' snga bur shes nas byang chub
371b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe thob cing shes rab cu ni bathob kyi
371b4(dkon brtsegs): ga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu sems can thams cad
371b5(dkon brtsegs): ral jig rten na/ spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus
371b6(dkon brtsegs): yongan smras pa lha'i bu gong gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mthun par ston pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal
371b7(dkon brtsegs): lta nyi / yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no// smras
371b8(dkon brtsegs): dam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin
372a1(dkon brtsegs): no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang
372a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong la/ gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na lha'i bu rna ba 'thob pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par
372a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun
372a4(dkon brtsegs): sa pa~M yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa l+le'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha' bu rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' la
372a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba yinado// sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la/ bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang
372a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na dul ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe ba dul ba rnams 'dul ba yino// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/
372a7(dkon brtsegs): pi ru dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur pa yino//
372a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji sar na'i ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no//
372b1(dkon brtsegs): sa tha ma pas ji ltar na dang pa yin/ rdzas pa sku'i bu gangasangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis bye yang mi byed pa yin no// sbas pa'angam pal dris ran/ byang chub
372b2(dkon brtsegs): shAbs la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa skra'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byang chub sems kyi rag lus par mthong ba yin no// bstan pa 'didun
372b3(dkon brtsegs): chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de
372b4(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang na
372b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes du dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras pa te/ gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do// lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la gzhan
372b6(dkon brtsegs): na ces skyes so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod spobs pa 'dis bu dang ldan/ 'jam dpal gyis
372b7(dkon brtsegs): spros pa mo sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang / sems las byung ba ci snyed 'gags pa snyed la'o// smras pa 'jam dpal srul pa nyid la yang sems dang sems las byung
372b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dag/ med nam sprul pa lta ci smos/ smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin
373a1(dkon brtsegs): no// sbas pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ spras pa lha'i bu gal te de bzhin bu'i srul pa zhig la
373a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis yan+ya ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa la spyad ces dris na/ ci de lan ldon par byed dam/ smras pa 'jam dpal ri de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do// smas pa lha'i
373a3(dkon brtsegs): bya de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas/ kho bos ji skad du kho bo yun ring po 'di tsam ni gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhes lan gdab par bya/ smras
373a4(dkon brtsegs): nga ser sna can yin nam/ smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ji las bsams te de skad smra/ spras pa lha
373a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ba de ser sna can yin nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
373a6(dkon brtsegs): da yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i ron kho bos shes pa ltar na khyod na
373a7(dkon brtsegs): so 'tshal pa yin nam/ sbas pa lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni tshul khrims 'ja' chal po yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de sa /
373a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pa spu'i bu yang tshul khrims 'chas pa dang song gsum po dag tu srung ba ma yin nam/ spras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin no// sras pa lha'i chu la pa yang sems can yangs
373b1(dkon brtsegs): namang bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin dungan song rnams su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir kho bon tshul khrims 'tshal ba yin no// smras pa'ajam dpal ci khyod gnod sems dang ldan pa yin
373b2(dkon brtsegs): srasu po lnga'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te sad sgra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gnod sa
373b3(dkon brtsegs): de rjes su 'chags pa med pa ma yin nam/ sbas pa 'jam dpal de bzhin no// spras pa lha'i bu kho bo ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / byis pa thams cad dang /
373b4(dkon brtsegs): ngas rgyas kyi sa thams cad las rjes su 'chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci khyod le lonan
373b5(dkon brtsegs): 'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni le lo can yin no// sbas pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de sar smai/ smras pa lha'i bu le lo can zhes bya ba ni/ gangs
373b6(dkon brtsegs): yod kyis mi rtsom pa yin la kho bo yang rtsom pa myed cing btul bar mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no//
373b7(dkon brtsegs): smra so pa 'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin na// smras pa lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo na sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod
373b8(dkon brtsegs): ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin nam/ spras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin
374a1(dkon brtsegs): no// smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya/
374a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/ smras
374a3(dkon brtsegs): nyashin te/ kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing sems
374a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang / lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal pa ma yin nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa lha'i bu kho bo yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing / de
374a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo na shes rab 'chal pa yino// smras pa 'jam dpal 'jig
374a6(dkon brtsegs): na gnas su yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang dag bsad pa gsod pa'i sems skyed pa rnams so// smras po 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu gang
374a7(dkon brtsegs): dpe zhes bya ba de ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug rnams te/ gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni bsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas yin no//
374a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no// smras pa lha'i bu ga te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' sreg par 'gyur na ni 'jig rten
374b1(dkon brtsegs): yong skrag par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yal gnas pa pa yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa 'jam dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa'i
374b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur pa de dag gang tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ sbas pa lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// sbas pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de sa sa/ sbas pa lha'i
374b3(dkon brtsegs): ny+dzan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir na na/ skyon med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na/ gang dag mos
374b4(dkon brtsegs): rab de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa lha'i bu rnam par grol ba ni yang rnam par grol ba
374b5(dkon brtsegs): ma par grol bar 'gyur ba med do// sbas pa 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba rnams yin no// smras pa lha'i bu gang dag rna
374b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no// smras pa lha'i bu stong pa
374b7(dkon brtsegs): / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so// smras pa 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la/ gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ smras pa
374b8(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro// smras
375a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams can
375a2(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpas sems da can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no// smras
375a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'a/ dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu sems can gyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal chos
375a4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras
375a5(dkon brtsegs): sa cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ smras pa lha'i bu mig gi yul ni
375a6(dkon brtsegs): ni yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i yin no// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul nirna
375a7(dkon brtsegs): / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// snga'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//
375a8(dkon brtsegs): kyim rnaMs sargyas kyi yus yin te/ sa sa kyi tshus ni byed nga / me pa gas pa'i lum pa yid // sus kyi yu nas sa rgyas kyi yul d-i/ @#
375b1(dkon brtsegs): bus ni mus dang reg bya dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang chos kyi dang / rnam pa rigs pa'i tshus
375b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yi mo/ gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs su rung ba'i yul ma yin no// tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
375b3(dkon brtsegs): myong ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du byed
375b4(dkon brtsegs): yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i yul ma yino// rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas
375b5(dkon brtsegs): kApA'i yul ma yin no// ma rig pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sgyu rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no// rga shi'i bdag
375b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas
375b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po
375b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus ma byas
376a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus ma byas
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan ma nyid gsum pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no// lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
376a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dang mtha' ma yin pa yul yin pa'i phyir yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khongs su chud pa yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bu/
376a4(dkon brtsegs): kye khang don gyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa yang ma yin te/ des ni bdud kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i
376a5(dkon brtsegs): yul dngan par rdzogs par khong du chud do// lha'i bu gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed kyang mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' ba
376a6(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi su 'phrul chen po yin no// de la mnyam pa nyid ni gang / mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no//
376a7(dkon brtsegs): shang das stong po nying la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong parjid kyi mnyam pa'i sa
376a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par
376b1(dkon brtsegs): rA pa'i mnyam pa
376b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mtshan ma nyid las kyang mi g.yom// chos thams cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par
376b3(dkon brtsegs): rimanyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su srid par byed kyang smod pa
376b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa nyid las kyang yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de
376b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang
376b6(dkon brtsegs): 'o// chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam
376b7(dkon brtsegs): dben par mnyam pa nyid dang / dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam
376b8(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su sbyin par byed kyang ma ngan
376b9(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo' ste/ lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa nyi dang / mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod
377a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams
377a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la slebs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis shi smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsams kyis mi khyab pa yin no// smras pa 'jam
377a3(dkon brtsegs): lur+ya nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
377a4(dkon brtsegs): pang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
377a5(dkon brtsegs): ma gyis mi khyab ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// gti mug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
377a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab ste/ shes shes rab kyi bya ba bsgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin
377a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rlom sems su byed pa'i stod pa ni sa ma yin no// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims
377a8(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// gnod sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlo mar sems su byed pa'i skyod
377b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dri ma yin no// le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i yin te/ brtson 'grus kyi rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// rnam par ga
377b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod
377b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
377b4(dkon brtsegs): na te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// rang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang
377b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
377b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pas mi
377b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug
377b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham tsom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med
378a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
378a2(dkon brtsegs): pa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sngar dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rjes su 'gyod pa med pa
378a3(dkon brtsegs): la gcugs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems
378a4(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa/ da pa yin no// yid dam ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems
378a5(dkon brtsegs): ra la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
378a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dgra thams cad nges par
378a7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa sa dpa' bas spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bo dang / 'thun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
378a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gshe ba dang / sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ri byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
378b1(dkon brtsegs): sar+b+bas sngapa dang / chos nyan pa dang / thams bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems pa
378b2(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi spyod pa yin no// sus dang ngag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas rgyan gyis par byed pas spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor pa
378b3(dkon brtsegs): su pa dang mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// skye bo mkhas shing 'dzangs pa rnam
378b4(dkon brtsegs): se pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin du nges par brgyugs pas sa
378b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// khur blangs pa nyams su len pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
378b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog par khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyong ba yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdung pas
378b7(dkon brtsegs): sa spyod pa ni byang chub sems na dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
378b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// dkor mchog gsum bri bar mi byed pas/ dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdud pa dang / yongs su gcod pas
379a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'a
379a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
379a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma
379a4(dkon brtsegs): ya ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tsheng
379a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba ded mkhal bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de rangs mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
379a6(dkon brtsegs): sob bo// lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gyi spyod pa de la bur de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de bzhin gshes
379a7(dkon brtsegs): 'an 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni tsa lags/ 'jug pa
379a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzod man
379b1(dkon brtsegs): mabyas pa'i bu'i mnan cing ga cig grangags yin te/ da byung nga gyur la phyis ma byung bar gyur ba ma yin te/ 'ani gsong mnas byung ba nyid yin no// do rdzon
379b2(dkon brtsegs): bA rUs/ phyis mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon skyes par gyur la/ phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni bzod ma
379b3(dkon brtsegs): man 'an zhus pa du skyes yang pa 'ams sbyis na/
379b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis ska
379b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur la phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni bzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis gang zag tu mi ba
379b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin te/ de ni bzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mtshan mar mi bzang bar gyur la phyis mtshan mar mi bzang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod pa
