397b6(dkon brtsegs): srid du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin de/ byams pa legs so las
397b7(dkon brtsegs): so// ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra 'di lta bu sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
397b8(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i khur klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do// de skad ces bka'
398a1(dkon brtsegs): gastsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom
398a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dpa pa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mchid kyis 'che ba/ dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/ glen pa/ blun po// rnyed pa dang //
398a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang / kha kur sti la bsdu ba/ mdza' bshes kyi sdum pa dang / slongs mo sder ba'i snum pa la bsdu ba/ bsod snyoms la sbyor bar brtson pa de dag gi
398a4(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis rgyu de dag thos na de dag rtogs pas myur du myur bar spyod par 'gyur
398a5(dkon brtsegs): cing / nongs pa de dag las bdag nyid srung bar bgyid pa dang / skyes bu dam pa lags pa de dag las kyang la la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing / de bzhin gshegs
398a6(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag rtogs so// rab tu rtogs so zhes de bzhin gshes pa dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems da
398a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byakhyams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes
398a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas gang yin pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par byaste/ byams pa des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa thas/ byang chub sems dpa ro khas che ba mang po 'byung ba'i dedag gi
398b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzog pa 'dod pa kyang yin pa de dag pas par bya'o byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ khyangan pa sems dpa' las rje ba yin par rig par /
398b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / yo byad 'dod pa dang / yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tshe bar byed pa yin te byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos pani pa de dag dang rdza
398b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ byang chub sems dpar khas che ba mang po yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpar khas che ba khyi'i chos
398b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig du/ khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na/
398b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas de la zugs par byed/ 'khren skad 'byin/ khro bas blta bar byed/ gnod sems kyi nyes pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir
398b6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed do// byams pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpang khas che ba/ khyi chos kun tu spyod pa mang po
398b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi khyim dang / gzhan gyi khyo grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed na
398b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang / yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong des sngon phyin pa'i khyim dang / dge slong gzhan zhig 'ong ba mthong na de khyim pa 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas/ khro bas blta bar byed/
399a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems skyed par byed/ thab mo dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa skyed pa dang / phan tshun dbyen gyi tshig sba bar byed/ tshig rtsub po ba
399a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do// dge slong mche ge mo zhe bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan pa brjod par byed cing / khyim
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la yang gal te khyod kho bo dang sten par 'dod na/ dge slong che mo zhig dang sten par mi bya zhing / dge slong mang po ge mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur
399a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba ring du mi gnas pa/ spad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyed pa yin no// de dag ni yi dgas kyi yon tan gyi chos kun spyod cing / dbul ba dang /
399a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par las che bar byed cing bdag
399a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun tu spyod pa yin bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjodapa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags
399a7(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod cing / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod cing nas/ zas dang gos sgrub par byed do// byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bskas
399a8(dkon brtsegs): cing seng ge'i las rnam par bya ba'i rigs pa wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / gnod sems dang tha ba dang /
399b1(dkon brtsegs): can gyi yang bying kun mo ring ba yongs su gtong ba mi byed la/ ser mas bris gyis dan byu / byung ba tshangams grags pa/ gtang ba de dag gos byabyor ris camasas
399b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / gnod sems dang tha ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed
399b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gnod sems su byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par smra ba'am/ ngan s+ho
399b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ don mthun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad bar 'gyur ba la spyos/ de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par
399b5(dkon brtsegs): zad pa dang / 'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems sem dpa'i brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus nabs
399b6(dkon brtsegs): bgrangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya che ba tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i
399b7(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
399b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs
400a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang 'dis ste dper na/ da ska rang bzhin du/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa/ kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo // byams pa de'i tshen dge slong brtson 'grus
400a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba/ cho ga shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ra ba la ni nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/
400a3(dkon brtsegs): de grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag tu song ste phyin pa dang / chos ston par byed cing rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag dang /
400a4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang / ri mo byas mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byaso// de khyim gang du zhugs shing
400a5(dkon brtsegs): gang las tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba thob par gyur pa'i khyim der ni da lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems skyed par mi byed do//
400a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang log par lta ba dang / ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing / de dag tu son pa na de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer de dag tshig snyan pa yang /
400a7(dkon brtsegs): mi brjod pa'i steng du/ de sa khro bar byed gage bar byed na/ yang de bzod pa'i go bgos shing snying rje chen pos gnas pas 'grol/ khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur mi
400a8(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde' bar yang mi 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
400b1(dkon brtsegs): mal rgya dang / sman dang / na pa'i gsos ldan dang / yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'jo ba gyur ro// byams pa 'di kyi snyam du sems/ de
400b2(dkon brtsegs): dag du yang 'gro bar mi byed cing 'gro bar sems sbed par yong mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems skyed par byed snya ma 'am/ byams pas gsom
400b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gsol bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byams pa de sar byang chub sems pa
400b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / gtung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing dge slong gan
400b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas/ de dag du lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang / 'jungs pa dang / ma dad pa dang / log par ldan pa'i khyim de gang dag yin pa de dag dang pa
400b6(dkon brtsegs): byed cing de dag khro zhing gshen yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur pa'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung
400b7(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid dang / cho ga shes pa nyid dang / nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams khyim pa dag dad par byas shing /
400b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi nyes par 'tsho bar khyed kyi/ bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' ba
401a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mos shes bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de tshe de'i du
401a2(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur to// byams pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems das
401a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su bslab par yang bya/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag gi rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing de
401a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi chos kun tu sbyang bar yang bya'o// / byams pa yang phye ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas che ba'i dge slong kha cig
401a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ khyim rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma/
401a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag na gtsigs la gcig bsngags pa ma yin brjod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / rtson pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro// de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs par
401a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba skur bdag nyid kyis rnyed par ni de snya ma yin la/ ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur bskur/ bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed par ni de sa ma yin no// bya
401a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad sa mi blta bar gzhan dag la sbyin pas bya ba yin na/ de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu gyur pa
401b1(dkon brtsegs): ma/ daci'i phyir zhen/ byams pa 'di ltar dres ni bdag gis sems can thams cad bde ba bskyed par bya'o// zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i
401b2(dkon brtsegs): // byams pa'i 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gtsigs bu cig skrag pa 'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa la/ lan 'gas zhog gi phyi
401b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos btson rar bcug par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam mkhyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i btson rang der
401b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas 'gyur snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
401b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni 'di lta bu cig pa de tha rang bar bgyi bsams pas/ bdag gis bu cig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar bar bgyi'o snyam nas/ bu gcig pa yid la bgyi ba
401b6(dkon brtsegs): kho na dag gis btson ra der 'jug por bgyid de/ thar pa yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid la gos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
401b7(dkon brtsegs): pangs dpe' de ni don gyi shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te/ 'dir don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po'i btson ra ji
401b8(dkon brtsegs): kha de bzhin du 'khor ba'i btson nor lta bur bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag ji lta ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o//
402a1(dkon brtsegs): khyams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ bu cig pa de ji lta ba bzhin du ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu cig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa
402a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bar bya'o// khyams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nams khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing / ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi bu cig pa dang 'dra don du btson der 'ju/
402a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin du ni/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos gos kyi ched dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya yi/ 'di ltar sems can de dag
402a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya bar blta bar bya'o// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dge slong lus ma
402a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung te/ de dag ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes
402a6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang 'bras bu'i skyes ngag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang yo byad kyi skyes dag dang byas pa'i lar gyi skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas/ khyams pa dge slong gis na ma
402a7(dkon brtsegs): tog 'breng brgyad lta bur mi bya zhing / bran dang las mis bur yang mi bya'o// byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya bar 'dod pas ni chos kyis skyes kyis 'gro bar byams
402a8(dkon brtsegs): par skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya zhing / zan des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / phan mchags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa
402b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha gsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// khyim rnams su song nas ca'o/ sangs rgyas
402b2(dkon brtsegs): sa dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa
402b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya zhing chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched dam/ zhing las kyi ched dam/ rnyed pa bde ba'i ched dam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam 'am/ rgyal po che
402b4(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'am/ chom rkun gyi gtam 'am/ grong gi gtam 'am/ grong gi khyer gyi gtam 'am/ ljongs kyi gtam 'am/ bu'i gtam 'am/ bu mo'i gtam 'am/ gtam gzhan gyi
402b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes dag mi bya'o// byams pa gang gis skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig la
402b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
402b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dag la byin par gyur na/ nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni/ des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse ba 'am/ phan gdags par mi 'gyur
402b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ de tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/ de yang de'i rna ba'i rnams par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/ re shig dang ba thob par ma gyur
403a1(dkon brtsegs): du zin kyang / de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin myang du byed pa yin no// khyam
403a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing / ci tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der
403a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brtson par byed pa ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar gser ram/ dngul lama?/ nor bu dag gam/ rin po che dag gam/ mu tig dag gam/
403a4(dkon brtsegs): DUr+ya dag gam/ dung dag gam/ man shel dag gam/ byu ru dag gam/ bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las/ yongs su
403a5(dkon brtsegs): thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can na pa'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
403a6(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsnga
403a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur gyi/ chos thos nas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs sutha
403a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur la/ sems cand pa'i chos can rnams kyang nang rnams mas yangs su thar bar 'gyur/ sems canan pa dang / 'chib dang / mya dang / sde sngags 'ang
403b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang 'ag 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur bu'i phyir de/ desas dgongasu de de
403b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces/ stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis// bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa na// tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas
403b3(dkon brtsegs): ji sar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin/ phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis/ 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi/ bde ba'i gang dag yod pa de dag
403b4(dkon brtsegs): kun// sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa pas/ gang gis de las sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni/ tshig bzhi tshigs su bcad pa gcig skyugs na// de ni shin tu phan 'dogs
403b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog yin te// des ni sdug bsngal dag las 'grol bar 'gyur/ zhes bstan te/ khyams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag
403b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul kha bu phul ba bas ni/ snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshigs su
403b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig cig bsgrags par gyur na/ de ni de bsu ches bcom ldan 'das bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ming gang gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/
403b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams mchog rin po che na bkang byas te// dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang // gang gis sems can gcig la chags bcang byin// rin chen sbyin
404a1(dkon brtsegs): chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya// chen des tshigs bcad snying rjes bsgrubs de la// char yang mi bod grangs su yang ma yin na// gnyis sam gsums
404a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam dug la yod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ khyams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
404a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na
404a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag g.yas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu g.yo bar mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams
404a5(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar sgrub par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnam
404a6(dkon brtsegs): la dang / gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas chu sri 'dzin 'khri'i sdug bsngal chen po des
404a7(dkon brtsegs): thar bar mi 'gyur bar byams pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i chos rin po che yang dag par ston par
404a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya ning khyod zang zing la/
404b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dru bar mi bya'i/ khyed chos la bsdu bar bya'o// khyams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/
404b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khas che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lus ma bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma bas
404b3(dkon brtsegs): pos sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang nyes pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyi/ phyin chad yang dag par bsdam pa'i phyir smon par yang mi byed do// des ni sngon
404b4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par srung mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus
404b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba byas pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing phyin chad sdom par ni mi byed do// byams pa gzhan yang des byang chub sems dpa'i theg
404b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal ba byas pas ni mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gra
404b7(dkon brtsegs): skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye bar rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag tu yang lhung bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpas ni myur du byed par
404b8(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing mdze mdog dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs par lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i gnas thams cad
405a1(dkon brtsegs): la yid skrag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag rgal nas khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o//
405a2(dkon brtsegs): dgrol bar bya'o// dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems can thams cad nye bar
405a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir te/ khyams pa des ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor
405a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi steng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / 'khor ji snyed pa dang / dgos pa ji snyed pa dang / dor bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ci snyed pa de snyed ni sems can 'ga'
405a5(dkon brtsegs): la yang ma mthong ngo // byams pa 'di ni lha ste dper na la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal
405a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gi spyi bo 'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces kyi skyes bu khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang dri dang /
405a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas tsu Tang dang / nags rgyas dang bangs pa 'di bzlas pa'am/ bskal pa las sdug pa'am/ bskas pa stong ngas/ bskal pa bum gyi bar du 'deg par bya
405a8(dkon brtsegs): mal 'i ga pa thas su ma mas tha rjengs da
405b1(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byabs pa gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma
405b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas kyang gang zhig gis
405b3(dkon brtsegs): mas can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes sems can thams cad nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems can dpa'i khur dang spo ba dang /
405b4(dkon brtsegs): mthu stobs dang / brtson 'grus ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gi las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
405b5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ci tsam pa de tsam du gyur la/ des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang se gol gtogs pa tsam gcig
405b6(dkon brtsegs): gris yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa 'di ni ji snyam du sems mi de'i las de stobs dang ldan pa
405b7(dkon brtsegs): yin snyam 'am/ khyams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ltar lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa lag so//
405b8(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs po stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ khyams pa
406a1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skad du/ gang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ba sgral bar bya'o zhes tshig
406a2(dkon brtsegs): tu brjod pa nas las su bya ba byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim bdag la la zhig la bu cig sdug pa/ 'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba
406a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong na mi mthun pa zhes med pa zhig bdog par gyur la khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi le lan gyis bu cig pa dang bcas chung ma dang bcas/ las byed pa dang / zho shas 'a
406a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du/
406a5(dkon brtsegs): kwa'e khyim bdag khyed 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod pas/ don 'di'i phyir zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la che mo khyer te/
406a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang zhag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par shog shig dang / de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu gcig pu 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di dag thams cad dang / nor dang dbyigs dang /
406a7(dkon brtsegs): yo byad 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing / gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid byed kyi sbyin pa yang skrag par smin par bya'o// gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de
406a8(dkon brtsegs): nas cha blangs te/ nyin mtshan bdun gyis phyir ma 'ongs na/ khyod chung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya'i steng du/ khyod cig pa dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas
406b1(dkon brtsegs): tshadangs bcad pa dang / srog dang bral zhing bsad par bya'o// zhes brno bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag de de sang bsgo ba na bdag pangs pa dang /
406b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / bu bangs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'khor pangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor pangs pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson pa dang /
406b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lag so//
406b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ de ni don de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du/ sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyid zas kyi 'du shes
406b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed par mi bgyid/ rmugs pa nyid kyi sems skyed par mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de'i srad pha rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag la
406b6(dkon brtsegs): zhog lags kyi bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus brtsom pa
406b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang ldan par gyur kyang / sems can de dag thams cad brtson 'grus chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi
406b8(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du yang
407a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpe' ni rgyan phyogs su ded pa'i sems can thams cad rgyan las bzlog
407a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i g.yo ba med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu dgod par byed pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ myi 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du
407a3(dkon brtsegs): shugs dang ldan pa/ 'di tsam du mthu dang / 'di'i tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur na/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag na chu'i phung po gang ji
407a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyur/ gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyun las
407a5(dkon brtsegs): bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du bab par gyur na/ khyams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus
407a6(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta legs so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
407a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun du bskyed nas/
407a8(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yinan// dbas
407b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang dag sangs rgyas yod do// chos yod do// dge 'dun yod do// legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnam kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do nas /
407b2(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi
407b3(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang ti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag mdza'
407b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes dang / gros grogs dang / nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing longs spyod dru du dang / longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas
407b5(dkon brtsegs): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba'i sems kyis khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo
407b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar
407b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar byed pa de dag ches cha shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas gdams ngag la nan tan gyis mdzes
407b8(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'di ci'i gtam la 'jig par
408a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dben pa 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs de/ gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no//
408a2(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yino// de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes
408a3(dkon brtsegs): su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba khyedan pa dang / dgra bcom la pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar ba
408a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyams pa 'di lta ste 'phags pa'i chos pa / 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / rab tu byung
408a5(dkon brtsegs): zheng bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po dang 'bras bu thob par de ni shin tu dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// khyams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tham la dam pa'i chos
408a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dus la bab pa'i chen/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas byang chub sems pa'i lus spangs te/ byis pa'i
408a7(dkon brtsegs): lus la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sas
408a8(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so// nyi shu gang zhin/ ser sna'i sems can tshar cad par bya ba dang / gtso
408b1(dkon brtsegs): bachen ze spel bar bya ba dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i mun
408b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spang bar bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par gnod par bya ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang / brjed pas
408b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi rten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa sgom par bya ba dang / shes
408b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang / smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /
408b5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa'i yul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
408b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang / yid ches par bya ba ste/ byams pa bzhi po 'di
408b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang / chos kyis ngoms mi ngoms mi shes pa dang / chos
408b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// sems can rnams 'khor thog ma dang tha ma med pa las thar bar bya'o// sems
408b9(dkon brtsegs): byams padu po de das ni byang chub sems pa rnams kyi las na/ las de ga yong su mdzems ca chung sems dpa ga cung ca
409a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu gzhug par bya'o// zhes yang dag par dam pa
409a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no// byams pa 'dis ste dper na/ mi sman mkhas la/ gsang sngags mkhas
409a3(dkon brtsegs): shing dug dang / rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod par gyur / de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du btang ba'i sman za bar byed ci ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes bskyed pa
409a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ dug za bar byed cing zos ras kyang yan lag dang / nying lag rnams shig shig por gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las/ yang gsang sngags sngon du
409a5(dkon brtsegs): btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing / de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang / sman des dug gi nyes pa de dag dang bar gyur la/ de nas mi res dus gzhan gyi tshe na/ sman de ma rnyed cing gnyen po
409a6(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed pas dug des shi bar gyur la/ de nas mi gcig gos des 'di skad smras te/ kho bo ni sman gyis dugazhi bar byed nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la ni ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi
409a7(dkon brtsegs): dgos/ yan lag dang nying lag shig shig por 'gyur ba mi dgos pas dug kyang mi za/ sman yang mi thung ngo // zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus snga
409a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa tham la byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba kha cig de dag 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus por zad par 'gyur rinas
409b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / de dag sdig pa mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas yang bshags par bya'o zhes ltung ba lhag par byed cing / phyis sdob pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar
409b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no// zhes nga sma te/ 'chi ba yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas log par srung ba
409b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no// byams pa byang chub lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'di skad ces bdag cag la ni dug kyang mi
409b4(dkon brtsegs): dgos sman yang mi dgos kyi/ bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lngar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtogs par sdig
409b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyang mngon par 'du mi bya zhing ltung ba yang 'gyur bar mi bya la bshags par yang mi bya'o zhes zer te/ khyams pa 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la drug ces bya ba de ni/ 'di lta
409b6(dkon brtsegs): ste bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas/ khyod cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o// khyams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
409b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/ byang chub sems dpas ste smos kyang ci dgos/ bzhin
409b8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ byas pa mi gzo' ba nyid dang / g.yo sten pa nyid dang brdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang / bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/ bzhi po de dag ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
410a1(dkon brtsegs): #dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba yinan/ byang chub sems dpa'
410a2(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ni dgos/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcang ba dang /
410a3(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs po lag pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnas gang na gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/ gal te de dang
410a4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes la/ 'bru ba med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas na ni/ des der gnas par bya'i/ de de la tha na tha ba dang /
410a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyes par byed na/ yang des de nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la thab dang / ne sdang gi sem
410a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can tu bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji sbed pa de dag thams na
410a7(dkon brtsegs): smos sam/ brgya ba ma/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis pa kha bar gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' des sems can de da cig
410a8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'am brgyal bam/ dbyig pas brdeg pas pa/ mtshon gyis btab pa'i gni ringasas sdig pa dang / sbas pa dang / nyams par mang bskyed par 'gyur masa'am/ byams pa
410b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig cig la smos sam/ brgya pa dam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ mchod gyis bad ba na yang bsod nams ma lags pa mang du skyed lags na/
410b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni sem
410b3(dkon brtsegs): can 'ga' tsam la la yang tha ba dang zhe sdang dang / gnod sems bskyed par mi bya ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
410b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ma gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
410b5(dkon brtsegs): la spyos sam/ brgya pa bam/ dbyig pas brdegs sam/ tshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems cig tsam
410b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig skyed par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de rmas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos de la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi
410b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par byed na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig yin na/ sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal par byang chub sa kyi phyir yang go cha bgo
410b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya dgos par bya dgos so// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong ba 'am/ shing ngam/ rdzas gcod par mi nus pa de lta ba ni
411a1(dkon brtsegs): #du/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos la tha ba dang / zhe sdang bskyed pas zad par byed pa ma gacho/
411a2(dkon brtsegs): par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te/ khyams pa de lta bas na/ khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhes dang bcas pa dang / gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas /
411a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
411a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces ga/ to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la yang zhes dang bcas pa dang / gus pa dang / bcas pas
411a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bgyid lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
411a6(dkon brtsegs): ni bzod pa'i stobs dang / mthu phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni g.yo la skye par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
411a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyi khyim la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa
411a8(dkon brtsegs): babyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bang ping skur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos lhur len par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zas dang / gos spar len
411b1(dkon brtsegs): par mo brjod kyi/ bdag ni pa'i nor yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni phrag dog dang ser sngas kun nas da ris par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni gzhan kyi rtsa
411b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la yid dga' ba dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob
411b3(dkon brtsegs): khar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ri sgrub pa snying por bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lhag pa
411b4(dkon brtsegs): chags par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dor nyung ba dang / bgyi ba nyung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su 'tshol bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis ba gos pa
411b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud kyis grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yid la sa bgyid pa mngon par brtson pas grong dang grong du 'jug par bgyid pa dang /
411b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis cho ga shes par
411b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bradag ni gzhan dag gi bgyis pa
411b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma bgyis pa dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
412a1(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba 'ga' yang phreng bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bdag gi las kyi mtha' sdom par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bslab pa thag ring
412a2(dkon brtsegs): du mi bgyid kyi bdag ni so sor thar pa la slob par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tshe bar sems par mi
412a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni chos kyi bsngags pa brjod cing chos la gyi rjes su mthun
412a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos sgrub pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bad kan dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rten par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das pa/
412a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gzhan rdzis mthong ba bskyed pa'i slad du tshul 'chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi shu gas kyis mchi ma 'byin par bgyid pa dang / bdag ni bgyi ba sna tshogs
412a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dra 'dzis spags te gnas par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos yongs su 'chol ba sa mngon par brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jig rten pa'i bkyi
412a7(dkon brtsegs): la dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdeg ni sog 'jog gi zas dang ldan pa sa
412a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis par rab tu kun tu spyod par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas dang ni yul gcig pa yongs su 'dzin par mi bgyid
412b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dgas ltar kun duchu bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsod snyoms la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tam yo
412b2(dkon brtsegs): su 'chol ba la brtson par gyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni nam gyi cha stong dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor
412b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su brjo brtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'bru 'dzi'i spyod yul brtson par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
412b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni yon tan cung zad tsam gyis chog shes par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni yon tan yongs su 'tshol bas ngoms par ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
412b5(dkon brtsegs): khyi'i chos rnams la kun tu sbyong bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chung zad ba shes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/
412b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni mdza' bshes shin tu brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyis pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni bgyis pa bzo ba dang / bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid
412b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sbyin pa'i lan gyis mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa lhung ba bcom par mi bgyid kyi/
412b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa lhur len pa
412b9(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyed kyi bdag ni lta na la 'jogs rdzas pasam pas mtha zhes su
413a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po la mos par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa ma mchis pa dang / bslab pa la gus par ma mchis par mi
413a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gzhan la smra ba yang
413a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i lce gnyis su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'chos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lhag
413a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rjes su rtson par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal bskyed par mi bgyid kyi/
413a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni gdol pa'i bu 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chags pa dang bcas pas/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyid
413a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ bdag ni tshul khris yongs su dag pa dang / dad pas gsal la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgying ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i
413a7(dkon brtsegs): yid la bgyid ba sngon du btang bas gdugs pas mthas kha na mchis nyam pa dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi bar gyis non par mi myod kyi/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam
413a8(dkon brtsegs): su bsgrub par bgyid pa'i srang du rtag tu brtson cing sbyor bar bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag tus pa brten par mi 'brid kyi/ bdag ni spong panyid la gnas pa
413b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang / 'khrul pa smra bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'a
413b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni lus kyi tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mtha' yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i
413b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi brgyud kyis chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyi chos ston par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gi sbyin pas pa
413b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes su mi bgyid kyi/ bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas mdza' bshes su bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag dang gzhan la yongs su gdung bar mi bgyid kyi/ bdag
413b5(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa'i slad du bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ bsod snyoms la
413b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/ phyag dar khrod pa la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid de/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs gnas par blang
413b7(dkon brtsegs): te gnas par bgyid cing de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la rten pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
413b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su
414a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chol ba la brtson pa la de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrogs par byed pa ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
414a2(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag dang / yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/ legs so leg so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sem byams pas seng ge'i sgra
414a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas pa gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras
414a4(dkon brtsegs): so// dge sbyong chen po dag khyed cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i tshe stan las langs te gar 'dong / de skad ces sbas pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la dge slong
414a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga bcu po de dag gis 'di skad ces sbas so// btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam de sa bu bstan pa'i
414a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas de dag ni srid par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag 'di skab du bdag cag niri yo byad bsrungs pa'i yon tan de dgas yang dag par mi snang bas bdag cas phyir khyim du 'dong
414a7(dkon brtsegs): gor mchag go// de ci'i phyi she na/ dad pas byin pa ni rig par dka' ning sbyang bar dka' ba'i phyir ro mam hA sems pa'i srang dur// de nas 'jam dpal gnor gyur pas
414a8(dkon brtsegs): srong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag migs so sogs so// gang dag dad pas byin pa la yongs su yongs myod par mi gro ba dag gis ni da sa 'dzem par
414b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/ nyin cig la lan brgya rab tu byung ba'i phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa dad pas byin pa la yongs su spyod pa ni des
414b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho cur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas sbal ba ji ltar rjes su gas
414b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal ngas ni rigs pa dang / grol ba la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pas dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sbyor cig/ rtsol cig 'bod cig/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis//
414b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod cig rab tu byung ba las phyir ma ldog shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur la dge slong lnga brgya tsam de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam 'a dpal ga cag gis ji ltar
414b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar bar bgyi lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar myong ba dang / 'bad pa dang / rtsol bar byed pa na chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/
414b7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' yang 'byed par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang thob par mi byed pa dang / chos 'ag
414b8(dkon brtsegs): yang spong bar mi byed pa dang / chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gang yang 'bri bar mi byed pa/ chos 'ga' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig/ dge slong
415a1(dkon brtsegs): gang de ltar sbyor ba de ni chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gang yang mi 'gro gang nas kyang mi 'a
415a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo // gal te 'gro ba med pa de la ni 'ong ba yang 'ga' yang med do// de ni 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya ste/ gang du yang rten pa yang ma yin/ mi rten pa
415a3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len par med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas
415a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad dus lnga brgya pa tham la byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ji snyed cig
415a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos grog yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung sa/
415a6(dkon brtsegs): zas dang gos lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces
415a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du/ gnas gang dag dang / spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lhag ni
415a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa nyam chung ba dang / tshul khri 'chos pa legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag legs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
415b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar gnas de dag zos na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag lags pa de dgas pa/ de dag kyang bdag nyid spang bar 'gyur
415b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus snga ba
415b3(dkon brtsegs): pa tha ma la de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams
415b4(dkon brtsegs): la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dang / sil snyan dang / mar me'i sbyin
415b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro// 'od srung ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yo dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin
415b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur te/ 'od srung ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khye cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang / zhi rab sbyor ba'i
415b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na/ de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// zhes
415b8(dkon brtsegs): de de skad gsungs na/ 'od srung mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs/ spong ba yang spangs/ lung nod pa yang spangs/ kha ton bya ba yang spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
416a1(dkon brtsegs): gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing / de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar sems par byed pa de dag la ltos/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa'
416a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste/ mar me'i snying po ri ra ba tsam btsugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
416a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mar me bus pa bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa gcig gos kyi
416a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po 'am slob dpon gyi drung nas/ tshigs bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung mnos te/ kha na ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dod par byed pa gang yin pa de de bas
416a5(dkon brtsegs): ches bsod nams mang du skyed par gyur to// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
416a6(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / spos kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lo 'bum gyi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum phul ba bas ni/
416a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i gam gyis 'jigs shings ga pa gzhan nig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing sems can gyi 'on sgrub pa na/ dgon pa la med
416a8(dkon brtsegs): pir phyogs te/ gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa dede bas ches bsod nams ming du skyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa
416b1(dkon brtsegs): kyal klu'i ched dam/ brjod pa'i ched du de sad gsungs pa yin grang snyam na/ 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi sa ste/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ de ni des mngon gsum yin pa'i phyir
416b2(dkon brtsegs): / 'od srung sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa na dang / chos grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med pa dang / rgya chen po dang tshad med pa dang /
416b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i cha dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs
416b4(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
416b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag
416b6(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drug gyur to// 'od srung des dus na gling bzhi pa'i khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/ 'od
416b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud de la bu ni dpa' ba dang / rtul pod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to// 'od sru
416b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i bar chos shes bya ba dang / chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'i gnyis shig rdzus te skyes par gyur to// 'od srung rgyal po ma khyud
417a1(dkon brtsegs): des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la mo brgyad khri ba ni stong rdzogs kyi bar du las
417a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / skur gyi gsos dang / yo byad rnams kyis bskyen
417a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la yang zhag pa na bdun bdun 'das shing chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang phul lo// gang dang gang ci dang ci 'dod
417a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang de la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo gang dang gang dag ji lta ji lta bu 'dod pa de dag gi gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang
417a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsig tu bcug go// dge slong re re la yang chags dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo// 'od srung 'di
417a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar rgyal po mu khyud des khang bzangs kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad brgyad cu yod pa/ ngos bzhi khang pa mig can shin tu 'brel pa/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ legs par byas/
417a7(dkon brtsegs): shin du zin par byis pa/ su 'khor gyi sang bus yongs su srung ba byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/ gang gi tshing bzhi gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de lang ba
417a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ 'khrul 'khor gyi srad bur dag gshugs kyis khang bzangs de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam pa du ma'i char dag kyang phab bo// me tog deng /
417b1(dkon brtsegs): gis khang bzangs de dag pus mo nu ba tsam du gang bar yang gyur te zhes 'od srung de skar rgyal po mu krung des de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun du sa
417b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mo du
417b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byas so// 'od srung de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das pa'i phyi de nyin par de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad lags pa'i lag tu/ khye'u chos
417b4(dkon brtsegs): dang chos bzangs gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
417b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyed 'dis yun
417b6(dkon brtsegs): ring po 'di srid du dge ba'i rtse ba bskrun pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gdugs te/ gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams dang /
417b7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/ 'od srung cha de ltar khye'u gnyis gdugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong po'i 'jig rten
417b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten du sa g.yos pa chen po yang byung bar gyur to// 'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i
418a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ lus mo
418a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa des
418a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen ni gang legs/ ci'i phyir slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'a
418a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par 'gyur lags/ 'od srung gis de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba kru ba dka' la 'di skad
418a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gtam de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci bya/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang /
418a6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo la bzod pa bsgom pa ji lta bu dang / snying rje chen po ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i
418a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la
418a8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ sred med kyi bu khyod longs la khye'u 'di gnyis spong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ston cig/ 'od srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des de la khye'u gtsigs
418b1(dkon brtsegs): 2/ rkye tshig yos lag pa ga yoms rba
418b2(dkon brtsegs): baM g.yas pas grangs te/ gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na gdag par ma nus so// des yang rgya cher mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / srob dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par
418b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na/ bran de gnyis sgra'i rtse'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa'am bsgral bar ma nus so// 'od srung des des khye'u de gnyis shin du gyen du 'phang bar bcung
418b4(dkon brtsegs): pan/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang ri dang / rtswa dang shing dang / chu dang bcas pa de rab tu g.yos shing / brla 'og tu 'gul bar gyur kyang / khye'u de
418b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bslang bar mi nus so// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe nyan thos chen po de'i sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
418b6(dkon brtsegs): mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa mdzad te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrub pa de dge slong sred med kyi bu des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'gul ba dang /
418b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa dang / kun tu 'khrugs pa dang brla 'og tu 'gul bar byas kyang / tha na khye'u de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo' 'am/ 'gul bar byed ma nus so// 'od
418b8(dkon brtsegs): srung de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
418b9(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags grang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/
419a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas ring po ma lon pa/ byis pa'i gzugs su mchis nas pa/ lus bong chung ngu 'di gnyis kyis dogasal
419a2(dkon brtsegs): gdugs pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thog pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des dge slong sred med kyi bu de la 'di
419a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// sred med kyi bu khyod ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di ni bsam
419a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa yin pas de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrug pa 'am bsam par sra ba ma yin te/ sred med kyi bu ga la ba nye stong gsum gyi stong
419a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste dper na/ ngas da ltar khyod tha nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de sa
419a6(dkon brtsegs): khu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cing / de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis rnam bskal pa bye ba snyed du rdzu 'phrus
419a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rnam par 'phrul pa byas kyang / de dag gis khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba 'am/ bskul bar mi nus so// 'od srung 'di ltar nga na
419a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mi rtag su tshogs des tshig de skad gsungs par/ 'khor dems srog chags 'bum thag pani bcun gnyis kyis bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
419b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams bskyed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthob pa
419b2(dkon brtsegs): na nyid yin yang / gang la nyan thos chen po 'di dag rdugs par byas te/ bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul des bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar to// bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi
419b3(dkon brtsegs): rlabs de lta bu thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing de ltar yang dag par shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag pa ni bcu rtsa
419b4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes
419b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus de 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
419b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs pa de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad gsol to// bcom
419b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba mdzad cing / khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba yang bstan tu gsol/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa tog sna tshogs
419b8(dkon brtsegs): des de'i tshe se gol gyi sgra mdzad do// se gol gyi des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mngon par grags par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi
420a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing ji snyed du se gol gyi sgras mngon par grags par gyur pa de snyed kho na rnam pa drug tu g.yos par yang gyur to// ji snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu
420a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur pa de srid kho na snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par yang gyur to// 'od srung de nas khye'u de nas gnyis kyis sgra de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung
420a3(dkon brtsegs): nas langs par gyur te/ 'od srung khye'u de gnyis langs par gyur pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas lha dang mi'i sil snyan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag
420a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma gsil ma dkrol bar rol mo'i sgra dag 'byin par gyur cing / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyuto// 'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis langs nas
420a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor pa byas nas thal mo sbar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal du lta zhing phyogs gcig
420a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod ngo do// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs pas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs lnga khye'u 'di
420a7(dkon brtsegs): sa kyis nga'i zhabs kyi drung du gdugs nas ngal yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su nus te/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin par bya ba'i chos sbyin pa yongs
420a8(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang lags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / yongs su gtong ba gang lags pa zil gyis gnon cing yongs su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur/
420b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbyin pa mchis lags sam/ yongs su btong ba mchis lags sam/ dge ba'i rtsa la mchis lags sam/ zhes khye'u 'di gnyis kyis ngas nu ba 'di skad yongs su nus
420b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nabs gnyis la gtugs so// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' zlos gros bzang po des 'di skad ces
420b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sbran pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang
420b4(dkon brtsegs): sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nus pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pa shid du gsol/ 'od srung gis de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
420b5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang / bshad par bya'o// rigs
420b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'dis bsod nams kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' ben par gnas pa zhig dgon pa dang / rab tu dgon pa dag na gnas
420b7(dkon brtsegs): shing se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i zhes bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa de bas ni byang chubasod nams kyi phung po ches che bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyal
420b8(dkon brtsegs): po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdu ba bsdus pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems
421a1(dkon brtsegs): can re res kyang so sor nas rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig skyid pa sbyin par gyur na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
421a2(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa yang dag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i lam du
421a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/ tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa zhig chos thams cad stong pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod cing gnas par gyur na/
421a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni/ se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong
421a5(dkon brtsegs): gi char yang 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag sdong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / khye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi chu dang / grangs dang /
421a6(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpa' dang / nye bar 'jas pa dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i

421b6(dkon brtsegs): khu khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ mkhas pa mngon pa'i sbyang ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di la mos par
421b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po de srid du mngon par 'dus byas pa de tsam du dpag tu med cing / de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa
421b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma de ni/ khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
422a1(dkon brtsegs): la gtugs shing phyag 'tshal ba 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang
422a2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brag stong ga cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / nye bar 'jal ba dang / rgyu'i bar
422a3(dkon brtsegs): du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// 'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra me tog sna tshogs de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun las dge slong brgyad khri stong gis bstan pa
422a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas/ tshig mthun par rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gang dag chos zab mo rnams bzod par 'gyur
422a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang dag chos thams cad stong par mos par bgyid pa dang / gang dag dben pa la dga' zhing dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar bgyid pa
422a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang dag shas de lta bu yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag gi dge ba'i
422a7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba 'di dag la rjes su yod rang ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig brjod par gyur to// 'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des dge slong de dag la legs so
422a8(dkon brtsegs): ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus rjes su yi rang bya ba'i chog de lta bu dag brjod pa ni legs so// gal te khyed cag gi sems dag rnam par
422b1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma gur du zinan/ khyed cag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du bcu gnas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
422b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//
422b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag dang / gang dag la chos thams cad stong pa dang / dben pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / 'dod chags dang
422b4(dkon brtsegs): khrel ba dang / rang bzhin ma mchis par glo ba ches pa mchis pa dang / bzod pa mchis pa dang / mos pa mchis pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang lags so// de nas
422b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od skyong de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la khye'u chos dang /
422b6(dkon brtsegs): chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi bgyid la/ ser sna
422b7(dkon brtsegs): can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun da 'dzin pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing stsol bar bgyid pa de dag mthong na yang de la dga' ba
422b8(dkon brtsegs): kha skyed par mi bgyid pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa
423a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par yang dag rje bgyid lags/ 'od srung de skad ces gsol pa dang /
423a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
423a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi byed la ser lasna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin
423a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par byed pa dang / gang du yang 'di la ste sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang //
423a5(dkon brtsegs): za ba mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang yod su rdzogs par byed de bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / dben
423a6(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sbyin pa yang
423a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar mi byed/ ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / kun 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang del
423a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyed par mi byed pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo la bzod pa dang
423b1(dkon brtsegs): las gyur ba dang / blan med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su kyang la rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bya dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos na
423b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldanan/ sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi byed la/ ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing
423b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa mthong na yang de la dga' ba skyed par mi byed pa dang / gong du yang 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa za na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
423b4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di la byang
423b5(dkon brtsegs): nub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / de mang du thos par gyur nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
423b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / yul 'khor dag dang tu zhugs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa byin par byed pa dang / gang las kyang tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam chung zad kyang re ba med cing / de gos pa
423b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos ston par byed pa dang / de gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
423b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi bsngags shing bstod pa yin pas na mchog yin no zhes dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/ de bdag ni sbyin pa'i dam pa sbyin pa gtso bo 'di la gnas pa
424a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes yang dag par mthong ba na dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed cing / sems can 'jig rten gyi zang zing yongasu gtong bar mngon par brtson pa gzhan
424a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la ni dga' bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag na/
424a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba ji snyed cig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la tshe'i mtha' ji snyed par ma tshang ba med pa'i sbyin
424a4(dkon brtsegs): pa phul bar byed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis spang
424a5(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po kun tu bskyed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran par byed pa na/ gos pa med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi 'dod par
424a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig bsgrags par byed cing / des tshigs su bcad pa de bshad nas kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di lta ste dper
