478b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyi dbang bya ba dang gang na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yod pa ma yin pa de ni nyon mongs par blta bar mi bya ste/ nyon mongs
478b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnod pa ma yin no// byams pa de lta mongs kyi nyon mongs pa gzhan dag la phan par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mi 'gyur ba dang /
479a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chu ngu'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog dang yang bsngo bar bya'o//
479a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa de'i dbang du ni 'gro bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i sgom mongs pa bstan pa yang gzhan yin la/
479a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bskyed pa ma yin pa'i sa la chags pa rnams kyi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
479a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang las kyi sgrib pa
479a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / ma sdad cingam smras la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'tshal bas lnga brgya pa tha ma la bya
479a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mos par bgyi'o/ the tshom mchis pa mang par bgyi'o gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi 'tshal ba dang / phan yang yangs su bzung ba dang /
479a7(dkon brtsegs): snying po bamal bar bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa dor bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod pa rnams las tsham med pa mang bar bya'o
479a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir nem/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spong ba ni 'jig rte thams cang ma mthun pa'i phyir ro// byams pa dper na rgyun du zhugs pa ni so so'i skyem
479b1(dkon brtsegs): spyad pan mang spang la/ byis bas sa'i skye bo dag gi ces par kyang gos pas mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
479b2(dkon brtsegs): ga par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug de dag nyid kyis rgyun du zhugs pa log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar
479b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs yongs su rtogs pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyong pa rnams ni bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir/ chags shing spa la
479b4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par gyur du zin kyang de dag gis yang gzhan la byis pa so so'i skye zas so rnams kyis yang gzhan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis bgal nyal ni sems la kur nas sa
479b5(dkon brtsegs): shing 'dug pa gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems rdul zhing nges 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa rnams dang / mnyam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i
479b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab stong pa rnams ni nyes pa thams cad kyi nang na lci ba byung du zin kyang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis rdul
479b7(dkon brtsegs): du rlog par byed de/ de'i rgyus log par ltung bar 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro// byams pa dper na me'i phung po 'bar ba la ni shing gi tshogs chen pos bstan na/ ji lta dzil
479b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta de ltar de phyir zhing cher 'bar bar 'gyur gyi me shi bar mi 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba de la ni
480a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i len pa ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de lta de ltar de'i shes rab kyi me 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/ shi zhing zad par mi 'gyur ro// byams pade
480a2(dkon brtsegs): bas nA rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
480a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas
480a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byang chub shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pas chos gang dag ni yongs su spang bar bgyi/ chos gang dag ni kun tu bsten par bgyi/ chos gang dag yongs su spong
480a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing kun tu sten par bgyid na/ shes rab stobs bskyed pa ma skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur la/ skyes pa yang rnam par 'phel zhing yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ba lags/
480a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub
480a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' las dang po pas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sna yongs su spang ba dang /
480a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe pa dang 'akur sti'i zhes pa mthong bar bya'o// 'du 'di la dge' pa yongs su spang ba dang / 'du 'dzil dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o// skab la dpal
480b1(dkon brtsegs): sa sa sa tshams pa nga ba byag// mnang mdana'ang yangs mamang ba dang / gzhin la da' ba'i rnal pa mam par stsal/ la
480b2(dkon brtsegs): mangs sa su sa dang / las la dga' ba nas pa mthong bar byar// smras pa la dga' ba yongs su snang ba dang / smras pa la dpa' ba'o nyes pa mdzang bar bya'o//
480b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa yongs su spangs pa des ni 'dod pa chung ba bsgom par bya'o// 'du 'jil dga' ba yongs su spangs pa ni gcig ba ngas
480b4(dkon brtsegs): ba kun tu bsten par bya'o// smra pa la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni don la rtog pa kun tu bsten par bya'o// gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni nam gyi
480b5(dkon brtsegs): cha stong dang / nam gyi cha skad la mi nyal bar kun du bsten par bya'o// las la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni sems can thams cad la byams pa kun tu bsten
480b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// byams pa las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung la shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob par 'dod pas yong
480b7(dkon brtsegs): su spangs par bya ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya'o// kun du bsten par bya'o rnams ni kun tu bsten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir phyir zhe na/ byams pa yi
480b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang rkyen la rag las pa yin la/ mi shes pa yang rkyen la rag las pa yin de de ni rkyen ma tshogs par thob par sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// / 'phags pa dgan
481a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa'i chen po'i mdo// bam po gnyis pa stetha ma'o// / de nas bcom
481a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i
481a3(dkon brtsegs): skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i nongs dmigs ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na/ 'dod pa chung ngul dga' zhing yongs
481a4(dkon brtsegs): su mi gdung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni 'dod chags skyed pa yin par brtag par
481a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sI pa ni dran pa 'jom par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur srin rnying pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang bdud par brtag par bya'o//
481a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyeng ba dang / bkur stin gti mug srung bar brtag par bya'o rnyeng pa dang / bkur sbyini bdag gi don sgrub par khyim la ser sa byed pa dang chags par byed par brtag par byas
481a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkar sa ni 'phags pa'i rigs pa ni yongs su spong bas ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sgo ni sangs
481a8(dkon brtsegs): mas cad kyis ma gnang bar brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur smin
481b1(dkon brtsegs): rnarnams la myang du gsong par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sta ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sa ni gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par
481b2(dkon brtsegs): chog par bya'o// rnyeng pa dang / bkur sti ni dge pa'i rtsa ba 'phrog par rtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sbyin zlog dang 'khor lo dang / lce 'debs pa la bur brtag par byam
481b3(dkon brtsegs): rung ba dang / bkur sti ni sngags pa mang pos sngags par dag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / spongs mo ster pa'i khyim la lta bar brtag par bya'o//
481b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni yid mi bde ba bskyed ba rtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni blo rnam par 'khrul bar byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sdug pa
481b5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir mya ngan skyed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi brjod par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed po nyi dang /
481b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su nyams par byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed
481b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bkur sti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par brtag par bya'o//
481b8(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni sngar bkur sti byed la phyis bkur sti mi byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni mdza' ba dag dang gnas par byed par brtag par
482a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni pha rol 'jid pa'i smad 'tshong ma dang bar brtag par bya'o//
482a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni bsam gtan dang chad med pa yongs su spyod par brdag bur bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sbyi ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro'i sgra gnas dang / ga
482a3(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten du byung ltung bar byed par brtag par bya'o// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti ni lha sbyin dang lhag spyod kyi tshig dang mthun par brtag par bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
482a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la nyes dmigs gang dge brtag par bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'di dag go// brtag nas kyang 'dod pa chung bya'i/ yongs su gdung ba ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
482a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa chung ba la skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag med pa'i phyir te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/ khyim pa dang rab du
482a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dag yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin/ lha dang mi rnams yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir gnas pas rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/ ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
482a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis skrag pa med pa yin/ bsdigs pa dang bral bas zil gyis mi gnon pa yin bdud kyi yul las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ sdug bsngal
482a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par 'dod par bya ba yin/ bsam gtan la goms par byed par gsal ba yin/ g.yo dang sgra spangs pa dang /
482b1(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
482b2(dkon brtsegs): rang ba'i man na lnga la ston hU~M lte bas pas yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas che sbas pa de bzhin byed pa yin mkhas pa rnams dang tshangs pa mthus
482b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams kyis 'dod pa yin te/ byams pa phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang / bkur
482b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad spang ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dod pa chung ba la gnas par bya zhing / 'dod pa chung ba kun tu bsten par
482b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// ro ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
482b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'dra 'ji la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ 'du 'ji la dga' ba'i skyon de dag ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na/
482b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du 'dzi'i las dmigs ni nyi shu pa
482b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin te/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la lus kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ dgra gis ma bsdams pa yin/ yid kyis ma bsdams pa yin/ 'dod chags
482b9(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin/ zhe sdang che ba yin/ gti mug che ba yin/ 'jig rten pa'i gang gis kyang gos pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gdam las yongs su nyams pa nang /
483a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la mgus pa la bsten pa yin/ chos yongs su spangs pa yin/ de la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa yin/ bag med pa bsten pa yin/ ba
483a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de rtog pa dang g.yeng ba shas che ba yin/ mang duthos pa las yongs su nyams pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi thob pa yin/ chu myur du
483a3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod par mi 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ chos la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/ dge 'dun la dga' ba
483a4(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su nyams pa yin te/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la brtags
483a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//
483a6(dkon brtsegs): chags spangs shing zhe sdang rab spangs shing // rnal 'byor can ni 'du 'ji mi gnas te// de ni de la gzhol zhing de la 'bab// nyes pa des na dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/
483a7(dkon brtsegs): rgod dang dgod pa de bzhin rnam rtog pa// 'di dag thams cad 'dra 'dzirna mas las byung // snying po med pa'i 'du 'jis byed pa// de ni lang yang spyod cing ma bsdams yon
483a8(dkon brtsegs): byis pa das ni 'jig rten ska la dga'// byas pa de dag mchog gag ma las rnams// na sdang 'phel nang rnam rtog gis kyang che// ches pa des ni la mi chags sa
483b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa ma yid sbal dga' bskyed nas// dge slong thos pa rnam par 'phel mi byed// de lA bas na mi rigs sgra spangs la// chos la rtag du dga' ba thob par gyis/ byang rlab mas
483b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod phyir nga yis ni// rang gi yan lag lan stong slang du btang // chos nyan pas ni ngal ngoms med na// de dag chos nyan pa ma skyo bar 'gyur// tshigs pani ba'i tshigs su bca
483b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir// nga na chung ma bu la dga' ma gyur// rgyal srid dag dang longs spyong ngas spang na// mkhas pa ji ltar chos ni nyan mi byed// rigs min skya dang dam pa pi sgru ba// dam pa
483b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu yongasu spang bar bya// bskal pa brgya phrag du mar gang bkod pa// chos kyi dam pa de la dga' skyed cig/ thar pa 'dod pa yon tan don nyer bas// 'jig rten bya ba
483b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btsal mi bya// gang zhig zas dang gos kyi don tsam 'dod// de ni mchog dang gtso bor bsngags pa yin// gang zhig 'dri zhing dge slong legs par 'ongs// skar
483b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gting gis tshur shog 'dug par gyis// mi yi rnyed pa'i rab dkon rnyed 'gyur zhing // gcig la gcig ni chos kyi gtam yang bya// lung nod la don bya dang / bsam gtan rnams
483b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi dkar po'i phyogs rnams 'phel gyur tam// gal te khyon 'dod pa che bar gyis// khyod la'ang bdag 'di skabs ni dbye bar gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mu
483b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'das nas// bstan pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na// dge slong dag ni shin tu rgod cing khengs// dgon pa bor nas 'dra 'dzi dga' bar 'gyur// rnyed par/
484a1(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin zas ched du// nyin dang mtshan rnams su yang gtan byed la// byis pa dag ni gnyid log gyur na yang // lo tog skye ba'i rmi lam rmi bar
484a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ byis pa 'di kun shes pa rab tu nyams// ngan song ngan 'gro gsum du gzhol 'gyur gyis// dga' ba dang ni mos pa bskyed nas kyang // bse ru lta bur rtag tu nag
484a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis// yon tan 'dod pa nags na gnas pa yis// pha rol dag gi skyon la rtag mi bya// bdag ni khyad par 'phags shing bdag mchog ces// de snyam du ni sems
484a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed mi bya'o// rgyags 'di bag med kun gyi rtsa ba skye ste// dge slong dman la brnyas par yongs mi bya// bskal pa gcig gis thar pa thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni bstan pa 'di
484a5(dkon brtsegs): la go rims yin// de ltar dge slong yon tan 'dod gyur pa// dpa' bos mi rigs brjod pa spangs nas kyang // dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba yis// gser+ya 'dra
484a6(dkon brtsegs): bar daston par gnas pa b+ha// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'dis ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dis
484a7(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i chos yongs su spong ba'i skad du/ 'dre 'dzin ngas pa mang po'i skyon chags shing // yon tan ma mchis la gnod pa dang ldan te/ 'du 'dzi tshan mongs pa 'phel
484a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid cing spyod pa bzang ba ma lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba su zhig gcig pu dga' ba la
484b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rtogs
484b2(dkon brtsegs): don rnam par nges pa la dga' zhing / don la rtogs pas yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sa
484b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shu yod par brtag
484b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la dge slong smra ba la dga' ba ni mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pa ni gus pa med par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa'i sba ba ltar
484b5(dkon brtsegs): len pas phyogs la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang / nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang bral bas/ dran pa rjed par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu ma sbyangs
484b6(dkon brtsegs): pas shis bzhin med par spyod par gyur pa dang / chos la bzod pa las nyams pas khengs pa dang 'dud par 'gyur ba dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su spangs pas
484b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang / smra ba'i spobs pas dus ma yin par smra bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i shes pa ma thob pas ma bsdams par 'gyur ba dang /
484b8(dkon brtsegs): lha dang klu rnams kyis mi bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rigs par thob pa rnams kyis blar 'gyur ba dang / lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams kyis pa spyong
485a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / bsgrub pa la mi gnas pas yid la bcags par 'gyur ba dang / the tshom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba dang / snga lhur
485a2(dkon brtsegs): len pas thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul can yin pas 'dod pas yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba
485a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rtog par mi byed pas/ myur du chos spong bar byed pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan rtsom pas mi rten med par 'gyur ba dang / sems yongasu yam dul bas bkur sti med pa thob
485a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du ma chud pas gzhan gyi dring 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams yongs su ma shes pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ste/
485a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga' zhing sgra lhur len la don la rtog par dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs yin no// de nas dang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'ad
485a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// thos pas rgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te// rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la rnachags// brjed par 'gyur zhing shes
485a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med par 'gyur// skal dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// nang gi sems las shin tu ring bar 'gyur// lus dang sems kyang rang sbyangs ma yin 'gyur// khengs par
485a8(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dud pa mang bar 'gyur/ skal dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ byis pa dam pa'i chos bas ma rab tu nyams// sems ni mi mingon shin tu rtsub par 'gyur// na
485b1(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring // skal dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dgag/ chag tu tham dgal gus pa med// sngags pa'i gtam dgal ni dga' babyung// slong ba meng lags
485b2(dkon brtsegs): shing shes rab 'bas// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni lha tshogs rnams kyis mi bkur zhing // de tshe de la'ang 'dod pa mi skyed la// so so yang dag rig las
485b3(dkon brtsegs): nyams 'gyur te// sgra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// gang dag lus ni mngon sum mang yod pa// mkhas pa de dag gis ni skyo bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa de dag gis ni sto ba
485b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de'i srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste// sbru la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// bdag ni bsgrub nyams da ni ci bya zhes// 'chi ba'i dus tsho byis pa mya ngan byed// gting rnyed ma
485b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// sprul dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// rtsa bskyod bzhin du 'gul zhing g.yo ba ste// de ni de ltar the tshom 'gyur du nges// de ni nam yang blo brtan mi 'gyur te/
485b6(dkon brtsegs): sbal dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ gar la lta ba'i khrod na 'dug pa zhig/ dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan brjod pa bzhin// bdag nyid nan tan nyams par 'gyur ba ste// smra la da
485b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// de'i sems ni rna ba'i rnam shes la// rab tu chags shing sgras rgyas shes rab nyams// log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar 'gyur// sprul dga'
485b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni g.yo ldan yang zhing re chad 'gyur// phyi phyir zhing ni rnam par 'gying ba rtsom// 'phags pa'i dam pa'i chos las rab tu ring // sla la dga' ba'i
486a1(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go/ mthu chung bsti stang gis ni dgar 'gyur te// mi shes ldan pa g.yo zhing 'gyur ba yin// spre'u ltar de'i sems ni g.yo bar
486a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ sbru la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ rang gi blo ni shes rab dman pa'i phyir// rmongs pa de ni gzhan gyis dring la 'jog/ de ni nyon mongs phyogs kyi dbang du 'tsha
486a3(dkon brtsegs): smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go// mig kyang 'khrul zhing de bzhin rna ba'ang 'khrul// sna yang 'khrul cing de bzhin lce yang 'khrul// lus kyang 'khrul cing yid
486a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'khrul par 'gyur// smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ yun rings dus nas sgra la dga' bas na// de ni bdag nyid dga' ba mi thob bo// tshig gang dga' ba
486a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas thob 'gyur na// tshig gcig tsam zhig bsams kyang mchog yin no// bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med// dga' bar bya ba'i ron nang na 'jug/ sum
486a6(dkon brtsegs): bas nas mis ni bu ram ro// zhim po rnyed par 'gyur ba ma yin no// ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste// ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin// de lta bas na sprul dga' spangs
486a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms shig/ smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtogs gyur cing // don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
486a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang yin pa skal dga' ba des ni don bsam pa la dga' bar gyis/ nges nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byams
486b1(dkon brtsegs): bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sla ba la dga' ba'i skyor rnams dang / don la sems dpa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs pa
486b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' snying po 'tshal ba rnams kyis mngon bsam pa btang ste/ snying po ma mchis pa'i zla ba la dga' ba
486b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ni rngo ma thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyis dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar brtag par bgyi byang chub sems dpas
486b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar brtags na/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi nongs dmigs mthong nas/ brtson 'grus brtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
486b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus brtsom pa la dga'
486b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnyid che ba ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis gnon te/ le lo che bar 'gyur ba dang /
486b7(dkon brtsegs): lus sha che ba dang / mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nang bzhis gnon par 'gyur ba dang / de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang /
486b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang // de'i lus la 'bras dang / phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / le lo tsam du 'gyur ba dang / de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam
487a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i shes rab nyams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de kha zas 'dod pa las yig 'dru bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug ni
487a2(dkon brtsegs): mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang / sems rdul bar 'gyur ba dang / mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems
487a3(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba
487a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyong ba la smon pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du na song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang
487a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byams byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus brtsom pa la
487a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
487a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de'i lus ni sha che mkhregs ma yin// le la de che blun zhing mthun mi byed// de'i mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur
487a8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bad kan rlung dang de bzhin 'khris rnams// dengag de'i lus lags cher 'byung // de'i mkhas rnams rab tu 'phrul bar 'gyur// gang ni gzugs dang gnyi la gal du
487b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pas ma tsa// sras byung tshul rnams mamatshas kyang gas sa ba sa 'a / gangs sa
487b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la po la mog mang pa 'byung // de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal// de la rma rnams maM babang 'byung bar 'gyur// gang zhes rmugs dang ga med la dga' 'a
487b3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ le lo byed tsang brtson 'grus yongs su nyams// de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'gribs// de ni rtag tu zhan cing sems kyang rmongs// gang zhig rmugs dang gzhi
487b4(dkon brtsegs): la dga' 'gyur ba// gti mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing // de ni the tshom can de la thob// de ni lta bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga'
487b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de'i shes rab shin tu nyams chung 'gyur// de'i blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur// ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid
487b6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' 'gyur ba// mi shes le lo snyoms las shes rab 'tshal// mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de// nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tsher bar 'gyur/
487b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// sems kyang rdul zhing de'i dran pa rmongs// lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas// chos smra na yang de ni rtag tu thogs/
487b8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// da mi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur// rnam par 'khor zhing g.yol rmongs pa dang // de yi sems na
488a1(dkon brtsegs): gdung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags// lus kyang gdungs
488a2(dkon brtsegs): shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs// bag la nyal bar nges mi shes// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de// de ni chos la 'dun
488a3(dkon brtsegs): paskyed mi byed// phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams// byis pa yon tan kun
488a4(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su nyams// dkar po 'jom zhing mun par 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing seMs kyang rab tu num
488a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur// gnyid kyis non pa'i lus kyang lhod par 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bdag nyid mi shes le lo
488a6(dkon brtsegs): nan gyur nas// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed// brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan sla// ces pa 'di 'dra'adi dag rtogs gyur na/ mkha
488a7(dkon brtsegs): bsu yigazugs gnyid dga' bar byed// shin du ga'i mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu/ don babang dam chos yon dan spyang ston pa// gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par
488a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na/ maMkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su ni ga der dga'// rdzun bsngal kun dang mun pasel byed cing // 'anas yongs su spang ba'i gzhir pa// sangs rgyas bum
488b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa'i brtson 'bras 'phags// gang yin ngan chos tu bstan par gyis// 'jig chen 'dzin paso gang tsa mo dang / 'ag sa sa co na ma
488b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na// mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus spobs kyis sgo// gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag rmugs gnyid
488b3(dkon brtsegs): skyon rnams mthong nas ni// rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsom pa gnas par byed// ri ni nga yis de dag bskul byas shing // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa
488b4(dkon brtsegs): nga sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyi spyor 'di lta bu 'di dag ga nas
488b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ slong bar mi bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang // brtson 'grus brtsom pa mi skyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan
488b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
488b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag kyi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na// le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams skyed par mi bgyid/ brjon
488b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis yon tan dang / phan yon 'di lta bu thos na/ byang chub kyi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ zhug su zhig brtson 'grus brtsom par mi bgyid de/
489a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus bcom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal pa lags so/
489a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags pas pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gang dag
489a3(dkon brtsegs): la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi bzhud la/ dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du/ rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
489a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rno//
489a5(dkon brtsegs): na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung ba dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i phyir/ rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// ni shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa
489a6(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la btsun par 'gyur ba das lab na thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ldan pa dang / yi na la garnam
489a7(dkon brtsegs): mas sa pang 'gyu pa sa nang dus na ga sa ga'ang rnams sbyang bar gyur 'a pa mam pas man mam 'dzin pa
489a8(dkon brtsegs): brnams par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can rnams kyi man mying bar ma byed pa dang / da'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'dus par 'gyur ba
489b1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyims so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / zlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon pa mtshas
489b2(dkon brtsegs): la rgyun du gnas pa dang / khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang / ro ro dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa skyed par byed pa dang / len pa med par dga' ba dang / kun nas mam
489b3(dkon brtsegs): sems mang ba las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge slong dang / dge bsnyem ma la rngon par 'gyur ba dang / de zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' ba
489b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang / mi rigs pa'i sla ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / zhal da byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mdzang
489b5(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gis 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan zhing rnam
489b6(dkon brtsegs): par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyen par brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i spags pas spags
489b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las la
489b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub la brtson par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te// de ni las ngan ngag la gnas gyur tsang
490a1(dkon brtsegs): las mchog dag la de ni rgyang yang ring // 'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur// rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin// dge slong lung nang
490a2(dkon brtsegs): kha don dga' rnams kyis// de las brnyas shing 'dod par mi byed la// bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// rtag tu las gnas skyod ni 'di dag yin// 'khor ba'i
490a3(dkon brtsegs): las la mngon par brtson pa dang // thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas// de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa yin/
490a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed// yongs su 'dzin pa med la dga' mi byed/ nor med nor ni ngon du gnyer bar byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa yin/
490a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags par 'gyur// 'du 'dzi dga' bas thams cad 'jig rjed par byed// gzeb kyi nanang du bya bcug ji bzhin 'gyur// ces pa 'di dag las la chags
490a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed// yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang mi ying mi 'byung / nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te/ zhes pa 'di ga las
490a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba yin// bla mas bskul na bka' blom bde zhing // rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin ma byung// de ni myung du tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur// zhes pa 'di sa
490a8(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' ba yin// khyiman mdas pa'i las rnams chag sems pas// de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba'o// bsam gtan dang ni spong bar de mi byed// zhes pa
490b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag las la dga' ba yin// de'i 'dod chags shas ni che bar ste// de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhe na// de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' mi 'gyur/ zhes pa 'dim
490b2(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' ba yin// de na 'khor ba phal cher dga' 'gyur te// de nyams na ni shin du sdug bsngal 'gyur// ri na bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur// zhes pa 'di dam
490b3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba yin// de sems rtag tu gnod ses ldan par 'gyur// las rnams 'phel zhing bang par mi 'gyur te// srid pa'i 'chi shing dag gis ram du bcings
490b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag las la dga' ba yin// de ni nag tu bla ma rnams mi rten// de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi rten// phyogs 'ad khyim pa la ni rnyed par byed// tshul khrims sa
490b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag la'ang phrag dog byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba yin// nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni// zas dang gos la rgyun du semam par byed// de ni rtag tu
490b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'dod ma yin// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba yin// de ni 'jig rten pa yin bya ba 'dri// rigs pa ma yin smra ba rnams la dga'// rigs pa'i smras pa
490b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las dga' ba yin// sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe// dbang phyug nyes pas de dag des char gcod// mi sdug las
490b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon par 'du byed de// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba yin// de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing // bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la// yon
492a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos po yongs su 'dzi
492a2(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pagal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lung nor pa dang / khadzan
492a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la brtson pa dang / zhal ta byed pa'i sngags pas sngags par byed na/ bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur
492a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ las kyi sgrib pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir na na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung
492a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i
492a6(dkon brtsegs): bar ched mi bya'o// 'dzam bu gling 'di zhal ta byed par yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal te byed pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrung nang pa dang
492a7(dkon brtsegs): kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa// kha ton byed pa la byed brtson pa 'dzam bu snying gang bstan
492a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag par rdzog brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su ma
492b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gnang ba yin te/ de dag gi bsnyen bkur ni lags par byas pa yin na// gang nag shes rab spyang par la mos nas ram tho dang bsnyen bkur byas pa'i chul grangs
492b2(dkon brtsegs): bu ba ni nga med bur 'gyur ro// de ci'i byor zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi las ming / 'a ba'i las dang blan med pa dang / shing dmeng pa dang / 'dzig
492b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de lta bas ni byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtsod pa don du gnyer zhing / brtson 'grus
492b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsom par 'dod pa'i shes rab la brtson par bya zhing // shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
492b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzil dga' ba dang / las la dga'
492b6(dkon brtsegs): bdang rnams kyi dngos dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar
492b7(dkon brtsegs): brtags par bgyi// byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
492b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas spobs pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs pa rnams mdo brgyud nyi shu po 'di dag tu brtag par bya'o// rgyas pas
493a1(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par snyan te/ mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro// mi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
493a2(dkon brtsegs): spros pa la dga' ba tshe 'di la sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas pa dang / bzod pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang / de'i mi mdza' ba rnams
493a3(dkon brtsegs): yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge' ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar
493a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab dang khon du 'dzin pa dang / rtsod pa dang bgyed pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang /
493a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin pa dang / de lce'i dbang po chu
493a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams legs par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur ba dang /
493a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrag par 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba'i lam bgyis
493a8(dkon brtsegs): das par 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang / rgyun ma rkang par yang du ma 'ong ba'i tshe mdzes par 'gyur ba dang / gang de dag du skyes pa de dang de ma tsham can du 'gyur ba dang
493b1(dkon brtsegs): drug tu de'i de la mi khom pa brgyad po dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang / nag tu de'i dkar ba'i phyogs brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po dang /
493b2(dkon brtsegs): rismos pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdzar bsdus pa yin te// de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
493b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi 'gyur te// bzod pa ring zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas// de'i dgran pas dpa' bar 'gyur ba
493b4(dkon brtsegs): spos skyong de'i nyes pa 'di dag go// bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// bdud kyi phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur// de'i dge ba'i chos skyes chung
493b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ spos sbyong de'i nyes pa 'di dag go/ de ni nams kyang dge ba mi skyed do// 'chi kar tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang // ngan song 'gro ba'i lam ni byed par 'gyur/
493b6(dkon brtsegs): spya na'i nyes pa 'di dag go// mi mdzes pa dang bltan mi sdug gang // de'i rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur// de'i lce'i dbang po rngub par 'gyur// sgras spyod da
493b7(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go// lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gangs shing // lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur// dge' ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam
493b8(dkon brtsegs): par spong // spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ sdig pa'i grogs po dgra dang phrad par 'gyur// dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par rag 'gyur zhing // mi 'dod pa'i tshig
494a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams rgyan du thob// smos spyod de'i nyes pa 'di dag go// byis pa'i blo can de ni gang skyes der// yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing // bdag tu des ni chom
494a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur// spos spyod de'i nyes pa 'di dag go// de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur// de ni ngal ba ldan pa'i mchog mi 'gyur// de la gnod pa 'di dag nag byung ste/
494a3(dkon brtsegs): spos spyod pa de'i nyes pa 'di dag go// de'i dge ba dgal bar chad mang // bgegs su 'gyur bas myur du thob mi 'gyur// rtsod dang ldan yang de la ngas rnams 'byung // skyes spyod pa
494a4(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go/ mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni// spos ma thams cad yongs su spong bar bya// smos spyod dag ni nongs pa rnyed par smra// de lta bas na sbas la gnas
494a5(dkon brtsegs): ma bya/ gang ma spros pa'am rtsod pa yod pa las// dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol 'gro ba'i mchog/ gang mnyan mongs yod po de dag tu// yung tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi b+hU
494a6(dkon brtsegs): rab byung ngan 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams// snang ba'i sems kyis myong bar ma byed cig/ khyed la ming med nang las tshong bya med// gang can dpyir 'ad das 'byung ba
494a7(dkon brtsegs): lci thung bram ma/ tshogs kyang yang ma snam// rgyun pa rnam pa bye nga phyu / mas ban pa ma ma
494a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems pa yin// dur smrig gos rnams dang pas blangs nas ni// ni zhing rab ni nye bar zhi bar byos// smos pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa skyed// mi bzang sems ni
494b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul gdug 'dra bar srungs// spos la skyong ba sems can myal ba dang // dung 'phro gshin rje'i yul dang ring mi 'gyur// de skangs na bzod pa brtson 'grus skyed// tshogs pasan
494b2(dkon brtsegs): smras par byed ni// sdug bsngal gi sad dang 'chi ba ci yang rung // gaur brdeg dang bsdig pa de dag ni// 'jig rten 'din gnas pa rnams la 'gyung// tshogs pa
494b3(dkon brtsegs): lazhes pa 'ji ga dkon/ tshogs b+har bag la nyal 'phel ba med// tshogs gyur rnams la dga' ba 'byung 'gyur na// mkhas pa su nig tshogs pa snying las 'byung
494b4(dkon brtsegs): glags tshol dag gi spyong rnams rnyed mi 'gyur// nams kyang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te// de'i mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun tu 'byung // smos pa spangs pa'i phar yon
494b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin// theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dga' 'gyur zhing // las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byung nas ni// stobs dang bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud btul cing // ba
494b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin des ni bzang ba bskyed// spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags// nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus// rtag tu spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur//
494b7(dkon brtsegs): mu zhig dor gnyer nges ni bzod pa skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'ongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
494b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs po de tsam du gleng pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das ci lnga
495a1(dkon brtsegs): patha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gis mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyong pa yang spong par 'gyur lags sam bka' stsal pa/
495a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ skyo bar 'gyur ning kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur ba 'byu
495a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de ga ni nyung ngo // byams pa gang sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa mi byed pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal la gnas dang / gcig la gcig the tshom za ba dag ni phal che ste// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
495a4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i mdo sde bab mo bstan pa'i yan tan dang / phan yon zab dag lung nod par mi bye ba kha ton du ma byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun rngub par mi byed/ de dag las kyi sgrib pa shas chebs yon ma
495a5(dkon brtsegs): a pan yon de ga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ ga dad ma med pa des mang sde de dag la tshim tha par 'gyur / tsas kyang chung no par mi byed byor byang ma byis gan rnab par ma byed dag ni drung du bdu rnas
495a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas su 'gyi/ pa na du rje dzin sa pa mas pa da da zhin gag gas pas sum pam mi / byang ba ma ga sems ca na ma
495a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung ni med pa'i phyi mas pasno pa byed do/ ga pang ngas pa bajug pas mang sna ba mo ma da kyis chom du gyur sa su na pa sa
495a8(dkon brtsegs): byag mi rnan pa'i gags yon na dang / rin man dag tshan 'dis kyis spong bas byung ba'i las kyinam par rnyed pan snad par midris sa gas du migs so// das pa ma'am ras 'byang chu semams
495b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa na po rnams pas sa ma namamamatsham ldan ma mas mas ma mad byam ma ba ga sangs pasas gang lags pa mam sa rnams
495b2(dkon brtsegs): yang yi bzhig das nga cing babadzin gshegs pa rtsed dngam mad tshang la bgyid pa sangs rgyas kyis mang de grub pa gang sa bcom ldan 'dasasams paskye napags sem
495b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa sems bskyed pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi nang
495b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yim skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin pa byan
495b5(dkon brtsegs): ba sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/ sem
495b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / che ba yongs su spangs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
495b7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti mgos pas bsamam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas
495b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad pakhyen pa nyid ma rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa meng pas sems cathams cad bla ma bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi yang lag nges pas 'i che ba'i gdam gyir byung
496a1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma bya ba'i sems paskyed pa dang ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nas bskyed pa dang / mam yongs su grangasams cas marnam
496a2(dkon brtsegs): brdung ba ste/ byams pa sems bskyed pa bumam dag yin pa/ sems bsgyung ba bcwa bri dadaga'as sems pa stod pa gang mang ru ba sangan byud pas med padzod sems rjod pa
496a3(dkon brtsegs): / sangs nas der sngo bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma nga// 'das bcas ldan las la tshe dang ldan pa dran pa'abs 'dzin ca nas sa gadzangs rnam
496a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe ring ldan pa kun pan
496a5(dkon brtsegs): po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kun dga' bo legs so legs so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
496a6(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag skad bka' dang / tshe dang
496a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha dang / maM dang / lA ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon sachog brdegs pa/
496a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i chos kyi rnam sangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i bya ba'i le'u ste/ sipra rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi dra dang/
496a9(dkon brtsegs): su le po dang / che rgyal chab ba mags rnams somam pas su seMms nanal /
